Summary: They employ thieves. Had 40 dollars go missing and to verify that I didn't just misplace, I set out another 40 and that also went missing. Also a very run down hotel, too expensive for how low quality the building is.
Manager Response: Dear A6072RVevank, Thank you for providing us with your feedback. I am deeply saddened to hear that your stay with us was marred by this incident. I can assure you that we have very clear security procedures and protocols in place and so your experience leaves us incredibly concerned. Once reported, an investigation is immediately performed and the outcome relayed to you. I am sure you will agree that we made every effort to ensure a delightful stay and would be delighted to speak with regarding the above matter. We consider your opinion and feedback invaluable.  Regards, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Management

Summary: I have several groups here and I cannot say enough about this hotel. First, I work with Viera Valones to book my groups and she is amazing at ensuring my groups have everything they need. She is always stopping in to make sure they have coffee and water and that the temperature for the room is perfect. She is absolutely amazing.   The Chef is great and even comes out and ensures that my group has everything the need when they order food. The food is awesome and I always eat at the hotel even though there are plenty of great restaurants in the area. ..  The rooms are always great and clean and no one in my group has complained about the rooms for any reason. They are following strict guidelines for Covid 19 and have not had any issues.
Room tip: Awesome Rooms and GREAT service!  Rooms are quieter on the higher floors.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Claudia Celia has made my stay fantastic!  1. Even with limited availability, she was able to extend my stay and keep me in the same room. 2. She helped me make copies/prints of my resume as there aren’t open business facilities. 3. Claudia provided a gracious greeting and is a great first impression each morning- a friendly face I look forward to seeing. I hope Hilton can take special care of such a great employee. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recognizing the exceptional staff that you encountered while visiting! We do pride ourselves on always providing top notch exceptional service to all of our guests. It is so fantastic to hear that you were able to experience and recognize that. We would love to have you back again for another perfect experience! Regards, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Management

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here for our Disneyland vacation. There is construction happening in the lobby but it didn’t really disrupt our time. We loved the large rooms, friendly service, delicious cookies, and pool/hot tub area. Our only issue was the parking. We weren’t aware or informed that there was a parking structure adjacent to the hotel, so when we arrived back to the hotel at 11pm with sleeping kids in the car we circled the outdoor parking lot for 20 mins before I went inside to inquire about additional parking. Once they told us about the 5 story parking garage we could use it was a non-issue, I just wish they had told us about this parking option when we checked in.
Manager Response: How thrilling it was to see your rating of your stay at our hotel! I am happy it was practically perfect in every way! I am especially pleased to know you had such wonderful experiences with our hotel staff. We rely on them to help create the best experience possible, and we are elated about the positive impact this had on your visit. We will certainly recognize all the team members who contributed to give you a seamless experience. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.  Regards, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Management

Summary: My family stayed for two nights we had two rooms for a party of six both of which were not clean! In one of the bathrooms there was a lot of black mold in the shower  it was disgusting. I asked to switch rooms I was assured they would give us a new room when we came back late that night after are activities there was a new person at the front desk she had no idea we’re supposed to have a new room. There is no communication among the employees we had to Waite 30 minutes for her to get us a room. The next morning at check out there was a different employee and again he had no idea what was going on. Would not recommend 0 out of 10!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I would like to extend to you my sincerest apology for any inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay with us. Our goal is to consistently provide extraordinary guest experiences, and I regret that we missed the mark in this effort. Your stay will be evaluated with full and intricate detail by our hotel management to prevent it from reoccurring. Naturally we aspire to deliver faultless service and I can see that there were many aspects of your stay that were truly disappointing.  I hope you can give us another chance in the future to show you how wonderful our property really is. Regards, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Management

Summary: Husband and I always get the best nights of sleep at the Double Tree Anaheim/Orange location. The City View is amazing and perfect location - walking distance to the Outlet and really good restaurants. Also close to Disneyland.  Those yummy warm cookies are an added plus! Highly recommend this location to those visiting Anaheim/Orange California.
Manager Response: We cannot thank you enough for your glowing review of our property! We strive to provide excellent service and accommodations to each of our guests with hopes of surpassing all guest expectations. We always pride ourselves on being able to provide an environment in which our guests can relax and truly feel special. We thank you for your patronage and sincerely look forward to hosting you comfortably again in the not too distant future.

Summary Heading: A lot of construction inside hotel, very loud construction.
Summary: Hotel is doing a lot of re-model work in the common areas near the registration desk and bar area. because of this, breakfast was horrible due to very loud construction noise, sawing on metal and bagging. Looks like it will be going on for weeks or months so be aware.
Manager Response: Your feedback is certainly not reflective of the experiences we strive to create and we hope you can accept our sincerest apologies. The comfort and joy of each of our guests is a top priority for everyone on our team and we regret to learn that we fell short of providing you with a perfect experience.  We only get one chance at making a wonderful first impression that reflects our legendary guest service.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: The rooms are cheap for a reason. Room smelled like Doritos, house keeping had there tv blasting. Beds are super small, and not super close to disneyland and there is no shuttle! Just not worth the money.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your visit. We pride ourselves on offering signature experiences, so I apologize for theinconveniences you encountered.  We strive to provide excellent service and accommodations to each of our guests with hopes of surpassing all guest expectations. We’re always seeking out ways to improve our guests’ experience, so I appreciate you sharing your perspective with us. We would love nothing more than to have another chance to deliver to you a truly memorable and impeccable experience.

Summary: I am spending about 150 nights in SoCal and this hotel has now become my "go to hotel" in the area. I tried a lot of other hotels but noe stay with this one because : - very friendly, helpfull, competent and professional staff - one of the last hotel providing above average quality with reasonable value for money - good location ( 35 minutes walk to Honda Center, 15 minutes walk to Platinum Triangle, 45 minutes walk to Santa Ana Main Place ... )
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am thrilled our team made such a positive impression during your stay with us. The guest experience is the most important aspect of a hotel stay and that can't be achieved without a passionate team! Thank you so much for your kind words. We can't wait to welcome you back!

Summary: Maybe its a California thing or a Hilton thing,  but I think its pretty cheesy to require an addition fee to park. The prices are pretty excessive already then add parking is, I wasn't overly impressed. That said, nice hotel. No refrigerator so plan accordingly!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Keith! Our convenient location as well as impeccable service, accommodations and amenities make us a very desired hotel. Our parking rates are commensurate with those of the area hotels and are published on our website and on all the online travel platforms, such as Expedia, etc. We commiserate if this was a surprise and can understand that there would be a measure of disappointment if this were the case. Our wish is that you will stay with us several times more on your next trips. Our staff is always ready to welcome you. We like to spoil our loyal guests and we look forward to delivering unparalleled service to you.

Summary: If you want a room for a Disney trip, it is fine.  If you areas Business travel or with multiple nights, NEVER will I stay there again,  remote battery not replaced as asked of the front desk.  Still no in  -room refrigerator after 3 nights.  Was told sold out , even though parking lot less than  half full the second night/day.  As business travelers get accustomed to in-room refrigerator as it is a working trip with much time working in your room.  As a traveler, I absolutely despise paid parking.   It is extra profit for a commodity this no cost to the hotel.  Include it is the room cost, but additional is a real deal breaker.     Ice machine NOT working on my floor. No microwave in the room either.  I have not seen the usual Doubletree buffet breakfast.   As I said
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I was disappointed to read that some aspects of your stay were not up to the highest standards. It is our goal to ensure that we deliver comfortable, safe, and personalized experience.  Please be assured your feedback is important to us and will be used to ensure we are always refining and expanding the service we deliver our valued guests. As you know, your most recent experience is not reflective of our high standards which will be confirmed during your next stay with us. I hope you can give us another chance in the future to show you how wonderful our property really is.

Summary: For our Disneyland trip we used this hotel. When we arrived everyone was very friendly but was a bit disappointed that my only two options for parking was self parking for $25 and valet for $30 per day. As this was our first time going on a proper vacation. Guess I should have read more carefully because I also thought it said breakfast was included like a continental type but no it just says breakfast available and it can get pricey. The food is good though. This hotel is about 9 min away from the Disneyland parking lot which was great. There are stores and restaurants near by. The view is limited and if wanting to have a Disneyland view this is not the place. We were only able to see the tower and a few lights at night. But over all very comfortable, clean and friendly.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to be of service! I'm so pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and that our staff provided excellent customer service. Thank you for taking time to review your visit and kind rating. We hope you will stay with us again soon!

Summary: I’ve stayed at couple Doubletree hotels but this property doesn’t meet standard. I’m okay staying at old properties but I believe operators should at very least maintain the property to keep it up. The furniture inside the rooms were rundown broken, lobby elevators keys were falling off. Room interior is dark, light switches don’t work. No standard things inside rooms such as blow dryer, soaps, shampoos, coffee machine with no coffee. Would not recommend staying here, would strongly consider Doubletree Anaheim Convention Center appears to be more updated and well kept.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your visit. We pride ourselves on offering signature experiences, so I apologize for the missteps you encountered.  We’re always seeking out ways to improve our guests’ experience, and feedback like this helps us do this, so I appreciate you sharing this with us. We would love nothing more than to have another chance to deliver to you a truly memorable and impeccable experience.

Summary: Poor Customer Service I felt a room number not a person. It was clear their motto is get them in and move on. Very inconvenient and unfavorable. They didn’t complete their job but was unbothered by it.
Manager Response: Your feedback is certainly not reflective of the experiences we strive to create and we hope you can accept our sincerest apologies. The comfort and joy of each of our guests is a top priority for everyone on our team and we regret to learn that we fell short of providing you with a perfect experience.  We only get one chance at making a wonderful first impression that reflects our legendary guest service.

Summary: We usually stay at this chain, but no more.  We arrived at3:20 and tried to check in. The girl behind the desk didn’t say the room wasn’t ready, we just could not check in until 4pm. Really? They want you to pay more for early check in?
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your visit. We pride ourselves on offering signature experiences, so I apologize for the any inconveniences you encountered.  We strive to provide excellent service and accommodations to each of our guests with hopes of surpassing all guest expectations.
