We would love nothing more than to have another chance to deliver to you a truly memorable and impeccable experience. Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary Heading: NO ROOM SERVICE EVEN IF REQUESTED IN ADVANCE
Summary: They never cleaned my room for the 5 nights I was there, even when I requested a day in advance.  They false advertise that you will have fridge and micro in room but when I got there it had none, and when I called office they charge $10 extra per night and you have to choose between micro or fridge. Disappointed in my experience there when I’m spending over $850 to stay there. WILL NOT be returning, save your money theirs cheaper hotels with way better service.
Manager Response: I am incredibly disappointed to hear your experience was not the ideal one we hoped for you to have. Our goal is to always provide our guests with exceptional service, cleanest rooms, and memorable experiences. Your comments will be evaluated by our hotel management to make improvements to the quality of our rooms and service. Allow me once again to personally and profusely apologize on behalf of our team for the inconvenience. I hope you can give us another chance in the future to show you how wonderful our property really is. Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary: If you want a good night sleep or rest this is not the place. The bathroom is extremely small with only one sink and no ventilation. It only fits one person at a time. The door needs to be closed in order to use the sink. Will not come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. On behalf of our entire team, please accept our apology for the disruption to your stay caused by noise.  It is disappointing that our provisions for alleviating the noise levels did not work well for you. We want our hotel to be a respite for our guests where all their needs are met with urgency and a great attitude. We definitely appreciate your business and that you took the time to offer your feedback. We do wish to have the honor of welcoming you back.  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary: Very disappointing property. Hallways smelled bad and the room was full of mold. The bathroom ceiling was black, and the bathroom had no ventilation.  Front desk personnel was very welcoming.  The (expensive)‘parking is convenient and has plenty of space. Very disappointing experience for this brand and at this price
Manager Response: I am incredibly disappointed to hear your experience was not ideal. Your stay will be evaluated with full and intricate detail by our hotel management to prevent it from reoccurring. Naturally we aspire to deliver faultless service and I can see that there were many aspects of your stay that were truly disappointing.  I hope you can give us another chance in the future to show you how wonderful our property really is. Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary: The front desk lady was very nice and the cookies upon check in were good. That’s unfortunately where anything good stopped…I’ve stayed here like four years ago and had a great experience but wow how it’s changed. I like to have tea at night so I got to my room and noticed there’s no microwave or mini fridge. I went down to inquire and was told I would have to pay $10 for a microwave if I wanted one but they had none available. I asked if there was anywhere I could just get hot water at for my tea and they said no. A super 8 motel has a microwave and mini fridge. I’m so confused as to why that’s an upgrade? Then two of the elevators have the floor buttons ripped out and some weird thing is placed there and it looks janky. Anytime I’ve been in the elevator with anyone everyone is
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your visit. We pride ourselves on offering signature experiences, so I apologize for the any inconveniences you encountered.  We strive to provide excellent service and accommodations to each of our guests with hopes of surpassing all guest expectations. We’re always seeking out ways to improve our guests’ experience, so I appreciate you sharing your perspective with us. We would love nothing more than to have another chance to deliver to you a truly memorable and impeccable experience.

Summary Heading: NEVER! NEVER! NEVER!!!THE DIRTIEST HOTEL I EVER LIVED!!!!
Summary: We lived here from July 10th to 12th, the trashcan in the washing room left somebody’s stool with STRONG SMELL since we checked in. It contains several used toiled tissues and a plastic bag at bottom, and, and …. A piece of DIRTY on inner trashcan side. Obviously, it was not cleaned before we check in. We put it upside down and minimize the stink smell for the first night and told the reception to clean it when we went out but they never did it!!!!!   After we returned in the evening why? They took note and told me room service should be informed yesterday night. It is NOT room service requirement, it is a cleanliness accident, A BIG PROBLEM FOR A BUSINESS HOTEL, but nobody (total 5 at lobby) cared about it. Several guys in the reception gave no solutions at all and they even
Manager Response: Many thanks for your review.  Obviously there were a few aspects to your stay that did not meet your expectations. We're always available and eager to assist and rectify issues as best we can. We pride ourselves on the culture we have established and the ability of our team members to quickly fix any guest issues so that you can get back to a beautiful and inspiring hotel experience. We truly hope we’ll have an opportunity to welcome you back to deliver a great experience deserving of a top rating.

Summary: The only positive was we got to check in early.  The room was from the 90s with patches on the wallpaper.  Furniture fell apart.  Safe did not work. Under construction which woke us up at 7am- my son was playing in a tournament and needed sleep.  The elevators took a million years.  The biggest issue was the reception staff.  So unfriendly and not at all helpful.  Didn’t give me our group rate parking after all of us completely over paid for each night- I had to ask twice!  Keys didn’t work for parking- no guidance on location of pool or any other amenities.  Clearly they have enough business from United Airlines to care about the rest of us:(. Embassy Suites in AZ was WAY better the previous week!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts and feedback with us after your recent visit. While it is wonderful to hear that our perfect location delighted you, it’s regrettable that we missed opportunities to make a perfect impression. We will discuss your review internally with other departments as a coaching exercise to understand where improvements can be made.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention so that improvements may be made. We all look forward to welcoming you back again very soon to enjoy a perfect stay at our property.

Summary Heading: Filthy, expensive and leaves you feeling ripped off
Summary: I’m a Hilton Honors member and I’ve stayed at many Hilton locations. This one is by far the worst one I’ve ever stayed at. The parking fee is $25/day but they don’t even enforce parking rules. There were cars parked in the crosshatch of handicap parking spots and cars without handicap placards parked in the handicap zone. The room was also visibly dirty upon checkin and I could tell that housekeeping barely cleaned seeing as how there were still water spots on the bathroom mirror from someone washing their hands and splashing the water from the previous guest. The bathtub was visibly dirty with black spots on floor of the tub. The furniture was literally falling apart. One office chair in the room had the leather peeling off of it and it left bits of the leather on your clothing
Manager Response: Your feedback is certainly not reflective of the experiences we strive to create and we hope you can accept our sincerest apologies. The comfort and joy of each of our guests is a top priority for everyone on our team and we regret to learn that we fell short of providing you with a perfect experience.  We only get one chance at making a wonderful first impression that reflects our legendary guest service.

Summary: This hotel was one of the worst I have EVER stayed at. Checking in (they say 24/7) I waited 3 hours to get a room. I was told my wait was because of the room being cleaned. However,  the bathroom had used soap in the shower, a prior customers med bag with rectal medication under the bed.  The Elevators are HELL on wheels with minds of their own. The food is sub par  and overly expensive. Parking is a nightmare and extremely expensive. DO NOT RECOMMEND
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your review. We pride ourselves on offering signature experiences, so I apologize for the missteps you encountered.  We’re always seeking out ways to improve our guests’ experience, and feedback like this helps us do this, so I appreciate you sharing this with us.  As a valued guest, and we would be pleased to have another opportunity to showcase our true hospitality.

Summary: This hotel needs a lot of work. There were buckets collecting water in the corridors, smelled like mold, the water was turned off to the whole hotel 1 day of our visit. All the furnishings need to be replaced as the fabric is missing so cleaning these pieces is impossible.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I would like to extend to you my sincerest apology for any inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay with us. Our goal is to consistently provide extraordinary guest experiences, and I regret that we missed the mark in this effort. We trust you found that the hold was refunded promptly upon departure.  We  hope that this experience will not stop you from visiting with us again.

Summary: This hotel has an endemic plumbing problem in the building. I checked in to a perfectly clean room. I set out my toiletries, and the tub was spotless. I went to the bathroom in the middle of the night to find black chunks of sewage strewn in the tub. The water must have backed up at some point since checkin. I searched the TA reviews for this hotel on “sewage in bathtub” and found reviews in 2017, 2014, and 2009 that mention this same problem. This is an expensive room, but Ayres and Embassy were full so I took a chance. Why can’t this problem be fixed? They’re currently upgrading elevators and other amenities in the building. Why has this been happening for over a decade with no fix?
Manager Response: I am incredibly disappointed to hear your experience was not ideal. Your stay will be evaluated with full and intricate detail by our hotel management to prevent it from reoccurring. Naturally we aspire to deliver faultless service and I can see that there were many aspects of your stay that were truly disappointing.  I hope you can give us another chance in the future to show you how wonderful our property really is.

Summary Heading: Service could have been much better
Summary: Room was not cleaned after our first night and I had to go to the front desk to get my own towels as no one would answer the phone at the front desk.  Very disappointed as Doubletree is always preferred.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide constructive feedback following your stay with us. Your comments are important to us and it will further assist us in raising our high levels of service. While we do our best to always deliver a great experience, it appears we missed the opportunity to exceed your expectations during your stay.  I truly apologize that we fell short of our promise. However, we do hope that you will join us again when you return to the area. Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary: My family and I stayed at the DT Orange while visiting the relatives in the area. This hotel is located in a great location (easy access to/from Freeway, walking distance to Outlets) and service was good.  The hotel is definitely an older property but the guestroom was well kept (meaning everything was functional) We were able to watch the fireworks from Disneyland in distance from our room.  Needless to say, their signature Chocolate Chip Walnut cookies were delish!  No valet service/limited F&B and HK. The biggest issue we experienced were all 4 elevators out of order on the date of checkout. Luckily we were able to take stairs down, but it wasn't an easy task. I know staff were bustling trying to resolve the issue.    The hotel definitely have potential to improve in many
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to be of service! I'm so pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and that our staff provided excellent customer service. Thank you for taking time to review your visit and kind rating. We hope you will stay with us again soon!   Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary: Great stay at the Doubletree Orange. Great location, room and service all around. I especially enjoyed the phenomenal service at the bar. Rafael has a great sense of humor and is also a true hospitality professional. I loved chatting with him while enjoying some March Madness. Thanks for a great experience, DT Orange and Rafael! 😊
Manager Response: Thank you for your outstanding review. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay, the well-appointed rooms, and the service our colleagues were able to provide you with.  We strive to provide excellent service and accommodations to each of our guests with hopes of surpassing all their expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon, at which time we will make every effort in providing you with another perfect visit.   Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary: Oh boy, this hotel is just bad. My wife and I went for a special occasion, we had been to this location once before with no issues so I was not scared to book this place again. Let me say I should have saved my money and stayed in a Motel 6. I used a standard feature for all Hilton properties and checked in early, picked my room and thought everything was okay since I have done this exact thing many times before at other Hiltons. I get to the hotel at about 630 as my wife wanted to get dinner.   I knew something was already wrong then, the valet had cars everywhere and left no place for someone to park and check in. I just had to leave my truck in the middle of the driveway since there was no place for me to pull off. The ART bus had to drive around me and park at an odd angle
Manager Response: Dear thebigcat76, I am incredibly disappointed to hear your experience was not the ideal one we hoped for you to have. Our goal is to always provide our guests with exceptional service, cleanest rooms, and memorable experiences. Your experience will be evaluated with full and intricate detail by our hotel management to prevent it from reoccurring. I would like to affirm that this incident remains isolated, however, allow me once again to personally and profusely apologize on behalf of our team for the inconvenience. I hope you can give us another chance in the future to show you how wonderful our property really is.  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary Heading: 10 bucks to use a fridge and the rooms are as dark as a dungeon
Summary: Don’t waste you time or your money just few blocks further there are a host of quality hotels that care about their guests. The stay required you carry your bags from the second to first floor because of elevators being out of service and who charges for a fridge!
Manager Response: Dear ajaydamier,  We want to thank you for your stay and for taking the time to post your review. We regret to hear of your experience at our DoubleTree Hotel Anaheim Orange County and are disappointed not to exceed expectations. We never want a guest to leave with a contrary opinion, and if given the opportunity, we would have taken measures to address every concern while you were staying with us.`We do have many different types, styles, and layouts of rooms available to our guests and unfortunately, a refrigerator is not a standard amenity. I regret also that the maintenance issues with the elevator coincided with your visit.                                                             Please know your comments and insights will be shared among our team to address and improve upon moving forward. We hope you will consider giving us another chance to regain your trust.   Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary: Employees were very friendly and accommodating. Very good customer service. Room was spacious and bed was very comfortable.  Quality mattress. Handicap accessible Room was very nice. Shower was roomy and excellent.
Manager Response: Dear oregunian1966. What a superb review! Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay - we are thrilled you had a wonderful time and experienced every element of true DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County hospitality. Our team enjoys going the extra mile to deliver the very best levels of service to our guests, and to look after their every need. It is especially great to know our spacious bathrooms and guest rooms with comfortable bedding made for a restful stay.  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: This hotel is very clean, the bed was very comfortable. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because there was no fridge in the room. I would have thought that to be a standard in a hotel of this magnitude.
Manager Response: Dear mrmrsopey,  Thank you for choosing DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County as the place to stay when visiting Anaheim. We are truly happy to read that you enjoyed your visit and all of the courtesies that were extended to you. We also appreciate your note on what a great job our Housekeeping team does, especially as we navigate through Covid. Its comments like yours that make our team feel appreciative that their efforts have not gone unnoticed. We have been incredibly deliberate in our choice of bedding to ensure maximum comfort.  We look forward to welcoming you back again when your travels bring you to Anaheim!  Warm regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: If you need to be close to Angel stadium I guess this will do. It was ok but old and a bit musty. Understaffed and overpriced in the on-site restaurants but Starbucks across the street - try embassy suites first if you need this location.
Manager Response: Dear Elisharoberts20,  Thank you for choosing DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County during your visit to San Diego. We want to inspire our guests with sophisticated yet tranquil accommodations; therefore, we are dismayed that you did not find our decor and property inviting. Nevertheless, we are delighted that our prime location suited your preferences. We hope the convenience of our on-site restaurants and the authentic hospitality of our team helped to make your stay satisfactory.  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for a much-improved stay.  Best, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: The Doubletree is a nice but slightly dated hotel. The staff is great. The pool and hot tub area are old not very fun. The room was clean, the bed was comfortable. It’s close to UCI hospital where I was working so that was very handy. Also close to movie theaters and shopping.
Manager Response: Dear 457mickt,  I am delighted you received excellent service from our doting staff during your stay at our DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange Country.  We are delighted that you took advantage of our perfect location literally steps away from Anaheim's top attractions! Our hotel has received a lot of love throughout the years and our Housekeeping and Maintenance teams are meticulous about ensuring the guest suites are perfectly detailed for our guests. Our team is comprised of the best in our industry and are always eager to see to your needs and requests. I look forward to welcoming you back when a future opportunity arises.  Best, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Awesome stay! We really enjoyed our night here. The cookies are delicious!!! We are from San Diego but we’re headed to universal studios the next day so wanted to stay somewhere that would make the drive shorter. Only a 30 minute drive from the park!
Manager Response: Dear loreeennaa97, Thank you for sharing this amazing review on your recent stay at our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. I assume you loved our safe and central location for exploring all the great neighborhoods and attractions nearby. Having the opportunity to unwind in our unique location can be a real treat.  We thank you for your wonderful review and invite you to let us know if there is anything that we can assist with prior to your next visit. Once more, it was a pleasure to host you.  We hope to have the good fortune of welcoming you back very soon!  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Service is an issue. Hotel is dated.  Multiple elevators were not in service throughout my stay.  Food on site is actually good.  Several staff members were not helpful but I did encounter a few he were trying hard to please.
Manager Response: Dear gp20222022,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us regarding your recent stay at DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim. We were disappointed to learn that on this occasion we failed to meet your expectations regarding the service received. Please be assured that each and every guest is of the utmost importance to us and we apologize that you felt let down. We recognize that by encouraging such feedback we can address any inconsistencies and ensure that excellent levels of service are reached and maintained overall.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County again when assuredly, you will find our service impeccable and seamless.  Best, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: We stayed here on a group tour.  I would have never picked this hotel on my own.  No fridge or microwave (there’s a charge, I thought this was a standard thing today).  Bed was very uncomfortable.  You hear traffic noise outside and ambulances due to the hospital next door.  Some of the front desk staff was friendly.  We had a problem with the heat (or lack of) in our room which was fixed right away.  Breakfast was the same thing every day.  Guys in the restaurant were very nice.  Very convenient to outlet mall.
Manager Response: Hello 252jan253,  I am delighted to hear that you received uncompromising service during your stay at our DoubleTree Anaheim - from Front Desk to Maintenance and our culinary staff. I am also thrilled that our central location proved to be convenient. Please accept my apologies for the shortfalls you experienced on this occasion. We have received rave reviews about the comfort of our beds and bedding but we are fully aware this is a personal experience and preferences vary. I do regret that you were placed in a room where you could be disturbed by the noise from outside as we know that a restful stay is the standard expectation.  Again, please accept   Warm regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree Hotel Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: I like the location. It’s right off the freeway. There’s a Starbucks across the street, and it’s a short drive to the toy story park lot at Disneyland. Our room had a view of the Angels stadium and giant A. Definitely staying again.
Manager Response: Hello scdunamis,  We are thrilled to earn your top scores and hope we have made the list of favorite hotels.  We are delighted to know that you had such a lovely experience. Our central location puts the best of Anaheim, including Disneyland, just steps away and we are happy to receive your ratings confirming that you so enjoyed discovering all that awaits just beyond the doors of our DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange County. We thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and on behalf of your many DoubleTree Anaheim friends, we look forward to welcoming you time and again for many years to come to enjoy our view and our amenities.  Warm regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: I was mistakenly charged for room service from the One hundred Bar. I contacted the hotel several times and left left several messages.  As of today (5 days later) no one has called me back to fix the charges.
Manager Response: Dear jonpenoch, Thank you for sharing your review.  We recognize that snafus can occasionally occur but deeply regret the irregularity that appeared on your bill at check-out, and that you had to take time out of your trip to follow up on this issue. Please do call the hotel again and speak to our Customer Service. Please know all of your valuable comments will be shared with my team, as we strive to provide an unparalleled experience. Your patronage is deeply appreciated, and I truly hope you will allow us another opportunity to serve you in the future.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Unfriendly front desk staff at check in Elevators not operating properly/one elevator not working No refrigerator/microwave in room would need to rent per nite Instructed bath towels had to be picked  up at front desk Very uncomfortable beds
Manager Response: Dear klassik206,  Thank you for being so forward with us about your recent stay; we truly rely on our guests' feedback to improve our offerings and services.  However, I'm incredibly disheartened to know this visit to our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim fell so short of our high standards. I hope you will accept my sincere apologies for falling short of your expectations.  Your added feedback regarding your arrival experience leaves us concerned as this is certainly not reflective of the first impressions we wish to create.  That this impression continued through the rest of your trip is disappointing. We do recognize that no matter where you stay, you should always feel comfortable and relaxed.  We hoped our high quality mattressses would have ensured you had a good night's rest but we do recognize that preferences vary. Due to the pandemic, we are again asking guests to get their towels from the front desk to limit contact with housekeeping staff. Our aim of course, is to recapture that positioning in your eyes and deliver those standards which we too hold so dear. Your comments and observations have been discussed and we are monitoring those areas where you have highlighted a tweak and adjustment need to be made.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: I stay at many double trees in orange and LA county. The customer service was amazing but I was not impressed with the rooms (stained carpet, burnt hole in sheet, mattress was disgusting). I paid for a luxury king room and it was quite the opposite. I was also told I couldn’t use my debt card to pay but was allowed to book the room with that card
Manager Response: Dear Chicak89, It will be my pleasure to pass on your kind words to all those colleagues who provided a warm welcome and some true DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim hospitality. Although there were a few small glitches, and please accept my apologies, I am very happy that we quickly made amends and continued to meet your expectations. I trust you had a comfortable return journey home and very much look forward to seeing you at The DoubleTree Hotel Anaheim again in the future. Please let us know, in the meantime, if we can be of any assistance.  With kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County

Summary: Outstanding customer service from the moment we walked through the door to check in! Room was very clean & spacious, on-site restaurant breakfast was delicious (and I’m not usually impressed with hotel restaurants), on mornings I was in a hurry I was able to grab coffee & a bagel or breakfast sandwich or fresh fruit from the coffee shop located in the lobby. The bar had  great beer & wine selections as well as great food available. I travel to the area fairly often and had a hotel I always stayed at but they were fully booked for this 8-day trip so I decided to try this hotel & I can definitely say that the Doubletree is definitely my new go-to hotel when I visit the area! Thank you for an amazing stay!
Manager Response: Dear azcherrybomb,  Thank you for taking the time to review your visit to DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. We always appreciate feedback and were delighted to learn that everything exceeded your expectations and you had such a memorable stay.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your room, and my colleagues looked after you so well. At The DoubleTree Orange, we pride ourselves in delivering an exceptional level of service, to truly take care of every need of our guests, and it is always so pleasing to have confirmation that we got this correct!  We look forward to welcoming you back to our DoubleTree Hotel in Anaheim on many more occasions.  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: No freige in rooms, bad customer experience , outdated rooms , dented bath and toilets, unclean , not comfy bed and on top of that they don’t clean the room when asked. Lastly unexpected charges have been charged $15 to get a fridge
Manager Response: Dear sefmutari1,  Your stay experience is of the utmost importance to us and therefore I apologize that it did not echo the perfection we desired for you.  It is regretful that you experienced these mishaps during your visit. We apologize sincerely.  We take these matters very seriously as this lapse in service is not the way of the DoubleTree Hotel Anaheim Orange County nor is it a reflection of our values.  We wish to have an opportunity to welcome you back here to experience our usual incredible and seamless stay at our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Old burned furniture! Great location but unfortunately won’t be staying here again. Room was not worth the stay.It was very dissatisfied to be in the room seeing the old bed skirts, old chair. It will be my 1st and last visit in this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear anaizcamacho21, Thank you for choosing our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County and leaving your comments. We want to sincerely apologize for the maintenance issues you encountered during your visit, and it seems this room was not adequately maintained for occupancy. We have shared your feedback with the Maintenance Supervisor who has taken proper action to ensure these missed opportunities are not repeated. We hold ourselves to very high standards and should you stay with us again, we believe you'll see that this was an isolated incident. Our management is always here to listen to any concerns you may have with your room, and I wish you had informed them of any blemishes you noticed while here so we may have addressed them.  We would welcome another opportunity to host you and provide you with the seamless and perfect stay you deserve.  With kindest regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Very pleasant stay, great customer service, got a cookie Lee made all of this possible.  Will chose this hotel for my future travels Clean,cozy, helpful and recommend places to visit  Will visit again. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear evatellez2021,  This is truly wonderful to read, and we are so very delighted to learn how much you enjoyed your visit to our DoubleTree Hilton Hotel Anaheim Orange County!  I am sure it was a wonderful opportunity to take advantage of the vibrancy of Anaheim with its diverse cultural scene, Disney, and great restaurants that keep our guests coming back year after year. Thank you so much especially for recognizing the wonderful staff that you encountered while visiting! We do pride ourselves on always providing top-notch exceptional service to all of our guests. It is so fantastic to hear that you were able to experience and recognize that.  It sounds like we will certainly be seeing you again sometime soon! Please let us know when you are ready to plan your next visit to our special property, and we will be looking forward to thrilling you once again.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: I can’t say enough good things about this place. Friendly staff, clean rooms and common areas, lots of ammenities. I will choose this facility again if I’m in the area again. They made me feel very welcome.
Manager Response: Hello newbeginnings15,  Thank you for taking the time to write such an amazing review following your recent stay with us, here at DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. It was such a pleasure to read and I know your comments will be useful to future guests - thank you for your unreserved recommendation!  We do pride ourselves on delivering a level of service to exceed all expectations - and I am thrilled we achieved this! I will be sure to share your comments with colleagues across the hotel and we look forward to having the opportunity to welcome you back again very soon - and on many future occasions!  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim-Orange County

Summary Heading: Maintenance issues And lack of Restaurant
Summary: Bathroom faucet and coffee maker did not work correctly.  Our trip was not leisure, husband required a  medical procedure scheduled the following am at UCI.  We could not leave hotel,   I needed a quick bite to eat, surprised to see nothing was available. Snack shop closed though website gave different hours. Waited til 5 pm got from bar took to the room. Hilton stopped room service long before Covid. ☹️
Manager Response: Dear kathyblazeout, I was so very sorry to read your review and greatly appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention. You sadly left the hotel with a poor impression of your time with us and I offer you my sincere apologies, as you did not experience DoubleTree Hilton Anaheim-Orange at its best. We are all looking forward to post-Covid days so we can fully open all the hotel facilities and return to regular business hours.  it is important that your next experience is reflective of DoubleTree Orange's usual reputation for high standards of service and care. We take all guest feedback seriously, so I thank you once again for sharing your thoughts and observations and I hope to welcome you back to DoubleTree Orange in the future.   Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Excellent room prices for group conference rate!!! Fresh baked cookies, pool/hot tub, and AV workers for the conference were great. Could improve: more visible security in lobby (in addition to the floor scans).
Manager Response: Dear jmeshilen,  I was very pleased to hear that you had a great time and were very well taken care of by our team, from the seamless check-in experience, the great rate, to the delightful cookies, and the thoughtful amenities, and not forgetting the successful conference orchestrated by our excellent AV team!  I was however extremely sorry to hear that the seemingly reduced security was an issue, casting a shadow on an overall very successful and pleasant stay.  Allow me to apologize for this and to assure you that our hotel is very secure as the safety of our guests and staff is of paramount importance to us.  However, this will be discussed within the team in order to avoid any other guest sharing the same sentiment.  Thank you for your feedback and I hope to have the pleasure of hosting you on a leisure trip next.  Best, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County

Summary: Poor customer service, smelly room, refrigerator not working. Will not ever stay at a Hilton Hotel again. We always trusted Hilton, sadly it’ll be our last choice from now on. Nothing worse than having a room smelling like cigarettes when it was supposed to be a non smoking room & having a screaming infant due to milk being spoiled caused by an employee not plugging in the refrigerator. Up charge for fridge was never removed. No milk offered since all of the stores were closed. Called the front desk & the response I received was “Well what do you want me to do?”
Manager Response: Dear caarlaayyy,  Thank you for choosing our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim. We do have strict smoking policies. I regret that you were placed in a guest room in which a previous guest did not adhere to these policies.  It is disheartening that we fell short of providing you a perfect stay, and that you express reticence in returning.  The frustrating situations with the refrigerator and milk that you detailed are uncharacteristic of our team and we are sorry that you had to experience this discrepancy. We always want to provide impeccable service with authentic and trusted responses to our guests' needs, and we are disappointed that we fell short of this. As much as it saddens me, thank you for bringing this to our attention so that we may re-examine what could have gone wrong and seek to refine our service and offering.  We would be honored to have the opportunity to showcase a true DoubleTree Orange experience, where you are greeted with pristine accommodations, impeccable service, and you enjoy our coveted location that makes it very easy to take advantage of all the restaurants and sights Anaheim offers.  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree  by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: I came here for a business trip. Great area. Next to the block of orange shopping outlet, UCI medical center, and many restaurants around.  I was hoping to be able to work on my computer. Great desk set up in room for work, however the Wi-Fi is so spotty, was hard to get work done. It’s free for Hilton Honors members. However it was so spotty, I opted to pay for the “ premium” connection, but despite that, the connection still very weak. Pls get this fixed double tree! If it wasn’t for this problem, it would’ve been a 9/10 stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County experience. We always welcome feedback, and greatly appreciate the detail you have provided. We were very sorry to learn that on this occasion we failed to meet all your expectations, and have taken your comments on board.  We will certainly reevaluate  our processes to ensure we are more consistent in our service delivery going forward. We appreciate you letting us know, and we would welcome an opportunity to accommodate you once more and earn your highest marks. Your constructive feedback is valued and important to us, so thank you again.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: The staff was very nice. The hotel and the rooms were updated clean and I felt safe in the hotel. The shower and air-conditioning work perfect which is a huge deal for me. The parking was easy and I felt like my car was not in danger at any time. The location was great around restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear jbails1800,  We appreciate you sharing your wonderful review highlighting your recent visit to our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We’re thrilled you felt so at home in our ample guest rooms and we are delighted that you had every amenity needed to ensure a comfortable stay. Your kind words regarding our service and our hotel are most appreciated and have been shared with the team who in turn extend their gratitude. Once more, it was a pleasure to welcome you and we hope you’ll join us once again in the months ahead.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: The older rooms have a funky smell from the fridge and the roof looks like there may have been previous water damage. I had issues upon check in with my upgraded room given to other guests. GreAt  location but the rooms need a make over  as well as the pool
Manager Response: Dear scockerill33,  I would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience and please accept my sincerest apologies for the disappointment you feel about your time at DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim. We take all guest feedback seriously and I thank you for highlighting these areas of our service that need our focus for improvement. The experience you have highlighted is certainly not reflective of the lasting impressions we strive to create.  On this occasion, we failed to provide you with the five-star experience you expected and I am sorry.  I hope we will have the pleasure to welcome you back to DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim in the future when I feel sure you will find our services much improved.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: For the amount we paid for the room we got the worst service and quality! Room was disgusting and uncomfortable, staff was unhelpful and rude and they want to charge extra for everything! Parking is way over priced and we didn’t even have a parking spot ! Worst experience ever! There are way better hotels!
Manager Response: Dear castroangel93,  Thank you for staying with us at DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim.  Guest satisfaction is taken quite seriously at our property and your comments have been shared with the team. We apologize that your experience wasn't up to par and we have taken note of where we could have improved your stay.  We appreciate you sharing your feedback and hope that we will have another occasion to welcome you back and exceed your expectations.  Best, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Mediocre hotel with scary elevators. Supposedly masks were required but hardly any hotel staff wore them.  Rooms were ok but supposedly updated and didn’t see that.  Paid extra  for premium updated room. Service and availability of food not great.
Manager Response: Dear clareschultz,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are disheartened that we missed several significant opportunities to show you our commitment to service excellence and regret your disappointment with the decor of the guest room. Rest assured that masks and gloves are a requirement here and I will investigate why they were remiss on this occasion.  I have never experienced otherwise with the team and so I remain confounded as to the occurrences on this occasion.   We would love to welcome you back again so that we can provide you with the flawless and meaningful stay you deserve.  Best, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary Heading: Not bad by any means, but not amazinggg for a doubletree
Summary: I would stay there again but would hope my room is a little cleaner and the light switch works. I didn’t complain about it because it wasn’t that bad and I was lazy - they probably would’ve offered me another room no problem. And Toss in some of those cookies again and we’re good regardless
Manager Response: Dear nicollebassi,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share this review with us. While I'm glad you seemed to have a great visit overall, I'm so sorry you experienced a few bumps along the way during your stay at our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange. We always do our best to ensure our guests’ stays are as seamless as possible, but it seems we missed the mark on this occasion. Additionally, I'm sorry to hear that you were disappointed with some of your housekeeping experiences. I would have hoped that you would have spoken with our Front Desk staff about these frustrations, as they are always happy to address any concerns our guests have during their stay.  Once again, I appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback with us. We are always striving to provide the best possible experiences for all of our guests, and seeing these ratings will help as we continue to work toward the future. We hope we get to welcome you back again soon when you will be sure to note the improvements and when we can be assured a 5-star rating.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: We reserved this hotel for travel for funeral services. My family and I stayed for 3 days. Overall the hotel was good and I would stay again. Only issue was parking. Fees are too high for a daily rate and the digital key did not work. The gate to enter was always open and the main parking was always full. If I had a room a spot should be reserved for hotel guests. Overflow parking was just an inconvenience.
Manager Response: Dear catalinathe2thfairy,  Thank you for your review and please accept our condolences. We truly rely on our guests' feedback to improve upon our offerings and services. Our hotel strives to provide the best in accommodations partnered with top-notch amenities and first-rate guest service. It’s always disappointing to read about a poor experience for any of our guests, and I’m truly disheartened to know your parking experience fell short of our high standards. Our Reservations staff do strive to provide the most accurate and helpful information at all times. Our parking rates are commensurate with those of the area hotels and are published on our website and on all the online travel platforms. We commiserate if this was a surprise and can understand that there would be a measure of disappointment if this were the case.  We hope that should you find yourselves visiting our area again sometime in the future, that you will choose to stay with us once again.   Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: I know that certain amenities are not available due to the pandemic, but some of these precautions just seem like cost savings. My room only had one bar of soap, one wash cloth and one hand towel. I was checked in for a five night stay. There was one package of coffee and a broken coffee pot in the room. The rooms are very loud due to the location on the corner of two busy streets and directly across from a trauma center. The staff was nice enough but the hotel is just ok.
Manager Response: Dear 4782021,  I would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are pleased your overall stay was enjoyable, but we want it to be flawless.  We are working during extraordinary times and the current restrictions are a challenge, however, this is no excuse if there were lapses in attentive service. On this occasion, we failed to provide you with the five-star experience you expected and I am sorry. We take all guest feedback seriously and I thank you for highlighting these areas of our service that need our focus for improvement. I hope we will have the pleasure to welcome you back to DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange in the future when I feel sure you will find our services much-improved.  Safe travels, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Everything was as advertised. Very clean. Quick and easy service. Front desk lady was very nice and knowledgeable. Hotel in a great location and room in great shape, well prepared. Really enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Dear avondetwilliam,  We are warmed to read that your DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange visit was so wonderfully enjoyed and we trust that many more will follow. We appreciate you sharing your kind words, especially those noting the gracious hospitality provided by our team. While we know the cleanliness of our rooms and our amenities capture the senses of many, we have long believed that it is the gracious hospitality provided by our DoubleTree Anaheim colleagues which brings guests back time and again. Once more, the pleasure was ours and we trust ours is a hotel you will call “home” for any future Anaheim travels.  With much gratitude, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Location was great as we visited a lot of beaches near by. Value for why we paid was great but the stay in room was very uncomfortable as the room was alway humid. Rooms where only cleaned once as we stayed 4 nights and that’s because we had to ask for a room cleaning
Manager Response: Dear butterflywireless1,  You are indeed correct to expect a flawless experience here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim, and we share in your frustration that several inconsistencies intervened. Our location is certainly enviable - our guests find our location perfect for visiting the beaches and Disneyland. We regret that you did not rest well in your room. To ensure our guests are comfortable in the knowledge that they are kept safe during their visit, our new guidelines stipulate that housekeeping should be limited during stayovers unless specifically requested. We will be overjoyed when things are normalized but rest assured we remain very vigilant about finding new ways to ensure enthusiastic hospitality in this "new normal". Please do come stay with us again as we do hope for the chance to earn your five-star approval on your next stay.  Warm regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim

Summary: Someone called security on my room saying my room was too loud , after I got the notice of my family member having his gender reveal party. Was so unnecessary, when there was way more extreme loud noise in that hotel. Seemed like a trick, for them to keep your deposit
Manager Response: Dear idropcad, Thank you for choosing our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! I imagine that on such a memorable occasion, you must have been incredibly excited, and rightfully so.  However, it is so important that we are mindful of all our guests at all times, particularly at night when our guests expect to be able to relax and enjoy a peaceful night’s sleep. It is disappointing to learn that you departed the hotel with such an impression despite our efforts to meet expectations.  We are hopeful that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back on a future occasion.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Parking fee is ridiculous, coupler with a high price room rate with zero amenities, which you typically find at much lower places. I was told to rudely park on the street if I don’t like the parking rates.
Manager Response: Dear ynotsin,  We would like to offer our sincerest apologies for the experience that you had. We are extremely disappointed to learn that you were not given the impeccable service that you deserve while our guest. The frustrating situations that you detailed are uncharacteristic of our team and we are sorry that you had to experience this discrepancy. We take feedback such as yours very seriously as we are continually striving to elevate our guest experience. The parking fees are commensurate with area hotels and establishments.  I understand that there was a measure of frustration if you were unaware of them, though they are published on our website and with the online travel websites.  Again, I sincerely apologize and hope to host you again in the future and restore your faith in our hotel.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: No water for coffee, no refrigerator, no microwave, no towel racks, uncomfortable chairs.  The only good thing is the bar food.  I will not be staying here ever again and I forbid my family from doing the same.
Manager Response: Dear tonygV3687GH,  Thank you for choosing our Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We strive to craft exceptional experiences for our guests with a commitment to superb service, and we regret that we fell short of these standards in your case. We appreciate your comments and they will be used for our devoted efforts to handcraft an impeccable atmosphere for our guests. We continue to receive high marks for service and cleanliness, and we are grateful for feedback that helps us moving forward.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Loved my stay will definitely be back the warm cookies were delicious!!! Didn’t like the parking situation if the main lot was full you had to park in another complex parking which was a little of a walk but not to bad but i loved everything else!!
Manager Response: Dear theeredbonejr,  I’m delighted you enjoyed attentive service while staying at DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim.  It is our uncompromising and passionate team of unparalleled individuals that make us who we are, and we are delighted their timeless service inspired your time with us.  The cookies are a guest favorite! We apologize that parking was frustrating. You have supplied valuable feedback which we will take into consideration.  Thank you for reviewing your stay. We hope to have another opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Asked for joining rooms months in advance did not get them. Did not know parking was 23.00 a day. For being a Hilton Hotel I thought it would have frig and mic. Told room would be cleaned only two days out of the week we stayed..
Manager Response: Dear djk229,  Thank you for your review and please accept my sincere apologies for the various disappointments you have shared regarding your experience. I regret that your requested room was not available at the time of check-in.  Our parking rates which are commensurate with those of the area hotels are published on our website and on all the online travel platforms, such as Expedia, etc. However, understandably, were this a surprise, there would certainly be a measure of disappointment.  At this time, we are abiding by brand guidelines and therefore, unfortunately, we are not able to offer our usual housekeeping service during stayovers. We are in agreement with our guests who have overwhelmingly stated their preference to not have hotel staff entering their rooms during the pandemic unless specifically requested Thank you again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you to DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim again, for a much-improved visit in the future.  Best, Hotel Management Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary Heading: Dirty room. Blood stain on pillows. Expensive parking. Never stay here again
Summary: Never stay here again! The room is super dirty. Pillow case has blood stain on it. White towels look super old, not white anymore. Expensive parking. 1 stayed for 1 night and they charged me $46 for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Khunglongcon129,  Thank you for choosing our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County and leaving your comments. We want to sincerely apologize for the housekeeping issues you encountered during your visit, and that we did not promptly respond to correct them. We have shared your feedback with the Housekeeping Supervisor who has taken proper action to ensure these missed opportunities are not repeated. We hold ourselves to very high standards and should you stay with us again, we believe you'll see that this was an isolated incident.  We would welcome another opportunity to host you and provide you with the seamless and perfect stay you deserve.  Kind Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: A decent option for visiting Disneyland while steering clear from the area immediately surrounding the park, the DoubleTree Anaheim – Orange County has been a good option for us. While the hotel no longer offers its own shuttle service to Disney, the ART resort bus picks up across the street and was convenient enough to give Uber/Lyft a run for their money.  The lobby level was remodeled a few years ago and the rooms are contemporary but unremarkable. Sadly, the desk chair in my 2 Double (Room 911) was visibly worn to the point of being uncomfortable to sit upon. (You could feel the metal parts through the leatherette seat. Yikes!) It seemed one or more of the elevators was out of commission during my stay leading to longer-than-average wait times and crowded elevators with a
Manager Response: Dear AlikaAB3,  Thank you so much for your candid review of our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim. Our aim is always to provide our guests with the best possible experience. Your review encourages us to cement the reputation of this fantastic hotel as one of the best in Anaheim.  You’ve brought up so many important points, both ups, and downs from your trip, and we truly appreciate your observations.  As a management team, we take all comments seriously and share them with our staff so we may resolve any and all issues. Again, thank you for your comments, which will help us in our ongoing efforts to improve our service.   We look forward to welcoming you back to our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim in the future.   Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: This was a decent hotel, It was a little bit run down. The service and team members were adequate and friendly. The carpeting in the rooms needs to be replaced, it is a little outdated. But it looked clean and sanitized.
Manager Response: Dear 457mickt,  Thank you for taking the time to share the feedback on your visit to our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim. We are pleased your overall stay was enjoyable, but we want it to be flawless. We are happy to know your interactions with our staff were perfect. However, we are passionate about exceeding the expectations of our guests, and we genuinely apologize for not doing so during your time with us. Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we hope you will give us another opportunity to welcome you to the perfect stay you deserve.  Best, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary Heading: Anticipated a great stay, UNTIL it wasn’t
Summary: Initially on check in everything seemed to be great, the gentleman that checked me in gave details about my stay and the expected cost of the 5 day stay. I was very satisfied. THEN every night at approximately 3:00am I received a alert that my credit card had a pending authorization. The  first night it was $250.00.. The second night it was $67.55 THE THIRD NIGHT it was $350.00 and that’s in addition to the 1425.00 that was initially authorized for my 5 day stay. I did not get any answers as to why this was happening one of the representatives told me they are pre- authorizing my card for any “Incidentals” related to the stay also $50 a day for parking! I didn’t check in with a vehicle. I’m very disappointed in the hotel and it’s staff who after being made aware of this seemed
Manager Response: Dear sheaj22021, Thank you for having chosen our DoubleTree Hotel by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We are so disappointed that we missed several significant opportunities to show you our commitment to service excellence. We regret not living up to your expectations, and we want to thank you for your patience as we focus our attention on the areas mentioned in your review. We will certainly share your rating with our staff in an effort to craft a better stay for all of our future guests. Additionally, I would like to take the opportunity to clarify that we do uphold a very strong culture of integrity and honesty.   We hope to have another opportunity on your next visit to Anaheim to provide you with the superb hospitality, accommodations, and amenities for which we are known.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree Hotel by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Hotel was nice, staff all were friendly, room was clean and in good condition.  Didn't realize we needed to ask for the room to be made up but that was ok.  Would have liked the restaurant to open a bit earlier for breakfast
Manager Response: Dear maureenjaroscak2,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a complimentary review. I am so glad that you enjoyed a wonderful stay at our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, and it scored so highly on all accounts. I am thrilled you enjoyed the high level of personalized service my colleagues take such pride in delivering to our guests, and I will have pleasure in sharing your feedback with them.  We all look forward to welcoming you back to the DoubleTree Hotel Orange on your next visit.  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree Hotel Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: The stay was okay. The room was clean and it met some of the double tree standards that me and my family are accustomed to. We were unable to extend our stay time (late checkout) which made things a little bit more complicated for our situation. The double tree cookies that this hotel is famous for were not available for purchase which was frustrating as well
Manager Response: Dear rey20212021,  I am truly sorry for the dissatisfaction with your recent stay here at DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. Each of your frustrations is understandable and I am quite disappointed that we were unable to provide the flawless experience that we aim to deliver to every one of our guests. As you may suspect from the majority of our reviews, your experience is not indicative of our hotel’s service standards.  I apologize that the unavailability of the cookies and the fact that a full house made it impossible for us to extend a late check-out exception, affected your trip to Anaheim.  We would be happy to welcome you back to a much-improved stay in order to regain your confidence in us as a hotel and brand.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: The night front desk wasn’t the greatest. The woman checking us in was stand offish. The room’s a/c unit was also pretty weak and left us humid and hot while we slept. They also didn’t have very many luggage carts so it was difficult to get out stuff up to the room.
Manager Response: Dear kelliewhite94,  Thank you for bringing your experience to our attention. We take great care with all the feedback we receive to ensure maximum guest satisfaction. I hope you will accept my sincere apologies for the staff interaction and the issues with the HVAC. Rest assured this is not the standard of quality we strive to achieve and we will promptly address the issues you have expressed. We will refocus training on the specific aspects that were inferior and will task our Maintenance team to re-evaluate all the HVAC units. You are a valued guest. I hope you will give us another opportunity to exceed your expectations!  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County

Summary Heading: Awful experience due to flase advertising
Summary: Awful experience. Especially as a returning Hilton HHomors Gold member. .The hotel used to be great. They still advertise free breakfast from 6am, and shuttle to Disneyland. Upon arrival we found that the shuttle was not available. Front desk told us that the city shuttle picked up right outside the hotel. Not. True. It picks up from a nearby hotel not this hotel. Free Breakfast for gold members is advertised as starting at 6am which we planned into our schedule and found that when we went down at 7am, the restaurant didn't open until 8am. We were not informed us this anywhere. We paid for this hotel because breakfast and transportation were supposed to be included. Neither were!! We overpaid by $50 per night for this outdated hotel. Requested wakeup call at 5:45. Got a call at
Manager Response: Dear RealJ,  Thank you for staying with us at DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim and for your loyalty to Hilton and for being a Gold member. We appreciate your feedback and are terribly sorry to hear that you had challenges with transportation and breakfast. I am disappointed to read that we did not meet all of your expectations nor ours.  While we do advertise that our breakfast will incur a fee and is currently available at Koffee Kitchen or Trofi Restaurant, the hours of operation were not correctly represented.  Please accept my sincerest apologies that you were left to feel disappointed with your hotel stay. I would like to assure you that we pay careful attention to feedback such as you have provided, taking immediate steps to correct any deficiencies.   We do hope to have the pleasure of your company again to showcase a much-improved stay.  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Poor quality Service Elevators filthy and only 1 elevator working. Non compliant with regulation with so many guests. Pathetic attitude on complaint at the front desk. Incorrect info provided stating signs will be there to reach the breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear shrutikd2021,  Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to write a review of our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced due to shortfalls in our housekeeping service and our elevators. Let me assure you that we want nothing more than to ensure your satisfaction from the time you arrive, up until you leave our hotel. So we truly appreciate that you have shared your feedback with us.  We understand that simple things, like the correct information, are important when it comes to providing excellent service and apologize for the service challenges you experienced during your recent stay. The issues you experienced are unacceptable and are in no way the standard here at DoubleTree Orange. I will be sharing your feedback with the appropriate departments to make sure similar incidents do not happen in the future. We hope you will give us another chance to provide the high-quality service for which DoubleTree Hotel Anaheim is known.  Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Elevators not working long lines. Takes 20 mins to get to room. Super long lines at front desk always not enough staff to open the hotel yet. Plus they charge you 23$ a day for parking! Also zero room service.
Manager Response: Dear stevesturdivant,  We are obviously concerned and truly sorry to hear about your less-than-stellar experience while staying at our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim. We strive to exceed our guests' expectations and only through this form of honest communication can we address any areas where we may not be fulfilling our potential.  It is unfortunate that you experienced some issues with a malfunctioning elevator. For this, I deeply apologize. I imagine our Engineering and Maintenance team was able to take swift and corrective action to rectify the situation. Also, our parking rates are commensurate with those of the area hotels and are published on our website and on all the online travel platforms, such as Expedia, etc. We commiserate if this was a surprise and can understand that there would be a measure of disappointment if this were the case.  We will certainly share your comments with all our teams, whom I trust will welcome another opportunity to provide you with the seamless and perfect stay you deserve.  Kind Regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary Heading: Terrible service, no shuttle even though they advertise! Front desk staff rude! Do not stay here!!
Summary: Front desk staff will not provide the same experience for each guest. They choose who they want to be nice to. Terrible terrible terrible!! No shuttle service eevne though they advertised the Disney shuttle. You will have to spend money on ART bus if you stay. False Advertising!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear marissanashley,  Thank you for choosing our DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County.   We were concerned to see that your experience with us was not up to your satisfaction and that you felt let down by several aspects of your stay. We are extremely disappointed to learn that you did not feel catered to and given the impeccable service that you deserve while our guest. The frustrating situations that you detailed are uncharacteristic of our team and we are sorry that you had to experience this discrepancy. To safely visit theme parks, hotels, restaurants, shopping, dining, and other destinations within the Anaheim Resort area, we recommend the Anaheim Resort Transportation (ART), a hop-on, hop-off service. We sincerely apologize for the frustration and disappointment you faced throughout your experience. We hope your visit included delightful experiences including culinary delights to be had at our restaurants, perhaps a rejuvenating swim and relaxing in a well-maintained guestroom. We hope you had time to go sightseeing and shopping in Anaheim, and if not, that provides something new to explore the next time you join us.  Thank you for sharing, and we hope you will consider giving us another chance to restore your confidence in our hotel so we can provide you with the flawless experience you deserve.  Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Okay price for the location being so close to Disneyland! Sucks you have to pay for parking? $23 a night! Room/hotel could use some fixing up, not as clean as expected. They didn’t have any cookies 🥺

It is apparent that the inclusions for your stay could have been better communicated and clarified to avoid disappointment regarding the additional expectations on arrival.  Our parking rates are published online on our website and on those of the online travel agencies. We appreciate you sharing your review, and we would be so pleased to know we’ll have the pleasure of welcoming you back very soon.   Kind regards, Hotel Management DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County

Summary: Need to ask for EVERYTHING including toilet paper.  Make sure you plan on waiting a long time in line when you want to speak with the front desk as you have to get everything for your room including towels and toilet paper from them.  There are no amenities but they will charge your credit card $50 per day for incidentals for unclear reasons.  don't think you are going to spend time at the pool unless you like cold water and dirty surroundings.  Check your bill also.  They don't get it right.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Service was poor with check in and also during the stay. Front desk not helpful and don’t know much about room size and bathroom size. Wheelchairs clearly won’t fit in regular room. How does cookie dough run out for a whole weekend ?

Summary Heading: I week of poor service two rooms
Summary: No maid service, Resturant closed, rude front desk staff, prepaid room and on day 4 was locked out of my room because they claimed I had not paid the parking which I had and after much discussion they admitted their mistake and blamed it on COVID but really they are staffed by morons.   Not worth the money better to stay elsewhere

My husband went to ask why the towels didn’t arrive and was told that out request for more towels was cancelled since they were completely out of towels. No one made an effort to tell us.   At night when we hoped to enjoy the hot tub, but a family was camping out with a cooler of beer. They had five minors with them, three of which were drinking. The other two were very young children.  Additionally, the matriarch was on the phone directing another large group of their friends on how to find them in the hot tub. When the second group arrived, we decided to leave as they were all smoking cigarettes (in the hot tub). We didn’t feel comfortable in that space with the

Summary: We loved the digital key feature and all the app had to offer. Having that made everything simply easy and convenient! We will def be back soon and will def recommend our friends and family to stay at the Hilton!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We like the location of the Doubletree. Everything is clean and comfortable. Checkin and out is easy. Bathroom clean and in good working order. Had to ask for temperature adjustment in our room and they came immediately and solved the issue. We ate elsewhere so can’t comment on the food. Parking fee is excessive in our opinion, but hey - it’s California so what else would you expect. We’ve stayed here before a couple of times and will come back.

Summary: The front desk was super welcoming and very helpful. The room was clean & also the pool was clean. Will definitely be staying here again. Walking distance to the mall & close to Angels stadium. Loved it!

Summary: I planned a last minute Disneyland trip for my family and I and this was the best option to stay at a very good rate. The beds were comfortable and the room was spacious. The front desk staff was very accommodating whenever I needed extra amenities or had any questions.

Summary: I will stay somewhere else during my next business trip. There are plenty of other hotel options in the area that offer far more amenities and better service for similar pricing. I generally love staying in hotels - this was basically a cheap motel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel has taken a serious downward spiral after 2020. We were truly surprised a great location pre 2020 was in such poor condition for the price per night. Hilton needs to step in and bring up the standards.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good clean hotel and friendly service. Hotel is in good location near amenities. Parking was an extra charge per night so just be aware of that as you’re booking and looking for rooms. I’ve stayed here previously and would stay again.

Summary: I came here to participate in the CIDA Feis. I had a wonderful time. The area for the stage was large, and covered. There was plenty of room to spread out in case you are worried about Covid (I’m not, but I understand many people are concerned).

Summary: No cookies. Long lines for the front desk at all times of day. Bluetooth system cuts out forcing you to get a physical key, and wait in line ~30 minutes to get one. Not enough staff at the front desk. Windows don't keep out the noise at all. Well below expectations in most regards. And the gym is still closed? There's no law keeping it closed now, just incompetence
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel seemed to be a beautiful facility.....some time of in the past. The elevators worked good enough but their appearance had me wondering if I should have a snack with me just in case. The hotel ( floor I was on) reeked of marijuana. But hey, it was close to a lot of cool stuff like the outlet mall and some good food, oh and the hospital helipad literally across the street. It definitely was not the worst hotel I have ever stayed in by far however, my expectations of a doubletree franchise have been lowered substantially.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was very clean,very well kept. The front desk staff was amazing. I wish they had a mini fridge in the room, that’s why I didn’t give them five stars. The room was nice and clean, the bathroom was nice and clean. The pool and hot tub were open which is great. It’s right next-door to UC Irvine hospital which is where I was working, it was convenient to walk back-and-forth to work.

Summary: The room was nice but I was surprised that there was not a mini refrigerator in my room. Most hotels of this caliber have mini refrigerators in the room. Also, you have to pay for the Wi-Fi. There is no free Wi-Fi. I would stay here again. The property is pretty high-quality
Manager Response: none

Summary: Worn mattresses in what I was told was an renovated room that had the same dingy carpet!!!  I was lied to by the front desk.  I received an upgrade offer after I had made the reservation and I accepted but confirmation was never sent from Hilton.  I expected better attention as I am starting to travel again for business but this was not a good experience.

Summary: Fun times with friends in Orange California. Will come here again in the future as long as you update the rooms. Please inform me when you were going to update the rooms as I feel like the complex is beautiful and needs updating.

Summary: Hotel was great! The staff was very kind and courteous. I love the location because it was so close to the hospital. Shopping is walking distance and there are great restaurants very close to the hotel.

Summary: I’ve stayed at the two hotels across the street & this one is much cleaner and has way more parking. Cookie at check-in is a plus. Overall this is a nice, clean and safe hotel. I will definitely stay here again in the near future.

Summary: My Family loved it. The wife was impressed how friendly and helpful the staff was during our stay. Room was super clean and sheets were clean as well. Great location everything 10-20 minutes drive!Coming back for sure.

Summary Heading: Very Dated Hotel, Doesn't Honor Diamond Breakfast Benefit!
Summary: 1 night stay here in May. I've been meaning to write this review for a while. I stay at Hiltons all the time, and this might be the worst one yet. The property itself is very dated, but in pretty typical DoubleTree style. Be aware the 2-bed rooms are doubles not queens. No elite recognition at check-in, and annoying $23 parking charge considering the hotel is in the middle of nowhere and the lot is uncovered.  My real issue has to do with the refusal to honor elite breakfast benefit. As a Diamond, I am entitled to 2 buffet breakfasts per day. The buffet was understandably closed due to covid restrictions, so I had called in advance to find out what the breakfast would be, and was told I would get 2*$15 credits to use on the restaurant menu to-go. At check-in the same thing was
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose this particular property because, shockingly, it was the cheapest of all of the Hilton properties in the area for the night. it was quiet, clean, and comfortable but I do have a slight problem with the front desk staff. There was a woman who was checking in ahead of me and she was insisting on paying for the room with cash, because the person behind the desk didn't know how to deal with that this woman's check-in took in excess of 40 minutes. That left a diamond member with lower back and knee problems standing for almost three-quarters of an hour. I finally couldn't take it anymore and I dragged one of the chairs from the seating area over to wait in line behind this mess.  unfortunately the chair was extremely heavy so I hurt my back even more dragging it over. This time, since I knew the modified schedule for room service, I was successful in placing my order of the

Julian & Ariel welcoming me @ the Front Desk check-in is the BEST of the BEST!!  Sincere WELCOMING Personal Service.  The Guest Rooms are very clean. Summary Heading: Good hotel but outdated amenities in the room
