Summary Heading: Good location near disneyland and the oulets
Summary: The hotel is conveniently located near to Disneyland (10min drive) and the Orange Outlets (5min walk). It also took us a 45min drive from LAX to the hotel. The rooms were large and clean but we found them to be dated with cramped toilets.   As Hilton members, we appreciated the complimentary drinks and appetisers at the bar in the evening. The buffet breakfast was good with a variety of dishes which were rotated daily. We recommend staying at this hotel for its good location.
Manager Response: Hello lucherylow! Thanks for your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations and are glad you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: If you cherish your belongings, don't stay here
Summary: I'm writing this review for my husband who had to stay here while working at a hospital nearby for a few days. I'm not even going to bother with whether or not the room was nice or the hotel was located in a good area. None of that matters when your room gets emptied of everything in it and the manager on duty couldn't care less.  My husband had a room here for what was originally supposed to be Wednesday night thru Friday. On Friday morning, the day he was supposed to check out, while he was working, he was contacted by the concierge by text and he requested the room for another night. He was told that would be fine so my husband didn't worry about it for the rest of the day. Fast forward to the evening, after working a 12 hour day, when he gets back to his room and finds it

I am not sure that the bed has been replaced ever since the hotel opened - very spongy and hurt my back.  Also, did not put me on the Hilton Honors floors - they said that they rooms on these floors did not matter but then they had various pricing differences on food menus for Hilton Honors members with certain statuses.  We stay there a couple times a year - we were there in September with a team for a business meeting.  They keep it fairly busy so hoping that they remodel soon.

Summary: This is one of my company's "preferred" hotels. I think next time, I'll stay at the Ayres.  This is not a bad hotel, per se. Doubletree hotels are general fine, no-frills, mid-range places. And they have yummy cookies! The beds are nice and firm, and the water pressure was decent for being in California. The lady who checked me in was super nice and gave me a good room on a high floor. The location is decent, close to freeways and Disney (in fact, I had a room that allowed me to watch the nightly fireworks at Disney).   However, it's not a great hotel. The plumbing is loud. I could hear any time anyone in my proximity flushed a toilet or ran a sink. The heating/air conditoning is loud. The features in the bathroom feel cheap. The pillows were awful. The windows are thin, and I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. Summary: I am a very supportive member of Hilton hotels. I've been an Honors member for years. Hiltons and their chains are always clean and have excellent service.  What I like about being a Honors member is you usually get free breakfast and good discounts the more you book.  However, I did not like this Doubletree at all.  First off, it was late and I was in line for about 20 minutes waiting to get my room. There was no one working the Honors desk.  Then they told me it was $24 for self parking! There really is no where else to park.  The worse part about this hotel is there is no free breakfast.  I would suggest a high room away from elevator as they have a busy bar.  By the time you pay taxes, it really is not worth it.

There is also a cute store down in the lower level with some items that could help if you forgot something. And a restronte if you want a bit to eat (we didn't take part but it looked nice) They offer a shuttle service to Disneyland but we chose to walk because it's free and not to far. The staff was kind and the maids did a great job cleaning our room each day. I do not have anything negative to say, It was very nice stay for us

We got a flight out of San Francisco at 2pm on the 7th and arrived at Double Tree by Hilton around 5pm. When we attempted to check-in we were told that there were no rooms available, we were very surprised since our booking was fully paid for from October 6th to October 11th. We were told that since we were a no-show on the 6th they sold out our rooms, rooms that we had already paid

Room was nice but I needed to ask for a few things couple more pillows towels & soaps. It’s was a okay stay I know now I need to be verbal & request the desired items at check in. And guess no more cookies from Doubletree

Summary Heading: Compelled to write my first review - EVER
Summary: My family and I just ended a 4 night stay here at the Doubletree. We have stayed at this hotel between 25-30 times in the last 5 years. We live in San Diego and have Disney APs - so we are here a lot! We loved staying here because it was close enough to Disneyland via “Cookie Bus” but far enough that it wasn’t busy and full of tourists visiting Disneyland.   Unfortunately, there have been a lot of changes in the last year and we’ve started looking for a new “go-to” hotel.  - Most notably, they no longer offer the free Disneyland shuttle (The beloved cookie bus) - you now have to use the ART - pricing varies depending on one way or round trip. For my family, it makes it an additional $15/day.  - The parking rates have increased so much $22/day to self park & $27/day to valet.  -
Manager Response: Hello, thank you so much for taking the time to write this enlightening review as we need it now since we are looking about new ways on how to improve delivering services to our beloved guests. Your review is what we need because it states there our weaknesses and thus we need to improve in these areas. Thank you so much, rest assured this will reach the management team so we can take immediate actions to this. Have a good day to you.

Summary: Customer service really bad. Hilton need to do more so you can keep customer come back or recommendation to our friends. Hotel need to response and solve the problems fast. When you make customers happy they will come back for sure.
Manager Response: We are deeply sorry for what happened during your stay and thank you for bringing this up. We will let our management team know about this so we can take immediate actions. Thank you again and have a good day.

Summary Heading: Not what I expect from a Hilton property
Summary: I was required to stay here for a convention, otherwise I would not have picked this hotel due to the fact that there are no refrigerators or microwaves in the room. They are an extra charge when requested. Stayed for 3 nights with no hot water. Hot water comes out of a faucet at more than 105 degrees in my experience. The first day the water was cool. The second day the water was set at 100 degrees - that is only 2 degrees above body temp. the last day the maintenance tech said he could not give me more than 105. Barely steam making water. The room itself had trash on the floor at checkin that was never picked up during my stay. The shower drain had clumps of hair upon checking in to my room. For some reason my key kept deactivating (no it was not near my cell phone) and every
Manager Response: We are deeply sorry for what happened during your stay. Thank you so much for bringing this up to us. We will let our management team know about this so we could take immediate actions and could take care of this as soon as possible. Thank you so much for your feedback have a good day.

Summary: To most people, this hotel is A-OK as it adheres to the basic Hilton standards. To someone, like myself, a Diamond member that spends half the year in Hilton properties around the Globe, It's unlikely I'd stay here again. First experience with check-in, $25 for early check in. 2. No real upgrades for Diamond members, the automatic upgrade is getting the same kind of room on a higher floor. The actual upgrades, suites etc, are an up-charge.  Next, called for a fridge; another up-charge. In addition, though relatively clean, the room is older/dated. Extra annoyances, Crayon on the walls, old stained carpet, rougher  towels (with a burned smell). All in, it really wasn't horrible, just not what I'm used to and definitely not a draw for regular business travelers; no benefit to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We apologize if we did not meet your expectations especially that you are a Diamond member, we believe that you deserved better than this. Don't worry, we'll contact our management team regarding this matter so we could give immediate actions and also to improve our services. Thank you again and have a good day to you.

Summary: Great family vacation location. Perfect for Disney and Los Angeles vacation. We recommend the dinner menu with the Mexican bowl. The staff at the restaurant, front desk and room service were fantastic.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us! Here at DoubleTree our main objective is to give high quality services to our valued guests. Also, for our staffs, we will let them and our management team know about this so we could give them proper appreciation for your commendations. Thank you so much for the wonderful review and hoping to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: My father had surgery St Joseph and I booked last minute.  Rooms were cleaned and bed was comfy!   Staff is extremely helpful and prompt. Great experience overall and Mom loved the accessible roll in shower.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave an awesome review. We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: The Doubletree staff was very professional, accommodating and courteous during our recent stay. My family was in town for my granddaughter’s birth at St Joseph’s hospital. So the hospitality was appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave an amazing review, we appreciate it. Also, we are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. We will let our management team know about your commendations to our staff so we could give proper appreciation to them. Again, thank you so much and hoping to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Overall service is good. Location is near to factory outlets and just a few mins drive to disneyland.  Arrived at hotel around 12am. Staff did not explain the breakdown why I am charged higher than indicated. There was no drinkable water in the room. There was no fridge installed in my room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review. We value your feedback and rest assure this will reach to our management team so we can continue and improve in giving quality services to our guests. Regarding with the breakdown of charges and the refrigerator, we will take immediate actions to this. Thank you again and hoping to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: I've stayed here a number of times over the years and I'm always impressed with the service here.  The staff is always friendly and helpful, and the rooms are comfortable and clean.  They've also got a dedicated shuttle to take you to Disneyland, a perk that is what drew my attention to start with.
Manager Response: Here at DoubleTree, we only value one thing and that is to satisfy our guests' needs. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to write an awesome review and we are hoping to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: So convenient to UCI Medical Center and the Outlet Mall.  The mall prices are not real outlet prices. The Doubletree has a staff. Very good parking. All kinds of restaurants nearby. Hotel food is good. Fast response if you need extras like tp.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Here at DoubleTree, we always lookout for our guests' needs and deliver high quality services to them. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Good service & breakfast, outdated & aging property needs work
Summary: Good breakfast, fast elevators and clean facility.  Outdated & broken in multiple areas, in bad need of renovation.  Self-parking gates not working - had to call in every day to get out, then they charged me for valet parking for each day!
Manager Response: Hello Michael  Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service. I have sent you an email to the email on your Hilton honors profile to get a little more information on what we can do at our hotel to make a better experience.

Summary: Even after calling ahead a few times  requesting conjoining rooms,  at check in the rooms where separated luckily enough the rooms we wanted where still available so the front desk staff was  able to accommodate. Back in February we had the exact same issue where the requested conjoining rooms we had requested where given to someone else. With the help of management we got our original requested rooms.  When I stay at this hotel and have no prior request or exceptions I  have absolutely no problems  Check in is super fast and easy a room is always ready especially if you check in online the day before.  Check out is super easy either through the app or the text message system The pool and outdoor area is beautiful  The bar lounge is great place to meet up with friends  The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. Regarding with Hilton benefits, we are doing our best to improve our services to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share this with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Large hotel, close to theme parks
Summary: I stayed at Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County in early June 2019. The hotel is large (over 300 rooms in 14 or 15 floors) with several convention halls. it is located of Interstate-5, across from UC Irvine Hospital, and 5 min walk from the Outlets at Orange mall. And it's close to the theme parks like Disneyland. Check-in counter staff were efficient. Parking was an extra $20 - the room key doubled as parking ticket to enter & leave the carpark. The deluxe Queen room (2 Queen beds) was fairly large, with small fridge, mid-sized flatscreen TV (has HBO and HBO2), arnchair and writing table. The maid came by daily by noon and room was well-made. The gym is on the 3rd floor, and has decent machines for running, rowing and weights (stocked with towels dry yourself if
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate that you're taking time to share your review. Rest assured that we'll do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Front desk manager was very rude
Summary: The staff was nice but the front desk manager was very rude.  The hotel was comfortable and the food was great. Billing and reservation process was a nightmare.  I would stay there again but not at all pleased with some aspects
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We deeply sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue to improve our guest service.

Summary: We were given three rooms in total - the first one was an assisted room and the sink on the bathroom was so low it was unusable! We eventually got moved after several visits and phone calls to reception only to find out the room we had been given was already occupied !!!! I worry about the security of a hotel that can give someone your room key! We then got moved again after no apology or explanation. The staff were very unhelpful and we wasted a full might trying to sort out a room! Would definitely not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are very sorry and are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can take immediate actions to continue to improve our guest service.

Summary: Clean, comfy beds, and friendly staff. Had great view of sunsets and Disneyland fireworks. Only 20 min from SNA. Some road traffic noise. Lobby spacious for mingling. Lots of indoor plants. Outside sitting area with flowing water. Overall, good quality and great service from staff. Breakfast ok. I expected higher end like Westin or The Hyatt Place, not Hampton Inn or Holiday Express standards.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary: We got a great rate for a last-minute weekend stay, which is always a plus. Check-in was smooth and quick, and we were given a room on the Hiltons Honors floor - I'd like to say that's due to my status, but I'd rather not lie in my reviews...it was luck that got us that high on a floor that quiet.  The room was indeed very quiet, and very comfortable. We were checked in for three nights, so we had time to spread out and make ourselves comfortable.   The room had a desk and a club chair with an end table next to it. Our window looked out over the parking lot and the outlet center down the street, but we weren't there for the views.  The bathroom wasn't expansive, but the shower had great water pressure and the sink offered quite a bit of counter space.   I did have to stop at the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay At Hilton Anaheim - Orange County
Summary: The hotel staff was quite attentive and helpful and went out of their way to ensure my stay was memorable and great.  The hotel was clean, mondern and quite convenient to everything that I needed to do.  I plan on coming back.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We stayed at Double Tree for my daughter's birthday trip to Disneyland and it was very comfortable, clean, the staff was great and we enjoyed our stay. We will be staying here again for future trips..
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: This reservation was booked on Hilton.com; The hotel staff was really friendly and attentive. However being a Hilton honors member is just like being a regular guest, we were first located on a lower floor not a Hilton honors floor and the room was very musty and a bad odor. I notified the hotel manager he located us to a higher floor, but still not a Hilton Honors floor and the AC did not work in the room. It was colder in the hall than in the room. Probably would look for another Hilton in the area when in Anaheim for an Angels game. Very disappointed!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service. When you are ready to book your next trip to Anaheim for an Angels game, please contact us directly so we can make it right SNACC_SOCIAL@hilton.com.

Summary: Hotel was ok for the money. Not as good as it used to be and we’ve been going there for years when making the Disneyland trips. Over time, this hotel has gone a little downhill and seems to offer less.  No more free shuttle to Disneyland, dinner menu options limited, extra charge for early check in, and room had a very old and musty smell.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are terribly sorry we did not meet our services.  We would like to sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you encountered during your time with us. If you have any other questions or concerns, please contact us directly and speak to any front office manager's.

Summary Heading: Looked clean but looks are deceiving.
Summary: Housekeeping didn’t clean well, rooms or hall. Staff was friendly but the price is too high for the poor quality stingy double beds. On premise restaurant is too expensive and parking was high and double charged. Take and air purifier for clean breathing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are terribly sorry about rooms not being cleaned well.    We would like to sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you encountered during your time with us.  This matter has been brought up to housekeeping management's attention.  If you have any other questions or concerns, please contact the hotel directly and speak to any front office manager's.

Summary Heading: Worst time for Check In, until midnight.
Summary: They gave me, my room untill 12:00 am, we got there at 9:00 pm and charge me Full night, with my son sleeping at the car, and we were a family with 7 rooms, they only have 2 rooms ready at 9:00 Pm, one of my family room were delivey untill 1;00 am. Was a nightmare after a long trip that we couldnt get to rest at that late hour.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We sincerely apologize regarding your experience about getting your room very late.  Please feel free to reach us directly at the hotel and speak to any front office manager's on duty to discuss this matter.

Summary: I spent a week in this hotel, while attending a conference in the Anaheim Conference Center. The location is ok, lot of restaurants and shops in the surrendering. Fitness center is great too ! The only downside is the cost of the parking (USD 22 per day). Rather chose the Uber option, more convenient.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon! Although the parking situation did not meet your expectations, we are happy to hear that the rest of your stay was enjoyable.

Summary: They gave me a room that no one has stayed in for a long time before cleaning and dusting. Housekeeper put pillows and clean sheets on the dirty carpet by the bathroom before making my bed. Disgusting toe nails clippings were on the bathroom floors.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  We would like to sincerely apologize for your overall experience at our property. We will definitely share this feedback with our housekeeping management team.  If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the hotel and speak to the Manager on duty.

Summary: The hotel was very nice I had a view of the Disney fireworks from my room every night. The room had plenty of room. The room service option were limited and pricey. I had room service 3 of the 4 nights
Manager Response: We are glad that you were happy with your room.  Regarding the room service options, we thank you for your feedback and will pass onto our management team.

Summary: It was almost weird to get into a hotel room with absolutely no flaws.  The only thing they could improve the room would be to get a mini-fridge, but it did have a working safe.  I've never had a more comfortable hotel room. It was exactly the way I wanted it. A nice chair with good lighting to read in, a large desk table that was perfectly practical, a really large TV, and attractively decorated everything. It was calming, not boring, and--I know I'm overusing this word--really really comfortable. I wanted to spend a week there as a retreat. I'm almost embarrassed by how much I liked this place.  A Starbucks in conveniently across the street and a large mall with a movie multiplex & restaurants is a short three block walk to the south.   And (keeping in mind that I hope to stay
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: The Doubletree is a beautiful property. Very convenient to local office buildings, Outlets, Angels Stadium, and just a couple of miles to Disneyland. The grab and go area in lobby is nice, as well as the bar and restaurant. Fitness room is nice with multiple treadmills and weights. The rooms are nice and have very nice views, but  but the bathrooms are small. You can hear the Disneyland fireworks and depending on side you can probably see them. Parking seems a bit steep for self parking at $22 per night! So far I have yet to stay in a Doubletree with USB plugs, those are very much needed these days.  It’s also a quick drive to local beaches if interested in visiting the Pacific. I would definitely stay here again.   Photo is from room 1213.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Really nice hotel.  Easy to get to.  Right off the freeway.  Convenient to Disneyland also.  Food at the restaurant was excellent.  Especially recommend the salmon.  Super comfortable beds and great big screen TV.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Stay was good overall but new disappointments this go around, must read
Summary: I want to say that we have stayed here numerous times and this is the first of some minor disappointments that you need to consider.   PARKING PRICES have increased dramatically over the years.  I am not sure if your hotel is trying to stay just under the $25 Disney rate and look good at $22 but this is pretty expensive for parking.   New Bus service!! The times are more convenient being every 40 mins. However for a family of 5 (2x adults and 3 under 9) this price is $13 each day on top of the $22 for parking.  The was such a great bonus to stay and go on he chocolate chip bus for free! For 3 days to go to Disney, this was an expense that we never had to worry about at this hotel and we never thought twice to book somewhere else. But it all adds up!   Change in complimentary
Manager Response: Good evening   Thank you for taking time to share your review and experience at our hotel. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations and that we were not able to create value in your stay for you and your family. As a valued Gold member, we always want you to feel that we are providing the best service and it pains us that we did not provide that during your stay. We have indeed had some changes at our hotel, but we want to do what we can to ensure that our most loyal guests are not affected negatively by these changes.  We do value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service and see how we can improve these policies.

Summary: Six of us stayed here, two double bedroom.. hotel is great, great service hotel very clean. Large enough to accommodate. Great location if you are going to the baseball or ice hockey. Little far from Disney. We were there for the baseball. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We stayed the weekend at Doubletree in April 2019. We were allowed to pick our own room and get a digital key with the app. Both didn't work and we had to check in manually. Interior connecting rooms door was broken. LOTS of maintenance issues. AC didn't function well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve overall. At DoubleTree by Hilton, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: We used this hotel for our wedding guests and as our place to get ready before the wedding. The suites were large and amazing which helped get our day off on the right foot! The restaurant and bar were great and the bar even stayed open late to service our guests after the wedding. We would recommend this to anyone getting married in the area as an easy place with great value and great amenities.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: This hotel is very clean and in an ideal location to many surrounding attractions. A short Lyft ride to the ballpark and free shuttle to Disney. Pool was open til 11, which made the hotel a real hit for the kids! Bar drinks were tasty!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Can’t go wrong with a Doubletree in my (limited) experience. Stayed here for a conference and the staff that helps with the conference (behind the scenes and the wait staff) are always amazing.  There is a Starbucks in the hotel, but I preferred to walk across the street to visit the Starbucks location outside of the hotel.  There are other fast food type places in this location as well.   In the evening, I walked to the outlet mall which is very close to the hotel.    I found the bed to be very comfortable and housekeeping was amazing as they made up my room very quickly each day.    I took an Uber to and from the airport and it was super easy, so I cannot comment on the parking.  All in all it was a great stay and I would not hesitate to book this hotel again.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Great place for a Conference- Food was Amazing!
Summary: I came for a Conference and was surprised by the individual attention that I received from the staff on many levels. Although we were a large group, I felt like those working here were interested in me as a person. The food was amazing. Usually conference "hotel food" is all the same, but this was on point! I'm gluten free and left every meal fully satisfied, the options were healthy, there was a variety and delicious. I went back for seconds almost every time. The only reason I rated the location lower was because going to California from the East Cost, I would prefer to see the ocean and didn't get a chance to do that. If you are looking for a place to host a conference- this is is a great pick!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Great location for eating, playing, shopping.
Summary: Great location, close to Disneyland, within walking distance of outlet mall, dozens of restaurants, bowling, skeeball, and it is annoying I have to type 200 characters when 100 is a sufficient message.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Keeping it warm with no tub
Summary: The air conditioning was limited to 65 degrees at the low end.  I suspect my room as no cooler than 70.  Also, there was no tub, so I wasn't able to relax after a long day's of work.  The reps in the hotel were very friendly, but it was clear that I couldn't have my needs met.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your needs during your stay and that the a/c in your room was not operating as it should have.  We apologize for any misunderstanding and want to help make this situation right. Please direct message us your personal information so that we can have a team member in the maintenance department contact you.

Summary: Diamond member Hilton.  Couldn't upgrade and didn't have a mini fridge to bring to room.  Staff responded curtly.  Rooms dated.  Advanced Requests not met.  Rooms were musty and smokey.  Would rather pay more for better.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are terribly sorry for not meeting your expectations regarding upgrades, request not being met and your overall experience. Please rest assured we will share your feedback with everyone in our management team. We appreciate your business and can only hope you are able to give us a second chance in the future.

Summary: Booked a king premium and the room didn’t have a fridge or microwave. The room was clean but the bathroom was very small, the A/C didn’t cool the room whatsoever. We were told we got  free appetizer per day but it was only good for a two hour window when we were out at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear parkerak84,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your honesty as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s amenities to better our guest experience. We welcome any additional comments or suggestions you would like to share. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Always a nice place to stay
Summary: My first visit but it was quiet, clean and comfortable.  It was easy to find, parking was convenient and then there is the cookie.  The workout room was also spacious, had a nice view from the window and everything was operable.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! And those cookies are the best, aren't they? We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Easy check-in. Room was spacious and very comfortable. Housekeeping was superb. Great location for a conference. Starbucks and restaurant located inside and when Starbucks is closed, they have a self-serve machine.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed everything about your stay with us! We're glad to hear you like the self-serve Starbucks machines in the lobby, we've just added those for the convenience of our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: The upgrade to an upper floor wasn't much more, but it was worth it. Nice view of the stadium and the mountains. Being walking distance to the Outlets at Orange was a definite plus. Close to Disneyland. The mattresses were super comfortable. Recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us this feedback and it is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the premium floor. Having that extra view is always a plus to any hotel trip because it raises the ambiance of your stay. We are so glad that we could offer that experience to you and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: All was fine except the super scratchy sheets.  Hate a $7.00 charge for room service too.  Great cookies of course.  Weird slope in shower to aid in draining but took me by surprise like I had to step up and down when entering or leaving, could be a trip hazard.  I'll be back though.  Good out ways the bad
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Rude staff, no help from belldesk, valet. We Unloaded/Loaded our own baggage. Was forced to take a downgrade in order to have two rooms on the same floor. Bed was like sleeping on a table, bathtub did not drain properly and sink only had hot water. Scalding our hands every time. We were also placed by the freeway with a 4 year old and 10 month old. Sirens all night as well as freeway traffic made it impossible to sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations and that our staff was not accommodating to you during your stay. This is definitely not typical of our hotel and this is definitely not how we want our staff to treat our guests. We will be addressing this with our bell staff and valet staff. If you have a moment, please provide us with your room number so that we may send our engineers to inspect the water and find why the heat temperature is so high and also to take a look at that tub drain as well.. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team because you deserve to be heard and we want you to know that you are being heard.

Summary: Great location, nice rooms.  Would definitely stay again. Love that it is in walking distance to the mall and restaurants.  A lot of siren noise coming from ambulances going to the medical center across the street but that wouldn't stop me from staying here again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We also love that our hotel is located within walking distance to the Outlets of Orange with so many shops and restaurants.

Summary: This is not a good choice for Disneyland.  When we booked they advertised a free shuttle to Disneyland, when we got there we were informed they no longer offered that and directed to the city bus at a cost of $51 for the 3 of us for the 5 days we were there.  They did offer to compensate me with Hilton points when I complained.    The bell service was very nice and efficient.  We were offered no upgrade as Diamond members and our room was not ready until an hour after checkin time despite me checking in on the Hilton app.  The front desk person told me that was due to them having a huge group coming in and them focusing on that, didn't make us feel valued as guests.  The room itself was small and very dark.  It was clean and comfortable, but it is dated, the rooms could really
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County.   Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are terribly sorry we did not meet our services.  We apologize regarding the shuttles services, unfortunately it's through a third party.  Please rest assured we will share your feedback with our executive team. We appreciate your business and can only hope you are able to give us a second chance in the future.

Summary: I have been using this hotel for my annual trips to Orange County for the convenience of location and price point.  They have nice staff and the rooms are clean.  However, the rooms have not been refurbished in about five years.  It is time to refurbish to keep up with the times.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  I will definitely share your feedback with my management team regarding the refurbish of the rooms.  We thank you for choosing our property and hope to see you soon again.

Summary: Very nice customer service was great breakfast was amazing and complementary The View was fantastic we can see the fireworks from my room and the bed was so soft and the shower was so clean the towels were very fresh
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! The breakfast is always a big hit. We are also excited that you got to experience the fireworks from the comfort of your room, what a joy.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I always stay here when I'm in town for medical care at UCI. The rooms are always clean, the staff are always friendly and helpful, and the cookies are always warm and delicious. My only complaint would be that the windows are not very sound proof. Being that the hospital is right across the street there are sirens at all hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We understand that sometimes there are things that can make your trip that much better and we'll share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service and the quietness of our rooms. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: The facilities were clean and well maintained. The staff is knowledgeable and courteous. Parking gets a little lacking, but all in all the hotel will accommodate you r needs the beat way the can. There all lots of cool places to dine in the area. My recommendation is try the micro-breweries in the surrounding area.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: we've always liked our stays at the Double Tree, clean rooms, not too far away from the park and friendly service.  The hotel advertises free shuttles to Disneyland on their website, but when we checked in we found it was changed to a paid service like the other hotels.  We spent over an hour one night attempting to get into our room due to battery issues.  Although we eventually got in, there really wasn't anything done other than an apology.  Coffee stand is decent but they were "away for 20 minutes" several times which left us without our morning coffee a few times.  Still a great hotel, but losing the perks that come with staying a little further away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary: A nice high rise property in a good location that wasn't too highly priced and is comfortable.  Lobby a bit noisy at times with the bar and other activity, but it's quiet up on the guest floors.  As good a place to stay as any in the area, I'm sure.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Visiting Angels Stadium or Disneyland? Book here!
Summary: I highly recommend booking your stay here. The staff are friendly, professional and attentive. There are shuttles available to get you around town. Plenty of new people to meet while hanging out in the lounge area but a word of caution: You’d best be wise to set your alarm clock and/or get a wake up call because the beds are so comfortable! You very well may get that elusive eight hours of sleep, for once.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Great hotel. Great staff, and comfortable rooms. Walking distance to Outlet Mall and varied restaurants made it ideal for me. As well as a short Lyft ride to Honda Center. Stayed there twice now for basketball games. My teams won the championship each time. So, I’ve now dubbed it Championship Hotel 😁🏀🏆
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Long wait at check in. Rooms not ready until after 5:00 pm. Hot tub out of service.  We spent (conveniently for the hotel) over $150 on food and beverage at the bar waiting for our rooms to be ready.  We intended on using that time in the jacuzzi but it was broken.
Manager Response: Dear Rosanne G,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel and are very sorry you had a disappointing experience with us. We’ve addressed the issues you described with our front desk and maintenance teams. Exceptional guest service is the foundation of our hotel's promise, and your feedback helps us improve. Thank you once again for your comments.

Summary Heading: I used to love this hotel... Not so much anymore
Summary: This hotel was my favorite hotel when going to Disney . We stayed here four years in a row. This year, they decided to discontinue their shuttle service for whatever reason. They didn't notify me when I made the reservation, they still have the shuttles in all their pictures and what's worse is the freaking shuttles are still sitting outside the hotel. It was a huge convenience staying at this hotel and taking this shuttle to Disney. Now they recommend you into taking the ART shuttle. They are a garbage can organization!! Their shuttles are never on time and they don't care and they don't wait. They even ran up to ten minutes early and didn't sit there to make up time. You just wait another 40 minutes for another one. I am not alone in my frustration 5 other guests were waiting
Manager Response: We certainly understand the disappointment in not having the free shuttle service any longer. We, do also miss the service that we were able to provide with our shuttles. However, with the ever-changing economy, transportation ordinances, and ADA laws, we unfortunately had to alter the means in which we provided the service. We are working very closely with the company to ensure that they are able to provide the service to our guests they were once accustomed to.

Summary: The hotel was out of the way for my business at the Anaheim convention center, but the staff was extremely helpful and the dinner menu was very good. Best Reuben sandwich in town! The overall value for this day was pretty good
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us @stevetY9009ZI.  We are glad to hear that our staff were extremely helpful and that the dinner menu was great!  We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Excellent stay!  Highly recommend this hotel.  Wonderful, efficient and friendly staff.  Convenient shuttle to Disneyland (not free, but good value).  Pretty lobby.  Good restaurant.  Rooms are spotlessly clean.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Overall, the property itself is beautiful, but unfortunately the lackluster staff and confusing policies made the stay more of an effort than a vacation. First off, they no longer offer free shuttles to Disneyland. You have to use ART which is 5$ a day per person. When we booked the hotel, it offered the free shuttle but when we arrived we had to prove that a site said free shuttle in order to be reimbursed for the price.   Then, I was double charged that night and was scared of overdraftng my account every night moving forward. Unfortunately I don’t have the means to afford two hotel stays at once.   And finally, check out with easy but the person at the lobby desk was dismissive. I’ve stayed at this hotel many times and never had issues but this was the last time I will be
Manager Response: Dear Trip00890385230  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service.  We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.					 					 Thank you, Miri L.

Summary: My 7 yr old and myself visited from the U.K. for a couple of days at Disney. We had a lovely spacious suite which was equipped with everything we needed including coffee machine, plenty of towels, hairdryer and shampoo etc. We did have to pay for the bottled water we used in the room. The suite was kept spotless and topped up on a daily basis. The hotel was a short walk from Disney and there were plenty of eateries locally. We used the hot tub each morning which was lovely despite the weather. The staff were helpful and we enjoyed our free cookies. Can’t really complain about anything so would thoroughly recommend!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I would strongly recommend the Doubletree Hotel.  The entire stay was extremely pleasant and all of the staff were extremely friendly and guest centric.  The breakfast buffet in the restaurant was terrific and had a great selection of both hot and cold menu items.  The only "issue" is the parking.  Although the parking is very close to the hotel, the cost (over $20/night) is a bit steep for the location.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Fantastic trip great stay! I would recommend this hotel for anyone going to Disney or sporting events. Comfy beds, clean room fast service. Great location close to all.  All staff were great. Service amazing. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Hotel was very clean, service was good, people were helpful and friendly.  Stayed for a week with a conference, hotel staff managed that quite well.  I loved the shower.  The room heating/A/C worked well, easy to manage.  The coffee cafe could have had better food selections in the morning.  Food was average overall. The conference kept me busy all week, but hotel was within walking distance of outlet mall, if you had time to shop. They had a shuttle to Disneyland for a fee, but I did not get a chance to go to Disney.  Their welcome cookies are absolutely delicious, always a nice touch with Doubletree.  Wait staff at bar very friendly.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: The service was excellent, as usual, but the mattress was horrid.  Do not book this room unless you’re assured a new mattress is in place.  It was soft and lumpy, and moved anytime weight was shifted.  Very uncomfortable.  We did NOT tell the desk because I think the hotel was full, or had no more king beds.  I’m sure we could have been moved had we asked.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team Thank you again!

Summary: Nice hotel but not extremely accessible to other restaurants. Bit pricy at bar but restaurant on property is nice.  Rooms are nice but bathrooms are pretty standard.  Pool area very boring at least when I was there.
Manager Response: Dear georgeV2877LW,   Thank you for your feedback.   We are glad that you have liked our hotel and the rooms. Your comments regarding the accessibility to the restaurants, pricing at the bar, bathrooms and the pool area have all been taken on board. Please note that the satisfaction of our guest are very important to us and we aim to provide a high standard of service.   We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a more positive experience.   Kind regards,

Summary: Very welcoming staff, good food, nice lobby environment, clean room.  Bar food was excellent with a variety of delicious food items. Service was fast. Outdoor dining area was nice, too. The pond with waterfall was a nice surprise.   Would return.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: They charge for everything. No free hotel parking. Had to pay additional $22 a day for parking. No free internet...must be a Hilton member and no free breakfast. Breakfast cost $18 per person. Would never stay here again.
Manager Response: Good morning   Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: every time we stay there we just loved the place, my kids love the pool and I love the gym early in the morning.verynice and clean rooms the views are great.it is ver close the outlets at orange it was very easy to do our shopping.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Good Business Hotel, Not a Good Disney Hotel
Summary: Booked this hotel for our 3-day Disney visit based on an understanding there was a free shuttle.  I wanted to park my vehicle and not worry about getting back and forth to the parks.  Turns out, there is no free shuttle; the hotel partners with ART (Anaheim Regional Transportation) which requires purchase of a ticket.  We bought a 3-day pass for $14 each.  We had problems getting timely schedules the entire stay at the hotel, and the ART app is not user friendly for searching route information.  One day, there was no schedule available and I ended up calling an Uber to get us to the park and we sat in the cold at the end of the day until a shuttle came along.  The rooms are comfortable and breakfast was great.  I just feel staff and the hotel itself don't seem to care about
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Waitstaff, day shift front desk is awesome, the hotel was very nice, room was great, bad coffee in room, night shift guard didn’t do his job and I wasn’t safe from a predator who also had drugs on him.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay in Anaheim California.
Summary: I stayed at the hotel to attend a wedding. The hotel stay was great and I was treated very well. The wedding reception in the conference area was very well managed. Over all a wonderful experience. I would recommend Doubletree Anaheim to any one traveling to Orange County California.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: perfect location to Disneyland with a free shuttle bus  and walking distance the shopping outlet and movie theatre   ...what more could you ask for and lets not forget the cookies ..perfect holiday. loved staying there
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Hotel is located at the center of freeways and attractions that make it a great place to stay for a nominal price considering the cost of tourist hotels nearby.  Rooms are comfortable and noise levels are low. Great dining inside the hotel and other great restaurants within walking distance.  Shopping is readily accessible as the Orange Block Shopping Outlet is across the street.  For pleasure or business you can’t go wrong with this hotel.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Great locationand easy to find. The staff was helpful on answering questions, giving recommendations. Bar had good drinks and nice bartenders. WiFi was good and no issues with it at all. We liked that we could order food in the bar and not have to go to the restaurant to eat. All food was yummy!  There were a lot of students staying there but we never heard them running around.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Doubletree is home away from home
Summary: Perfect location between Orange, Anaheim and L.A. Located near many major freeways. Right across the street from the movies and outlet shopping. Super close to Disney and other attractions. Staff is great and rooms are comfortable.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: My husband and I really enjoyed our stay! It was extremely enjoyable. The staff was very sweet and always helpful! My only complaint is that we did not receive your famous warm and delicious doubletree cookies at check in. :(
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We had booked this hotel reading good reviews on location and service but other than location this hotel was a nightmare.. we booked our room on Expedia with late check in guaranteed so we assumed everything would be ok.. our flight arrived close to midnight and were looking forward to sleeping and resting as soon as we got to the hotel. This however was far from the case. There are 6 of us travelling together and I had booked 2 rooms with 2 queen beds and accessibility specifically for my mom who needs to use a Walker to mobilize  When we arrived to check in around 1230am. We were told that our rooms were not ready! How is this possible if check in starts in the early afternoon?!? If we had checked in at 5pm.. would our room still not be ready?! Absolutely ridiculous..  we have
Manager Response: We regret to learn that you stay did not meet your expectations and that you went through such a horrible check in experience. This is something that we would not wish upon any guest and there is no excuse for the way that we dropped the ball. Our goal is to make it right for all of our guests that do not have the best experience and want to help make this situation right for you and your family. Please direct message us your personal information so that we can have a manager contact you directly.

Summary: Advised hotel of late check in because flight came in late and my brother even came to the front desk personally to let them know we were on our way. Now 130AM and still waiting for our rooms to be ready. I understand if we check in early ahead of normal check in time but at 1am I would expect our rooms to have been ready. We're told the manager is nowhere to be found and my elderly parents and child are left out to wait until who knows now what time. Rooms booked in advance, hotel advised ahead of time and yet... poor show Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations and that you went through such an experience during your check in. We can definitely understand that after a long day of traveling that you would expect to have a seamless arrival and this was where we dropped the ball on our end. There is no excuse for what you and your family went through and for this we are very sorry. We will definitely take your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service so that instances such as what happened to you do not happen again. Our goal is to make it right for any guest that has an unhappy experience and we want to extend that to you. If you would like to discuss the particulars of your experience in more details and give us the chance to make it right, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at 714-634-4500. We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: Doubletree feels like your home away from home, the staff is friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean, had no problem requesting extra towels. They have a shuttle to Disneyland which is great, no need to drive back when tired from a day at the parks. The shuttle leaves every hour from the hotel and every hour,20 minutes from the parks. They have plenty of food places & Starbucks near by. Also located next to the outlets which is in walking distance. Awesome location.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Everything was great. Great service and the complementary best cookies!  Breakfast was also great, friendly and attentive staff. Rooms were comfortable, only thing is I would have love an actual queen size bed. Other than that, great 👍
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We checked in the evening of our wedding not knowing what to expect. It was late, we were pleasantly exhausted, but nonetheless still exhausted! Upon arrival we were greeted and given our room key and went up to our room only to discover the key did not work called the front desk they gave us the correct room number and the very next morning shocked us with complementary breakfast and even picked up our parking tab!
Manager Response: We are happy you chose our hotel to spend your wedding night.  We apologize for the problem with the room key, but are glad we were able to Make It Right for you.  We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel: we were on the 17th floor the room was neat, clean and quiet. The cleaner came early which we prefer. Our room did not have a fridge, which we would generally take as a normal feature in a hotel room, luckily there was an ice machine on the same floor! This room only had double beds? I prefer Queen but... It was paid car parking across from the front door, but when they held a wedding reception we had to park in the overflow car park as the guests used the car park. It was convenient for the Shopping Outlets and for the Convention Centre also easy to get to Knotts Berry Farm and Disney Hotel does offer paid wifi unless you are Hilton honours member then it is free Would stay again in a room with a fridge!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Decided to stay at Doubletree the block of Orange we are locals we live close because I have a lot of points with Hilton and I'm a lifetime diamond I thought me and the family would go enjoy some pool and fun the staff at Doubletree the block of Orange does not disappoint front desk awesome Bar and Restaurant great service good food breakfast in the mornings is very delicious and the staff is always available to help you and to help the children the rooms are nice they have views of the Disneyland fireworks he did give me a nice upgrade which I very much appreciate would definitely stay here again for date night or a night or day with the kids I highly recommend this hotel for Disney stays they have a great shuttle service to and from the park and also the customer service is
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay for Disneyland trip
Summary: My husband, friends and I stayed here for our Disneyland trip. It was convenient with shuttle bus. The place is nice but the bathroom in the guest rooms were outdated (but still really clean). The price is decent too!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. The courtesy transportation to Disneyland was a great perk. Breakfast was of good quality. Rooms were slightly dated but comfortable. Didn't get a chance to check out some of the other amenities, but overall would recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: overall is good, but not all the staff in the front desk provide good service, the guy when we arrived is very good, he is nice and helpful, but the guy on the other night was very mean! he didn't even smile!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Dropped the ball three times and was not treated as a valued guest
Summary: I wasted a night waiting for a promise that was never delivered.  front Desk staff was going to bring stuff up to my room and it never showed.  I had to resolve the issue myself.  Wait staff in the resturante was rude and uninviting.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The parking rate when your staying for two nights and two rooms. I wouldn’t stay here again just because of the rate. You would have thought you were in Vegas. We were at the block of Orange. A lot of money for a 2 night stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife & I travel to California for business monthly. For the first time I decided to stay at the Doubletree Anaheim-Orange County. My wife & I like the Hotel. We were greeted by the Valet people. The lobby looked nice. Sometimes my wife & I like to have drinks in the evening. The lobby area had nice decorations. Also, it felt inviting to socialize in lobby area. At check-in, we were greeted by Marlene Oliva. Ms. Oliva had a smile and very friendly. She answered our questions and patience with us. A few days later, we talked to Ms. Oliva again. She greeted us with smile and was patience. My wife & I complimented her for her friendliness towards us. On our next trip to California, we plan to stay at the Doubletree Hotel. We hope to see Ms. Oliva again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The free cookies where awesome. Our room was very roomy and we had all the essentials. Wish they didn't charge extra for a fridge and microwave. But hey you can't have it all. The free shuttle to Disney was great. Plenty of times to ride and get back from. There is also a plaza next to the hotel that has Starbucks and Wendy's so there are options. The food at the bar downstairs wasn't bad. Overall great Disney hotel if you want free shuttle. The room was great and would definitely consider this hotel again
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is in a great location, friendly and helpful staff both inside hotel and it valet section. Always greeted when entering and offered help with bags during check-in and check-out. Local stores and restaurants nearby!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location with free shuttle to Disney and convention center. Breakfast was very good and room was clean and comfortable. Staff is always willing to help with any needs or questions you have. Good value
Manager Response: none

Summary: The house keeper did not clean the bathroom one day and the other day they did not replish the toilet paper or shampoo. The internet would slow down. The lobby is quite nice and does appear to be very inviting. Rooms are average or below average at best.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband, three kids and I stayed here in October during our Disneyland trip.  We love that the hotel has a free shuttle to and from the parks, although because of the distance to the park we did have to get on the freeway which I would have preferred to stay off of traveling with children and no seat belts.  The room was also not ideal.  The beds are far too small and very uncomfortable. The room just looked and felt outdated and they don't even offer a mini-fridge or microwave in the room.  This was inconvenient for us as we were traveling with our toddler who loves his milk.  We loved the fresh baked cookies at check-in but we do not think we will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Karla E,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your honesty as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s service and amenities to better our guest experience. We welcome any additional comments or suggestions you would like to share. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll give us another chance to deliver an exceptional stay.

Summary: Terrible customer service. Room was not ready upon check in and customer service did not follow up when room was ready. Only untill I called was I informed the room was ready and this was close to 5 hours after the check in time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed 5 nights here. Getting here from the airport with the Super shuttle entailed specific instructions to Orange County as there is another double tree in Anaheim. Besides that, the location is great. - shuttle bus to Disneyland  - good breakfast buffet - 5 mins walk to the Orange Outlet ;) - Wendy's & Starbucks & Mexican sub   across the street - And u get choc cookies at check in Friendly staff too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were larger than expected. They changed our rooms so we could be together when we checked in.The rooms were very clean. I could barely hear my grandson next door expressing his displeasure at the top of his lungs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel does an excellent job in customer service.  As a "road" warrior I am in hotels every week.  It is a joy to find a hotel that takes service very seriously,  and does so many little things to make our stay a pleasure, and want us to return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay here every time we go to California. The free shuttle to Disneyland is perfect but the hotel itself, and its team, are superb! We stayed here for 9 nights in October - when we checked in we were told they were overbooked and asked us if we would be willing to stay on a sofa bed in the parlour side of a suite for the first night and as a thank you they gave us $100. We agreed (travelling for 24hours we would sleep anywhere). The next day when we went to check into our actual room, Cedric on reception had upgraded us to stay in the full suite for the rest of our stay. We had a Disneyland view, fridge, microwave, walk in double shower... it was great! They really went beyond our expectations and took care of us.   The hotel is in walking distance of outlet shopping and
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean room, friendly and helpful staff.Convenient shuttle times to Disney— shuttle busses clean, drivers friendly and safe.I had a very late check-in (1230 am!), but I was still greeted with a smile and a warm, fresh chocolate chip cookie!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here a number of times. Each time has been worth the money paid. We always take the free shuttle to Downtown Disney the night we arrive to get tickets for the parks and dinner. The parking here is reasonable if you take into account the parking at Disney is 17-20 bucks.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We were greeted and helped by very nice staff! The room was clean and very comfortable with a great view of Anaheim.  The entire hotel was very nice with great amenities and the cookies were so amazing!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Warm cookies after checking in are awesome. Rooms have always been clean, we usually book a 2 Double Bed room for a party of 4. The towels there always seems to be only 3 which is no big deal we can always call in for the extra. This time around the double beds though they were comfy they actually felt lopsided as if they were tilting down on the head area, made us feel as if we were laying upside down. Just used extra pillows and after our exhausting drive and trip to the park we just got past it, didn't want  to deal with a whole room switch after unpacking. So besides that this hotel gets us each time due to the convenience of the free hourly theme park shuttle. It's big and spacious so that's a huge plus because we pretty much never have to worry about being first come first
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for your loyalty and look forward to your return.

Summary: This was the best hotel venue ever! The hotel staff, & Vinolie (catering manager) were beyond wonderful. The ballroom was beautiful with amazing lighting. The rooms are clean, updated, and the beds are so comfortable. Would love to stay here again!
Manager Response: We thank you for allowing us to be part of your special day.  We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I stayed here for the first time and stayed on the HHonors floor.  I made sure my room faced up the I5 freeway (a little noisier) but it did give me a nice view of the Disneyland fireworks that evening.  I could even hear the muffled noises of the fireworks as they exploded in the air (via vents in the hotel room window frame).  This hotel was popular with both business people and families.  It was located less than 10 minutes from Disneyland.  Within a block or so was the Outlets at Orange (lots of stores and restaurants), office high rises and the UC Irvine Medical Center.  The rooms were updated and reasonably comfortable.  Front desk service was friendly and efficient.  Self parking was $17/per night.  Since the hotel runs a free and convenient shuttle to Disneyland it would
Manager Response: We thank you for choosing the Doubletree Hotel Anaheim/Orange County for your recent visit.  We hope that you will visit us again soon!

Summary: We drove in from Vegas and arrived at 11:00 am. We had called the day before and were pleasantly surprised to find that our room was ready for check in. The shuttle service to Disney left on time and picked us up on time. The restaurant was great! We got back to the hotel 15 minutes before they closed. I expected them to pack it in and the food to be sub par. I got the complete opposite. The New York steak was cooked perfect as was the salmon and calamari. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Absolutely adored this hotel, the proximity to Angels Stadium was just perfect for us, Everything from the check-in (thank you Cedric!) to helping us get the fireworks view we requested was fantastic.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: So close to Disneyland I saw the fireworks
Summary: I love Double Tree, always a nice stay.  Don't care for in house restaurant, but that is because of the "yuppie food".  It is good if you like that type.   Close to Disneyland and to shopping Outlet Mall.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Best stay out of any hotel in this area.
Summary: We were greeted immediately. Very very kind helpful staff. Felt like home but better because they accommodated you for everything and with everything. Very clean clean clean comfy beds. A lot to offer around the hotel shuttle to Disneyland every hour which is very nice. You just can't ask for anything more this hotel was amazing I will stay here every single time I go to Disneyland or anywhere in Anaheim area. This hotel should actually be more than just a four-star because it takes more stars to feel the way we felt and have our experience the way it was and they did it they really reached out for us and did so much and made our trip so wonderful.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Always very friendly and very helpful
Summary: Every member of the staff we have encountered at this hotel is absolutely friendly and helpful - genuinely so! We return here every few years and are pleasantly reminded why we do so! The service as well as the rooms are impeccable. The facilities leave nothing to be desired. Easy walking distance to the outlets, a regular and free (!) Shuttle to Disney that runs all day and picks up after the park closeks. It is also very easy to get to from all the freeways.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: The front desk staff was friendly and welcoming. The bellperson was very nice and helped with our bags. The room was tidy, and de-feathered as requested. I didn't try the restaurant, or coffee bar, but glad they were there. The gym was a nice feature. I enjoyed my stay.

Summary Heading: Great for Business or Family - I will be back

There is a great bar, restaurant and even quick serve coffee and pastry shop so i didn't have to leave the property at all.  Regardless of that convenience, I did leave and found tons of restaurant options within 5-10min of the hotel.  I discovered the hotel offers a shuttle to the Disney Parks every hour which sold me on coming back with the kiddos and wifey.  We like being a bit away from the hustle of the Disney area, and the fact that they have an hourly shuttle makes it a

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting UCI

Summary: We have stayed at other Double Tree hotels before. Usually in the Irvine area. The Orange location is very convenient and at a great location. Its right next to the Angels stadium. Very close to Disneyland that you can take a shuttle. The Outlets of Orange is right next door. And the hotel also works directly with a tour service that can take you around Los Angeles areas. Many food places around if you Yelp or get recommendations. The Irvine Spectrum is about 15-20mins away. Again, a great location if you're staying around Orange County and Anaheim area.

Great bar in lobby along with a Starbucks coffee bar. Rooms were clean and staff friendly and accommodating. Will be a regular as my business brings me into this area.

Summary: Great hotel in a great location. Walking distance to stadium, breweries, outlet mall and multiple restaurants. The hotel staff was friendly and accommodating.  The hotel was clean and the bed was comfortable.  I will definitely stay here again!

Luv the Happy Hour with swift courteous service and discounted appetizer prices too!    Only wish is for floor to ceiling windows (HaHa!)  Good Hotel!

Summary: Becareful.  Awful hotel  Because this hotel was wrong room charge, I requested a refund, but this hotel could not do it.  注意して下さい。 宿泊費が予約と違い高かったので、差額の返金を求めましたが、対応して頂けませんでした。クレジットカード会社にお願いすることになりました。
