Summary: Good hotel on a fairly large scale.  Room was clean, but a little noisy at night due to sirens from the local hospital.  Breakfast was very good as was the service generally.  A few different dishes on the buffet which is always good and make a change.   Walking diatance to the shops at orange which are not all outlets.  The free bus to disney was very good and reliable and made up for the cost of parking.  I would stop again, even though it isa few miles from disney.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: No issues, good value for money with friendly service
Summary: No complaints, was good value with a decent room & amenities. Turning the shower on was a little challenging but otherwise all good. Location was fine, room clean, service was on point and easy to park at too.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Mixed bag - Good location, some staff really care, others...
Summary: A completely split experience at this property. Some of the staff, like Cedric were amazing, staying on top of things and checking in. Others, sadly there were many of them could care less, even when working front desk. Sadly if you have to interact with staff, it's going to be hit and miss.   Location wise, it's decent. There is a free shuttle to Disneyland (some drivers are great, others are certainly not and you wonder why they are in a job that interacts with people) which is very convenient, and if you have to it's a $6-8 Uber.   The rooms are clean and there is a safe in the room (hidden), so international travelers can store passports etc with some confidence.   The lounge and restaurant are passable, but nothing great. The options in the area (outlet malls etc) are
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ok stay, wished the premium rooms were more premium
Summary: We chose this as the hotel had a free shuttle to Disneyland and was right next to the outlets to shop. Tick for this. We booked premium rooms for our stay and although they were clean (except the carpet) I found them to be a little tired. There's no minibar fridge so no cool drinks. It was ok, nothing bad but just not great. Thought it was strange that the pool did not have a fence around it so if you wanted to have a drink outside you couldn't as the kids would run to the pool. Also, if you are a light sleeper ask for a room facing AWAY from the Medical Centre opposite as the sirens and helicopter went all through the night.   Always love the cookie you get at check in!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: My stay at a Double Tree
Summary: Great experience at this DoubleTree.  Had not stayed at one since my days in Colorado.  Hotel was in great location to the meetings I had to attend.  Room was in excellent condition.  Hotel lobby was bright and welcoming.  Staff at check in were friendly and helpful
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: 2 nights at Doubletree from Trisha B
Summary: The hotel offered a lot and there are great shops and mall walking distance.  The room was average.  I'd definitely stay there again.  They accommodated me with a early check-in as I had been driving 6 hours to get to my event. No pool though.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: The Doubletree is in the perfect location for everything there is to do in O.C. We stay here when we're attending an Angels game, going to Disneyland, beach weekend, and visiting family. We usually stay 2-3 times a year. The staff is always helpful, the bar stays open late as long as they're busy, there's a coffee shop that has your typical Starbucks items for the morning. If you're a light sleeper request a room that faces West/Southwest and on a high floor to avoid the typical sirens you'll hear because of the hospital across the street. The Outlets at Orange (used to be The Block) has tons of food and shopping options just a short walk away. Close to the 5 fwy, 57 fwy, and 22 fwy so getting in and out is easy. And yes, the cookies are great!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I travel a lot and this is first hotel I have seen where there is no fridge in room.  Ice maker was not working on our floor. Changing room under construction for Swimming pool. Shuttle every 1 hour to Disney. could not find our reservation with breakfast so had to show them my reservation confirmation to get vouchers. Was given continental voucher, very few options for cold food.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for our trip to Disney/California Adventure and were not disappointed with our choice.  The check-in experience was exceptional and Ginelle, the front desk agent, was an angel. She was so patient and accommodating and even found connecting rooms for our family with a view of the Disney fireworks. All interactions with hotel staff were outstanding. Our rooms were clean and well kept. The shuttle to Disney was an unexpected bonus. I highly recommend this hotel and if we ever come back to the area, will definitely stay here.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Absolutely the best Doubletree I have ever stayed at. The valet took our bags from and to our Uber’s. I’ve never had that kind of service at a doubletree so I was very impressed. I highly recommend this hotel to anybody going to Disneyland.

Floors are sticky, room has cat urine odor,(probably doesn't reflect all accomodations), double booked room so was awoken at 3am then front desk called to ask "me" why. When asked how visit was at checkout, I said "not great" she said ..." ya,kk, bye"just poor service

Summary: We enjoyed our weekend of baseball. Hotel is close to Angels stadium and walking distance to the Outlets of Orange with shopping, restaurants, and movie theaters. Price was also affordable. We recommend staying here.

Summary: The hotel and room were good, staff was great. I wouldn't return only because we were there for Disneyland and the shuttle schedule wasn't convenient for us. It only left once hourly for the most part and no shuttle back until 300. It was 110 degrees at noon on 7/6. We had to take a cab back to the hotel. It got up to 113 that day so you needed to take a break at your hotel before 300. If I weren't going for Disney I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary: Stayed at the DoubleTree for four days. Enjoyed stay. Room was very nice.Had breakfast and dinner in the restaurant. The quality of the food was very good. I would eat there again. Bar service was also very good.

Summary: great maid service even with 2 grand kids making a mess with all their toys they kept the room clean. Grand kids loved the pool but a little cold for my tastes. All together a great trip.

Summary: Large, clean, comfortable room. Friendly staff. Great bed. Not close to many dining or shopping options. Very nice bar area. I ate there and had room service. The food was great. I liked that they gave me 2 free waters apon check in.

Summary: 4 minutes ago on Google  I've been a Hilton Honors member only staying at Hilton hotels because I've been impressed by the service and quality. Unfortunately that wasn't reflected in my stay at the Double Tree in Orange CA. When we got there, there was piles of boxes of food throughout our hallway right by our door. When we came back later that evening it was spilt over so the food was all over the walkway of our door. Instantly after that my spouse had stepped on something sharp, to look down and find toe nails all over a section of our carpet in the room. It was absolutely disgusting. They clearly didn't vacuum at all. I went down to address the situation, I spoke to a very nice young lady who said we'd be moved to a better floor which was also an upgraded room. Another

Summary Heading: its pretty important you get that cookie!!
Summary: ya, its a nice hotel....ya, all the staff are real friendly and helpful...but you should expect that....after all it's a Hilton. its location is what really sold us.  If it wasn't for the fact you could walk to the stadium we would have been just as comfortable almost anywhere. it cost a lot to stay here.  if you lived at the hotel for the entire stay maybe it would have been worth it.  you are gone by 10am or 11am...gone all day back at 8,9 or 10pm.  i didn't appreciate having to pay $17US per day for parking...it's not like it's a secure parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.We appreciate your business and thank you for choosing Doubletree Orange as your home away from home.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, good service, fair price
Summary: I actually moved to this hotel after booking another that turned out to be terrible.  This hotel is an older hotel but it was updated and clean.  I ended up getting a better price than I had down the street and it was much much better.  Service was good and it had a Starbucks!  The only part that wasn't great was the guest laundry.  It's located outside by the pool and equipment was old with only one out of two dryers working.  I would recommend this property.

Summary: Hotel was decent for location to Angel Stadium and bars restaurants and shopping. Have to Uber everywhere though. Employees working check in and check out and the cafe weren’t friendly at all. Rude actually. Wifi wasn’t free (had to sign up for Hilton honours to get free wifi, water and hot cookies- which is a nice touch.) There’s a charge to park your car and no shuttle to the airport. How come you can figure out that one!? It was an ok hotel. Needs improvement. Pool, hot tub and outdoor patios are great.

Summary: I went there to get away from stress! The room was so noisey I had a hard time sleeping!! It sounded like the shower was running all 3 nights! Very annoying!! I saved to be able to stay there and feel like I didn't get the quality I had hoped for!

Summary: We spent a couple of day's in Anaheim to watch some baseball games.The accommodations were excellent.The hotel is close proximity to food,entertainment.The staff is friendly and welcoming.Will definitely return in the future.

Summary: Attended course at UCI and the location of teh hotel was perfect, just across the road from the hospital. Even had great view of helipcopters landing and taking off (bit noisy, but it only seemed to happen during the day.

Summary Heading: I will definitely be coming back, the staff rocks!
Summary: My stay here was a part of my Mother's Day gift from my husband. I just started a new job, am in grad school and man am I always tired. I asked him to just give me a night away to rest and relax after my spa day and my husband made reservations for me here.   I enjoyed my stay immensely from the moment I checked in. The front desk manager Cedrick (I believe his name was) went out of his way to ensure I had a great stay. He was thoughtful and accommodating and a real gem! He even told me what time to watch for the Disney land fireworks show out of my window. Oh and who doesn't like delicious cookies at check in?  My room was nice, I only wish that it had a refrigerator. I didn't finish my food from room service and so it went to waste. Also, for some reason the AC didn't kick in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.We appreciate your business and thank you for choosing Doubletree Orange as your home away from home.

Summary: The hotel is very well located. You can walk to restaurants and to the outlets of Orange. Staff is friendly, helpful and professional. You can park your car yourself or they have valet parking. There’s a bar in the lobby that’s fabulous. Really glad I stayed here and I would do so again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.We appreciate your business and thank you for choosing Doubletree Orange as your home away from home.

Summary: I was here for a Conference at the Convention Center and my wife and daughter enjoyed their stay at the Hotel. Check in was very smooth. We were greeted right away with cookies and bottled waters. They upgraded us without us asking to a room on the 18th floor with a fantastic view. Our room was clean and no issues (the tub was slow to drain but we didn’t mention till we checked out). The Outlets were within walking distance so my wife and daughter loved the shopping experience. The only negative was that during our stay 3 of the 4 elevators were down for service 2 of the 3 days (we had to use the service elevator which was not easy to find). Besides that little inconvenience everything was good.
Manager Response: Thank you from taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This location is right across the street from the UCI Medical Center- very convenient for us patients. Parking is expensive at $17/day for self-park but valet is even worse. The room was clean and comfortable and basic. I had requested the lowest tier room so there was no fridge or microwave. The only thing I requested when making the reservation was that all feathers/down be removed from the room. About an hour after I was in my room, housekeeping showed up to change out the bedding. It was not inconvenient. The menu choices for vegetarians at the on-site restaurant are rather limited. There are other restaurants nearby as well as shopping. I had a problem with the television one night and the night maintenance man came by and brought a new tv. He was very nice. Had no issues
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review.  We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations.  We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service.  Thank you again!

Summary: The room was quite average but nice that it was clean.  The WiFi worked well.  Location minutes to shops and Anaheim stadium as well as Disneyland.  Biggest negative was elevator service - 3 out of the 4 were down so they were directing guests to the staff elevators but the two of them were busy with staff carrying laundry or room service.  It was an annoyance during the stay but if that problem wasn’t there would probably give hotel three or maybe 4 stars as staff very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the elevators. We hope to see you soon in the near future.

Summary: We arrived on a Tuesday (April 17th) and stayed 5 nights, the hotel charged us for our 5 night stay at check in along with a 50.00 a day incidentals charge of 250.00 - NO PROBLEM! We expect that at any hotel!   I also had a 85.00 charge I assumed was for the 17.00 a day parking but I was wrong and that’s where things went down hill! Every single morning I woke up to international charge alerts (we are from Canada) that my card had been charged by Hilton double tree - charges ranging from 4.00-90.00 every single day we had been there ! I asked the front desk and was assured it wouldn’t continue , but no one could explain what it was and why it was happening ....it continued! I ended up speaking to Peti the manager, she assured us it would stop , she was sorry and she would refund
Manager Response: We apologize for any misunderstanding and want to help make this situation right. Please direct message us your personal information so that we can have a manager contact you.

Summary Heading: Take me out to the ballgame
Summary: My brother and I go to Anaheim once a year to see the Boston Red Sox play the Angels.  The hotel is just a short walk and we look forward to our annual event.  The only time we've not stayed here in the last 6 years was one year when it was full for a wedding.  Great Hotel and Great Staff.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I recently stayed during a convention with some colleagues. The service there was friendly. My bed was comfortable and the room ok. Needs a bit of updating. My only observation was there weren’t enough employees around when it was really busy. The hotel was booked out, so you would expect to have staff there to cover demand. Otherwise, Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We're glad to hear that you had a comfortable stay at our property.  We hope to see you in the near future!  Best Regards,  Warren Sison Front Office Manager

Summary: I checked in on my app which made it quite easy to go straight to my room after a long day of work, but i still decided to stop by the front desk for a cookie. After i went up to my room I decided to take a bath. As im in the bathtub a huge roach comes out from behind the toilet. I killed the bug and immediately call the front desk. The agent working on the night of 4/14/18 just said that he'll send engineering up and that was all. Its a pest problem not a toilet problem. Engineering came to check to just pick up the bug and walk out. At this point it was almost 12:30 I went to go finish washing up and as I look down to throw trash in the small bin, I see another roach right near my foot. I called down to the front desk and asked to be moved immediately. I've stayed at so many
Manager Response: Dear michelle h  Thank you for taking the time out to let us know about your recent experience. We sincerely apologize for both the incident in your bathroom and also for your experience with the front desk. This is a very big thing for us and we do not want you to feel unheard in any way. Our goal is to have a safe and happy stay and unfortunately we did drop the ball on those during your stay. This is not something that is typical of our hotel we can assure you that this problem is not common for us. Please know that moving forward this is something that we will be paying close attention to so that it does nor again either to you or any other guests in our hotel. We do hope that you decide to return and give us another try so that you can see that we have corrected these things.

Summary: Beautiful hotel and super friendly and helpful staff.  The fitness center was clean and up to date, and the food was quite tasty.  Room was clean and comfortable, and housekeeping kept it that way for the duration of the stay.

Summary: The staff were great. The location is close to Hwy 5, which made driving around very simple. The hospital is right next door though and you can hear every ambulance at night. Minimum 10 per night! No fridge in the room which sucked because we have kids and wanted to pack lunches for our daily tours. The room has 2 Double Beds which were bouncy and you could feel every movement. The lobby is really nice but the rooms are in dire need of updating!

We do apologize that we were unable to meet expectations and that the location of our hotel did not allow you to have an enjoyable experience. We are working to create a better guest experience and honest rating and scoring really helps us as we move forward. We will evaluate the items that you have flagged so that we can work around those for the future.   Thank you again for taking the time to let us know where we went wrong so that we can fix these items. We hope that you return to see the improvements that we have made based on your feedback.

Summary: The staff at this hotel were very kind and helpful. The room and bed were comfortable and clean.  No fridge or microwave unless you pay more.  The grounds were pretty, a pound with a waterfall.  Pool was nice and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us! We're glad to hear that our staff made a difference!  We hope to see you again in the near future!  Best Regards,  Warren Sison Front Office Manager

Summary: Location was close to the Angels Stadium and a 15 min walk. I was told by the front desk lady to not walk back alone because even though the hotel is situated in a safe area passing a specific spot (i don't remember the name) is very dangerous but i walked back and didn't feel in danger at all. Plus i was by myself and felt safe.  My room 1808 was the best!!  I wished I could've stayed longer just to enjoy the room and the view!!  I didn't get a welcome cookie so had to return for it. Also checking in on Sat night with 1 person working upset some people and me since I was in a hurry to get to the game but they ended up calling another person. Everyone was very nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Please consider another hotel in this area.  This hotel is in need of updating immediately.  I am shocked that this is considered a HILTON! Having stayed at numerous Hilton hotels over the years this is the worst one yet. Starting from the small dated rooms to the lack of fridges, to the hard water, small beds and charging for parking all I can say is do not stay here unless it’s the last place in the area.  It is located right beside a major highway so traffic noise is extremely present at all hours.  Please don’t make the same mistake we did and book somewhere else as there are many hotels in the area to choose from.  We regret spending money on this hotel what a disappointment.
Manager Response: Dear adventureKitchener  Thank you for taking the time to provide this feedback. We do strive to create the best guest stay and we apologize that this was not the case during your stay. We are constantly working to create a better guest experience and feedback such like this is exactly what we need as we move forward so we do really appreciate you for letting us know that you did not have the best experience so that we can use this to work for our goal.   We completely understand the concerns that you have in regards to the room condition and beds and this is something that we are working with our staff to remedy. Unfortunately our parking is leased through a third party company and we do not set the prices for our parking, but we do our best to make sure that our guests have a safe and smooth parking experience as well as a parking rate that is convenient for the guests in comparison to our neighboring hotels.  Again we do apologize for this experience that you had, but we do hope that you consider staying with us again. We are using all guest feedback as we move to make sure that our guests have a problem free stay and great customer experience and we want you to know that you are being heard and that we are taking what you have said to correct these issues.  Sincerely  Management

Summary Heading: Like coming home to a warm hug
Summary: After a week in Vegas, dealing with TSA and LAX arriving at the check-in desk of the DoubleTree Anaheim was one of the most calming experiences a traveller could have. We had arrived before scheduled check-in, but the ladies on the desk, seeing our exhaustion and weariness, did not hesitate in providing us with our warm choc-chunk cookie and found us some available rooms to rest our bones before taking a short walk to the outlet mall for lunch/dinner and a touch of retail therapy. The cafe serving starbucks coffee available each morning was an absolute gem as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we came the first time, they didn’t have a room ready for us at 6pm. We came back at 9 and they still didn’t have a room ready. The front desk was rude and weren’t very helpful. Also, the beds in the room were very small for two people.
Manager Response: Hello PaigeProuty  Thank you for taking the time out to provide us with this experience that you had and we do apologize that we did not meet  expectations with  the service at the front desk, your arrival experience, or the room. These are three really key things in making sure that all of our guests have a wonderful stay and it saddens us that all three of these key points were missed. We have dropped the ball and for this we again offer our sincerest apologies.   We hope that you return to stay with us. We are working to create a better guests experience and we will use your feedback as we move forward to our goal of a problem free stay for our guests.  Thank you again.  Sincerely  Management

Summary: I love this hotel. The place is clean, the staff is wonderful and the beds are amazingly comfortable!  The warm cookies at check in are delightful!  I love the digital key option and the lobby bar makes strong drinks!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us!  We're glad to hear that we are your to go to property!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Best Regards,  Warren Sison Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel was beautiful, check in was a breeze and having a Starbucks in the hotel lobby is always a plus! Very clean and friendly staff. I slept like a baby and never skip out on the cookies! I'll be coming back for sure.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had the opportunity to be a guest of this grand hotel. It is one of two in the orange area. The lobby was magnificent and welcoming. The check in was quick and being a honors member provided me with perks like floors designated exclusively for members. A complementary meal the following morning. The room was huge with two amazing beds. The LG flat screen provided viewing pleasure on either side of the room. There was a work table that allows the visitor to feel like home. The view of the outside was spectacular. I can see Anaheim Stadium as well as UC Irvine medical center. The shower head provided plenty of water. The vanity had lots of space so if you need to spread out your toiletries, it was not cluttered. The only two areas I was unhappy with was the security safe made
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel overall was very good , they put me on the 19th floor when I requested a stall shower. I had a few requests from the desk all were brought up to the room very fast.   Eat breakfast everyday at the hotel which is good but nothing special.   Had appetizers at the bar one night , I thought they were very good.   Mac n cheese balls and loaded nachos were very good.   Will be back next month
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Value and Close to All of OC
Summary: Stayed here recently for a conference at the hotel. I like the service staff as well as the overall condition of the hotel. Staff here is very friendly and goes out of their way to assist you. The hotel is clean and the cleaning staff keeps it that way during your stay.  The digital key didn't work for me but it did for some in my party. While limited, the restaurant food is fairly good. The bar service is excellent. Very close to Disneyland and about 20 minutes from John Wayne Airport. Hotel sits right on top of the Orange crush so you can get to about anywhere in OC you need to in decent time. The elevators are the only real complaint. It seems only 2 of 4 are working. Gets a bit rush hour like in the mornings stopping on every floor.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were there for a cheerleading competition at the convention center. These are long nights and early mornings. We were trying to get some rest on Saturday and the house keeper knocked 3 Times and than the house keepers manager knocked a 4th time. Mind you we had the no disturbance sign on the door. Each time we told them we do not need the room to be cleaned. The house keepers manager looked at us mad cause we didn’t want the room cleaned.   The day we checked in we had the do not disturb sign on the door and were napping after a long day in traffic and house keeping open the door and when we spoke up said sorry wrong room.   I guess the do not disturb sign doesn’t mean anything in this hotel.   Do not stay here if you plan on resting!!   That’s not all- my daughter asked for
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Sanchez,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. I am very sorry to hear that housekeeping disregarded your Do Not Disturb sign and interrupted your rest. I will be passing along this complaint to our Director of Housekeeping so he can address it with his staff. I apologize about the miscommunication regarding the water, and I will certainly address this with all of our Guest Service Agent. We take pride in our service and I am very sorry your stay fell short of that experience. We really do appreciate your comments as it will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. At DoubleTree by Hilton, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: Beautiful property, awesome location, and great staff! Close to the Mall, complimentary shuttle to Disney, Spring Time in Anaheim is perfect but remember to bring an umbrella and a sweater, Restaurants, Target, and Starbucks close by plus amazing cookies!
Manager Response: none

Summary: An excellent two night stay. Check in was quick and effecient and we were given some lounge/bar vouchers as the paperwork hadn't been filled in prior to arrival. Room was large, clean and located on the 16th floor. Breakfast was buffet style and the selection was plentiful and well stocked. The waiter on morning one was excellent whereas on the gent on the second morning was not as attentive and needed a bit of prompting but that was the only slight negative during the stay. As mentioned elsewhere parking is $17 a night which grates a bit but it is shown on the website so you are aware of it at time of booking. Shuttle to Disneyland was a big plus.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Located 5 min walk to Angel stadium.   5 min ride to Disneyland.   Across street from uci medical center.   Rooms are good size.  Shower and bath very nice quality. Tough to find free parking nearby.   Fast food places within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County.  We're glad that you enjoyed staying at our property and we hope to see you again in the near future!  Best Regards,  Warren Sison Front Office Manager

Summary: Overall a good hotel. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Pool super tiny especially compared to the GIANT fish pond that is easily 10 times the size of actual pool. Clean rooms but WiFi isn’t the greatest.

Summary: Good location, close to restaurants , short walk. Shopping   Nice Bar in lobby. Room was large, very clean.  Services where very good.  Good cookies upon check in.  Easy and fast check in.  Staff was very friendly.

Summary: It is a nice business hotel in very close vicinity (walking distance) of Outlets at orange and good restaurants. Room are pretty good, clean and well maintained. Breakfast is good, although same everyday.  Overall a very good hotel, definitely recommended.

Summary Heading: Great conference venue and accomodation for our sales kick off meeting

The food throughout the 3 days was excellent, 2 lunchtime meals taken outside in the tented area by the tennis court and the final day in the main restaurant. The salmon salad that I had on my arrival evening was excellent!  Reasonable sized fitness room although one of the running machines was out or order so a bit of a queue for the other two.  Recommended.

Summary Heading: would have been a 4, but the parking charge brought it down

Summary: Great property located very close to Disney and with shuttle service (limited). Would definitely stay here again. Shuttle drivers were accommodating and fun. Breakfast was great and appetizers for honors members were good and appreciated.

Summary Heading: A Great Place Near Just About Everything!

The heater in the room worked well, as it was cold outside). Practically, instant hot water for the shower.  Hotel Location, Location, Location: Excellent Freeway Access, close proximity to Disneyland, and a few blocks from the mall (shopping and restaurants).  Parking:  Choice of $20.00 Valet Parking or $15.00 Self-parking Per Day  Staff: Very Courteous and Informational.  And they did not forget the Chocolate Chip Cookie!

Summary: We road tripped from Portland to Disneyland. Couldn’t get our hotel close to the park for the 1st night. This hotel was available and we snatched it up. Our short stay was amazing. EVERY single team member we encountered, was helpful and welcoming. I work for Hilton, and visit many properties. This is one of the best. A beautiful property. The room service servers, bartender and concierge, stood out to me. We stayed Sat. Oct 28. Didn’t get the name of the concierge who worked that evening, but he was very informative and helpful. The room service server who worked earlier in the evening, rode the elevator with us, and was so interactive. Later, we had room service delivered, and Adrian was the best. Before heading to my room I stopped by the bar for a couple beers. Christopher
Manager Response: none

Summary: If queen sizes beds were offered instead of doubles and parking wasn't charged nightly then it'd be excellent, but for now I will keep my eye on other hotels too. Friendly, clean, service was great but with the few things mentioned it could be excellent but for now it's great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is very nice.  We were treated like special guests.  Rooms were spacious and clean.  The grounds are landscaped beautifully.  It was a great place to have a conference.  The lobby is inviting and a comfortable to meet with friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easy Parking adjacent to Hotel, large impressive hotel, checking in process very professional and friendly. Large spotlessly clean rooms, useful Gym on the third floor and outside swimming pool. Pleasure to stay here on business. Booked a return stay again in a few weeks, for end of October 2017.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very clean rooms, great staff, and comfortable beds. The hotel atmosphere was very pleasant.  The cookies were wonderful as a late afternoon or evening snack.  There is also a nice and reasonably priced restaurant and coffee shop in the Lobby.  The pool area and grounds were very beautiful with a Koi and duck pond. The plants were also beautiful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love this place. The staff is always friendly and accommodating. Great views from the upper floors. Parking is easy to access. Centrally located, for me, with easy access to my customers and easy access to the beaches. The only place I stay when in the area. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stay here and feel like family
Summary: The guys at the bell desk are so cool. the shuttle drivers to Disneyland are warm, funny, and nice. One day we missed the shuttle and a driver volunteered to take us to park in the DoubleTree van free of charge. Come on. who does that? These guys really care. They gave us extra cookies, told us jokes, and we all sang along to the radio. These are the little things that make a vacation special.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything in the hotel was nice except for the food. Breakfast should have been more conducive to different eating needs. The box lunch on the first day was horrible. The second day we got Subway sandwiches and was a lot better. Dinner was of medium quality. The restaurant was good they have a great variety of salads.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was attending conference on October 5th, till 9th. I did reserve my room in April and was very disappointed that that the view from the window was the roof top below. I also learned that people that are points members got better rooms. That is not fair since we were all part of the the same event and got the same room rate. The hotel restaurant was closed on Sunday and open at 5PM so you could not have lunch. We had a meal there ones on Thursday and service was very bad. Personnel at bar very unfriendly. The conference food was not very good. Breakfast never had any bread!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The girls and I had a great time. The staff was freindly, the rooms are spacious and clean. A clear view of Angels stadium.I did not expect the fabulous service we received but certainly enjoyed it! Free shuttles to and from Disneyland make this hotel a must!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were here for a convention of over 400 plus people and only 2 elevators worked for 18 floors. We never saw anyone working on the other 2.  Long lines to get an elevator. Then a giant Saturday evening crowd and only one bartender on duty.  Most people got tired of waiting.  The ballroom and meals on the covered terrace were lovely. The room was nice and the staff was polite.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was there for a religious conference that served about 400 plus attendees. Overall the service was excellent. My only complaint was the elevator. We had to wait in a very long line. I only stayed one night and I was very satisfied with my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for you kind words and for staying with us at the Double Tree in Anaheim-Orange, we hope you will continue to patronize our hotel. I apologize about our Elevator being down but our elevator contractors ThyssenKrupp have worked on this issue. Thank you once again for staying with us.  Sincerely Ronald

Summary: Worst double tree around Has a hitlon honour diamond  The hotel didn't care The worst double tree  I have ever stayed at This hotel should not be in the hilton brand  Staff didn't care about h hours menbers
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel had friendly staff, clean rooms, a great location for what I needed, and plenty of amenities.  I will be using it again when I next come back to the area.  They do have parking available, and I would recommend having a vehicle to get around the area or you will be using a taxi or ride share service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall my visit was decent. I did however order room service for one night food total $65 when I got the bill it was $90 so unfair for mini cheese burgers and chicken big disappointment. Guest services was amazing however they are very friendly and helpful
Manager Response: Dear Ambreah2017,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a guest of ours, you are our most valued in our eyes. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. I have informed the Food and Beverage manager of your concerns and we thank you for your honest feedback. At DoubleTree by Hilton, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us in the future.    Sincerely,  Julia Shotwell Asst. Director of Front Office Doubletree by Hilton Julia.Shotwell@Hilton.com  714-634-4500

Summary Heading: Have always like it but... this time =(
Summary: I have stayed here many times. However, this last time we found a bed bug on our bed. When we were relocated to another room, the trash was still in there from previous occupant. When we checked the beds after we caught the bug, we didnt see any others on the mattress. They did refund our stay but the eeby geebies can't be removed. Just be careful and check your room prior and never set anything on the floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.   We would like to sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you encountered during your time with us. If you have a moment of your time, please contact our security department directly at SNACC-Security@hilton.com or 714-634-4500 and dial “0” to speak to the operator.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree By Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Overall everything went great with my stay. The room was always nice and clean, we ate at the restaurant and the food was good. I do wish the coffee shop opened before 6am. Staff was always helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was a good stay , haven’t been here in years. Easy check in bell staff was attentive and came right out to assist with my bags. Parking was easy and convenient. They had my food vouchers pre printed with my gold status information which saves time.   Room was nice on the 19th floor nice view and pretty quiet.   Only real noise was from the hospital helicopter pad Nextdoor.   Will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was very friendly and attentive. Not all of our expectations were meet. I requested refrigerator and microwave but they were not provided. For the price I would think that they would be available as requested or at least told they would not be available. Only complaint was refrigerator and microwave because the staff was fantastic
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Family trip for an Angel's game and shopping
Summary: We stay at Doubletree in Orange two times a year. My children, grandchildren, my husband, and I enjoy our annual Christmas trip to Disneyland and another trip to an Angel's game. We found the hotel in 2008 and will continue visiting them. The staff is professional and always kind and helpful. We are Hilton Honors members. We also stay at the Doubletree in Ontario and also have found the facility and staff to be excellent.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was pretty good.  9th floor with a view toward Disney, which is only 4 miles away.  Also close to the Anaheim Angels home field, Anaheim Ducks home ice, Orange outlets a 2 minute walk away. Ramp to interstate is 1 minute away by car.  Easy drive to Santa Ana airport.  Easy drive to airports.  The downside was that the air conditioning really did not work well. Despite setting it at the lowest setting of 65 degrees, I could not get it cooler than 74.  Otherwise the room was decent. The bed was comfortable and everything was clean. I used the electronic key app on my smart phone, that was very convenient. Opens room doors and parking gates.  Parking is 16$ a day.  So, it was convenient to many attractions. If you are looking to visit them this would be a decent place to stay.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Tom M,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We value all of our guests at the Doubletree by Hilton and work hard to provide you with excellent customer service. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations.  Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. At DoubleTree by Hilton, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us in the future.    Sincerely,  Julia Shotwell Asst. Director of Front Office Doubletree by Hilton Julia.Shotwell@Hilton.com  714-634-4500

Summary Heading: Typical Doubletree - Nothing Wrong, Nothing Great
Summary: The best part of the experience was the front desk staff, who were extremely nice, particularly to my kids.  Our room was clean and the WiFi reliable at 6Mb.  The cookies were good, as always.   Parking is either valet or self park in a lot that requires a key card (available at the front desk) to exit.  The hotel is located across the street from UCI Medical Center, so there was some ambulance noise. The restaurant breakfast was a bit pricey, so we went out to eat.  On the plus side, if you have a room facing Angels Stadium and they are playing a home game and there are fireworks that night (as was the case when we visited), you get a great view.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Eric G,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. I am glad your experience with the Front Desk staff was great, they are a great group of people who love taking care of all of our guests. We appreciate your feedback in regards to our hotel as this helps us to improve our services. If you wanted to see the fireworks on a non-game night, request to stay on the Disneyland side of the hotel and you will have a great view of the fireworks everynight! At DoubleTree by Hilton, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us in the future.    Sincerely,  Julia Shotwell Asst. Director of Front Office Doubletree by Hilton Julia.Shotwell@Hilton.com  714-634-4500

Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for almost 2 weeks after having brainstem surgery at UC Irvine Medical Center.  The staff took excellent care of us, including our dog.  The rooms were always clean and well stocked.  The cleaning staff was very friendly.  The check in staff was friendly and helpful.  All of them stopped to pet and play with our dog and all were very kind to our kiddos.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I always stay in this hotel when I visit my son at Chapman.  It is very convenient, safe, and a good value.  The rooms are always clean, but have been a bit warm this last visit.  However it was 110 degrees outside. I also enjoy the waters and cookies when you check in using your Hilton honors membership.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed for one night this week which was OK (was in 1608) - I appreciated receiving an appetizer coupon and free breakfast as a Diamond member but had very weak internet in 1608.  I also had breakfast in the restaurant and while it was free it was awful - the food was burned bacon was undercooked and french toast was disgusting so I barely ate and left.  Also cleaner mops elevator floor and lets it run wet and soapy with no sign which was VERY DANGEROUS (I reported to desk).   Despite that I liked the location and returned.  When I decided to return for a second stay the clerk gave no vouchers for anything (I asked and he said pick them up in the morning which would defeat the bar one)...and he said he upgraded me to a room on the 19th floor which was the exact same as 1608
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: First Hilton Honors experience and everything fell below my expectations.
Summary: I was given an entirely different room than the one I booked. Staff was ok at first, but only one lady seemed to be nice and know how to treat their guests, considering how much money I paid. Cafeteria was awful, they sell some salads and I had the bad luck to witness how little insects came from the inside of it... terrible experience now that I recall every detail
Manager Response: none

Summary: As a return visitor, we were pleased with the room location (high floor) and convenience of early check-in after a long red-eye flight. The shopping/entertainment center within walking distance is convenient too. We'll be back to this hotel again in the Fall!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Surprise!  You will be nickel and dimed to death!  $15 a day for parking.  $15 for premium internet service in your room.  If you want it free, you have to go to the lobby.  No free movie channels.  Another nickel and dime thing.  No in room refrigerator.  Do not book through another program.  Book directly through the hotel.  My husband didn't come, and I booked through another agency on line, so the hotel could not give me a break on my room rate.  One person instead of two.  The view from the higher rooms is incredible at night.  Room was clean and fresh.  The bed was very comfortable.  They did not have a plug near the bed for a c-pack or whatever.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A/c like having a fan on it was 108 raining beds very uncomfortable small pillows. Hotel said a/c is fine but room really hot we had 20 family members in different rooms and we all complained about the room a/c
Manager Response: none

Summary: I travel all the time. I only stay at Hilton properties if possible. This Doubletree is my favorite. The staff has been there a long time and they are all professional and friendly. The rooms are great. Breakfast is wonderful and the breakfast staff so nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was here for a work project and have to say it is affordable for business travel, but not necessarily helpful for a business Traveller. The business center equipment was often not functioning. Staff though are super friendly. Rooms are fresh and clean but could use a mini fridge and better a/c. The thermostat was set at 67 and I was still sweating. They offer free shuttles to Disney. Parking is a bit of a hassle if the front lot is full. There is a structure around the corner with a long walk from it to the hotel entrance. They have facilities to host large events like meetings and weddings. The breakfast buffet is WAY overpriced at $18pp. It is fine food but not worth that price unless you eat 3 plate fulls. Still, this hotel is your average 3 star hotel convenient to Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are terribly sorry we did not meet our services. We appreciate your business and can only hope you are able to give us a second chance in the future.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County

Summary Heading: Stayed at Doubletree for a Hockey Tournament
Summary: My family and I stayed at the Doubletree in Orange, CA for a large Labor Day hockey tournament. The hotel is located in a decent area of town near an outlet and between 10 and 30 minutes to the Ice Rinks where my 9 and 11 year olds played ice hockey. The hotel is nice, but the pool security was a little over the top. Yes, we had some beers, but we are all 40-50 year old, not making too much noise and just watching out for our kids. Were not 18-21 year olds going crazy, there is no reason to sweat us because one of the parents brought a soft cooler to the pool and some plastic cups and a beer. We all spent 1000s of $ already with you, I know each beer is a loss of revenue, but please consider the bigger picture. The rooms are otherwise great, but the WiFi is terrible. It drops
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are terribly sorry we did not meet our services. Please rest assured we will share your feedback with our executive team. We appreciate your business and can only hope you are able to give us a second chance in the future.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County

Summary Heading: Best value stay when visiting Disney
Summary: Conveniently located. complimentary shuttle service to/from Disney. Quiet rooms and comfortable beds. Friendly staff service. I got the all inclusive rate (Room + Parking + Breakfast), so got a good deal. Stayed here several times with the family when visiting Disney or a Daycation in LA.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have commented previously on Trip Advisory about the Doubletree in Anaheim. I stay here exclusively when I travel to Orange County. Simply put, this place can't be beat...don't hesitate to stay here!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel with a good shuttle service to Disneyland and cheaper than the others close to the Park. very nice pool and spa (even if close to the road is hidden by trees and you do not realize it) Laundry service was perfect, our stay was really good. I suggest this hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: Highly recommended... great bed sheets ... spacious room... clear... hospitable staff... and great location.. close to pretty much all attractions in Anaheim, especially, Disneyland, Honda Center, and mall/movie with outlets.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is convenient to John Wayne Airport, Chapman University and 15 minutes from Newport Beach, CA.  The atmosphere in the lounge area is relaxing and the rooms were nice!  Checking in was a breeze and a warm cookie is always a nice touch.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The doubletree is an excellent choice for business travelers.  I stayed here for two nights in August, for a meeting nearby.  Check in was a breeze and the cookies and water were a very nice touch as my late arrival and jet lag was dragging me down a bit.  The layout of the hotel is easy to navigate.  The room was wonderful.  A discerning eye can find bits of wear, but it is not a problem. With a modest amount of activity in the hotel, it remained a quiet place and provided a great place to rest and recharge.  The breakfast buffet is very well done.  Don't miss the ginger shots.    The location is convenient to offices, shopping, medical,facilities, entertainment and other attractions.  The price is in line with what you might expect.  It is a great value and a nice step up from
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Decent Value not happy with service
Summary: It is your standard doubletree with a nice lobby.  Rooms were fine.  My issue is that I got out of shower and the floors were very slick to the point my bathmat slid out from under me and I fell hard against the bathtub.  Luckily I did not hit head or break anything.  I let the front office know that this is dangerous.  They did send maintenance to check out and said they would make it right but never called me again.  I would be very careful staying here and check the floors.  Whatever they mopped with was the wrong product..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.   We would like to sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you encountered during your time with us. We take these matters very seriously and apologize there was no follow up. If you have a moment of your time, please contact our security team at SNACC-Security@hilton.com to discuss this incident.  Thank you again for bringing this to our attention.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County

Summary Heading: Quality seems to have gone down since prior stays..
Summary: We've stayed at this hotel every year with my husband while he's on local business trips.  Generally we enjoy our stay and have no issues.  This year, it wasn't horrible or anything, but definitely disappointing.   My husband had been using the room a couple days before myself and our children arrived.  It was late at night, and I finally arrived with all our luggage and children at the door of our room to find my key card had been disabled and I was locked out of our room.  Back down at the front desk, they told me I had to be escorted to our room by two security officers with badges.  What?!  Apparently they had gone in to our room, even though the "Do Not Disturb" sign was on the door, looked around our room, and found some ammunition amongst all my husband's things on the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Did not have proper room that was reserved
Summary: I reserved adjoining rooms for my family of 4. At check in they said none were available. Unbelievable and they put my children in a room on opposite side of the hotel. The check in clerk was unhelpful and offered no solution!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fine Meeting Venue - Close to Mickey & Donald
Summary: The Doubletree has a convenient location and very fine meeting facilities. The rooms are quiet and the internet is reliable in your room. Be aware the restaurant is fine for breakfast, but that's about it. Bar seems a bit pricey - but hey, it's near Disneyland. Concierge is very helpful and knowledgeable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, close to outlets and restaurants.  Good location to get on expressway to numerous attractions.  Shuttle service to Disney was nice.  Property was clean and staff were helpful.  After there was a mixup with room type and we didn't have a mini fridge in our room they immediately brought one up at no extra charge.  Rooms have good sound proofing and cleaning service was top notch.  Because it's technically in the city of Orange on the edge of Anaheim you pay much less in occupancy taxes for your stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for work or family
Summary: I have stayed here multiple times for work and leisure. The recent upgrades to the coffee bar and business center were nice. The breakfast buffet provides a ton of quality selections. We enjoy the easy atmosphere and will be staying here again should we ever come back to the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: was given a price that included parking. when I checked my credit card bill, found they had added an extra charge. called hotel and spoke to a very rude woman. I told her that we were given a price without the add on at the desk. she said go read the web site. when I told her this was wrong she hung up on me.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very helpful staff and knowledgeable of our issues and resolved them quickly. I loved the warm cookies and how we were able to ask for them anytime of the day. We stayed here for a wedding and I enjoyed every minute of it. Was able to extend my check out with no charge that was the great on my end.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was a bit nervous about booking this hotel since it's so close to Disneyland and they have a free shuttle.  I was afraid there would be tons of families with loud kids slamming doors at all hours of the day and night.  I had also read reviews about lackluster checkin staff, but I found everyone very friendly and the hotel extremely quiet.  Even though we weren't there to go to Disneyland (attending a funeral instead) we really liked being able to watch the fireworks from our room every night.  We hadn't planned on it, but somehow my sisters always ended up in our room at 9:30, and we watched them 3 nights in a row.  It was a very nice surprise, and lifted everyone's spirits at the end of the day.  It was very convenient having a coffee maker and mine fridge in our room as
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Hilton team must be proud of this place. The staff are incredible from the reception to the drivers who kindly shuttled us to Disneyland.  Rey, Roger et al made every attempt to ensure our visit to Disney started with them. With warm smiles and greetings, they created an air of happiness. They told me they loved working at the Doubletree. How many times do employees ever make that statement?  The room was comfortable and inviting. It allowed us for a wonderful night's rest.  The pool was great for our son, who loved every moment of our visit.  And yes, thank you for the cookies!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel, wonderful staff, very accommodating and friendly. Nice large rooms, big TV, and with a wonderful view,  free WIFI; Great restaurant service, good food, and overall a wonderful place to stay when away from home.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was clean and very well staffed.  I only had an issue with breakfast eggs being cooked on high heat so that while the yoke was still "over medium" the surface of the egg was rather crispy. I sent them back and second set of eggs was "better". The staff went out of their way to pickup a package that was delivered to the wrong hotel and it was delivered to my room probably with an hour of being delivered.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We greatly enjoyed our 7 night stay at the Doubletree.  The staff was friendly, especially the bellman Julio, who gave us lots of good recommendations of things to do in the area.  We had breakfast in the restaurant there every day.  Variety was good & staff was very friendly.  The lobby and pool area were very nice.  The room was clean and a good standard size.  Great location for visiting Disneyland we loved the free shuttle that leaves every hour.  The drivers of the "Cookie Bus" were a lot of fun, they seemed to enjoy their job.  Close to the 5 Interstate, so going to areas outside of Anaheim was no problem.  We were very happy with our stay and would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was somewhat a disappointing stay.   From the beginning when the digital key didn't "arrive" through check in....and finally getting horrible service in various places in the hotel, I've decided we won't stay here again.   The room was adequate and the bed, in fact, was very comfortable but there was a "musty" sense to the room that's probably attributable to the age of the HVAC system and we both had breathing issues by morning.   We love the Hilton chain and are actually at another tomorrow in the Phoenix area and so understand there is always a delta between the levels of each facility.....but this one just didn't do it for us
Manager Response: Please let us know the next time you stay with us and we will make sure that the AC in your room is in good working condition. We checked the room and the AC was working. Thank you for being a loyal member of the Hilton Brand. We take pride is providing our guest with the best accommodation.

Summary: From the beginning, my reservation, to my stay, and my departure were all less than acceptable.   I was placed on a floor that I specifically asked to not be on. My room was dirty, had soiled towels & blankets   The room was supposed to have a refrigerator, and when one arrived, it smelled as bad as the room did.  The internal noise of the hotel kept us up at night. It sounded like internal construction. When i asked to be moved, i was told someone would call me back. No one called me.   The bed smelled, and was uncomfortable.  This hotel was far too expensive for what is considered to be " upscale"   Add the insult of 20.00 a day parking ( i was told it would be less) I wouldnt stay here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good experience overall, with the exception of the meeting space, which did not fit our needs.  Staff was friendly and knowledgeable.  Hotel was beautiful, and clean, ad the team did what they could to make the meeting space work out.  Cookies were a big hit with the kids!
Manager Response: Hi Kristy,   We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us, we apologize for the meeting space but appreciate you allowing us to work with you to improve in every way possible. We look forward to having you stay back with us. Have a great day.

Summary: Elegance from the minute you walk through the door.  Porters greet you and assist you with your bags. 3 Restaurants inside; a full service formal one, a café that is part of the bar and that has patio seating available next to the 2 level coy pond, and a Starbucks that sells sandwiches, pizza, and hand made ice cream.  The rooms are beautiful, one side of the hotel looks towards Angel Stadium and the other towards Disneyland with a perfect view of the nightly fireworks.  Every turn in the hotel was a new discovery and the staff are eager to make your stay perfect.  Fantastic for kids.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A fantastic hotel with some of the best staff I have encountered in years of travel.  Rooms are very comfortable and clean. Food at the bar was well-prepared and delicious. Great job! Will definitely look them up again next time I am in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Here on a Conference and entire stay in room, and Hotel amenities, were very nice. Our Conference accommodations were adequate. Ability to get one of those scrumptious Angus Beef Hamburgers after hours, is very much appreciated also.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall, this hotel is situated not far from Angels stadium, nice location, good dining and good size rooms. The staff here was very courteous and professional, they had all the right answers to questions we had. They also gave us great tips on places to eat or go visit. Thanks for a great experience!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed in a variety of hotels varying from high end Caesars resorts to let's just say accommodating spaces.   I'm sure this is a great stay for not only Disneyland but we stayed here to go to Angel Stadium and the beach, it was the perfect place.   This hotel exceeded my expectation!  In fact, I am almost didn't stay at this hotel due to some of the negative reviews. I'm glad I reconsidered my choice. Don't consider all the negative comments, any hotel can seem a bit shabby if you zoom in close enough.  The customer service is exceptional! There was no check in line at 5pm. I was quickly taken care of. They offered me free Wi-Fi signing up as a gold member. Which took less then 30 seconds for the clerk to do.  She met my request for a more remodeled room if possible, with
Manager Response: none

Summary: No welcome when arrived. Wet floor room. No wifi access due to poor strenght of the signal. Reported the problems but nothing got resolved! Did Not get any credit or any accomodations at all. Extremely unhappy and would never want to be back here anymore!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback from your recent stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.   I would like to sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you may have encountered during your time with us. If you have a moment of your time, please contact me directly at 714-634-7139 or email at Lizeth.Acevedo@hilton.com. Summary: I write this as a Hilton Honor Diamond member - We were upgraded to a suite on the 3rd floor, two queen beds. Room was nice, beds were comfy and the bathroom cleaned. It was a long day so we only stayed here for a good nights sleep and breakfast. Breakfast was great, service was OK, the stay was fine.
Manager Response: Hi Joe,   I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your Hilton loyalty and look forward to having you stay with us again.   Cody Dahlen Sales Coordinator Direct (714) 634-7159 | Fax (714) 634-7115 Email: Cody.Dahlen@Hilton.com

Summary: First off, the shuttle drivers are AMAZING. They're engaging, friendly, and if you're tired and want to head back to the hotel early, they'll happily come pick you up! That being said, I didn't know about the $50/night extra charge ON TOP of the cost of the hotel room. Also, I kept getting randomly charged for things by the hotel then those charges would disappear from my card. One was for $68 and the next one was for $48. That kept messing up my balance in my account and when I asked what they were for, the desk person just handed me the bill. She couldn't tell me exactly what those charges were for. Anyway, the rooms are always clean and the Disneyland shuttle is convenient but when I carefully budget my money for a Disney trip and and up having to give $150 of that to the
Manager Response: Hi Jessica,   I am happy to hear that you are a fan of our shuttle drivers and will let the department know that their hard work is appreciated. Summary Heading: Bad Customer Service made right after hassle!
Summary: Booked for my son via booking.com and received a great room rate of $129 per night for a total of $284. I originally booked with my credit card, and then used an option to updated credit card info on booking.com (nothing else changed)  Upon arrival, they indicated because the reservation was modified, the rate is now $199 per night, and over $400 with taxes. With a current booking.com reservation confirmation in hand, the two ladies at the front desk argued that because changes were made ( # of people on confirmation was 2 plus baby, and still 2w/ baby there would be a charge, and to modify the existing reservation info would take on a new room rate) After about 15 minutes of back and forth, one of the ladies decided to make it right and honor the room rate of $129.  Unnecessary

Laundry facilities on site, but front desk never seems to have any change available to exchange paper money for in order to use the coin operated machines. Summary: Just stayed here with our 9 year old. Arrived late check in was good.  We had room on 10th floor. Which is where problems start.  Room has no sound proofing at all.  We can hear people partying in the pool below until 11pm and all the traffic like we have window open.  We had dinner at restaurant which is lovely but seemed to be only one poor waiter running around.  Next day go to Disney all day only to get back to our room at 11pm to the most awful smell. The bath is full of sewage like dirty bath water and poo. Call down they send someone with in 10 mins . The gentleman tells me it's from next door and he will clean it. Now really late.  Man dies his cleaning my but leaves us with the awful smell that lingered for most of the night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have stayed at this hotel many times. Have stayed as Hilton blue (regular) and as a Gold member. The staff here is extremely friendly and helpful no matter your status and the rooms are clean. As a Gold member, I received complimentary breakfast in the restaurant (full hot buffet plus fruit/oatmeal/breads/etc., buffet also includes juice, coffee, and made-to-order pancakes/waffles/omelettes, just have to ask). Complimentary shuttle to Disneyland runs at least hourly in the morning and every 30 minutes at night (maybe more often during peak Disneyland times). Most hotels charge for their shuttle so this is definitely a nice perk.   As a Gold member, also received complimentary small appetizers during Happy Hour in the lounge at night. Like all places, there are a few things can
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We love Roger the Disney Van Driver!
Summary: Nice stay for our anniversary and a fun weekend at Disney. The free shuttle to the park was a deciding factor plus a lower rate compared to Anaheim hotels. We especially enjoyed how fun Roger was to visit with in the van ride, he engaged with everyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thank you to the front desk staff upon check in and checkout. I'm sorry I don't recall their names. But the cookies were warm and delicious! Melanie from reservation was excellent too when I called the hotel. Barbara from the online check in reassured me about my concerns with check in. Thank you for responding quickly. Thank you to the concierge and doorman for taking a picture of us in the lobby with our BTS image pickets. The wonderful staff in the breakfast and dinner restaurant, all smiles and asking us what brought us to stay at the hotel/city. Thank you to the housekeeping ladies. Overall fantastic stay and we will back if BTS ever comes back to do a concert at Honda Center!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights and the customer service provided by Melanie and the staff was incredible.  This was from check in through check out.  The beds and room was very clean and having stayed at another hotel the night before Doubletree blows it away.  The lobby is very clean and modern as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stood here for 3 days during our trip to Disneyland. This place is really close and even has a shuttle that goes to and from the park (we didn't use it). The font desk was very accommodating and put my parents and nephews in a room right next to ours. Cookies at check in we're a hit with the kids too! The only bummer is the paid parking ($15/day) but it's secure so it's not all that bad. Rooms are clean and roomy, important because we have a very active 3 year old. All in all, great, clean, comfy room for a what I think to be a steal in price. Would and will stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: a week with the grand kids
Summary: We had a couple hick ups with the van driver and the front desk agent trying to get back from Disneyland on the shuttle. My wife was told to get a taxi. Management stepped in and as they say made it right, but in this case the damage was done. My wife reinjured here leg running after the driver because he would not stop at the pick up spots.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel with a great location. Service was excellent. Valet service was good because of handicap person. Room was for handicap with close proximity to elevator.  All areas including lobby were nice and clean. All staff were friendly and eager to assist.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel room overall I would like to give a 4. The bed was super comfortable. Bathroom is an ok size. The shower was kinda small, it's hard when the water pressure is hard and the water gets outside the shower... the fitness center is nice. But don't use their headphones they don't work. I tried FOUR pairs of them which they offer for free but you cannot hear out of them at all.   Parking Issue #1 Parking Garage- When I was ready to leave my hotel key didn't work. I tried using the call button no answer. As I waited in my car in the parking garage the phone line to the hotel wasy busy. After waiting 10 mins a resident came up behind me and used his key to let me out. (Thank you kind stranger) The hotel shares the parking garage with residents (theres apartment homes attached)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Really happy with this hotel. Extremely close to Disney. Very clean, beautiful grounds, friendly staff and clean rooms. Absolutely love the warm chocolate chip cookie upon check-in  Love the outdoor landscape would definitely return
Manager Response: none

Summary: 4 nights with free shuttle, always on time, to Disneyland.  Terrific drivers, front desk and concierge staff - rooms was very comfortable, clean.  Dinner/breakfast costs a bit pricey, but good options for food.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This my so to hotel whenever I am in Anaheim. the staff is very friendly and it has the basic amenities. easy access to main highways and you have an outlet mall with restaurants, shops, and an AMC movie theatre one block away.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Convenient location, nice décor, average service
Summary: Stayed one night four as nearby business meeting.  Over the years I have stayed at the hotel several times before.  Very easy access from several O.C.  freeways and very convenient self parking..  Nice enough lobby and bar.  Same with the room, but the bathroom​ shower has been remodeled and liked the new glass shower door.  Only complaint was with checking out.  Only a single desk clerk had his hands full, made worse when he had to take 5+ minutes processing the sale of tickets to Disneyland  to a guest not checking out while I simply wanted to get a receipt.  More than frustrating.  I will return next time I need to spend a night in Orange, but hope they assign someone else to help Disney sell tickets.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was one of the most disappointing hotels I've ever been to. We had 2 adults and an 11 year old with 2 double beds to share.  An adult and child couldn't sleep in this bed.  When we were told the hotel only had double beds, we had to make a bed on the floor. We asked for 3 comforters and they gave us one.  No rollaway bed; that was a fire hazard! There is no airport shuttle. The lobby bar charges $18 for a glass of prosecco.  We took showers both morning and night and the water was barely luke warm. We were chilled while in the shower. The room service breakfast was cold. There was paper garbage on the hallway floor that was never removed the 2 days we were there. The "famous soft, warm cookies" that Douletree is known for at checking were cold and rock hard. Called hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at the Doubletree Hotel in Orange, CA. We would like to offer our apologies for the less than enjoyable stay you had at our hotel. We appreciate your concern, interest and the extra time you have taken to bring these matters to our attention. While our guest safety is of top priority, we were sorry to learn that you were greatly inconvenienced by the ordinance to accommodate a rollaway bed into your two double bed room. We are sorry that we failed to demonstrate our ability to provide the proper levels of service and hospitality. Your feedback is quite valuable in that it enables us to correct and improve, thus helping to ensure that all guests are properly satisfied.   Our team takes pride in the recent completion of our hotel renovation which includes digital key, a new business center, coffee shop and bistro, gift shop and front desk. We sincerely hope that you will allow us another opportunity to showcase our hotel and our true level of hospitality and interest in serving you properly.  Sincerely,  The DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County Family

Summary: The ability to text made everything so easy, from reminders to room service requests. this hotel goes the extra mile for the guest comfort and convenience. I have traveled to many places and tried many brands this will be my first choice wherever I go
Manager Response: none

Summary: The management and staff here go out of their way to make you feel at home. Food & beverage services were phenomenal.  Close to Disney if you want to go to Downtown Disney or the park on your downtime.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They really price gouge you when something is going on in town. Watch out, $369.99 for a single King bed room with no refrigerator or extra amenities. Heating/Cooling system was very loud and never shut off. If you turned it off, it got too hot!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed here when the price is right. I recently stayed and the hotel is undergoing construction.   It's not intrusive. My only negative is poor lighting between self park and the hotel.   Otherwise if price is rights it's a good place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at this location on a few occasions.  The rooms are great - comfortable bed, clean and relaxing.   They offer free shuttles to Disneyland and CA Adventure.  Definitely worth the stay here.  My daughter and i stayed here last month on a weekend trip to Disneyland/CA Adventure.  We arrived at the hotel pretty late (almost 930pm) and we were starving.  Unfortunately the main restaurant was already closed so we had to order from the bar area.  We waited for a little bit and after 35min, we eventually got our food.  The hotel is conveniently located within walking distance to the Outlet Mall.  Friendly hotel staff - would definitely stay here again for convenience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pros: - Nice shower with a full, hard spray. So often the shower spray is a trickle.
