Shower head was at an okay height for me (5'6") but was pretty low for my tall husband. - Big, clean outdoor pool and hot tub. - As always, fresh, chocolate chip cookies upon check-in.  Cons:  - Room had two double beds (not the typical two queen beds). My husband is 6'4" and we barely fit in our bed together. - LOTS of sirens all night long. I believe it is near several medical facilities, which makes the sirens understandable, but you might opt for a different hotel if you are a light sleeper. - The blow dryer was really old and clunky.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location was awesome. Close to disney, airport, and other main attractions. The pool was great and had a nice hot tub too. There were pets everywhere. I didn't bring my fur babies but now that I know their so accommodating I will certainly consider staying with them again. No continental breakfast or comp coffee. The restaurant was open for breakfast and there was a starbucks that was crappy. Ugh. There are smoking sections with comfy couches and right by the pool. This I liked a lot since most of CA is unfriendly to cigarettes. We will definitely give this hotel another stay if we return to the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love this hotel and staff! Shuttle to Disneyland is awesome! Have been staying here for the last 9 years, every year a few times a year! Drivers are always friendly and on time! Staff is super kind!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Always enjoy staying at a Doubletree
Summary: Doubletree hotels are a step above the norm. The staff are expedient, friendly, helpful and always have a pleasant demeanor. The rooms are clean and very comfortable. The digital selection of your room and check-in is an easy to use  and a pleasant amenity. As always, the warm chocolate chip cookies are always the BEST!! I am always happy when I find out the Doubletree has special rates when I travel on business, even if the business is not at that location.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel, especially the environment, palm trees, & shuttle to Disney!
Summary: The hotel was clean, the views were great, and there was a free shuttle to Disneyland! I stayed in this hotel for a conference, and I was not disappointed! The conference rooms were nice, and the hotel rooms were clean and comfy.  The only downside I had was the room pillows were not comfortable at all.  The staff was very accommodating; my group LOVED Roger, the shuttle driver! Take a break and sit out by the pond or the pool and enjoy the quiet with the palm trees overhead.  I'm usually impressed by the Hilton hotel brand, and this Doubletree lives up to the Hilton name - thank you!  I wish there were more options for restaurants around the hotel, but that has nothing to do with the hotel itself.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am in Anaheim about 6 times a year on business and I always stay at this hotel. The people are genuine, friendly, and professional. They continually update and renovate their amenities (with an expanded coffee-bar and snack shop now) to enhance the overall customer experience.   I would also bring my family and children to this hotel without hesitation...no, they aren't a "Disney" property or anything...but they have a shuttle that runs back and forth to Disneyland multiple times of day. Great balance of being centered on the business traveler as well as being accessible for families wanting to have some California fun! Professional, Clean, Very well maintained, and a positive client base.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If I could give less than the lowest rating, I would. Our team manager was forced to book rooms for two teams and families at the Double Tree Anaheim-Orange County via 3rd party booking company (RoomRoster), as per regional hockey tournament requirements. Presented check in staff with email confirmation of room booking which listed free self parking and complimentary breakfast. They refused to honor either of the listed free amenities, citing a disconnect between what RoomRoster and Double Tree Anaheim-Orange County negotiated. Hilton brands itself on the notion of the highest level of hospitality and service, and the Double Tree Anaheim-Orange County management expected paying guests to be penalized for whatever misstep was made in the hotel's contract process with RoomRoster.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us this feedback. We greatly apologize for all of the miscommunication and this disconnect on our end. No traveler should feel penalized for the mistakes of the hotel and no traveler should feel that their children will not be taken care of. Our intention is never to make our guests feel unwanted in the hotel or feel as if they have not gotten the service that they deserve. We are working with our management and Room Roster to right these wrongs and we also hope that you work with us as we try to Make It Right for you. We hope that you can also work with us as we correct our mistakes.   Thank you again for taking the time out to give us this feedback and we will be sure to use your feedback as a model as we move forward. We hope that you would give us another chance in the future.  Sincerely  Doubletree Management

Summary Heading: Good Spot - close to Disney but far enough away from the chaos
Summary: I'm a 14 year diamond member and this is a great property.  Very nice staff, great rooms and excellent food.  It is one of the better ones in the UC Irvine area.  The parking is a bit tough and their valet doesn't seem to be around late at night would be the only complaint
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Family fun rate is great for families foing to disneyland
Summary: Hotel was nice and breakfast included with this rate was great value.  Service was great and so was the food.  Close to the outlet mall and within walking distance of most amenities.  Free shuttle to Disneyland was awesome and shuttle drivers were even better
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was accommodating and friendly; clean facilities; great conference hotel close to Disneyland. The hotel is across the street from an outlet mall but not close to conveniences such as Walgreen's or CVS. I would have liked to have been closer to places like that.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This is a great place to stay!
Summary: We have stayed in this hotel for the last three years.  We stay here to visit family that goes to Chapman University.  It is conveniently located to the school, outlets and Disneyland!  The staff is very nice and the hotel is clean.  It is newly remodeled.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at the Double Tree of Anaheim (in Orange), and was highly impressed by the friendliness of the staff and the fact that they seemed to get to know me by my second night there (I stayed 4 nights)...
Manager Response: none

Summary: It is clean, well taken care of, good customer service, and the careline is there for you to get any issues taken care of. I give it a 5 star rating despite that there is not much to do. Renting a car if you are in business would be the way to go. The TVs are old, but other than that, they are very caring and have a great service, especially the front desk.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location and staff, staff was very helpful. Food was reasonably priced and average pub food. Location very convenient to local amenities. Was unaware of having to pay for parking but common for the area from what I understand.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Priced right, easy location, great food, good parking, excellent banquet meals. Inviting lobby, friendly check in staff, very nice banquet special events rooms and facilities. Property is continually upgraded and kept in excellent condition. My 10th stay and will come back often.
Manager Response: none

Summary: nice hotel with nice rooms, the only thing to consider is that there is very much traffic around the hotel, bring earplugs and be sure to book a hotel room that is located towards the cathedral to avoid most of the traffic. The hotel has free transportation to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a very stressful trip for us as my son in law was having Brain surgery the  friendliness of your staff was comforting and the location could not have been better. Thanks. And yes surgery was a success also. We will be staying again in the future for chemo and radiation.  And hopefully one day to take the kids to Diesnyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent Hotel. It was always packed. People coming and going all the time. Good clean hotel. Great atmosphere. Staff was so helpful, and we always felt welcome. They always made sure that everything was alright. Very Busy hotel, but the staff handled everyone, and they all seemed to be pleased.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Near UC Irvine Medical Center
Summary: Very reasonably priced, courteous staff, lovely accommodations. Across the street from a great shopping center complete with movie theater. They even give you warm chocolate chip cookies at time of check-in. Perfect.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really like staying at this hotel and the remodel of the lobby is finished and looks great. The hotel is nice and what I really like is right behind the hotel is a big outdoor mall. Plenty of restaurants and things to do and seems not to tie into Disneyland prices. The only downfall is their new coffee cafe is expensive. Doughnut and a latte was $10. That does not keep me from staying there. This is a great hotel and works great for business.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not what I expected from a Hilton property. Staff is nice enough. Don't eat in Restraunt. Food is over priced and waiter was bad. Parking is irritating. Waited 15 minutes to exit parking area cause gate reader was confusing and didn't work properly. Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were staying here due to the need to be at UCI Hospital at 5am. The location couldn't have been more convenient. The room was spacious, quiet, and comfortable. Desk staff was friendly and helpful. The on site restaurant seemed overly expensive to me for the quality of the food offered, but that's my only complaint. I would definitely stay here again--hopefully for a better reason!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Due to a medical condition for which I see a specialist at UC Irvine,  I have stayed here 3 times and will be returning.   The room was a good size with convenient chair with ottoman and a large desk. Clean. The bed was rather soft but not enough to bother moving.   Conveniently located across the street from UC Irvine Medical Center and close enough to Disneyland for free shuttle service. There is also a great outside mall within walking distance with many shops, restaurants, movie theater, bowling alley and a Dave and Busters.   I recommend this hotel, especially to business and adult leisure travelers as I saw few children. However, the shuttle to Disneyland,  the pool and closeness to the mall also make this an ideal family hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good Hotel.. Excellent staff.. Construction was a downer.
Summary: Used this hotel 4times for Disneyland. Great staff... Laundry room a must. Used to have a cafe and Gift shop but were being remodeled last trip. That was a downer. Pricey for a construction like front desk experience with limited amenities due to remodel. So gave value an Average. If no construction, it would have been worth it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My stay was excellent. The room was comfortable ,clean and well appointed. My meals were very good. The staff was helpful throughout my stay. I was contacted by text  before I arrived ,and asked what they could do to help me get checked in. They asked if I needed any help with transportation Checkout was seamless
Manager Response: none

Summary: It is located in central Orange County.  They are doing a beautiful renovation and the rooms were well appointed and quiet.  The front desk, maids, valet, and bartenders were so friendly.  The value was fantastic!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family has stayed here numerous times over the years.  This time was a volleyball tournament and disneyland trip.  Quiet stay, and love the cookies.  Free shuttle to disneyland.   You have to pay for parking,  but the shuttle makes up for it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights. The bed, bedding and pillows were wonderful. Great night sleep. All our requests were met before we arrived. The staff was so kind and helpful. Able to walk to eateries and shopping. Convenient location. Would certainly go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great, affordable hotel in a good location
Summary: The title says it all. It was a good deal, clean, and walking distance to restaurants and shopping. The bar tenders were nice and my fiancee used the fitness facility and said that was nice as well. The area behind the hotel is nice with a cool water feature.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Outstanding customer service n courtesy.Highly recommend it!The warm cookie at check-in was especially nice. Breakfast buffet was excellent. Suggest you request a west facing room as UC Irvine hospital er is on the east side n is somewhat noisy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location was convenient to restaurants, outlet shopping, and Disney attractions. Hotel was quiet at night. A restaurant is conveniently located on site. The outdoor pool and patio is well equipped for relaxing. The onsite bar/lounge is a great place to debrief with friends and colleagues after hours.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was our 2nd times staying here. Staff was friendly, location was awesome with the outlets, different restaurants near by,  free shuttle to Disneyland was absolutely useful. Room was good size, refrigerator and microwave was useful, however I felt like the room should of been dusted before our arrival. Other then that, our stay was pretty comfortable. We look forward to staying here again if the price is right.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed here on a few occasions and have never had any issues.  The staff has always been very friendly and helpful. The property is well maintained, rooms are clean and very comfortable. I will continue to stay here for any further trips I take to the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Every aspect of this hotel was very satisfying, from greeting by bell hops to check in desk to elevator service to room service to workers passing by in the halls.  Bus service to some nearby locations (such as Disneyland) is provided
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love the brand, always know that I'm going into a safe environment - which is important because I tend to travel alone.  Clean, bright and helpful.  Easy check in - Easy check out.  Found out they offer free transportation to Disney Land too - if interested.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here last minute in early January when my 3-year old son was discharged from the ER at CHOC during a vacation to Catalina Island. For a last minute check-in, and for the area, the price was great. The front desk staff was very sweet when we arrived well past midnight. The king bed was SO comfy, and the room was very large. We ordered room service for breakfast which was a wonderful treat; the food was good. We were given a generously late check out. No noise problems whatsoever. I would absolutely consider this hotel if we ever make the trek to Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very clean hotel, it was slightly loud at night with what sounded like a train or something throughout the night. The pool is tiny and not what was expected by our children.  The hotel seemed to be more of a corporate hotel then a family friendly establishment.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have always enjoyed going to this hotel, as they would seemingly go above and beyond, but this time my sheets were dirty - like not just stained, but were NOT washed from previous guest. Housekeeping even looked shocked at how nasty they were. I check my sheets, one should not have to. Luckily I did. There were fluids all over them. I was sick over the sight. Sheets were changed after I called and they FIRST came to check like I was making it up. Nothing was done for me above that.  It is so loud in the rooms form traffic and construction.  My AC was super loud and my refrigerator did not work.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write to us. We are very sorry to hear that your bedding was not up to cleanliness standards. We take it upon ourselves to provide our guests with clean, sanitary rooms. We're also sorry to hear about the outside noise and other inconveniences that were mentioned. We would like to hear from you; if possible please give us a call at 714-634-4500 so we can learn more about your experience. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you.  Sincerely  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I rarely write negative reviews, however I write only in an attempt for others to make informed decisions. I have spent 13 nights total in 4 different hotels this month alone so I travel a lot on business and experience many different hotels in various countries around the world. This hotel is aged, but clean and in a good location. For the price I booked at, I sincerely expected a top notch hotel. The breakfast was  extremely underwhelming with the only positive being that there was in fact food available. One can get an omelette cooked hot for you, but this is about the best it gets. Several of my colleagues also stayed here and we all agreed that for the price we payed, our expectations were not met. Perhaps I booked at an overly crowded time and hence the rates were higher.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write to us. We are sorry to hear that you did not obtain a good rate with us for your stay. We're also sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations. We strive to ensure that guests are satisfied during their visit to Doubletree Anaheim-Orange and that they receive the best quality for the price. If there is any way you could reach out to us, please do so at 714-634-4500 so a member of our management can hear from you regarding your recent experience. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to hearing from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I traveled across the US for a special surgery . Staying at this hotel ,was the best decision I made . Every single staff member went out of their way to ensure my comfort , and safety . I was centrally located to the surgical center , fwys and all OC has to offer . If your travelling for business , family and disney , or any reason , look no further .
Manager Response: none

Summary: Delightful experience.  Very accommodating service from all of the staff.  Contemporary ambience.  The Bar offers perfectly mixed drinks, and the opportunity for an informal supper.  Nice area to get-together with friends.  The bedrooms are spacious with all of the necessary amenities.  We were offered a good rate.  We have stayed several times due to the close proximity to the UC Irvine Health Center.- avoiding the dreadful hours of commuting traffic.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great price, quality facility that provides a comfortable stay in the Anaheim area. I've stayed at this hotel 4 times in the last years (or so) and every visit has been a good experience. Great breakfast!  Parking is a little annoying.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was amazing! My family stayed here for one week while we stayed in California. The staff was so nice, the rooms were very clean, the pool was amazing and also very clean! The hotel provides a free shuttle to/from Disneyland everyday. Having the shuttle available really saved my family money and energy, which we were very thankful for! The hotel also gave out free, warm cookies at the front desk whenever you asked. There were also cookies in our room! Overall, this hotel made our trip better. I would recommend staying here while visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Choice if you're looking to do different things
Summary: The hotel is 15 minutes from Disney and 30 minutes to the beach or 30 minutes to  John Wayne Airport.  It's a great location if you're looking to go in a different direction each day.  We had friends head north while we went south.  it's clean, the restaurant is nice and the staff pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear about your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad you found our property to be located near all of your favorite destinations! We're also pleased to hear you enjoyed our restaurant and pleasant staff. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed here for a corporate event. The restaurant and bar areas are great! Everyone is helpful and friendly! This hotel is near shopping, restaurants and there is a Target nearby also! The rooms are comfortable and clean!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your recent experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It' sour pleasure to provide excellent guest service, great restaurant and bar areas and to be in close proximity to your favorite destinations! We are glad to know that you enjoyed your clean and comfortable guestrooms. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We always stay at this hotel when in town for Disneyland , the shuttle makes getting to Disneyland easy as well as the return trip when your exhausted and don't want to think about anything except laying down...pillows are comfy too!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear you were our guest again at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We love to have returning travelers at our hotel and we always look forward to making each experience awesome! The complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland is always a guest favorite, in addition to our comfy guestroom and pillows. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I was there for a medical appointment across the street at UCI Medical Center.  The hotel is convenient, but I found the room to be in a general state of disrepair.  The front desk person wasn't responsive. The bathroom is tiny.  Overall I was more impressed with the Ayres Hotel. I far preferred that room.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for your review regarding your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County. We are glad you found our hotel to be convenient. We greatly apologize for the disappointment you experienced with your guestroom and for our Front Desk personnel's unresponsiveness. We will be sure to take your comments into consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope that you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Thank you, Doubletree Management

Summary: I feel very safe and comfortable staying at this hotel when I am traveling alone with my children. They look forward to the delicious cookies and I am grateful for the quiet rooms. The complimentary E&C bath and body products is definitely a bonus!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure and responsibility to ensure the safety of our guests and their children. We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed the delicious cookies and quiet rooms. Our E&C bath and body products are a guest favorite! Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another luxurious stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Did not get help when needed
Summary: Everything was great, except when we asked room service for water, we were told to wait 20 minutes. This is not expectable when my husband explains to room service that it is an emergency. I was feeling naseous and dizzy and there was no water in the room. Even if we wanted to purchase it, the service was too slow. Instead, my husband went outside of the hotel and bought water in less than 20 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write us. We are very sorry to hear about your experience with us. We take it upon ourselves to ensure the health and safety of our guests and to treat guest emergencies as a top priority. If there is any way we could hear from you, please call us at 714-634-4500. We thank you for your feedback and we look forward to hearing from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Helpful staff, good parking and close to shopping
Summary: I was attending a confrence at Disneyland. Unfortunately the Disneyland hotel was booked out and I had to look for alternative accommodation near by. This location is easy to get to, easy to find and the room I had was clean and reasonably spacious.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for staying at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear that you chose us despite the Disneyland hotel being sold out. We're pleased to know that you were easily able to access our location and that your room was clean and spacious! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: love this hotel. We always staying here when visiting Disneyland. Free shuttle to DL!! Great customer service. Free cookies upon check in and awesome breakfast buffet that is very budget friendly.  Thank you and we'll be back soon
Manager Response: Dear Anna,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is great to know that you frequent our hotel whenever you visit Disneyland! Our complimentary shuttle service has been our guests' favorite hotel amenity, in addition to our chocolate chip cookies! We're pleased to hear that the price was within your budget and you enjoyed the breakfast buffet. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to you next visit with us again soon!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: A very nice hotel.  The staff are friendly and efficient.  The rooms are a good size.  All very clean and updated.  The restaurant food and service are good.  The hotel was updating during my stay.  The brochures in the room did not have the correct time for the restaurant serving hours.
Manager Response: Dear Terry,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear of your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're sorry to hear that you did not receive the correct times for the restaurant serving hours. We'll be sure to bring that to our Staff's attention. We're glad you enjoyed the restaurant food and service from our staff. Thank you for your stay with us and we look forward to having you again for another nice stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: The hotel had great food, pleasant staff, a clean, comfortable room, and easy access parking.  And a great room rate! What more could one ask? I will definitely return, whether it be for work or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear about your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad to know that you enjoyed the food served at our hotel, your clean and comfortable guestroom and pleasant staff! We're also happy to know that you were given a great room rate. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This was my 3rd visit to this hotel staff are so friendly Hotel is just a couple of minutes to the orange outlets . Rooms are fab breakfast is fab free bus to Disneyland very relaxed atmosphere can't praise the Hotel and its staff enough looking forward to my next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to have you again at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide excellent guest service, fab guestrooms and breakfast and a fab complimentary shuttle to Disneyland! We aim to please and we're glad we hit our target! Thank you for your visit and we also look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Always a great stay at Double Tree Orange CA.  Fourth year that my family and I have chosen this hotel over a myriad of others in this area.  The reason?  The staff.  I can use all superlatives and it would be clichéd. Simply put... they are grounded in customer service expectations.  Check in to check out they exceed the standard.  Great job!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. we are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to have you for a fourth year at our location! We know that providing excellent guest service is the key  to providing a great guest experience, and we strive to make that goal again and again. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another fantastic stay!  Sincerely,   Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: It is ok to stay. We were not very happy, but good palace to stay for a couple of days with family. There are also other hotels around providing better service. However, the location was good and people were friendly. I did not like to pay 10 Dollars per day for the car parking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear that you did not have the best experience with us at Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We will take your comments into consideration as we always strive to make sure each guest has an incredible stay with us. Please feel free to contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear from you. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I needed to be close to a location for an early appointment so I chose the Doubletree in Anaheim. I used Hilton points and when I checked in online I had been given an upgrade to the Presidential suite. It was one of the nicest rooms. The service was excellent and the hotel was centrally located to the freeway, Disneyland, shopping. I hope to stay there again when I have more time to enjoy the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to offer our HHonors guests the best in upgrades! Our Presidential suite is very comfortable and spacious. We're pleased to know that our location was convenient and accessible to all of your favorite destinations. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great location. Comfortable, clean. Excellent breakfast! Love the Disney shuttle! Highly recommend to any type of traveler. Love the digital check in and the text messages during stay checking in things I may need. Excellent!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to know that our location served your needs and that you found your guest rooms to be clean and comfortable. It's our pleasure to know that the digital check in and the text messages from our staff suited your needs. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The best experience we've had in a Hotel in California in a very long time. The staff was kind, friendly and wonderful!!! The lobby was lovely decorated for Christmas which is so important when you're traveling over the holidays. They were very pet friendly to our little terrier puppy. All in all a tremendous experience and we've traveled all over the world. I highly recommend this hotel!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ruthie,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear about your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy to know that your stay with us was a memorable and enjoyable experience! It's our pleasure to welcome you with a lobby full of Christmas decorations. We strive to make our guests feel at home, as well as our furry friends as well! We thank you for your stay and we look forward to having you again soon for another amazing stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great property. Excellent, friendly and supportive staff. Shuttle to downtown Disney every hour. Scenic pool side view. Highly recommended for families. Orange outlet malls is on walking distance which gives you the option for food, shopping and movie.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the 5-star TripAdvisor review! We're pleased to hear about your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We make it a top priority to make sure that our guests receive the best in service and accommodations. It's also our pleasure to provide complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and to be in close proximity to the Outlets at Orange! Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again for another excellent experience!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Nice quiet hotel.  Easy access to Disneyland.
Summary: Free Shuttle to Disneyland need I say more! The staff was friendly and a big plus it's a pet friendly hotel. The shuttle service was very convenient especially with stroller and toddler. Overall this hotel is great for families visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear about your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad you enjoyed the complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and our pet-friendly environment! It's our pleasure to welcome families during their Disneyland visit. Thank you for your review and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Excellent place to stay.  Comfortable beds and nice rooms. Easy access to shopping and Disneyland.  Staff members were very friendly and helpful.  Breakfast menu and buffet had several choices available.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange! It's our pleasure to provide comfortable beds and nice rooms, in addition to excellent guest service and easy access to your favorite places nearby. We're glad you enjoyed the many menu items our Trofi restaurant had to offer as well. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The food was cold and not enough gravy on the biscuits!  I was there for four  mornings and each was lacking, the pancakes were rubber and the syrup was watery the eggs were not real!  Owners need to eat there to see
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your breakfast experience with us was below your standards. Please feel free to contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can learn more about your experience. We look forward to hearing from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Our family stayed at the Double Tree in Anaheim for 4 nights.  The staff was very accommodating and consistently strived to make our stay special.  This was the best hotel experience I've had of all of the hotels I have stayed in!  I cannot say enough good things about the staff!  I was truly impressed!
Manager Response: Dear Shalette,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your visit at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to make you feel accommodated and at home. We know that guests look for quality and great service when visiting our hotel, so we are very glad to know that you had a great experience with us! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: VERY NICE PLACE TO REST THE BONES
Summary: Although the hotel was under renovation the staff made the place look very festive and seasonal for Christmas.  The staff was great and very helpful in every way.  The bar area and sports viewing was excellent and many games on Sunday.  Bar food was great, and the happy hour was generous
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us this wonderful feedback. It is great to hear that the staff was able to make you feel welcome and that you enjoyed the holiday decor. And I will personally let our bar staff know that they provided you with great food and a chance to enjoy the games on Sunday.  Hope to see you back with us!  Sincerely   Doubletree Management

Summary Heading: One employee let the whole hotel down
Summary: Myself and 13 other people chose to stay at this hotel as it was close by the Honda stadium for an ice-hockey game. It was nice, check in was simple and efficient with warm cookies for all of us, a great start! The room was clean, we called down to have some bathroom amenities sent up which arrived in less than 5 minutes. The issue was while we were having drinks after the ice hockey at the hotel bar, which was a really nice bar. The female employee, Tristin, who was on table service however, not so nice. She wasn't very engaging or helpful, this combined with eye rolling and sighing when someone from our party wanted to change their order (while she was still taking other peoples order at our table) created an awful atmosphere. After 25 minutes she returned with the drinks,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time out to give us your feedback.  I can definitely understand how that service would impact your stay and I apologize on behalf of the entire hotel staff. We have always taken pride in training our team to provide exceptional service to our guests, but this time it appears we have missed our mark in providing not only you, but the other guests with you, with that exceptional service and I cannot stress how sorry we are for putting that bad taste in your mouth. This issue will be addressed and we guarantee that this will not happen to you or any other guests that stay with us or have a meal at our Lobby Bar.   Thank you again for giving us your feedback and I hope that you can give us another chance in the not too distant future.  Sincerely  Doubletree Management

Summary: Big Shout out to Janice Bernard for all your help with our holiday party, everything looked amazing and the food was great!! The service provided by Luis and his staff was very professional and all were very friendly. Thank you again for providing excellent service for our holiday party!!! Every employee welcomed all of us with a smile and very professional!! Thanks again..
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with that wonderful feedback.  I will personally tell Janice, Luis, and all of our Banquets and Events staff that they provided you with great service. It is a delight to hear that our team was able to help create that memorable experience for your company holiday party and we hope that we get the opportunity to create many more of those experiences for you in the future.  Thank you again for that feedback!  Sincerely  Doubletree Management

Summary: The staff is friendly and helpful. Enjoyed the comfy bed and quiet room stay. Waiter and hostess at the restaurant were just so friendly and went above and beyond to accommodate us in a rush. Shuttle to Disneyland was easy and always on time. This was my second time st this hotel and definitely will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange county! It's our pleasure to be your place to stay for your Disneyland visits! We're glad you enjoyed the friendly complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and that we are always able to accommodate you when you come to visit us! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: location was good, staff was friendly and room was big and clean. free internet is also good for members ... best experience for me was having a free shuttle to disney ... looking forward fo future stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange county! It's our pleasure to be your place to stay for your Disneyland visit! We're glad you enjoyed the friendly complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and that our staff was able to provide you with great and friendly service! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We arrived into LAX late and booked this hotel.  Check-in was courteous and quick.  Room was spacious.  We also enjoyed the breakfast buffet in the morning (extra).  Rather than fight Disney traffic, we parked in the hotel lot and took the shuttle to/from the park.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange county! It's our pleasure to be your place to stay for your Disneyland visits! We're glad you enjoyed the friendly complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and that our rooms were able to accommodate you during your trip! It is also good to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet in the morning. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: For being under renovation, the hotel was pretty good. Black hairs in sink and shower were biggest complaints. The bar staff had one (younger) guy that was excellent and one (older) guy that is rude and should be coached or terminated. Will give this one another chance if I am in the area. After renovations the prices may go up and value dimensioned.   Breakfast was good and front desk staff very nice and efficient.
Manager Response: Dear Brian,  Thank you for your review and for your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear that the bathroom in your guestroom was not up to your standards and that you did not receive excellent guest service during your entire visit. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your overall stay. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: First stay at a Double Tree Hilton property.  Located in an older part of Anaheim near medical center, juvenile hall and a large outdoor mall.  Very close to Disneyland.  Good clean hotel with a friendly and helpful staff.  Rooms were well set up with lots of outlets and plugs.  Relatively quiet even with kids running in the halls.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be your first Doubletree hotel and to be in close proximity to Disneyland, the Outlets at Orange and UCI Medical Center. We are glad that our staff provided excellent guest service and that your guestroom had plenty of outlets and plugs. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Great pet-friendly hotel for Disneyland visits
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel twice now to go to Disneyland and it is fantastic. It's much more affordable than the hotels that are closer to the park, and the free shuttle makes it just as convenient. The shuttle runs every hour on the hour and has always been reliable in my experience, and to top it off the drivers are so friendly (like all of the hotel staff)! Plus, I love that I can bring my dog with me for a very affordable pet fee, and unlike some other hotels you aren't limited to certain "pet friendly" rooms--as long as you pay the pet fee you can have your dog in any room in the hotel. I can't recommend this hotel highly enough for Disneyland trips, especially if you're traveling with a pet!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange county! It's our pleasure to be your place to stay for your Disneyland visits! We're glad you enjoyed the friendly complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and that your dog made to feel at home too! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Overall a good and decent hotel. The room and lobby was clean. There was a little bit of construction still going on, but nothing that got in the way or detracted from our stay.  Shuttle to Disneyland: leaves hotel a half an hour before the park opens and then  every hour after that. The first pick up from Disneyland is at 1415 and then every hour after that until 0015. If you want to leave before 1415 you can call hotel and they will pick you up. Drop off at b1 near the front of the gate.  Breakfast Buffet: the food was good and the restaurant was clean. They offered eggs, bacon, sausage, breakfast empanadas, pancakes and an assortment of fruit pastries and cereals. I can't say if it is worth the cost as I was not in charge of breakfast. But it was a decent breakfast with
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear about your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to know that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and our breakfast served at Trofi restaurant. It's our pleasure to provide friendly, helpful guest service with smiles along the way! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Hotel clean and nicely decorated for holidays. Staff friendly and professional. Stayed here before for Disneyland trip, love shuttle service that runs all day both directions and easy to walk to just outside the park.  Very affordable hotel for the quality.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your Thanksgiving weekend stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide friendly, professional service and a complimentary shuttle ride to Disneyland. We are glad that you found our location to be affordable and that you enjoyed our holiday decorations! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary Heading: Perfect stay from start to finish
Summary: We spent 2 nights here with one full day at Disneyland and this hotel was the perfect home base. We took advantage of the shuttle service to and from Disneyland, very efficient. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful, breakfast was delicious, and the room was clean and tastefully decorated.  Definitely recommend for a stay near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad to hear you took advantage of our complimentary shuttle service to and from Disneyland and that you found our location to be the perfect home base. It's our pleasure to provide friendly, helpful service, delicious breakfast and a clean and tasteful room. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another perfect stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Always clean with an amazing staff
Summary: This is our goal to hotel for volleyball tournaments and Disney.  The hotel is clean and always kept up, but it really is the staff that keeps us coming back time and time again.  We highly recommend this hotel which also has a Disney shuttle and is also near ASC.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Rosenthal  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdivsor Review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is always such a pleasure having you with us and we look forward to all of your visits!

Summary: We stayed here for one night as we flew over from las vegas to visit disneyland. We arrived at about 8am and we were given our room immediately which was great and we also got free warm chocolate cookies each. Our room was huge, big lounge area , two huge tvs, lovely bathroom area and two massive double beds. ( which after a day walking around disney were a godsend!). The room was very quiet i never heard anyone at all! would have thought we had the whole hotel to ourselves. We also got another free cookie upon our return from disney, this was a nice added extra. We had a fab time and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Hannah C.  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdivsor Review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is a delight to know that your room was very accommodating for you during your stay and it is also good to hear that you were able to find that relaxation after a long day at Disney. We look forward to having you with us again and we will be sure to have plenty of those warm cookies ready for you when you arrive.  Sincerely,  The DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: The gym was way too small. Only 3 walking machines. No room to stretch or weights lifting. The menu of the restaurant and room service was terrible. I didn't even wanted to try the food. The staff was nice and he facility was overall nice.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for your review regarding your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County. We are glad to hear that staff was courteous and that you enjoyed our facility. We greatly apologize for the disappointment in our gym and the items served from our Trofi Restaurant and Room Service. We will be sure to take your comments into consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope that you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Thank you, Doubletree Management

Summary: Great location (close proximity to shopping/entertainment center) and friendly staff. Large and spacious hotel room. Comfortable bed. Received cookie when checking in!  Stayed here as it was part of a group reservation (wedding). Staff placed a wedding gift from the couple prior to me checking in. Great experience overall.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be within walking distance to the Outlets at Orange! We are glad you enjoyed the spacious guest room, comfortable bed and delicious warm cookie! Thank you for your stay and we look forward to having you again soon for another great experience!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable with some inconveniences
Summary: The hotel was as expected for a Doubletree - clean, comfortable room, cookies at check in. But our experience was less than ideal. Lobby construction made some areas (including the real front desk) in accessible. The room was noisy (wind was whistling under the door) and the room key did not work in the parking lot causing a problem every time we tried to exit the lot. The price for the room was a real value and the staff removed the parking charges, but the overall experience was not as expected.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for your review regarding your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County. We apologize that our Lobby construction caused a challenge for you during your stay. We are currently working to renovate our lobby and we understand that the construction may cause some issues for you as the guest. We are working diligently to complete this project so that the lobby will have a new and fresh look. Also, I would like to extend an apology for your challenges with the parking. We will address these issues so that it will not happen to you or any other guests that use our guest parking, but it is great to hear that the staff was able to remove those parking charges and Make It Right for you. We hope to see you again with us so that we can make a better impression on you, especially once we have our newly renovated lobby. Thank you again for that feedback.  Sincerely,   Doubletree Management

Summary: I love this hotel, great price , Disney shuttle every hour , personal text messages to see if we were happy , and a delicious cookie on arrival  brilliant , the kids love Rey the driver he is very friendly and keeps them entertained .
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We're glad to have had you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to make sure that all of our guests are provided with the best of service. Rey is always great with the kids on our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland! We know that keeping our younger guests happy puts a smile on parents' faces. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stay here if you wanna stay away from Disneyland crowds, Very clean and well kept, also all employees are very friendly. Starbucks in lobby across in-hotel restaurant, breakfast, lunch, dinner. Mall just a block away with more restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Alice,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our property being away from the Disneyland crowds and that you were easily able to access the nearby Outlets at Orange. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: room was comfortable and big, very clean and good staff service when checking in, only 1 front desk so checking out was slow checking out, no hairdryer in room so need to bring own hairdryer, cookies were a little hard
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. It's our pleasure to have had you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad to know that you enjoyed your guestroom! We're sorry to hear that you experienced a slow checkout and that our cookies were a little hard. We strive to provide excellent guest service everyday and we are always open to suggestions and comments regarding guest experience. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Stay 10 minutes out, it's worth it.
Summary: There's an allure to staying right on top of Disneyland. There's also a price. Save on parking, inflated hotel bills, and avoid the tourist traps by staying just a few minutes away. Less than 10 minutes on their shuttle (which runs often) and it's a regular, totally normal, clean Doubletree. Nice rooms, great shower, friendly staff, and no crowds. You're also right on top of a mall for convenient shopping in some post-Disney downtime, or if you forgot that pair of socks for the 20 miles of princess chasing.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We're pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to hear that we were your hotel of choice while going to Disneyland! A great thing that guests love about our location is that it's close to Disneyland but far away from the theme park traffic, and our complimentary shuttle service is very convenient and stress free! It's also a pleasure to be close to the Outlets at Orange as well! Thank you for your review and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: It's a Doubletree, and that's perfect
Summary: A perfectly normal Doubletree in the least normal city in the area. Staying right on top of Disneyland is great, but it's worth considering other options, and if you do, this might be the best idea. Rooms are nice, amenities are minimal (since you'll be at Disneyland), and the shuttle is less than a 10 minute ride. Staff were all over any issues.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to make your stay with us as comfortable as possible and to also assist with any issues you may have encountered. We are glad to have been your choice during your stay in Orange. Thank you for your review and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: At first I thought the drive was long but when I arrived it was well worth the drive. This is a very good hotel , clean and friendly just need free parking. Close to a Outlet Mall and Disney land.  Love it!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be in close proximity to your favorite destinations such as the Outlets at Orange and Disneyland. We are very glad to hear that you like our hotel! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Received an EXCELLENT rate on my room, But the room service menu pricing was over priced.  The items offered sounded good, but $14 for a very basic breakfast was TOO MUCH. There could be a complimentary breakfast buffet offered, for those staying at the property.  The layout of the guest floors was NICE, once you find your room ... No long hallways to navigate.    The POOR CONFIGURATION of handicapped parking was NOT, Well thought out. Said parking is regulated by the California Department of Motor Vehicles and so states; "Handicapped parking spaces should be located NEAREST the main entrance of the building"  It looked like certain hotel employees, were given PERSONAL RESERVED spaces where the handicapped spaces should have been placed.  THE ENTIRE parking lot could use a huge
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad you paid a visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to offer you an excellent rate for your room, but we are sorry to hear that our room service was overpriced. We're glad to know that you easily found your room via our easy to navigate guestroom floors. We value all of your feedback and welcome you to contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can address your concerns regarding guest parking and service charge for animals. Thank you for your recent visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Good value and location. Property under construction but hardly noticed it. Staff very enthusiastic and helpful. Coffee bar in lobby. In-hotel restaurant overly expensive but bar offerings were a great value and delicious. Enjoyable and relaxing stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very nice property in orange county
Summary: If you need a place to stay in Anaheim, this one is a great location with very nice rooms. It is next to the outlet mall and is away from All the Disney traffic. It takes about 30-45 min to get here from LAX.
Manager Response: Dear Jasen,   Thank you for yoru 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your recent experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad you loved our location and guest rooms, and that you found it very accessible to the nearby Outlets at Orange shopping mall. It's our pleasure to be away from all the Disney traffic, but to be in close proximity to the theme park. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another very nice stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Very good people ready to help you and answer your questions without any trouble. Once again Julio very knowledgeable person. #1. Julio took all our luggage to the room welcomed us into the place with a big smile and showed us the street from the window on the room
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are so happy to hear that Julio was able to assist you with all of your questions and needs! At Doubletree Anaheim-Orange County we pride ourselves on providing the best of service to our guests. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another relaxing stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Rooms are average but clean.  The hotel could use some sprucing up.  Beds were comfortable.  Shuttle to Disneyland was perfect, but you definitely need to pay attention to the schedule as they only pick up once an hour.  Hotel staff was very friendly and extremely helpful
Manager Response: Dear Michele,  Thank you for your review and for your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We are constantly making improvements to our property so we can maintain a contemporary look and feel, and we hope our appearance did not deter you. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the Guestroom beds and complimentary Disneyland shuttle service. It's also our pleasure to provide friendly, helpful service to our guests. We look forward to having you again soon in the near future.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Good hotel for business.  Three miles from Disney ($6-$8 Uber ride). Worked well.....BBQ restaurant down street (Lucilles?) is legit. Orange Outlets are a. I e addition for shopping and food options.  Will return to property.
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are pleased to hear of your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be your hotel of choice during your business trip. We're glad to hear that you were able to easily access your favorite destinations form our location. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This hotel was clean and located in a nice area the staff is very friendly and helpful... I would stay here again in the future when i go back to visit family. The bathroom was clean and we always had clean towels, the bed was comfortable and clean..
Manager Response: Dear Caroline,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdivsor Review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's great to hear that our staff was friendly and welcoming to you and that you were comfortable in your room. We are also very proud of our Housekeepers for keeping up the cleanliness and creating that great experience for you. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed on a family trip to Disneyland in September.  Very nice rooms, comfortable beds, and room was always clean and tidy for us. The only downside is you have to pay to park by the day. They were having issues with the security gate at the time, so they actually refunded our money back for the parking inconvenience. They do provide a free shuttle to Disneyland which was also convienent. Highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdivsor Review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be your choice of hotel during your trip to Disneyland! We are sorry to hear that you experienced issues with the security gate at our self parking, but we are glad to know that you were refunded for the inconvenience! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The hotel rooms are big and clean. They allow pets in the hotel, the staff is very attentive. The hotel has a free shuttle that runs to the Disney parks at multiple times throughout the day and evening. The breakfast buffet is delicious and worth it. The hotel is close to a hospital so we did encounter sirens that did wake us up.
Manager Response: Dear Rachael,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your recent visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to welcome all of our guests, including our furry friends! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our guest service, complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and breakfast buffet. We're sorry to hear that sirens from the nearby UCI Medical Center disturbed your sleep. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: stayed 2 nights after a long flight and it was great.   Room was big and clean,  quiet and had a good sleep.   Ate at the bar the first night, good selection of beers and food.   Pool area was quite busy due to an Irish dancing competition so quite noisy with excitable teenage girls but area and pool nice.   Staff were great, really friendly and helpful.   Shuttle to Disney was easy,  on time and great driver.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your selections at our 1Hundred Bar! We're happy to hear you enjoyed our pool area despite it being busy due to an event taking place that weekend. It's also a pleasure to provide excellent guest service and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights at this lovely hotel in June 2016, with the main purpose of visiting Disneyland. The room was big, clean and stocked with basic amenities. The breakfast was comprehensive with a wide varieties. There is a "Best Buy Mall" and "The Outlet at Orange" (with about 80-100 shops) within 5 minutes walking distance. The hotel also provides hourly shuttle bus to Disneyland (about 10-15 minutes journey).   We will recommend to those who are seeking "value for money" deal, as compare to hotels right next to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our location is ideal for any travelers that are looking to see the Orange County area and experience Disneyland. It is also pleasing to hear that you found value in our room rates. We are proud to offer that alternative for Disney travelers who need that extra value saver option.   We look forward to having you with us again!

Summary: We went to this place because the conference we went to used this place as their hub.  Not bad! Out maid, Marcela, was wonderful!  We booked a suite because we needed to accommodate lots of people for happy hour. The staff was wonderful making our needs happen. No matter what we asked for, they made it happen. What was really cool was it was in the middle of everything! The crystal cathedral was only a couple of blocks away and a multitude of restaurants were nearby
Manager Response: We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our location is ideal for any travelers that are looking to see and experience the Orange County area and the broad restaurant culture around us. It is also pleasing to hear that our staff was able to create a memorable experience for you during your stay. We take much pride in the fact that all of our team members are able to not only answer your requests, but make them happen with efficiency and great service standards.  We look forward to having you with us again!

Summary: Ii am a business person, I don't expect much but I do expect engaged can do employees. When I brought up concerns, I was ignored. Don't order breakfast al la carte in the restaurants, it came burnt and they told me that is the way they cook.
Manager Response: I can understand your concerns. Here at the Doubletree, we take full responsibility when our team does not meet the expectations of our guests. On behalf of the entire hotel, I apologize that we could not meet your standards and expectations and I especially apologize that we have caused you any inconvenience. As far as the restaurant service, it is very unfortunate that you had that experience with our breakfast and it saddens me to hear that you were not provided with a more suitable meal. Also, I take full responsibility for the fact that you felt that your concerns were not heard out and that you did not get the solutions that you should have received. I would like to speak to you personally to hear you out and come up with a solution that can Make It Right for you. May we ask that you please contact the hotel and ask for the Manager on Duty so that we can fix this for you immediately.

Summary: This hotel is located around the corner from a nice outlet convenience for shopping and many restaurants within walking distance.  My friends and I stayed her for a weekend. One of my friend had stayed at this hotel before and recommended. The price was reasonable and the location was convenient. The check-in was fast, very pleasant and we were each given complimentary cookies. We stayed in room 704, the room was clean, not much closet space and the tv was off to one side. The room was wheelchair accessible which we didn't request for but we didn't mind.   My friend called down to the front desk to ask about the wifi and was kept on hold for a good 15 minutes finally she just gave up. The next day after returning from a day of shopping we found that nothing in our room was
Manager Response: Dear Lyna,  Thank you for your review We are very sorry to hear that you experience a great deal of noise during your stay with us, and for not refreshing your room in a timely manner. Please feel free to call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can learn more about your experience and gain your feedback. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to hearing from you.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The main reason we chose to stay at Double tree Orange was the shuttle between the hotel and Disneyland.  Over-all my family enjoyed the stay at the Double tree  The hotel staff are professional and courteous.  The Deluxe room we stayed in was spacious for four of us and the rooms were cleaned daily.  There were a few amenities that was not working properly such as hair blow dryer (no blowing heat), mini refrigerator, and in-room safe (unable to lock).  The hotel front desk helped with delivering a new hair dryer.  We lived with what the refrigerator could cool and didn't bother asking about the safe.   We would definitely recommend staying at the Double Tree Orange to our family and friends who are considering visiting Orange County California.
Manager Response: Dear Reck,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide you and your family a spacious room during your visit to Disneyland. We are sorry to hear of your experience with your in-room amenities, but we are glad to hear that we were able to send you a new hair dryer. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Friendly staff, got to love those warm cookies at check-in. Breakfast buffet was OK, pancakes cold. Selection was limited so I used the Starbucks coffee/snacks across from the restaraunt for the rest of the stay.
Manager Response: Dear Al,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to welcome our guests with a warm chocolate chip cookie upon check-in! We're sorry to hear that our breakfast was not up to your standards. We thank you for your stay and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Close but not too far away
Summary: Conference at Anaheim convention center made taking the shuttle to Disney easy and only then had 3 block walk to convention center.  Easy and got some exercise.  shuttles run hourly, which worked fine with my schedule.  Lots of restaurants by Disney entrance too; so I ate before / after taking shuttle.  Hotel lovely as expected. Garden and Koi pond relaxing and oasis in busy city.
Manager Response: Dear Vicki,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! It is our pleasure to have you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad you were able to take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland, and that you were also able to easily access the Anaheim Convention Center and nearby restaurants. We're also pleased that you enjoyed our garden and Koi pond. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Long weekend trip to Disneyland!  Free Hotel shuttle to the park is great! Rooms are very comfortable and quiet.  Hotel restaurant's Breakfast buffet had a nice selection and was very tasty.  Main lobby Lounge was great for drinks and appetizers.... very relaxing. Everyone on staff was always very pleasant and quite helpful.  Hotel is also within walking distance to outlet shopping and cinemas. Can't beat the price for all the conveniences!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your long weekend trip to Disneyland! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary shuttle service to the theme park and pleasant guest service. It's also a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed our Trofi restaurant's breakfast buffet and our 1Hundred Bar's appetizers and drinks! Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: A great place to stay when traveling to Southern California.  Have stayed at this location numerous times and every time the hotel has exceeded my expectations.  The breakfast is nice but a little pricey if you are looking to stay within a budget.  Overall, the staff was great and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor Review! We are pleased to hear of your return to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to always exceed your expectations every time you stay with us. We're glad you enjoyed our courteous staff and breakfast from our Trofi restaurant. Thank you for your stay and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We always stay at this hotel and receive bell hop service and valet parking! The rooms are clean and has many accommodations such as a Starbucks, a full bar and a restaurant in hotel lobby. Then across the street there is many more places from gas, food and shopping. They have free shuttle service to Disneyland or you can drive the short 5 minutes to the happiest place on earth....
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad you had a great experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide clean guest rooms and on-property accommodations. We know that convenience and location is everything and we are pleased to know that we were your ideal place to stay during your visit to Disneyland! Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Had a great stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Orange. The room was a great size and the bed and pillows were extremely comfortable. The staff was super friendly and willing to help. Anytime we needed additional items like linens or toiletries they were very quick to deliver.  We would recommend this hotel to others and we would definitely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your recent visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide our guests with comfortable guest rooms and super friendly staff! We are glad to have been able to provide you with the personal items you needed and that they were received in a timely manner. Thank you for your stay and for recommending our hotel to others! We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I stayed here on business and a side trip to Disneyland. It's a very nice hotel in line with the Doubletree brand.  The staff at checking are very friendly as were getting support staff. The room is adequately sized.  Be forewarned, this hotel is NOT near Disneyland. It is at least a 10 minute ride away. The shuttle leaves every hour and it's free.
