The hotel is located right beside UCI medical center. It is about a block from the entrance to I-5  Across the street are a couple of fast food restaurants and of course a Starbucks. There are no rows of other family restaurants in the area thought you're pretty much stuck eating at the hotel unless of course you're going to Disney or have a car.  Uber does come here if needed.  Parking is horrible. Self park is almost always full and
Manager Response: Dear Jonathan,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to have you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent guest service and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland! We are sorry to hear that you did not have a good experience with our self parking. We do hope that you were able to easily find more restaurant choices at our nearby Outlets at Orange, which is walking distance from the hotel. We thank you for your review and we hope to have you again soon for another comfortable stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This hotel offered shuttle service to and from Disney.  Easy to get to.  Very nice hotel.  The cookie upon check in ws a nice gesture.  I liked the food options but I ate at Disney.  The staff were very nice.  Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! It's our pleasure to have you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland! It's always a pleasure to welcome our guests with a warm cookie when you check in and excellent guest service. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed as part of a travel agent conference, and, boy, was I impressed!  Beautiful facility, FANTASTIC food, and the staff were phenomenally helpful.  Our conference was closer to Disneyland, but it was TOTALLY worth the effort!
Manager Response: Dear Kate,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide beautiful surroundings, fantastic food and phenomenal staff to our guests. We're glad to have been in close proximity to your conference located near Disneyland as well. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Loved the location- far enough from Disneyland to escape the crowds but close enough to get there quickly. We had intended to use the free shuttle but a family friend picked us up instead. I wish we had used the shuttle instead to avoid the giant Disney parking lot. Very clean and comfortable property.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide you the convenience of being close to Disneyland but far away from the heavy crowds! Our complimentary shuttle service will always be here to make your trip to Disneyland easy and comfortable. We're also glad that you enjoyed our property and your overall stay. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Who cares if your room is dirty!!!!'
Summary: Dirty room I have pictures! Why was I charged 160 for a room I couldn't use till 9pm 4 hours after I told the front desk? I called and asked about early check in was told no problem. I guess I'm lucky I had two rooms or I would have been sitting in the hall way.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear about your recent experience with us. We strive to ensure guest satisfaction, especially in regards to their check in experience. We would like to hear from you so we can gain a better grasp of the situation; please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500. Thank you for your stay with us and we look forward to hearing from you.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This was a vacation to re-visit Disneyland and my husband and I enjoyed the free transportation to Disneyland and great, clean, and friendly staff at the DoubleTree Hotel in Anaheim/Orange CA, this was a great experience for us.  Did I mention their cookies are to die for?
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear about your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide our guests with complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland, along with our warm delicious cookies upon check in. We enjoy being a part of our guests' experience during their visit to Disneyland, and we are glad to help make it a great one. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I will definitely stay here again!!! The room was clean n spacious. I loved the warm cookies that are given upon arrival. The bed was comfortable. Minutes away from the Block of Orange. I loved that it was quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear about your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide comfortable, quiet guest rooms and warm cookies. We know that convenience is everything for our guests, and we are pleased to know that you were able to access the Outlets at Orange from our property with ease. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to your next stay with us!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Shuttle only runs hourly and doesn't do it's first pick up till 2:15pm. Great hotel if you're NOT visiting Disneyland. Friendly staff, great food, pool is average. Only stay here if it's significantly cheaper than somewhere closer to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you were dissatisfied with our complimentary shuttle service to and from Disneyland, as our shuttle times to Disneyland begin around 7:00am and pickups from the park normally don't begin until 2:15pm. We are pleased to know you enjoyed our friendly staff and food from our Trofi restaurant. We would like to hear more feedback regarding your shuttle service experience; please call us at 714-634-4500. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you as a guest again at our hotel in the near future.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay - good experience
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for business because it's close to my company's HQ. The parking is great - I'm not sure if they charge or not. I thought so ($15/night) but I didn't get charged, thought it might have been because of the standing deal between the hotel and my company. Parking is right out front, and I didn't have to scout for a place to park. Check in was OK - a bit of a wait but nothing crazy. I was upgraded to a suite which was nice, but it felt like a former 2-bedroom suite that was turned into a 1-bedroom suite with a living area.  The living area felt like an empty former two-bed hotel room with a small couch in the corner of its wall.  The couch wasn't too comfy and didn't feel too clean, but it wasn't unbearable either. The room seemed like one that would typically
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent guest service and comfortable guest rooms, whether they are here for business or leisure. We're currently undergoing renovations to our guest rooms, which may explain the reason why you sense a rugged/old feel with your guestroom. We're glad to have had you during your visit to your company's nearby headquarters. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We ate at the restaurant bar a few times and enjoyed everything we ordered. Service was great and staff helpful. Breakfast buffet was excellent and all the staff very accomodating. They do close the pool very early if you ask me (I think it was like 10 or 10:30 pm). Love the fire pit design outside the restaurant, added a lot of ambiance.
Manager Response: Dear Danna,   Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your recent experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent restaurant service and great food! We're glad you enjoyed the pool and the fire pit design, as it is a guest favorite! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great place to stay. Easy check in and check out. Employees are always nice and willing to help with your every need. Clean and comfortable. Shopping,food, and night life locations are within walking distance.  Great valet parking
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad to hear that you had a great check in/check out experience and that you had a clean, comfortable guest room. We're also happy to hear that you were easily able to access the nearby Outlets at Orange and that you enjoyed our valet parking. Thank you for your review and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The check in process was fast, hotel was quiet, and the bed was comfortable. The location next to the outdoor mall will ensure you'll have tons of options for food and its right off the 5 freeway making it easy to get around. For negatives, $20 parking and though the hotel is well kept, it's time for a refresh.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy to hear that your check in experience was fast and that you encountered a quiet, comfortable visit. It's great to know that our guests enjoy our location, as it is within walking distance to the Outlets at Orange. Thank you for your review and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This was for work and play. Disneyland is very close and they provide a shuttle every hour. Had a Double Bed room, 9th flr, and a good view. Beds were very comfortable. The Restaurant has a breakfast buffet every morning. The cost is $18 and changes everyday, coffee and juice included. Staff is very friendly. Anaheim Outlet mall is within walking distance, probably 5 mins away and has Restaurants, bowling, theaters and shopping, There is a pool, not heated and a Jacuzzi of which we used many nights after walking so much at Disneyland. The Lobby has a Bar and 2 Happy Hours and outlets for your devices. Had a good stay!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide comfortable guest rooms, delicious breakfast items, the 1Hundred Bar and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We are pleased to know that you were able to easily access the Outlets at Orange and our pool and Jacuzzi served your relaxation needs. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Attended a week long conference here and it was a very pleasant stay. Staff, room and facilities were great. I would stay again. Not far from John Wayne airport. Restaurants within walking distance and a beautiful outside mall nearby to do shopping and eating.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your week long conference! It's our pleasure to provide great guest service, facilities and comfortable guestrooms. We are glad you were easily able to access the nearby Outlets at Orange and John Wayne airport from our location. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to your next stay with us!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: NO WIFI UNLESS YOU ARE HILTON MEMBER.
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights during my USA trip on July 2016. Let me summarize the Pros n Cons about this hotel.   The pros: 1. Spacious bedroom, comfortable bed.  2. Bedroom is also nice. Amenities are good.  3. Breakfast is okay.  4. The gym room is good. Complete equipments.  5. There is a shuttle bus to Disneyland.  The cons: 1. Although the breakfast is doing its job,  But i should say that i didnt see any changes on the menu during my 2 nights stay. They are all the same. Customers can get boring if they keep doing that.  2. This one is getting me very disappointed. WIFI ISNT FREE!. You need to pay or you must be a Hilton member to get the free wifi. Most Customers are not the Hilton member, the management hotel should know it. Although i bought a simcard during my trip, but
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your trip to the USA! We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our daily breakfast selections, as we aim to please our guests with various options on a daily basis. Becoming a HHonors member is absolutely free and offers free WiFi and other perks for our guests, so please be sure to sign up before your next stay at any Hilton property brand. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your guestroom and hotel amenities. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Booked a second night on return and had same problem .... The reservationists not imputing all the necessary info requested or a barter game is being played??? However most request were received after speaking to manager
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your necessary information regarding your room stay was not imputed by our Reservation team. We are glad to hear that this issue was resolved once speaking to our Front Desk managers. Please give us a call at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience and to ensure that this does not happen again. Thank you for your visit to Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County and we hope to have you as our guest again soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Lots of noise from sirens, not enough staff - for a nice looking hotel it should have better service.  The food was good when it arrived hot, which was not when ordered in the bar.  The rooms were nice, but dark.
Manager Response: Dear Dyanne,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you experienced a great deal of noise disturbance during your stay with us, in addition to the level of service you received from us during your stay. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience. We thank you for your visit and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We recently stayed here for a State-wide conference.  The hotel was very comfortable and well appointed.  The conference rooms were good.  We had lunch outside, but the lunch area was completely shaded by a cover - so it was delightful and the food was fantastic.  Nice location near the outlets and there is a shuttle that runs to Disneyland if that is what you are looking for.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to make your stay a great one during your State-wide conference. Our Veranda area is a great location to host an outside lunch for an event such as yours. We'are glad you enjoyed our conference rooms and our location being in close proximity to the Outlets at Orange and Disneyland. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Perfect spot for visiting Disneyland along with the Angels and Ducks.  Staff is always helpful.  Property also has a tennis court, basketball hoop and outdoor pool all of which we enjoyed. Warm cookies upon arrival are a nice touch.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to have had you during your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be conveniently located to Disneyland, the Angel Stadium and the Honda Center. We make it a priority to offer our guests the best in service and to offer each person a warm chocolate chip cookie upon check in. We're also glad you were able to partake in your desired outdoor activities during your stay! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for approx 1 week while I attended a seminar which was also hosted at the hotel.  Check in staff were friendly and polite. The hotel hallways and rooms appear a little dated; compared to most other American hotels of this type, it is no different or worse.   The room was comfortable and large. Adequate storage space, armchair / footrest space and a working space with a large desk.  The hotel is located close to a large shopping mall, about 5 minutes walking distance. There are some dining options at the mall, but all are chain restaurants or fast food style. No great healthy eating options nearby. Besides the shopping mall there is little else nearby for eating options or evening activities. If you do not have a car you could easily feel stranded. For me,
Manager Response: Dear James,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to be of convenience for our guests' needs, particularly in the areas of shopping and entertainment as we are within walking distance of the Outlets at Orange. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the on-property amenities and spacious guest rooms. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Would stay there again for a Staycation
Summary: Everything was clean and functional.  Staff was friendly and curteous. I would definitely stay there on a staycation and recommend it to other friends and family. It is centrally locted in Orange County and very accessible to most Freeways.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It's our pleasure to provide clean, functional rooms and friendly guest service. We look forward to your next staycation with us and thank you for spreading the word about us!   Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Our first room had a musty and pet urine odor to it. Also the temperature in the room never changed and was warm. The second room had left over food in fridge that made room smell. Staff tried to correct
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear that your room had an odor and that the room temperature was not up to your standards. It is our priority for our guests to receive the best experience during their stay with us. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your time with us. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Hotel is setup very nice. From the Lagoons to the pool and spa were tranquil at night. Good restaurants and bar area for viewing football. Rooms were nice, modern but basic. Microwave but no fridge. Bathroom does the job but small. Staff is great. Business area but a lot of entertainment and restaurants all within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide a tranquil and serene outside environment to our guests. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your guestroom and our friendly staff. Thank you for your stay and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I stayed at the Doubletree due to a procedure at the adjacent UC Irvine Health Center. This was a frightening time for my husband and I but The Doubletree staff could not have been more kind or accommodating. We didn't know when I would be released so they worked with my husband to ensure his comfort and relieve our stress. I think the entire staff, including the shuttle who took us to The Outlets (as a kindness) were wonderful. The front desk was amazing. Stay there!
Manager Response: Dear Patricia,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review. We are very pleased to hear that you were very well taken care of during your procedure at the nearby UCI hospital. We know that it is of utter importance that our guests feel comfortable and accommodating during a critical time. It's our pleasure to provide you with excellent guest service and shuttle service to the nearby Outlets at Orange. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon under better circumstances.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: OK if only using to visit area
Summary: Not a good hotel for business travelers.  Internet signal in guest rooms not good at all.  Had to use personal hot spot.  Was not told that I needed a voucher for breakfast.  When I didn't have one, they tried to charge me $18 for cold eggs, cold potatoes and cold biscuits and gravy when only ate 2 bites of each.   Good place to sleep, and close to lots of venues, but that's it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your recent stay was not up to your standards. It is our priority to make sure that all of our guests receive the best of service during their stay with us. Please give our CARE Line a call at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience with us. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We had a wonderful time here.  The firepit area was soooo relaxing and the service was wonderful.  The location to Disneyland is so convenient and it is also very close to The Blinking Owl Distillery located on Washington Ave in Santa Ana.  You have to visit this wonderful Distillery.
Manager Response: Dear Gloria,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! Our firepit area is a guest favorite, in addition to our excellent guest service. We are also glad that you were able to enjoy the nearby distillery during your stay with us. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a busy area
Summary: If you are a light sleeper don't stay here, it's across the street from a busy hospital with lots of ambulance traffic.  Other than that it's great, close to freeway, outlet mall and of course Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your stay with us was disturbed by the nearby UCI medical center. We're glad that you enjoyed your overall stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. It's our pleasure to have had you as our guest. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed here on a friends recommendation and I am so glad we did. They allowed us to check in early, the shuttles to and from Disney were pleasant. When we go back to Disney we will be staying here!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! It's our pleasure to have had you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad to hear that you were able to check into your room early and that you enjoyed the complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again on your next Disneyland trip!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Staying at this Doubletree has been a delight. The staff surely know about hospitality. Love the check ups via text message, quick response towards concerns. The gym, breakfast, scenery, cookie-grand!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! it's our pleasure to have you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to know that you found your visit to our hotel delightful and that you were provided with excellent guest service. Our text messaging system is a guest favorite! We're also glad to know that you enjoyed our gym, breakfast, scenery and our famous Doubletree cookies. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel with a nice heated pool and garden area. The rooms are clean with comfortable beds and clean crisp sheets and ours had a beautiful city view. The shuttle service is convenient but the shuttle only runs once an hour every 30 minutes would be better.
Manager Response: Dear Catherine,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! It's our pleasure to have you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your guestroom view and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We're also pleased to know that you enjoyed the hotel pool and garden area. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: My new go-to hotel in the Orange County area
Summary: I was so much more impressed than I expected.  I have always had good experiences with the Doubletree brand, but this hotel really fit my needs.  Great location - just off the 5, close to Anaheim stadium, Disneyland (the hotel runs a regular shuttle), the Christ (Crystal) Cathedral (around the corner), and John Wayne airport.  The buffet breakfast was very good: fruits, pastries, eggs, bacon, sausage and a different "treat" every morning - empanadas, biscuits & gravy, etc. All staff members I encountered were friendly and helpful,  I am already looking forward to my next stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to fit your needs and to be conveniently located to your local destinations. We're glad to know that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet and excellent guest service. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Pros: Disneyland Shuttle is handy and a major sell Pool Decent rooms with nice bathrooms Not many children Fast elevator  Cons: Feels a little dated Beds are not comfortable UCI view is nothing to write home about.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear that you did not find your guestroom beds comfortable or up to date. We're pleased to know that you enjoyed your guestroom, the hotel pool and moderate hotel traffic. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights for a business trip. Loved the online check-in because I was able to order extra foam pillows and a bathroom. When I got to the hotel to grab my room key, they gave me the warm cookie, which I love. I had no issues with my stay. Everything was clean and staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your visit at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad you enjoyed the online check-in feature and that you were able to order extra items for your stay. It's our pleasure to provide our guests with warm, delicious cookies and friendly service. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I tend to choose Double Tree for business trip to Orange County, due to the location (close to the airport, close to my meeting place, service with a smile, great rooms and loves the cookies). I highly recommend the Double Tree.
Manager Response: Dear Enna,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! It's our pleasure to have had you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to know that we are your first choice in hotels whenever you visit the Orange County area for business. It's also our pleasure to provide you with excellent service, great rooms and warm cookies. Thank you for highly recommending us and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Visited Disneyland and didn't want to make the 2 hour drive home after a long day at the theme park. We search for hotels within walking distance to the theme park but they were either way too expensive or no availability. The Doubletree hotel not only had availability but offered a shuttle to the theme park. It was also less than a 5 minute drive to the park. The room was very nice and clean and even had a view of Disneyland. We enjoyed watching the fireworks from our room since we were too exhausted to stay to watch them from Disneyland. Room was very clean and beds were comfortable. Overall, great time and comfortable stay. We slept in till check out time. :)
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be a part of your Disneyland family vacation. We're glad you enjoyed the complimentary shuttle service to the theme park and the view of the fireworks from your guestroom. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Overall good experience. Customer service from the hotel staff was the best I've seen in a very long time.  The shuttle service offered by the hotel to and from Disneyland was excellent. I would recommend this hotel to any family looking for a comfortable stay while going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-Star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent guest service and ensure that every stay is a comfortable one. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland as well. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again  soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great location near good shopping, restaurants (down the street) & an AMC 30 movie complex. Self Parking is $15 per day (registered guest SHOULD be free; but it's not). It's is NOT located near any park
Manager Response: Dear Frederick,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our daily parking prices. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed our location and your overall stay. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The food is my favorite part. I know room service can be pricey but for the food here it's worth it. It's convenient because the hotel is right next the orange outlets so you don't have to travel far as well as a good distance away from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Nathali,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent food choices, whether through room service or in our Trofi restaurant. We also know that convenience is important for our guests as well, as we are located near the Outlets at Orange to serve your shopping needs. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We were taking our daughter to Chapman University snd the location was perfect.  Rooms were nice and big and had a view of gireworks from disneyland. Staff very helpful qnd courteous. I would defintely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Sandie,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to have had you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be your choice of hotels during your visit to nearby Chapman University. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your guestroom, the view of the Disneyland fireworks and our helpful service from our friendly staff. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for a five nights to allow us to visit Disneyland.  The hotel was easy to find and there was plenty of parking.  Check-in was quick, but we were not situated on a Hilton Honours floor which was disappointing for a Gold member.   The room was a fair size and had two double beds, and a good view over the locality, but not a Disneyland View as requested, however, we were moved after one night, so this was better.  The staff in the hotel are fantastic, all are pleasant and willing to help.  The bar staff, breakfast staff, front of house and drivers of the courtesy bus to the parks were all very professional and cheerful.  The hotel has a small pool area, the days we used it it was far from full, and although it is unmanned, it is a great asset to the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to have had you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear that you were not placed on a HHonors floor. We are glad that you were eventually moved to a room of your liking. It's our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent service. We're pleased to know that you also enjoyed our pool area, quick check in and your guestroom. Thank you for visiting and we look forward to having you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Hotel is extremely convenient for Chapman University parents, visitors to Angels Stadium, Disneyland and just about anywhere in Orange County.  The price is reasonable and includes a lot and the service and help is great there.
Manager Response: Dear Max,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear that you chose the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your visit to Chapman University! We are glad you were able to easily access all of your favorite destinations from our location. We pride ourselves on making sure that our guests receive the best in guest service as well. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: From check in the check out this hotel was brilliant the staff go above and beyond to help you with anything and the location was perfect they had a courtesy bus which was perfect  I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide excellent guest service from our guests' arrival to departure. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We're glad to know you'll recommend our hotel as well! Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you as our guest again for your next family trip!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great place to stay when visiting your Chapman University student. Just a straight shot to Campus down Chapman avenue.  Nice price and nice size.  Get 2 beds if you want your student to stay with you to get some piece and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that you chose the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County as your hotel during your visit to nearby Chapman University! We are pleased to hear that you experienced peace and quiet during your stay and that we were located right down the street from the campus. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Sheets were scratchy, felt like sleeping on paper towels. Room was nice, bathroom generic, they remolded but didn't bother with the shower tiles. Super ugly ceiling tiles outside bathroom. We made a reservation for a king bed, they tried to give us two doubles, eventually we got out king (that I had reserved). Loud outside noises.  The common areas were very nice. Tried to go to the hot tub twice, but it was completely overrun by kids 9:30pm), so we didn't bother.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your stay with us was not as memorable as hoped. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can learn more about your experience. Thank  you for your feedback and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: WILL STAY HERE AGAIN WITHOUT HESITATION
Summary: Very friendly staff that went out of there way to meet my needs and wishes.  Excellent breakfast (LOVE the potatoes with quinoa) & a wonderful greeting upon arrival with a warm cookie and bottled water.  Rooms are very comfortable and clean.  Close to everything.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you had a great time at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent service and to have their needs met. We know our guests enjoy our warm cookies when they arrive, and they expect the best of quality with their room stay. Thank you for visiting and we look forward to seeing you again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Arrived on Monday August 22nd, 2016. Parked in the gated lot right out front, bringing ticket to check-in desk after walking in through a large porte cochere entrance way. Booked a premium room with 2 double beds with the free breakfast for 4 nights, with the 4th night free. Breakfast is free for all adults booked into the room and kids under 5. I asked about my teenage son and they gladly gave me coupons for him as well. Parking is $15 per night, a little steep considering you are not near Disneyland but seems to be the going rate in Anaheim these days. Lobby has a restaurant (Trofi)? and a Starbucks, as well as a lobby bar at the opposite end. You get free cookies when you check-in and we also received 2 bottles of water as well. Be careful of the 2 fancy bottles in a clear
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide you with excellent service throughout your stay. We are glad to hear that Rey kept you entertained during your complimentary shuttle ride to Disneyland! We are also glad to hear that you enjoyed our on-property amenities and hotel layout. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another great getaway!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Overall I was disappointed with my stay i would possibly stay elsewhere in orange county next time I also found there was not much in restaurant choice in the area compared with staying closer to Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your experience with us was disappointing. We would like to hear more about your time with us during your stay. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500. Thank you for your visit and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed here the night before a medical procedure at UC Irvine.  It's right across the street from the Hospital.    Parking is either Valet for $20 or self park for $16, so take your pick.   Very nice hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Greg,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! It is our pleasure to have you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel during your procedure. We hope you had a comfortable stay. Thank you for your review and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed there during our visit to Disneyland Parks as we bought the 2 days 2 parks tickets  Location is very near , a shuttle bus every 30 min takes you to the parks  very delicious cookies are offered at arrival  Rooms are nice and beds are comfortable  The front desk were very friendly and checked us in upon our arrival  There is an outlet just next to hotel
Manager Response: Dear Ahmed,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Orange-County! It's our pleasure to be your hotel of choice during your Disneyland visit! We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and your comfortable beds. We do our best to give our guests excellent service and make sure their stay is great. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: we've stayed at this hotel several times.  Never disappointed, staff always welcoming.  Within easy walking distance to shops, restaurants and Angels Stadium.  Shuttle available 5o Disney. Pool, lounge area provides a welcome, quiet retreat for relaxing with a glass of wine.
Manager Response: Dear Zimzala,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! it is our pleasure to have you at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to hear that you have stayed with us over and over again and that you enjoyed our friendly service and convenience to the Outlets at Orange. Our complimentary shuttle service to Disney is definitely a guest favorite! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another comfortable stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for five days. We loved eating breakfast because it was included in the package. Children loved playing basketball, swimming pool was awesome. Overall we loved it. We also liked that outlets were so close in walking distance away.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. It's our pleasure to have you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our on-site amenities and that you were able to easily access the Outlets at Orange. We're glad to hear you enjoyed your breakfast with us and that it was included in your package. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another awesome stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Saw complaints about bed bugs. Stayed in the updated top floor. It was clean, new looking. No bed bugs. I was pleased with the hotel and the service. Had the view of the fireworks from Disney land out of my window.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We know the thought bed bugs can be very scary, so we take all the measures we can to ensure that they do not find their way into our guestrooms. It's our pleasure to provide excellent guest service and a great view of Disneyland's fireworks from your room. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another very good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Have stayed here several times for Disneyland vacations.  Away from the crowds, but just a short free shuttle ride to the parks.  Super comfy beds, clean rooms, Starbucks on site, delicious warm cookies.  Never had a chance to used the pool, spa, or tennis courts, but they looked well maintained.  Good value for the money.
Manager Response: Dear Heather,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide you with comfortable rooms and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland during your time with us. We're also glad to hear you enjoyed our on-site amenities and delicious warm cookies. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I stayed for 5 days while in Orange on business.  The overall stay was enjoyable.  The staff is friendly and courteous.  The room was decent and comfortable.   For the amount of time you actually spend in a hotel while on travel, I would give this a very good review.
Manager Response: Dear Susanne,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your visit at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to make you feel comfortable and to provide you with friendly, courteous service from our staff. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another enjoyable stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We spent one night and found the hotel lobby, room, etc. very good and well appointed.  As a HiltonHonors Gold member, we got the usual bottles of water and cookies.  But, were also able to check in on line, choose our room and then just pick up our keys at the front desk when we entered.  Didn't eat in the hotel, but enjoyed the Starbucks in the lobby prior to leaving in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear that as a HHonors Gold member, you were able to check in online, choose your room and pick up your room keys! It's our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent guest service and to offer a welcoming environment to all who enter our hotel. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Our son got married in Orange County and our family and friends all enjoyed a safe, clean and enjoyable stay at the Double Tree property - The staff and amenities couldn't have been better. Thank You all for a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your son's wedding! We are proud to be a part of your family's special occasion and are happy to know that you enjoyed a safe, clean and enjoyable stay. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Little far from Disney .  Disney shuttle doesn't run enough could leave every half hour the first pick up not till 215 pm to return to hotel. Close to outlet stores. Not great restaurant in hotel. Staff very friendly and helpful. Concierge and shuttle drivers are great.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland schedule did not meet your transportation needs. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our friendly staff, concierge and shuttle drivers. If you feel obliged, please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anahiem Service Team

Summary: Huge property which seems to be always over-crowded....mostly with families/kids (and during our stay, the entirety of the Texas Rangers MLB team). As a business traveler, if you are looking for a little more calm/tranquility, this property is probably not for you.   Everything about it is pretty basic Hilton/Doubletree. The rooms are slightly warn, AC doesn't work all that well, breakfast is included and pretty standard. Valet parking is a fortune. Lobby bar is average.
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your stay with us was below your standards. We strive to make all of our guests, whether they are with us for business or leisure, feel comfortable during their stay. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Serivce Team

Summary Heading: what I expect of a doubletree
Summary: Just checked in for a night. Great location, beautiful property, Bar area and restaurant although I ordered room service. 15 minutes from John Wayne airport. Found a great rate relative to what you find in this area. You do pay for parking 15 or 20 for valet. Room service was great! Good wi fi- free for hilton members. Will be back if ever in this area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to have our guests experience a great location, beautiful property and a great rate! We're glad you enjoyed the room service and HHonors perks. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anahiem Service Team

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, except for the ambulance noise
Summary: Customer service was great. Checked in around 1 am and noticed a few people in front of me with 1 employee at the counter. Another employee walking by noticed and immediately jumped in help and had me checking in within a few minutes. The front desk staff, restaurant staff, concierge, and shuttle drivers were all very helpful and a pleasure to deal with. Restaurant in the lobby had a great breakfast buffet. Free shuttles to/from Disneyland were extremely convenient and just a short ride from this further away location. Stayed on the 19th floor and the room was spacious and appeared fairly new. There is a medical center across the street, so sirens from ambulances did awaken me a few times.
Manager Response: Dear Mike,  Thank you for your review. It is our pleasure to have you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry that you were inconvenienced during your stay with the ambulance sirens from across the street. We're glad that you enjoyed our guest service and that you were immediately assisted with your check in. It's our pleasure to provide excellent food, complimentary shuttle service and spacious rooms. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: A lovely hotel and so close to Disney
Summary: This hotel is very close to Disney, at max a 10 minute drive - though the hotel does offer a bus service to Disney.  The room was nice and the staff were friendly.  Cold water and warm cookies upon check in.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide cold water and warm cookies when guests arrive to our hotel. We're glad you enjoyed your room and our location, being that it's close to Disneyland. Thank you for your review and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Wonderful service throughout. My son loved the warm cookies at check-in, the great view from the room of the Disneyland fireworks, and the shuttle driver who taught him a magic trick. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased you chose the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your trip to Disneyland! It's our pleasure to provide warm chocolate chip cookies upon check in. We're glad you enjoyed the view of the Disneyland fireworks from your room and the friendly shuttle drivers aboard our complimentary shuttle service to the park. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The location of this property is very good for business.  Really close to the highways and tons of things to do and see nearby.  It also seemed to be a strong family location for disney.  There was a mix of business travelers and families.    While this hotel isn't going to blow your mind for the quality of the rooms or amenities, they did everything well.  Check in and check out were efficient, the room was clean and everything was in working order, and all the employees seemed genuinely engaged.    There was a parking charge, but it was reasonable (I think $15) and the lot is right next to the hotel.  Fitness center was decent, breakfast was great.   While likely not a 'destination location', I don't think you'll be disappointed with a stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to have had you at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad that you enjoyed our location and that you found it to be a strong family location for Disney. It's our pleasure to make our guests' experience an enjoyable one and to provide excellent guest service. Thank you for choosing us and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Great location and excellent customer service
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here for 3 nights on a visit from Ontario, Canada. We were doing a lot of driving during our trip so it was great to make use of the free shuttle rides to and from Disneyland. Through the day we had 3 shuttle drivers who made us laugh and smile the entire time - a big thank you to Karen and Rey - didn't catch the name of the third driver. The hotel staff was very friendly and made everything easy. Our room was a tad bit dated but very clean and was enough space for the two of us. We stayed in a Hilton Honors room on the 16th floor.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle,  Thank you for your review and for visiting the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be your home away from home! We're glad we were able to give you a break from driving by providing complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland, along with the humor our shuttle drivers provided along the way. We hope you enjoyed your stay on the HHonors floor. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We were on the top floor, corner room. It was quiet for New Year's Eve, too!! The room was very nice and spacious and clean. We ate at the restaurant for  breakfast and a late night snack. Service was friendly and quick. The food was good, too!! The hotel is a good 20 min. from Disneyland, but they have a great shuttle. I would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you shared your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide quiet, clean rooms to our guests. We're glad you enjoyed food along with the friendly and quick restaurant service! Our complimentary shuttle service is a great choice for our guests who want to leave the driving to Disneyland on us! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I stayed for one night during a business trip on the third floor. The entire night I listened to the outside street traffic and a crying baby next door. They obviously have a sound issue between walls. I had a horrible night sleeping. The hotel was clean and staff was nice. Will not stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear that you encountered noise issues during your stay. Please feel free to contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to hearing from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This is a good hotel in medium price range, service is good room size is average and is bit dated. We stayed there with 3 kids location is central but a bit far if you want to walk to disneyland with the kids. Second floor pool is good for the kids and adults, parking lot is quite impressive but they charge 18$ per day
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad you and your family enjoyed the pool area and hope that you were able to take advantage of the complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland! Our self parking is $15 per day and $20 for valet so we hope that you found our rates reasonable given the prime location. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Business trip, hotel is excellent, enjoyed my stay and centrally located, everyone in the hotel is super friendly and willing to assist on anything. Rooms are super big with perfect views to the adjacent stadium.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad you enjoyed our stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your business trip! It's our pleasure to provide excellent guest service and spacious rooms with great views. We know location is everything and we are glad you found ours to be convenient. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Although this hotel is not a "Disney" hotel, they have a free shuttle that makes the trip to the parks nice and easy. The driver we had, Rey, is amazing and although I think a lot of his jokes and entertainment was for the kids on the bus, we as adults found him humorous and entertaining as well. Definitely the best staff member we had contact with.  Unfortunately, my experience with the front desk staff was sub-par as they seemed a little scattered and my digital check-in didn't seem to help things move any smoother. Our room also didn't seem 100% cleaned when we got there and we needed to call housekeeping to replace the bed sheets.  Overall, we had a great stay with a few issues that could easily have been one-offs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Anaheim Double Tree Hotel has a great service commitment, nice and clean rooms, very friendly staff. For families, there's a convenient shuttle service to Disneyland. Overall, I am very satisfied with this hotel. It's a good choice for both business and leisure travels.
Manager Response: Dear Ulrich,   Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our priority to provide excellent guest service, clean rooms and friendly staff. We know that our hotel caters to both business and leisure guests and we strive to ensure comfort and quality. It's also our pleasure to provide complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Nothing out of the ordinary for a Doubletree
Summary: Stayed here for 5 days last week mainly for work and trying to stay a little out of the Disney bubble and congestion.  Overall its a decent hotel.  Rooms are dated but in decent shape.  They think a room with a microwave and fridge is an upgrade when should be standard in all rooms.  The air conditioning is off all day and doesn't kick on until you arrive in the evening which makes for an uncomfortable hour or two until the room cools down.  The breakfast was included since I am Diamond and was good with a variety of options.  The gym is updated but kind of small for the size of this hotel so except it to be crowded in the morning.  The parking across the street is convenient but fills up quick if there is an event at the hotel and then you have to park in a garage over a block
Manager Response: Dear Jeff,  Thank you for your review and for your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to hear that you found our hotel to be decent, even though the microwave and fridge upgrade was not included with your room type. We're sorry to hear about your experience with the air conditioning, but we are pleased to know that you enjoyed the Diamond HHonors perks. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Took the family to Disneyland and decided to stay at the doubletree orange. We were more than satisfied with our stay. The entire staff was very helpful. We drove 10 hours overnight and they had our room ready for us by noon. The rooms were clean and comfortable! The shuttle to Disneyland is great! Ray is a great driver and showed our boys card tricks while we waited for the shuttle to leave. The shuttle was always on time and allowed us to rest halfway through the day so our youngest could nap. If you're looking for a great place to stay in the Disneyland area you won't go wrong here!
Manager Response: Dear Eric,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review and for your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to know that your family was more that satisfied during your stay with us. It's our pleasure to provide clean and comfortable rooms, fun shuttle service to Disneyland and excellent guest service. We're glad you had a great time during your stay with us. Thank you for visiting and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The DoubleTree in Orange California is a very nice and welcoming hotel; I enjoyed the stay very much, the rooms are quite big and the shower was very comfortable, no bath tube but a shower one can straight walk in.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to make our guests feel welcomed. We're glad to hear you enjoyed your spacious room and comfortable shower. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Cancelled our booking without notifying us - thanks for that!!
Summary: Cancelled a booking we made several months ago without even telling us. No emails, calls or anything. Only when we checked the booking details on the Hilton site just before our trip did we find it was cancelled. Who the hell even does that without attempting to contact you or anything?! Doubletree customer services were absolutely useless and did nothing to help us. Never again!
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Ryan W,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences this booking cancellation may have caused you and your family. We would be more than happy to reinstate your booking details at your earliest convenience. We can do so by contacting the hotel and speaking to the manager on duty. Thank you once again for bringing this to our attention. We would like to make it right for you sir.   Warm Regards, Lizeth Acevedo Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel is great and our second visit to this hotel. The shuttle to Disneyland is great. They are very prompt with the schedule. Walking distance to the Outlets at Orange and several restaurants. I parked our car in the parking area and didn't get it out till we were leaving for the next part of our vacation. We went to the Angels game and were able to walk. Everything was great!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to have you again at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! Being that we are centrally located to nearby restaurants, shops, Disneyland and Angel Stadium, it is a plus for our guests! It's our pleasure to provide complimentary, prompt shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for staying with us again and we look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Staff very nice and friendly . Air conditioner could have worked better. Loved the shuttle to and from Disney. Breakfast was a plus but a little overpriced for children. The valet attendants were awesome.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry that the air conditioning in your guestroom was not up to your standards. It is our pleasure to provide complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and excellent guest service. We are glad that despite the prices you enjoyed the breakfast. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: A fine choice not too far from Disneyland
Summary: Had a two night stay at the Doubletree.  I found the hotel to be adequate.  I feel that there are better options in the area.  The Doubletree is about three miles to Disneyland.  It was nice to be away from the crowds and the hotel provides a free shuttle to and from the park.  The drivers were fantastic, all friendly and very helpful.    After staying at several Hilton properties this summer, I was a little disappointed by the Doubletree.  I was told that I was given an upgraded room, but was given the same room type that I reserved.  The hotel seemed a little run down.  Rooms appeared to be partially renovated, but still need a little work.  The exterior entrance to get to the pool was absolutely disgusting and the pool areas needed some cleaning.  I found follow up by the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you chose us as your place to stay during your trip to Disneyland, despite the several hotels to choose from in the area. We are sorry to hear that you were not given the upgraded room we originally promised you. Our property is undergoing continual renovations so our guestrooms have a contemporary feel. We are sorry to hear that our pool area and our Front Desk staff did not meet your expectations. Please feel free to contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience with us. Thank you for your visit and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This was our 3rd time staying at a doubletree but by far the best one yet! Even though the other ones were nice this one just felt homie. Beds are super comfy and the bathrooms are very nice. The shower head was probably my favorite thing after a long day at Disney! Definitely recommend you to stay at this property!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad have you again at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to make you feel at home by providing super comfy beds after a long day at Disneyland. We have had renovations done for our guestrooms, including the bathrooms so we are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed the décor. Thank you for recommending our hotel and we look forward to your next stay in the near future!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: An easy-access hotel that was clean, friendly and convenient
Summary: I stayed there for one night in July.  I was pleasantly surprised.  It was clean, very friendly and very comfortable.  It had convenient access to the freeway and the outlet mall nearby.  We were even blessed to be able to look out our window and watch the fireworks from Disneyland.    It does appear for at least the night we were there the clientele was primarily business but it could easily be used for families enjoying the sights and sounds of southern LA.    I'd definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to make sure our guests enjoy their stay. We are happy you were able to easily access nearby attractions. While we do hold many business events at our hotel, we pride ourselves on also being a destination for families during their trip to Disneyland and other local areas. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Good choice for quiet after Disneyland.
Summary: Stayed here for a family trip to Disneyland.  I prefer to stay a little bit away from the crowds.  This is a good choice.  The free shuttle to Disneyland is great.  There is also food nearby so you can eat for less than at the theme parks.  Also it has a swimming pool and jacuzzi. The beds are very comfortable.  I would stay again.  There is valet and self park.  It's not free but I knew that ahead of time.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location, as it is away from the Disneyland area yet in close proximity. It is our pleasure to provide complimentary shuttle service, in-hotel amenities and comfortable beds. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We flew into Lax and stayed at this hotel.  Location for Disney was great.  Bus from hotel took you to Disney every hour at no charge.  Return trips every hour starting at 2:15.  10 minute ride. Reservation was a small mixup but hotel staff took care of problem.  They were most helpful sending us to Laguna Beach and recommending a whole day tour of La and Beverly Hills.  35 min. Drive to Lax early Sun. Morning.  Only complaint was self parking gate constantly did not work.  They really need to address problem.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review and for sharing your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy to hear we were your hotel of choice during your Disneyland trip! We are sorry to hear that you encountered issues at our self parking gate; we are looking into the issue.  We're glad we were able to take care of the reservation issue. It's our pleasure to recommend suggestions on how to make your experience in Orange County and L.A. the best! Thank you for visiting and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great Cookies!   Very good location, extremely clean and always responsive and happy-face crew. kinda old , but nicely restored and feels good. only complaint would be breakfast area and restaurant crew.
Manager Response: Dear Nima,   Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor Review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide excellent guest service, clean comfortable rooms and great cookies! We are sorry to hear that you were not 100% satisfied with our breakfast area and restaurant crew. We know that location is important to our guests and we are glad you were pleased. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another nice stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Double Tree Orange County: excellent stay
Summary: We stay here when in Orange county, California. We have always had an excellent experience at this property. The staff is very helpful, friendly, and professional. The rooms are very clean and well appointed.
Manager Response: Dear Bob,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear that you stay with us whenever you are in Orange County! At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we pride ourselves in excellent guest service and clean, comfortable rooms. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: All staff members were helpful and friendly, enjoyed having casual conversations with them. They were always willing to provide assistance with hotel or local questions regarding services or activities.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure and privilege to provide our guests with excellent guest service and personable conversations. We hope that this made your visit more exceptional! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Doubletree cookies always makes this stay sweet!
Summary: This high-rise hotel in the city of Orange is very convenient to Disneyland, Anaheim Angels Stadium, Honda center and OC beaches.  It is also within walking distance to the Outlets and a variety of eateries.  The hotel does provide shuttle service to Disneyland and has its own on-site parking lot (with a fee).  Lobby is pleasant and rooms are comfortable.  Staff is friendly.  Our only concern is that the height of the bathtub is a little higher than normal so that when you stepped off, expect a further drop than usual.  Other than that, everything was great!  We also had breakfast at Trofi, the in-house restaurant that served buffet breakfast as well as an a la carte menu.  Breakfast included fruits, yogurt, oatmeal, pastries, eggs, bacon, sausage, variety of juices, tea/coffee,
Manager Response: Dear Theresa,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear that there was a concern with the height of our bathtubs. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can ensure the safety of our guests. We are glad that you enjoyed your comfortable rooms, pleasant lobby and friendly staff. It is important for our guests to be located to all of their favorite attractions during their stay. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Very nice clean rooms, modern, sleek interior and bar area.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  First time I've stayed here because I thought it was too far from Disneyland.  Well, I got to Disneyland quicker than any other hotel I've stayed at, and I've stayed at a lot!!  They have their own free shuttle and it is prompt.  Took less than 10 minutes to get to the park.  Our driver, Rey, was great with the kids!!!  I'll definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear of your great experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is a priority of ours to ensure that our guests receive the best of service during their stay. We are happy that you arrived to Disneyland from our location in a timely manner via our complimentary shuttle service! Ray is definitely a guest favorite! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to be a part of your next Disneyland adventure!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Team

Summary Heading: Several times stay at this hotel
Summary: Big room. Near orange outlet only 100m walk nice buffet breakfast and welcoming cookies always love double tree aand the cookies. The have shuttle to disneyland. Really enjoy stay here. And we'll be back again
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad you stayed at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're glad you enjoyed your spacious room, breakfast buffet and welcoming cookies! It's important for our guests to be near the local Outlets at Orange and to be provided with complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have see you again son for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: My husband booked this hotel for my birthday weekend this past week! And at first I was disappointed that he didn't book our usual hotel closer to Disneyland. But I have to admit it exceeded my expectations!  I loved every moment of our stay and was glad my husband booked us at yet another amazing Hilton property! Trying to figure out another great excuse to stay here as it was close to angel stadium as well as the orange outlets!   Shuttle offered to Disney makes it con isn't if you plan on visiting
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to hear that we exceeded your expectations despite not being in your usual hotel closer to Disneyland. It is our pleasure to have made your stay enjoyable for you and your husband!
