Location is everything and we know that's important to our guests. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another great visit!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We were upgraded to a King from a queen bed.  Hot chocolate chip cookies upon arrival!.  Free shuttle to Disneyland which helped out a lot.  The shuttle driver dropped us off at Angel's Stadium one night on his errand run.  Concierge told us the wait is long at Disneyland, to buy our tickets early.  Close to an outlet mall.
Manager Response: Dear Bridget,  Thank you for your review. We are happy you stayed with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to have upgraded your room and to have provided shuttle service to Angel Stadium! We are also happy to give you tips and pointers when planning your day at Disneyland as well! Gotta love the chocolate chip cookies! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay.  Room was clean and comfortable.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Shuttle to go to Disneyland is free and convenient.  We went to Anaheim Stadium and it was a short drive.  We will definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your weekend at Angel Stadium! It's our pleasure to provide clean, comfortable rooms and excellent guest service. We are glad you were able to easily get to Angel Stadium as well! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Perfect location for Disneyland (10 min away), UCI hospital, Chapman University and Angel Stadium!  We booked early and had a great rate. Suite was nice!  Great to have 2 separate rooms!  Staff very friendly.  View of Disneyland was great!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad you recently visited the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to be located in a great location central to all of your favorite attractions. We are also pleased to hear that you enjoyed the view of Disneyland from your hotel room and our excellent guest service. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The room is clean..bed is comfortable. Receptionist were polite. Shower is good..clean bathroom.  Accessible to malls and theres a restaurant within walking distance. Parking is easy..wifi is very good!   Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear you had a good stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide great guest service and clean, comfortable rooms. We are glad you were able to easily access the nearby Outlets at Orange and hotel parking. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed here again for our family visit to Disneyland. The room we were allocated was clean and very comfortbale. As I found last time I stayed here the staff were freindly and helpfull. As a Hilton Gold member I had free wifi and complimentary breakfast which had good options. The hotel provides a complimentary shuttle to Disneyland park which is regular and we used this service with no problems . With my family of 4 I can say that this hotel is probably the best value and place to stay for your visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your room and HHonors perks such as complimentary WiFi and free breakfast. It is also our pleasure to make this your hotel choice for your Disneyland adventures! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Came in for runDisney.  Was really simple to grab an Uber.  ART transportation was available across the street.  One morning really early, the valet guy even dropped us off  at Disney for free.  That's what I call service.  Love the chocolate chip cookies.  Hotel has a washer and dryer outside by swimming pool.  I think there were 2 washers and 2 dryers.  Get change from front desk first.  Ate at lobby bar through Hilton hhonors program.  Got a lot of free coupons.  Breakfast adequate, also complimentary through hhonors.  Full bfast.  Room very quiet and clean.  Would not hesitate to stay again.  Thank you Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide excellent guest service, chocolate chip cookies and clean, comfortable guest rooms. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland as well. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I LOVE this hotel - I've been here twice for conferences and will definitely stay there if I go down to Anaheim for Disneyland. The front desk staff are extremely friendly and they don't put on the "fake" customer service.  There is a free shuttle every hour to Disneyland. Warm cookies upon check-in (WHAT!) The bar is great and the older bartender makes a great margarita. My only wish is that they had stairs from the 1st to the 2nd floor (for conferences).  Walking distance to The Outlets at Orange. If you are a light sleeper, there is a hospital across the street and there is some ambulance noise but not constant.  Has a Starbucks and a little store inside. Room service was fast and tasty.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy to know that you love our hotel and that you are looking forward to staying with us for a future trip to Disneyland. We are glad you enjoyed our bar and margarita as well! As a note, we do have stairs that lead to Second floor; it can be accessed outside right across from the pool area via a guest room key. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our location and our warm, delicious cookies as well. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This was a great hotel for a conference. My conference was three days. The conference was in the hotel and I got a room here. I did go out for dinner but other meals I enjoyed at the hotel. I will recommend this hotel to other and I will stay here on visits to this area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to know that you had a great time with us during your three day conference. It is our pleasure to provide you with a great experience during your time with us. Thank you for your visit and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,   Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Very nice hotel with excellent service except I was dissappointed that they would not allow us to use their luggage cart so we could bring our luggage to our room. The breakfast was very good and we had excellent service!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you were not permitted to utilize a luggage cart to transport your items to your room. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can fully hear of your experience with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and were given excellent service. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Room (4th floor) was quiet, clean, comfortable, well-lit, no odors. A little warm; temperature range on thermostat was limited so I couldn't get it as cool as I would have liked. High charges for parking ($15 per night for outdoor parking for guests) and wireless Internet (about the same). Check with the hotel to see if you get free Internet by joining HHonors. Room service pizza was decent and only slightly overpriced. No refrigerators in rooms (at least not in mine) so don't plan on keeping leftovers. Free cookie at check-in; hotel staff were friendly and helpful. Room had no place to hang towels except a small hook on the bathroom door, making it hard to take advantage of the optional towel re-use offer to save water.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to know that despite some minor inconveniences your visit to our hotel was decent. It is our pleasure to offer our guests clean, comfortable, quiet hotel rooms. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Not satisfied with services received at DoubleTree.  What was promised to me on the phone was not done when I arrived.  The room was not what I expected, not too clean and so as the bathroom.  The breakfast menu was filled out and put outside on the door knob per instruction, it was not picked up so we had to call and placed the order on the phone.
Manager Response: Dear Maata,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with your recent stay. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience with us. We want to ensure that our guests have an enjoyable stay with us. We thank you for your visit and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel and it was fantastic. The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was updated and very comfortable. The free shuttle to Disneyland also came in very handy. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent service and clean, updated rooms. One of the many perks of staying at our property is the complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We are pleased that you had an enjoyable stay during your business trip. Thank you for visiting us and we look forward to having you again soon for another fantastic stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Place was great and very close to the Orange Outlet Mall. 10 minute drive to Disneyland. My kids enjoyed the pool though it could have been better. I only wish they provided a microwave and refrigerator in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! For your next visit, please be sure to request a Deluxe room, which would include a microwave and mini refrigerator in the room. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our location and that it was convenient for Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again for another great stay!!  Sincerey,  Doubletree by Hilton Anahiem Service Team

Summary: Nice Hotel, The staff was very friendly and helpful. The Location was Very good. There is a nice fitness center. Easy walk to restaurants. Bed was comfortable, Room was quite and clean. Will stay again when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Dana,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent service and wonderful surroundings. We are happy to hear that you found our location convenient to the Outlets at Orange and that you had a clean, comfortable room. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Very pleasant welcoming staff, rooms well appointed, nice gift shop, good food
Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights for a business seminar and was very pleased.  The room I had was great for working on the computer with a flat screen TV that swiveled so I could see it clearly at the desk or while in bed. Lots of channels that worked well.   Elevators were quick and always available.  Air conditioner in room was a little noisy so I just turned off fan at night.  Meeting rooms had plenty of wall outlets for power however the internet signal was not always real strong.  Had buffet lunches and the food was excellent with lots of variety.  The front desk staff went out of their way to accommodate any requests I had and the checkout was accurate and speedy.  Lots of shopping and restaurants nearby at the Outlets of Orange which is only a couple blocks away.
Manager Response: Dear Dale,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear that you encountered a weak internet signal during your stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your room and the buffet during your seminar. We are also happy to hear that our Front Desk team was expedient with your requests and checkout and you found the Outlets at Orange right at your fingertips. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another pleasant stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Location was great, fitness center was great, staff was great, rooms were great. Hotel was very accomodating to us and our dog. There is a large mall in walking distance, also a Best Buy shopping center. There are tons of food places and a grocery store a couple blocks away.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is always great to hear of our guests' great times during their stay with us, such as yours. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our staff, hotel amenities and location. We know it's important for our guests and their pets to have a comfortable visit during their time with us. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again soon for another awesome stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The service was very friendly and helpful at the entrance when you arrived. The staff greeted you and opened the door for you when your car parked in the front door. Th e staff made me feel welcomed, and even helped me to call the cab when I needed. The staff at check in was not pleasant and made me wait for along time, and 3 times coming back I still did not have my room ready, no time frame was promised. It was not convenient as digital check in, defeated the purpose of check in on line. I did no feel good and excited after all that waiting.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear you did not receive the best of guest service from our Front Desk personnel. We are also sorry to hear that your were not given a time frame as to when your room would be ready. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience. Thank you for visiting and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed here over the July 4th weekend, which ended up being a good time to book hotel rooms in the OC. The hotel is conveniently located near a large shopping center (Outlets at Orange) and sporting venues in Anaheim. Also near golf courses, John Wayne Airport, South Coast Plaza and within 1 hour to the beaches (moderate traffic conditions). I would rate Doubletree within the middle range of the Hilton family, generally offering more economical room rates.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you spent your 4th of July weekend at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our location and that you found it close to everything you need. We are also glad to hear that you found a great time to book with us as well. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great hotel with good location. Clean, nice, delicious food, very big and comfortable room, good internet in room. Nice personal. Near Disneyland. There is a free transfer to Disneyland. All for a good opportunity to rest and gain strength.
Manager Response: Dear Yelena,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your experience at our hotel. It is our pleasure to offer our guests delicious food and comfortable rooms. We do our best to make sure our guests have a place to relax and unwind during their stay with us. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again soon for another enjoyable stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Parking was reasonable for the Anaheim area but the ease and accessibility of the self parking lot was excellent.  The lot was well lighted and had staff in the immediate area making it safe and secure.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear about your experience at Doubletree by Hilton Anahiem-Orange County! It is our top priority to make sure our guests feel secure on our property. We are very glad to know that you found our parking lot easily accessible. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Spacious rooms, close to Dave n Busters and shopping. The bar is nice. We were out for a basketball tournament, so the boys loved the basketball hoop. Pool area was nice, they had a pond with fish very relaxing.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to know that you enjoyed the spacious rooms and the pool area. Our guests find our location convenient in that it is in very close proximity to shopping, food and other activities. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Good alternative of family hotel for Disneyland
Summary: This is a more economical alternative of family accomodation for Disneyland. It's actually in Orange, not in Anaheim, but it has a free shuttle to and from Disney entryway hourly. It's also very near (roughly a block away) to the outlets at Orange, so plenty of restaurants and shops. Rooms are clean, service is friendly and helpful, rates are better than hotels in Anaheim, overall, a good and worthy stay experience.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to know that our hotel suited your vacation needs and that you enjoyed the complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland! We pride ourselves in providing clean, comfortable rooms and quality service. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: A+ made our anniversary so special  thanks
Summary: They welcomed us with open arms and we're willing to really make us feel special. It was our anniversary and gave us the best service we have ever experienced. Thank you again we will come back here for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you spent your anniversary at the Doubletree by Hilton Anahiem-Orange County! It is our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel with open arms and make you feel special! We are honored to have had you at our hotel during your anniversary and to have became a part of your special memory. Thank you for visiting and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Everyone from the bell desk and valet, to the front desk was warm and welcoming.  The room was clean and ready upon my arrival. The free shuttle to Disneyland was a plus.  The drivers were friendly and safe.
Manager Response: Dear John,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear about your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to welcome our guests with excellent service, from the very moment they arrive to our hotel. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your room and the complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I was here for only one night on a business trip.  Great room & sleep.  Arriving late, I decided to have dinner at the hotel rather than venture out; however, it closed at 9; but the bar offers the same dishes.  The king room was exceptionally comfortable, especially the bed and they accommodated my request for extra pillows.  Loved the bath, large tub, great for soaking.  My room had a frig, microwave and coffee maker which were convenient.  Staff was exceptional and friendly.  Overall, a great night to get ready for a busy day!
Manager Response: Dear Pat,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and pleasant stay, whether for a short business trip or a long stay for leisure. We are pleased to hear that you received your extra pillows and that you enjoyed all of the in-room features and amenities. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times. This was the first time I experienced an issue with having my room cleaned. Staff was friendly and efficient. I had to wait over 10 minutes for a front desk employee - there was only one staff member.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your room was not up to your standards during your recent visit. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can learn more about your experience. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anahiem Service Team

Summary: We stayed 3 nights. Service was first rate. Complimentary breakfast was delicious. Housekeep was great. Cookies were delicious. Shuttles to DL were on the hour.. A big shout out to Rey.. Card tricks and corney jokes .. He was a delight. We came home and I realized while unpacking I had left my flat iron for my hair, called them Monday nite..got here today Thursday..we will be staying there again. Great job guys. Thank you!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear about your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide our guests with first rate service and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Our shuttle driver Rey is a big hit with our guests! We are also very glad to hear that you received your flat iron as well! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another awesome stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: We stayed here for 6 days. Me, my wife in wheelchair and our 16yr old son. And one additional family. And two cars. Quick and service minded carrier that toke our luggage at the front doors.  So with the luggage in good care, we moved to check in and it was easy and quick. And great cookies  we loved them.  The ADA room, was with two queenbeds and roll-in shower. And here we found 2 points that irritated us.  My wife has MS and can’t sit up by here self, unless I place here in the corner in the shower, on the bench.  1th point. Why a small shelf in the corner, she got the neck just in the height of the shelf. 2nd point. The sink was slightly to high and the sink and controls out of here reach.  The patio and pool area was clean and cosy. We saw hummingbird twice during our
Manager Response: Dear Ambjorn,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear of your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We're sorry to hear of your inconveniences with your ADA room. It is our pleasure to offer our guests excellent service and ensure that their needs are met during their stay. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your overall stay and your complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This hotel is moderately priced for the area and has everything you will need including comfortable rooms and access to a restaurant. It is very close to Disneyland and even has a free shuttle. The staff is friendly and do a good job of taking care of their guests. I've stayed here many times and plan to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to offer our guests comfortable rooms and excellent guest service. We are pleased to offer complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and other great amenities. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: They keep this place so cold inside that you have to wear sweaters or jackets.  It was really uncomfortable. We asked multiple times for the air conditioning to be turned down without success. Had a couple banquet room meals. Really tasteless blah food. Not well prepared at all.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your experience at our hotel was not up to your standards. Please give our CARE Line a call at 714-634-4500 so we can hear more about your experience at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. Thank you for your visit and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anahieim Service Team

Summary: I stayed here on business during the week.  Whereas they are very much set up for the Disneyland goers, it is a very good business hotel also.  Walking distance to the convention center, and restaurants makes it an ideal location.   The staff is out of this world.  Very helpful, very firendly.  When I walked up to the desk after a long week of travel, it was sweet relief to experience that much customer service.  Te room was spacious and clean.  A good set up for working and relaxing. Parking is gated, so more secure for that area.  This hotel is a good idea if you are traveling in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide excellent service to our guests and to be a place where you can relax while working. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your room and that you found our location to be convenient to your favorite destinations. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We booked directly through Hilton and got a great deal. We were upgraded, at no additional cost, to a suite, Front desk is super helpful. My only issue was there was no tub, in a suite? and the sheets weren't all that soft. Temp of the room was great which for us is really important. Everything was clean. Loved it
Manager Response: Dear Victoria,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear that you were upgraded to a suite at no additional cost and that you enjoyed your overall stay. Our renovated suites and guestrooms do contain showers instead of tubs, which explains why you did not have a tub during your stay. It is our pleasure to provide great guest service! We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Very attractive upper mid-range quality, good support for Disneygoers
Summary: I stayed at Doubletree-Orange on May 1, 2016, and then tested out the competition across the street 2 weeks later at ALO-Orange.  I enjoy testing Disney-friendly hotels for how good of a Disney stay a family might have.   First off, the cookies in the lobby are very good. Next, I felt that Doubletree-Orange offers a stylish and comfortable stay a couple of miles from Disney, with good transportation support. Doubletree will often provide free shuttle to Disney as part of your deal, but may not include internet (they didn't for my deal). ALO always offers free internet. Parking is free, just swipe your room key. Doubletree will immediately look like a nice hotel as soon as you walk into the spacious Lobby. Good ambiance. Staff here was very friendly.  Location is great for
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is good to hear from our guests regarding our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and their great experience during their stay with us. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel appearance and delicious Doubletree cookies! We thank you for your visit and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Priority for us is peace, excellent bed, and good customer service.  We got all 3 at Doubletree.  Room decor was tasteful (art in hotels is usually pretty awful) and the bathroom was up to date and sparkling clean, as was the entire facility.
Manager Response: Dear Sylvia,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy to know that you found our location to provide peace, an excellent bed and good customer service! We take pride in our hotel's appearance, as we know that feature is important to our guests. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another relaxing stay!  Sincerely,   Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Hotel located near shops & restaurants, very close to Disney. Highways are nearby providing good access. I didn't use them but they have shuttles for Disney. Can be noisy given the closeness to Disney and that they cater to this crowd. In the end good value for the time.
Manager Response: Dear Ross,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Orange-County! Location and convenience is important to our guests and we are glad to hear that you found our property to be in close proximity to your favorite destinations. We also are glad that you found our property to be a great value. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed at this property, not family friendly. Room is not equipped with microwave or refrigerator it is at an additional cost. Parking is not free it cost as well. Nice property if not traveling with kids. Hotel parking area not clearly identified and hotel sign is on clear in respects to entrance of hotel which is in the rear of property.
Manager Response: Dear Trina,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your experience with us was not up to your expectations. Please give us a call at our CARE Line 714-634-4500 so we can hear from you about your full experience with us. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anahiem Service Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this Doubletree. We were there on a Disneyland vacation for our family. The hotel is in impeccable condition. The staff was friendly. The shuttle beats parking at Disneyland any day, even if you do have to schedule your activities around it. Get in line early for the morning shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide excellent complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland park. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the service! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Well, stayed at this resort last week and got trapped in the elevator for 25 minutes. A lot of people did not know what to do. They upgraded us, but still a little distressing. Tried to book again on line for July. We have a lot of HHonors points, but paid cash. Gave us the "low price guaranty", on Saturday, and was down $65 on Monday. Cancelled the first and changed to the cheaper. The price for 2 people and 1 were the same. I was booking for 2. The confirmation came for 1. I called to correct and they said there would be a $141 dollar extra charge. REALLY? My family and employees will NOT stay in Hilton properties again. I don't like these kind of reviews, but really? The room when we stayed last time was clean and fine, but their business practices, in my opinion, are
Manager Response: Dear Bob,  Thank you for you review. We are sorry to hear that your experience with us was not up to your standards, and for the unfortunate elevator malfunction. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear from you and to learn more about your stay with us. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: More of a business than vacation hotel
Summary: This hotel is located in a very busy area with lots of traffic noise. This impacted the pool and hot tub area, esp. with sirens from emergency vehicles due to a hospital located directly across the street. If that doesn't bother you it is a clean and nice hotel with renovations being made to the rooms, although we stayed in one that was not yet renovated and it was fine except for the lack of towel racks in the bathroom. There is a complimentary shuttle to and from Disneyland all day long, which is why I booked the hotel, along with lower room tax than in Anaheim. The shuttle drivers were a hoot, very friendly with one actually playing Disney trivia with us. Otherwise, it seems primarily a business hotel. Overall, I would stay in the hotel again if other options are not
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to have had you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We are happy to hear that despite the traffic and noise from the nearby hospital that you enjoyed your stay with us. It is our pleasure to provide complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland! We are glad that you enjoyed your room and overall stay. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed here with a wedding party and family members that had flown in from all over the country. The service and accommodations were wonderful. Our room was comfortable and clean. Lounging areas off the lobby and around the pool were perfect! Beautiful fire pit outside. Starbucks coffee available in the lobby. Warm cookies presented at check in. Yum! Great choice !!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Nancy,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide excellent service to you and your family during such a joyous event. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your room and the areas within the hotel. Our warm cookies add a special touch to our guests' experience! Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This property is in a great location to walk to the Orange Outlet Mall where there are several restaurants to dine. Good access to freeways in all directions. if you are there during baseball season, Angels Stadium is walking distance. Rooms were clean and comfortable. They do charge for parking. Hotels charging for parking to me is a bit ridiculous but business is business. Bar was okay, for a drink or two but there are better options at the outlet mall. I did not eat breakfast or dinner so can't comment on the food options.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to have had you as our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent guest service and clean, comfortable rooms. We know that location and convenience is everything for our guests and we are glad to have been close to your prime destinations. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I stayed here for business but will definitely be returning for pleasure. The free shuttle to Disneyland runs on the hour and was a 5min short ride. All the staff there was friendly and helpful. The lobby was dramatic and beautiful and the room was nice and clean. I really enjoyed this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Megan,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide excellent guest service and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We are glad that you enjoyed our lobby design and your hotel room. thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed here while enjoying Disneyland. Peti was welcoming and very accommodating at check-in. Had a great room and was able to check-in early. Room was very clean and up-to-date. Shuttle provided to Disneyland was great. Both the driver in the morning and the driver at night were phenomenal! The oriental gentleman working he evening was fantastic. Full of pretty clever jokes and kept everyone entertained! He's a valuable asset to Hilton. I'd hire him in a heartbeat! Thank-you for the enjoyable, yet short, stay!
Manager Response: Dear Cory,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! Peti, our Front Desk Manager, is definitely awesome with welcoming guests to the Doubletree! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your room and your complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Ac in rooms was absolutely Aweful.  Breakfast was poor staff was mediocre. The hotel bar hours were extremely inconvienent. The hotel was clean. The location is ideal for shopping and not a long drive to Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your experience with us. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear about your experience directly. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you as our guest again in the future.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: A Good Place with a Central Location
Summary: Just a one night stay for business reasons. Hotel is impressive and well appointed. Friendly staff and comfortable, clean rooms. Breakfast is a full blown affair with menu items cooked to order or a full hot buffet. Check out was easy and seamless. All in all a good stay, my second time at the Doubletree Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear Neale,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear about your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to have you as our guest during your business travel. We are glad you enjoyed our friendly staff, comfortable rooms and breakfast at our Trofi restaurant. We are also happy to hear that your check out experience was a great one. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The reason for our visit was family emergency that had us being needed at the hospital next door. Was important that we were close by (walking  distance) from the hotel. Having bar there for afterwards to unwind was very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We are glad to know that you had a comfortable stay during your family emergency and that our lobby bar helped you to unwind. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I liked the rooms. The staff were very cool/very friendly and helpful. The bathrooms were very clean and nice. On the top floor there's only showers--no tubs. VERY comfortable bed. The breakfast buffet eggs came across as though they were powdered, but overall a good buffet (not as good as Hilton's, which I consider the high standard, but much better than most). Parking is a little odd--there's parking right in front of the door, but if it's full there's an "overflow" parking garage around the corner. I preferred the garage in general--the other lot is open air. It's kind of tricky because the entrance to the hotel faces the parking lot, not the street. There's only one way directly into the lobby and that's going eastbound on Chapman. But it's easy enough from other roads as
Manager Response: Dear Noel,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide friendly guest service, comfortable rooms and convenience. We are glad that despite the confusing entry into our hotel that you were able to easily access our location. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This a great location and in the middle of the area. Easy access, great amenities and great restaurants in just a short driving distance. I will definitely keep this hotel in my log for places to stay. Shopping is just a short distance away as well. Easy access to the freeway; parking is also reasonable and easy. Parking garage and outdoor parking in front of hotel. The view from room was also nice.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star Trip Advisor review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is important to us that our guests have an awesome experience during their stay, which includes convenience and great amenities. We are also happy to know you enjoyed your room view as well. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Loved the location and the service also the disney shuttle that was free! Awesome service to provide guest it really is something that alot of hotels don't provide. Parking a little pricey but still all well worth it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We know that convenience and location are key when it comes to our guests' needs. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and our guest service. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Service Team

Summary Heading: Perfect Place to stay away from Disneyland
Summary: Located within walking distance of shopping entertainment angel stadium and restaurants. Friendly Staff. Clean rooms. Paying to park was a little much when the parking lot was not big. Enjoy our weekend. Game, Wedding, and Graduation
Manager Response: Dear Vivian,  Thank you for your review and for staying at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County! We are very happy to hear that you found our location convenient to all the nearest attractions in Anaheim and Orange. We are also happy to know that you enjoyed our friendly staff and clean, comfortable rooms. We are sorry to hear that you were dissatisfied with our parking fees. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I have stayed at this Doubletree twice.  Once it was way too noisy and this time it was much better.  So this time, I gave it 4 stars and last time, I gave it 3.   Positives:  For a Doubletree, the room condition and overall look were nicer than I expected.   It's not ultra-high end, but it was solid. Negatives:  As noted, the noise factor varied significantly between my two stays.  There was no dinner service at the restaurant (just the bar), which might have been just for that night or might be the norm.  I found it odd. Here are some specific observations:   Location: near an outlet mall in Orange  Noise level:  as ridiculous as it sounds, the power flush of the toilets was noisy. I heard toilets from all over flushing. It was not terrible this time, but last time was really
Manager Response: Dear Krawimi,  Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you stayed with us again despite your dissatisfaction with your first visit. We apologize for any inconveniences you may have encountered during your recent stay with us and we hope that you had an enjoyable experience the second time around. Please feel free to contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 and let us know how we can make your next visit more enjoyable. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights, 13 Nov-16 Nov, 2015.  I arrived  2 hours early and the front disk's lovely staff let me check in and welcomed me with warm cookies!  The room was very nice and clean. It's a king sized bed and a business table. TV, coffee maker, safe, clean water, lots of complimentary soaps and lotions. Bed super comfortable and clean, room service is active, very nice designed decorated room. I was on the 16th floor and the view was very nice.  Location is great, close to many awesome places, Orange Outlets Shopping Center, Coffee Shops, Starbucks and Disney.  I had a wonderful time during my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to welcome our guests into a clean, comfortable room and to offer a great view on our 16th floor! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location, as it is in close proximity to the Outlets at Orange and Disney. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I stayed here with my fiancee for three nights in April 2016, so that we can go to Disneyland.  The hotel provides complimentary shuttle to Disneyland, the driver is very friendly and made the trip enjoyable.  We stayed at the top floor with a view of the fireworks at Disney, very nice room.  The room is very clean, king size bed very comfortable, and nice flat screen television.  The internet works very well.  This is the second time I stayed at this hotel within the last 6 months and so far it has met all of my expectations.  Definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your visit to Disneyland! We are happy to hear that this is your second visit to our hotel within the last 6 months as well! We love it when our guests receive the added perks of the view of the Disneyland fireworks from their hotel room. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your clean, comfortable room and the complimentary shuttle service to Disney. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great hotel, and a perfect central vacation location. You are only 20 - 30 minutes from John Wayne Airport, and about 30 - 40 minutes from Huntington Beach. Uber is available and widely used, as well as their friendly cab companies. The hotel staff was more than accommodating to help us navigate the new surroundings. There is also a "super nice" mall within 1 1/2 blocks (walking distance-out the front door - turn left), with many, many restaurants and really nice stores.
Manager Response: Dear Ronnie,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide excellent service to our guests by helping to navigate the surrounding areas. We are pleased to hear that you were able to easily access the nearby Outlets at Orange and that you found our location to be in close proximity to Huntington Beach and John Wayne airport. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another fantastic stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We checked-in online the day before, and selected a corner room that was available.  When we arrived (at the exact time we said we would), we dropped by the reception desk to pick up the keys.  Unbeknownst to us, the lady at the reception desk had assigned us a different room on a different floor, not the corner room we had thought we already selected.  Two days later, we called to checkout and requested a receipt be emailed to us.  The front desk said they would do that, but we never received the receipt.  Hotel room was fine, except for the AC fan, which was extremely loud.  But the front desk ladies dropped the ball on checkin and checkout.  Very disappointed with reception desk.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience with our Front Desk personnel. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear from you about your experience during your stay. Thank you for visiting and we hope to have you again as our guest soon.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anahiem Service Team

Summary Heading: EXTREMELY SATISFIED (except for the $15 parking fee)
Summary: Being born in Orange County. The "orange crush interchange" is in  my old stomping grounds.  Very clean hotel, This time I was on the "HHonors" floor. Great view, clean room. The only thing is, there are othere similarly priced hotel, with complimentary parking. The high rise offers great viwes, and creative room vents; flaps at the window base. I really like this hotel, but the $15 parking fee, feels like a 'resort charge" and alienates guests. Perhaps the owners/management want people to dislike them, for this. I feel its "chumpish". Thats my only 'big thing" that would make me choose elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear of your being inconvenienced by the parking fee. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your room and view from the HHonors floor. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,   DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The staff was awesome and the rooms look very stylish! That will be my hotel next time I'm visiting the OC! The location is great since it's close to Disneyland and the beach. The shuttle service is very convenient!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear that you thought our rooms were stylish, our staff awesome and our shuttle service convenient! We are glad to hear that you like our convenient location as well! Thank you for your stay and we look forward to seeing you soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: A beautiful place with wonderful people. I enjoyed my stay with my family. The service was awesome and the rooms were clean. The only think I misses I forgot to pick up my voucher for breakfast and I had to pay for it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your visit to the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed our service and our clean, comfortable rooms. It is important for our guests to feel at home while away from home. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another nice stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: needed nice accomodation within reach Lucky strike bowling and family in area, great service.not expensive,welcoming,nice bed,great sleep,late check out.plus they have Hilton Honors floor just for us,hubby and i used internet,restaurant,work out room and lobby
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your family get together! It is always awesome to know our guest find our property in close proximity to their favorite locations, such as Lucky Strike. It is always a plus to become a Hilton Honors member so you can reap awesome benefits during your stay! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Needed hotel close to UCI for medical appt. Doubletree is literally across the street which very convenient, but overall expensive for extended stay. Although the room rate was reasonable, $129/night,  parking was $15/night extra. Breakfast is not included, and the restaurant in the hotel was expensive as was room service.   Although the sleeping area was clean, the bathroom was not and we had to clean the tub before using.    We are looking for hotel near UCI as we need to be close by for 2 weeks following surgery before flying home to Chicago. Doubletree is not a consideration.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your stay with us did not meet your expectations and that the bathroom in your room was not kept to our cleanliness standards. Please feel free to contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 to let us know how we can learn better about your experience with us. We thank you for your stay and we hope to have you as our guest again in the future.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed April 27th-May 7th as a family of 4 to do Theme Parks. Very clean hotel and very friendly staff. Laundry is by the pool so it's nice to make a couple of hours of it while I do laundry and sit in the hot tub and the family swims. Beds are double so kind of small but comfortable. There's a Starbucks inside so that's a nice touch! Got free wifi but paid for parking which was fine with us. Has a safe in the room you do not pay for and easy to use  with your own password. Had a great view of the Disneyland fireworks on the 9th floor above the front entrance, doesn't matter what floor really so long as you're at least about 5 and up I would say to see them. Sirens are a little bit annoying as there is a hospital right beside the hotel. The cookies were definitely the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for you 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear you stayed with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your family theme park visits! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the pool while doing laundry and that you enjoyed all the other amenities featured at our hotel. We are also happy to hear that your room featured a view of the Disneyland fireworks as well. Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great place to stay while visiting the university. Quite a bit of amenity in surrounding, including shopping and dinning. Close to Irvine, and Newport. Downtown Orange a must visit. Lots of good restaurant and antique shops in Orange to visit. Chapman new art center and the university a great place to visit.
Manager Response: Dear Mike,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is a benefit to our guests that our location is in close proximity to the Outlets at Orange, Irvine, Newport and Downtown Orange. We are very glad you chose to stay with us during your visit to Chapman University. Thank you for your visit and we hope to see you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: If you're traveling for Disney this is a great option because this hotel offers a complementary shuttle to and from the park on a daily basis this is especially appreciated as this is an exclusive ride which does not stop at any other hotel. This hotel is clean, spacious and professionally run. The beds are extremely comfortable. Overall a very pleasant stay. It would be perfect if the hotel offered can rides to the Von's (Safeway) about 2 miles or so away. And they should really have mini refrigerators standard in every room. This hotel is a very good choice I will be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star Trip Advisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! Providing complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland is one of our favorite guest features. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed our beds and that our location is in close proximity to your favorite shops. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great Disney getaway!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I was at this DoubleTree for a business conference and had ordered room service for dinner but didn't see an option for a glass of wine on the menu.  When my order arrived the server asked about my day and I mentioned how nice it would be to have a glass of wine.  He returned a few minutes later with the wine and said "it's on the house, enjoy your evening."  Truly made my day!
Manager Response: Dear Margaret,  Thank you for your 5-star review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is awesome to hear that you were provided a complimentary glass of wine after a day of conferences! We are very glad you were able to unwind with an unexpected surprise! We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another outstanding stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Traveled to Anaheim on business and stayed at the DoubleTree. The hotel is beautiful, the staff was incredibly helpful and friendly and the lobby bar was a nice place to relax in the evening.  I believe the hotel was full or very close to full while I was there but it didn't feel that way. There was plenty of space both inside and outside to unwind after a long day of work.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is always a pleasure to provide excellent guest service and to make our guests feel at home. We are glad you were able to relax and unwind with us after a long day at work. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: friendly staff, spacious room, reasonable breakfast
Summary: friendly staff, spacious room, reasonable breakfast, nothing extraordinary but decent.  We were attending a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center and chose this hotel because we got a smoking deal but it also had great ratings.  We chose to get our "steps" and walked to the CC - took about 50 mins.  We were here 4 nights and one night walked over to the shopping center (5 mins) for dinner and movie, very convenient.  Another night ate in old town Orange (5 mins by car) lots of great eateries there.
Manager Response: Dear Lydia,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy you were our guest at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad you looked us up and took advantage of our friendly staff, spacious room and reasonable breakfast. We are happy you enjoyed our location and found it easily accessible to your favorite attractions. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The staff was very nice and the hotel was pleasant and clean. I wasn't a fan of the pillows (they hurt my neck) but that wasn't a deal breaker for my stay. I have stayed here before and I will be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Ryan,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear our pillows did not provide you with the best in comfort. We are glad that you enjoyed our friendly staff and found our location pleasant and clean. Thank you for your stay and we look forward to having you again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Beautiful hotel in a great location! And the front desk agent who checked me in, Angel, was very friendly. Everyone I encountered was always courteous, making my whole stay a pleasure. I'll be back when i'm in town!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star Trip Advisor review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to our hotel. It is our pleasure to provide exceptional guest service just as Angel has done. We are also glad to hear that you enjoy our location and look of our property. Thank you for visiting us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: My son was getting married on a Saturday  at 3 o'clock when I called to make our reservations I was told they could not give me early check-in on that day so we had to pay for  Friday in order to be able to make my son's wedding   I don't understand why they don't make exceptions.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review. We are sorry to hear that you were not able to check in early for your room. Due to room sell outs, early check ins may not be available. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear about your experience. We thank you for staying with us during your son's wedding and we hope to have you as our guest again soon.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Nice & relaxing stay with FREE shuttle to Disneyland
Summary: Location is great away from the Disney traffic. The outlet is near and restaurants are just down the street. You cannot beat the FREE Disney shuttle and it is well worth it. The hotel is in excellent condition, the mattress and the pillows are extremely comfy. The tv channels are watchable, lol.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! Location is everything and we are happy to know that you had easy access to the Outlets at Orange. It is good to be away from the hubbub of Disneyland traffic and to ride there for free on our complimentary shuttle vehicles! We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed your comfy bed and pillows and the tv channels provided in your room. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another relaxing stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This hotel is in a great location. The reason I picked this particular hotel was because of its location to Disneyland. I enjoyed this hotel it was very clean and the staff is friendly. I like that they had a complimentary shuttle to Disneyland. The downside is the shuttle schedule. I was not able to see the fireworks because the last shuttle was at 9:15pm and the fireworks started at 9:00pm. There should be an additional shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear Rachael,  Thank you for your 5-star Trip Advisor review! We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear that our complimentary shuttle service times to Disneyland was not to your liking. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our location, cleanliness and friendly staff. Thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Hotel was perfect - just as advertised. Staff was courteous, helpful and very pleasant. We just stayed overnight and had an appointment at UC Medical Center next day - hotel allowed a late checkout because of delayed appointment.
Manager Response: Dear Joe,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to make your stay with comfortable and to provide you with the best in guest service. We are also happy to hear that you were accommodated with a late checkout due to your delayed appointment. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Very nice staff and clean hotel!
Summary: When we arrived we had driven for about 7hrs we wanted to check in even though we were early, the room was not available so we went to the outlets across the street which was great because we found great deals and a place for our kids to have a little fun. There are tons of great restaurants near. We then came back to the hotel and the receptionist was very nice and rushed our room so we could check in asap which I appreciated. The room was big with a microwave and mini fridge which I asked later and they had upgraded the room at no cost! Thank you for that. The whole staff was nice and friendly. The pool was clean and nice pool area.  The free shuttle to Disneyland was awesome, the only downside we found was that the earliest afternoon shuttle was until 2pm which was a little
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star Trip Advisor review! We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your experience with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear that your room was upgraded and that you enjoyed the pool area and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We are also pleased to know that you enjoyed your room and the view of the helicopter landing. We know location and convenience is everything and we are glad you were able to easily access the Outlets at Orange and the nearby restaurants. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to you seeing us again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: One of the best Doubletree Properties
Summary: My wife and 9 year old son drove from Sacramento to Anaheim for a 2 day seminar. So needless to say they needed somewhere safe and clean with some amenities. Upon arriving after midnight my was quickly and kindly checked in with great customer service. She was given the room upgrade along with breakfast vouchers for the next 2 mornings. ( It is a good idea to enroll in Hilton Honors program to receive upgrades)  They both got good sleep each night because of high quality bedding and were treated with excellent customer service!!  Breakfast buffet was high quality including smoothies and many made to order items. Swimming pool was clean and clutter free.  Yes you do have to pay for parking, but you do at all of the other properties we have stayed at in the area. (Some I might add
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad your family chose the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your seminar! We are happy to know that you were checked in quickly, given great customer service and a room upgrade with breakfast! It is definitely good to be a HHonors member! We are also glad you enjoyed the on-property amenities and convenient location. Thank you for choosing us during your trip and we look forward to having you back again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,   Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: About the best value in a hotel I have experienced.   My wife and I spent a week here and although I dislike being away from home, the staff were outstanding, the other guests were conversational and I wore a smile constantly. My sincere thanks to you.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we are happy to be your home away from home! We are glad to know that you enjoyed our staff and that you had a pleasurable time during your stay! Our sincerest thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Lovely hotel within walking distance to the ball park and outlet stores.  Great staff.  Very helpful people work here.  Check in was quick and easy.  Would stay here again.  The warm cookies were a hit with my husband.
Manager Response: Dear Diane,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location near the Outlets at Orange and our friendly staff. Our cookies are very good, but very addicting! We are glad to know that you had a quick and easy check in as well. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The hotel is not only beautiful, but the staff are very friendly and helpful.  Our breakfast was wonderful.  This hotel is so close to Disneyland and they have a shuttle to take you there and back.  Will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Loren,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are very happy to hear our staff was helpful and friendly, and that you enjoyed our breakfast and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The staff at the hotel made you feel very welcomed.  They were ready to direct you to check it.  I had an overall great time.  The staff was so helpful by giving you guides and recommending things to do while in  California.  I thought that was great being that it was the first time I was there.  They also kept asking if there was anything else they could do to make my stay better.  I didn't need anything else, except maybe another cookie. :)
Manager Response: Dear Claudia,   Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are very pleased that our staff made you feel right at home, and gave you recommendations and pointers on things to do in California! We are also happy to hear that you had a great time with us during your first visit to the Golden State. Thank you for your visit and we hope you will come back and stay with us soon for another great experience!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The location is ok, not far away from the conventional center and Disneyland, takes about $5-6 of Uber or Lyft to go to these two places. In addition, the shuttle is very helpful in transporting travelers to Disney. The free breakfast for HHonor members is very good as well. In addition, HHonor member has several separated floors dedicated to serve hilton members.
Manager Response: Dear Shuang,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to know that you enjoyed our location and our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. It is always great to give special perks to our HHonors Members so we are glad that you took advantage of them. Thank you for staying with us during your conference and we look forward to having you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Love this hotel, just don't like the parking
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel many times as it is close to the college my daughter attends. It has easy access to John Wayne Airport and is close enough to Disney, with a free shuttle, for those wanting to see Mickey Mouse and friends. The staff are welcoming, friendly and helpful. The hotel has been updated per advertisements, but it didn't look that different to me from last time I was there. Only thing that bugs me is that the hotel charges $15 per night to self park. I know it's in California, but the nickel and dime-ing irritates me. Between taxes and visitor charges the quoted price for the room is never close to the initial estimate.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you love the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry that you were not happy with the daily parking rate. We are happy that you enjoyed our staff, location and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Excellent location, good parking, close to everything. Having Starbucks in the lobby & the excellent desk & restaurant staff makes this hotel a wonderful experience! Even the gift shop was reasonable & had some sale items that I purchased. Didn't have time to go to Disneyland, but would definitely stay here in the future. You can see the Anaheim Angel's fireworks from your room!
Manager Response: Dear Vivian,  Thank you for your 5 star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry that you didn't get to make it to Disneyland, but we hope on your next visit to our hotel that you will take advantage of the complimentary shuttle service to the park! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location, hotel shops, guest service and the fireworks view from your room. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed one night on our way up the 405 and was convenient to freeway.  Self parking was hard to find but once directed by valet was no problem. Efficient check in was done online and even got to pick room.  Front desk gave us fresh cookies but forgot free breakfast vouchers that I got next morning.  Room was clean and comfy.  Only issue I had was a little noise which was surprising considering I faced interior access road and would probably be less on higher floors.  Breakfast was excellent compared to other buffets.  Fresh eggs, tasty bacon and sausage and nice oatmeal.  Checkout was easy and efficient.  Would stay here again but ask for a higher room on other side of hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Dave,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Dooubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! Comfort and convenience for our guests is our goal to provide and we are glad to know that you chose us during your quick overnight stop. We are sorry to hear that you experienced some noise during your stay. We are glad to know that your check in and check out was easy and efficient. We thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We had a leak in our shower and had to find a place to stay. It was last minute & our funds were limited. Unfortunately the Doubleteee only had availability for one week & we needed to be out of our home for two weeks. This hotel had everything we needed, breakfast, close to our work places, gym. I am currently staying ar another hotel for the 2nd week of our repair; it is horrible. I wish I was back ar the Doubletree.
Manager Response: Dear Tami,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very glad, despite the circumstances, that you chose to stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear that we could only offer you one week of availability. We are glad that you had everything you needed during your stay. We wish you were back with us too! Thank you for staying with us during your time of need and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team
