Summary: Last minute business trip and still received great deal and great hospitality. Have to pay to park which is unfortunate. The fire outside the bar was warm and mesmerizing, the marquerita not so good! Beautiful view of city lights.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you came to stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County at the last minute! We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy our margaritas but we are glad that you enjoyed the fire pit in our patio area. We are glad that you enjoyed the view of the city lights and our hospitality. Thank you for visiting us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County

Summary: Great customer service . Love welcome cookies. Location is perfect to Disneyland an shopping and restaurant. Safe location. Close to major freeways . Personnel was friendly and helpful with directions and answering questions.
Manager Response: Dear Irma,  Thank your review. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to welcome our guests with a warm, delicious cookie and to offer a clean, comfortable room. We are glad that you enjoyed our location and felt safe with us! We are also glad that our hotel staff were friendly and accommodating. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I'm checking out of the Doubletree Anaheim in Orange today follow a one-week stay. I would stay longer, but they're sold out for the coming week so I need to go elsewhere.  This is my second time staying at this hotel.   The room seems to have been nicely renovated since my last stay, although it seems the beds shrunk down to a double from a queen; not terrible, but still very comfy. Thankfully the windows open because it was very stuffy and the a/c didn't seem to work, rather blew stale air around; no cooling affect. Great water pressure in the shower and good sized room; didn't feel like a caged animal. I was on the 10th floor with awesome NW views of Angel Stadium and mountains. Suitable storage for clothes and luggage.  Not sure what size the TV is, but it worked and had
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are very sorry to hear that the a/c unit was not fully functioning in your room. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your in-room amenities and our friendly, accommodating staff. Being a Hilton Honors member does give you great perks such as free breakfast, and we are glad that you took advantage of that and the complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We thank you for choosing us and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Went to the March Madness Tourney with Texas A&M and had a great stay with my wife.  Concert on Friday night outside our room was late and loud.  Thumping windows late into the night but everything else was great.
Manager Response: Dear Charles,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry to hear that the concert featured at our hotel created a disturbance for you. We are glad to know that you had a great stay with us during March Madness. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We had a great time at the Anaheim Double Tree in Orange County.  The staff was amazing and helpful.  The hotel was immaculate.  The dining area was great with an amazing breakfast buffet that was changed up daily.  We had an awesome time, and would love to stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you had an excellent experience at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet, staff and immaculate hotel. We thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We had agreat room on the 19th floor.  We stayed here during our visit to see to Sweet 16 games over at the Honda Center.  Staff was really great and the room very clean.  Check in was fast and the cookies are always great.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is very exciting to have guests stay with us during national sporting events, such as the Sweet 16 games at the nearby Honda Center. We are glad you enjoyed the cookies and that the check in was fast. We are also pleased to hear that you enjoyed your clean room and our friendly staff. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Would definitely come back here next trip to Disney. Convenient location near Disney, shopping, restaurants. Free shuttle to Disney parks( just give tips to drivers if you are able). Very clean rooms!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star Trip Advisor review! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We hold ourselves to the highest standards in cleanliness, comfort and fun. We are glad you found our location convenient to Disney, shopping and restaurants, and we are glad that you left the driving to Disney to us! Thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We had a great rate on a room at this hotel, and it met my three must-haves for any hotel: (1) CLEAN, (2) comfy bed & good linens, and (3) good water pressure in the shower. In addition, the staff was helpful and friendly and the on-site restaurant was okay. Although they recommended we not do it, we walked from the hotel to Honda Center for the NCAA b-ball tournament. Very easy and doable walk, and we got a Lyft car back. Also easy, short walk to the Outlets where there are a couple of restaurants.  This hotel is a good value and conveniently located. Would definitely stay there again.  One pet peeve: in order to use the free wifi, you have to give up lots of privacy rights. No, thanks.
Manager Response: Dear Grace,  Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We know location and convenience are vital to having a great experience while on travel and we are glad to hear that you were able to easily access the nearby Honda Center and Outlets at Orange. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Tried to get early checkin but turned away to return four hours later.  During check in, person next to me was offered free parking.  I asked for the same and was told I don't rank enough to get free parking.  Room service menu is very minimal on selections.  No simple breakfast is offered and prices are extremely expensive.  30 dollars for a basic breakfast is far beyond my companies allowance.  I will not use room service again.  One simple cocktail, after returning from a very busy day at work, cost 15 dollars.  I should have stopped at the liquor store before returning to the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Steven,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your room was not ready upon check in and that you were not satisfied with our room service selections and prices. Please give our CARE Line a call at 714-634-4500 so we can know in full detail about your experience with us. We thank you for staying with us during your business trip and we hope to have you as our guest again soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Nothing fancy but very comfortable and clean
Summary: We attended the NCAA Basketball regionals at Honda Center. This hotel was convenient to the freeway and to the venue. Friendly people, clean and comfortable rooms. Nothing over the top but a very solid place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree Anaheim-Orange County during your visit to the NCAA regionals! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location being close to the freeway and venue. We pride ourselves in having a friendly staff and providing our guests with clean, comfortable rooms. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Feeling great! Such an amazing staff, beautiful room, spacious bath, and extremely comfortable beds. Chilling with no makeup on, no worries, and completely blessed. What a joy to stay on our family vacation. The entire Front desk staff is by far amazing, friendly, efficient, and welcoming. They went above our needs and definitely full filled our wants with COOKIES. Extremely thankful they provided my family with toothbrushes and toothpaste. The runner who delivered was quick, and brought more than asked. The valet Jay was extremely helpful, & went far beyond making us feel welcome. The beds! Oh the beds! Super comfy. We stayed in a double bed room. Loved the soft yet firm bed. We chose to stay in an access room as we enjoy the spacious tub. Oh, GUESS WHAT?! They have a
Manager Response: Dear Amanda,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is a pleasure to provide our guests with the best in comfort and cleanliness. We are pleased to hear that our staff went above and beyond your expectations and that you enjoyed the top-notch service from Jay! We are also happy to know that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We thank you for staying with us and we cannot wait to have you as our guest again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We had reservation for two rooms for two nights. One of our rooms were not ready upon check in and was asked to come back one hour later. As we walked inside the room, it was still not ready so we had to wait another 30 minutes or so. The carpet was wet. The foam pillows that we had requested were never delivered. On a positive note there was Free Great shuttle service to and from Disneyland and fresh baked cookies and bottled water upon check in.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that one of your reserved rooms was not ready upon check in. We are also sorry to hear that your requested foam pillows was never delivered. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 to let us know about your full experience during your visit. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon in the near future.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The Double Tree accommodated us greatly during our stay. We stayed at the hotel two nights Friday and Saturday and checked out Sunday. We Visited the Disney parks Saturday & Sunday, and the hotel was very accommodating to us. Being located close to the parks and running shuttles late into the night to be able to pick us up after fun field adventure.
Manager Response: Dear Giuseppe,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your trip to Disneyland! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and that our staff greatly accommodated you. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Needs to provide stronger internet connection
Summary: This hotel is really nice with the exception of the weak and unreliable internet connection.  If you are on business travel and must use the internet you may want to consider a different place.  If you do not need the internet connection this is a wonderful hotel.  The staff is friendly, restaurants and shopping nearby, freeway access easy.
Manager Response: Dear Steven,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you encountered a weak internet connection during your stay with us. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear about your experience and ensure that our guests do not encounter this problem again. We are glad that you enjoyed our guest service and that our location served as convenient to nearby shopping, restaurants and freeway access. We thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: My mom and I have a mother- daughter tradition of taking a trip to Disneyland together every year. This year we decided to stay at the Doubletree in Anaheim and we couldn't have been happier with our stay! The staff was so courteous and friendly, I mean every single staff person I encountered was exceptional! This is our hotel moving forward for our yearly trip! I wish I had discovered them sooner! The room was very clean, the bed and pillows were excellent! The food at Trofi was delicous! A+++++++
Manager Response: Dear Dinora,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you and your daughter enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! Thank you for making us part of your mother-daughter tradition this year! We are very pleased to hear that our staff made your Disneyland trip extra special and that you enjoyed your room and Trofi. We are excited that you will make us your hotel choice for future Disneyland trips! Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you again soon for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Amazing check in service with fresh cookies and cold bottles of water if you are a Hilton Honors member. Always welcomed back with a smile and they have even come to remember my name which makes me feel like I'm staying with friends instead of a hotel. The food is excellent, and the guest services can't be beat! I will continue to stay here every time I'm in LA.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star Trip Advisor review! We are glad you came back to visit the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We know that making our guests feel at home is important, and we are glad to know that we have made a personal connection with you! We are glad to know that you enjoyed our guest services and our food. We thank you for your visit and we can't wait to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Away from the craziness of hotels surrounding Disneyland but has a free shuttle.  The restaurant Trofi is inside with decent pricing and good food.  There's a small cafe with Starbucks coffee across the restaurant and there's a cute gift shop for the kids.  Stayed in their suite and it was perfect for families.  Separate bedroom w/ TV, sofa bed in the living room and a mini kitchen.  Outdoor pool is really cute and the hotel itself is inviting, and clean.  Parking is not free and they're doing a ton of construction but still love this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your trip to Disneyland! Convenience and luxury are necessary when traveling with families, and we are glad to know that our Trofi restaurant and Coffi shop suited your needs. We know comfort and value are important to our guests and we aim to please by providing clean, comfy rooms and outdoor amenities. We thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: So we had a large group and had everything set up.  But upon arrival by our guests they were supposed to receive a welcome packet and breakfast vouchers. Neither the above happened and there wasn't a ton of help.  Also the rooms are fine but you can hear everything from the neighboring rooms which is really annoying. Would I stay again?  Maybe but there are other Hilton options around.
Manager Response: Dear Sjwiden,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you did not receive a welcome packet or breakfast vouchers upon your arrival to our hotel. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can hear your concerns. We are also sorry to know that you encountered a noise conflict. Our guests are our top priority and we want to ensure that we go above and beyond expectations with every visit. We thank you for staying with us and we hope you will give us another visit in the near future.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We recently stayed at the Doubletree during a visit to Disneyland. The room itself was comfortable and clean. I was a little surprised that it was missing towel racks, robes, extra pillows/blankets, which I assumed was a standard hotel thing.  We were very disappointed by the food and drink, however. We ran into an issue with nuts being pancakes without being listed in the menu (luckily, we just weren't nut fans, and there wasn't an allergy emergency). We tried late night foods, a few drinks at the bar. Everything was just poor, so eating and drinking offsite is recommended.   Otherwise, with a free Disneyland shuttle, heated outdoor pool, and great customer service (all of the staff we encountered were friendly), it's a solid choice.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your selections at our restaurant and our bar and that your room was not fully stocked with the aforementioned items. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can fully hear about your experience. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and great customer service. We thank you for your visit and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I only stay at this hotel when I visit Orange County. From check in to check out, everyone is very accommodating and friendly. They have a Starbucks within the hotel which is a plus for me and the cookies are always delicious too.
Manager Response: Dear April,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are very happy to hear that you are a returning guest during your trips to Orange County! At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we know how important it is to provide excellent guest service and to welcome every guest with a warm, delicious cookie. We thank you for loving our hotel and we look forward to having you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed here to work, then play at Disneyland.  Location is awesome since you have access to a shopping area close by and who doesn't love Krispy Kreme which is blocks away!  Not too far from Disney; I think its surface streets to the happiest place on Earth!  Breakfast was totally awesome--they even have rice!  Thank you Doubletree for a great stay.  The only downside I can think of is the parking--I forgot my card key to swipe out the lot and even the attendant who was outside couldn't do that :( even with verifying who i was on the intercom...sad face.  That cost me an extra 5 minutes to go back to my room via elevator....my fault tho.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad that you enjoyed our location being in close proximity to Disneyland and to Krispy Kreme! We are sorry to hear about your inconvenience at the parking lot. We are glad you had an enjoyable time with us during your trip to Disneyland. Thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Did not expect such a nice hotel at that price
Summary: We did not expect to like this hotel this much.  We were just looking for a hotel close to the movie theater as we were attending the 24-hour movie marathon and getting away from the Chicago winter for a few days.  And while we were there, might as well go to Disneyland for day. Everyone in our party was very impressed by the hotel especially given the price.  Since we were not paying very much for the hotel, we were just expecting an “it will do” type hotel.  This was perhaps the best Doubletree Hotel I have stayed at and would give it 4 stars out of 5 at a 2.5 star price.   CHECK-IN Front desk service was great. This was really quick and simple although it would have been better to get room keys even if the room was not ready. Staff was friendly and efficient.  I assume we
Manager Response: Dear JamieUSA,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We know that it is important for our guests to get the best experience and value, and that convenience is a plus. Despite the nearby construction, we are glad hat you enjoyed the nearby Outlets at Orange and our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed our in-room amenities and guest service. Thank you for staying with us and we hope that you choose us as your hotel in the near future the next time you want to escape from the Windy City!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great place to unwind and spend some time with your family. Highly recommended. We've stayed there 3-4 times and will continue to use this hotel when we stay in Anaheim. This hotel offers a free shuttle to Disneyland and my wife and I agree that it's the real reason we stay at this specific hotel time after time.
Manager Response: Dear Francisco,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor Review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is always a great thing to hear that our guests love to return to our location again and again. Our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland serves as convenient for our guests. We know how important it is to come to a place to unwind with loved ones and we are happy to hear that you chose us as your place to relax. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have see you again soon for another awesome stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: we stayed with family in 3 different rooms, and we really enjoyed our stay. The food was fantastic (and we are picky!), and we all enjoyed hanging out in the lounge, lobby and outdoor area after a long day at Disneyland!!   We had thought we were going to be staying at the Doubletree closer to Disneyland, so we were disappointed about that. However, the shuttle went fine, and the staff was extremely friendly, helpful, and welcoming.
Manager Response: Dear Connie,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are sorry that you were disappointed that our location was not closer to Disneyland, but we are happy to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary shuttle service to the theme park. It is our priority for our guests to receive the best in guest service and to ensure that each stay is exceptional. We are happy that you enjoyed your time in the lounge, lobby and outdoor area! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I recently stayed here for two nights on a business trip.  The room was clean and comfortable.  There was a desk and large flat panel TV in the room.  The shower had great water pressure.  I did not eat at the hotel restaurant as there were several restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. I would stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Dear gameluver,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our priority to make sure that each of our guests are welcomed with a clean, comfortable room and other comforts of home. We are also glad that our location served as convenient for you to easily access nearby restaurants. We want to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Disney Trip with family great place to stay.
Summary: Checked in 2-19-16 checked out 2-21-16. Took family to Disneyland for the weekend. Hotel property is clean and appealing. Nice small pool outside with a jaquizzi. The pool and the pool area was clean and kept nice. There is several tables outside the bar and lounge area for outdoor sitting. The hotel is a non-smoking hotel in the rooms but there is a smoking area outside to smoke. We stayed in a room with 2 double beds, microwave, 2 cup coffee maker and fridge. The room was clean and neat. Everything was as it should be clean, neat and ready for guests. The hotel has a nice restaurant onsite as well as a coffee house that serves Starbucks coffee. There is a gift shop as well that seemed to have a large variety or souvenir items.  The staff onsite made a point to greet you
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor Review! We are happy to hear that you had a great stay with us during your visit to Disneyland! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we know that location is everything, especially when it comes to family vacations. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our on-property amenities and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We hope that the nearby noise from the hospital was not too much of a disruption. We thank you for visiting us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The team at Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim are very professional and helpful.  They are solution oriented. The room was clean and I enjoyed my stay. I liked that the errors that occurred with my booking were not a deterrent, but the staff identified solutions that made my stay away from home a pleasant one.
Manager Response: Dear Alaphiah,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We know that sometimes errors are encountered and we do our best to solve them in a timely manner, in the best way possible. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our guest service and that your stay away from home was a pleasant one. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Very nice hotel, but staff not so nice.  Additional deposits are exorbitant.  The parking is ridiculous & even if you pay for it, we were blocked out the whole weekend due to a function they were having.   And $3.25 for a bottle of water is insane
Manager Response: Hi Ryan,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear that your stay with us was not up to your standards. We are also very sorry to hear that you were heavily inconvenienced with the issues that you were faced with during your stay. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 to let us know exactly how your experience was with us. We thank you for your stay and we hope we can have you as our guest again.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I came to this location to celebrate my birthday. All i can say is that the front dest made my stay so great Melanie help me out with a great room an amazing view.At check in time this wonderfull lady gave me all the informartion i needed. Great location within walking distance to Dave & Buster where i was  going and other locations as well. I just want to say thank you for the great staff the this hotel has specially Melanie, Mayra S, Mark G, Cathy and Julio that made my Birthday so special :-)
Manager Response: Dear Claudia,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are very happy that you chose to stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County for your birthday! We are very glad to know that Melanie, Mayra, Mark, Cathy and Julio helped to make your birthday special! It's always great to receive a room with an amazing view! We strive to make sure that our guests have a memorable experience with us. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I have just returned from a weeks stay in  room 1514 - third year in a row I have stayed at this hotel - Hotel rooms are spacious, clean and modern. Lovely pool area, bar area is off the lobby with excellent service for drinks and food. Across the road is the outlet mall with many many shops, restaurants, cinemas, vans skating - Great hotel for everyone's needs. Free shuttle to Disneyland from there you can take the shuttle to Knotts Berry Farm and the South Coast Plaza shopping mall (25 minute trip pending traffic) What makes this Doubletree Hotel far superior than the others is the fantastic service you receive from reception, Naira -wonderful - is the perfect person to have in this role -apart from her professionalism, her friendly warm manner and smile, combined with her
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County and are looking to stay with us next May! We know that location and convenience is everything, and having shopping, restaurants and entertainment in close proximity to our property makes all the difference. We have a lot of guests that enjoy our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland, in addition to our guest service and spacious, clean rooms. We are happy to hear that Naira and Peddi were very accommodating and made you feel welcome. We thank you for your stay with us and we look forward having you as our guest again next May!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel if you're planning to visit Disneyland. The room was comfy and clean but the selling point for us was the free shuttle service to/from hotel to Disneyland. It's about a 5 minute shuttle ride. The staff was helpful and best of all, the cookie upon check-in. OK enough said ;)
Manager Response: Dear Jaymers,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your trip to Disneyland! We are happy to know that your room was comfy and clean and that you particularly enjoyed the complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. It is important for our guests to receive the best in customer service and to top it off with a delicious cookie! We thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: While staying at the Double Tree my first experience of the location wasn't too bad. There was construction, but I understand that the hotel is growing. I was upset at the fact that after reserving my room I did not see or wasn't aware that the parking has to be paid daily. I feel like that should have been included with the hotel fee. Parking was an extra $30 added to my bill, not to mention because I wasn't aware of how to get out of the lot without paying I was also subjected to paying an extra amount. The beds were uncomfortable, it wasn't exactly one of my best stays in a Double Tree establishment.
Manager Response: Dear Alicia,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you did not have a great stay with us during your visit, and we are also sorry to hear about the issues with the parking charges. Please contact our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 to let us know about your entire experience with us. We thank you for your stay with us and hope we can make your next visit with us better than your recent stay.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Hotel is well located for most of northern Orange County and convenient to nearby freeways.  I am usually here each year about February which works well for me.  Rooms are nice, elevators fast, dining room and bar areas are pleasant.  Parking is better with the recently completed parking garage.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for your review. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you've been our guest each February! At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we enjoy having our guests return again and again. We are happy to hear that you enjoy our nice rooms, fast elevators, restaurant and bar areas. We are definitely excited to offer our guests additional parking as well. We thank you for returning to us and we hope to have you as our guest again for another pleasant stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This facility is outstanding in every way - physical plant is exceptionally well-maintained;  staff are clearly well-trained to make guests feel valued and appreciated.  I suppose there is one really dumb thing, not necessarily the fault of management - the street address - dosnt exist !   Coming off the freeway you durn well better make a right turn onto CHAPMAN Blvd, from which you can turn left on a side-street and then left again into the hotel's property.  The street address of "THE CITY DRIVE" does not provide for guest access into the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad that you enjoyed your visit with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad that you were able to still find our location despite not being able to locate our street address. We will be sure to keep this in mind for all of our guests. We are glad that you enjoyed our friendly staff and location. We thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again for another outstanding stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Good for family stays near Disney
Summary: I always like Doubletree, and we booked this hotel as part of an air-hotel package.  It was about a 15-minute shuttle ride to Disney.  There was a mix of families and business people staying there.  The rooms were spotless, the breakfast buffet wonderful, the staff were always polite and helpful.  The beds were extremely comfortable.  I highly recommended this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Deborah,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are happy you and your family enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County during your trip to Disneyland! We aim to make sure that our guests receive the best in customer service, cleanliness and comfort. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I attended a conference here and stayed for a week.  I enjoyed the food, the staff and my room was clean and comfortable.  I would stay here again. Close to additional shopping and dining options too.  The restaurant served a good buffet breakfast with healthy options and the dinner was excellent.  The lounge area is comfortable and the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Athena,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor Review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us during your conference here at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We know our location serves as convenient for our guests with the Outlets at Orange within walking distance and our on-property amenities. We are glad that you enjoyed our restaurant and friendly staff. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This was a combination business and pleasure trip for us.  The location is great and the staff is very helpful.  The shuttle to Disney is great and helped make our day very pleasant.  The rooms are comfortable.  Breakfast is very good in the restaurant.  This is the third time we have stayed here and will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Debrah,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you had a pleasant experience with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are very glad to know that we were a part of your business and pleasure trip! It's our pleasure to provide great guest service and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stay here any time we come to Anaheim, because of the location, the comfortable rooms and the fact that we get a warm cookie when we check in. But mostly it's because of the people--from the moment we check in to when we leave. We come to play at the nearby Disney parks, but it is because of this hotel we have a great time! This time was particularly wonderful and I can't thank them enough.
Manager Response: Dear Joanne,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to know that you have frequented the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is always great to hear that our guests love their stay with us, and we are definitely glad you always have a great experience with us whenever you visit. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your comfortable room, our warm cookies and our team! We can't thank you enough for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This is an excellent hotel....value, price and service.   The continental breakfast is great value.   The conference room was immaculate, well-lighted and clean.   Food was very good.  My room was very clean and quiet.   The staff was friendly and helpful.   I even got extra cookies !
Manager Response: Dear Terence,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are excited to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide great guest service, value and great food. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our conference room and your room accommodations. Extra cookies are always a plus! We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest soon for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Meets minimum Doubletree expectations but not impressive
Summary: This hotel met basic expectations, such as a relatively clean room, comfortable bed, basic furnishings, etc. However, it left me disappointed on multiple levels beginning with errors in the reservation. Check in staff did their job but without any enthusiasm or sense of welcome. My bathtub had some sort of gritty dirt in it and I found a used coffee filter in the in-room coffee pot (yuck). Hotel may respond that there is the "care line" for needs, but at 6:00 a.m., I was not going to call to have my shower cleaned and the filter removed from the pot. Neither was a major deal but both made me wonder what else had not been cleaned in the room.  They charge for parking, which I expect in downtown locations but would not expect here. Breakfast is pricey so unless you're on an
Manager Response: Dear TeacherProf,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear that you were not completely satisfied with your stay. Please reach out to us at 714-634-4500 so we can learn more about your experience. We would like to thank you for your stay and we hope to hear from you soon.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: No hot water.  No response from staff.  Poor internet connectivity.  The hotel was cold and drafty.  We arrived and told staff that we had no hot water.  The front desk indicated they would call us back.  No response.  In the morning we still had no hot water.  After calling twice an engineer was sent up to confirm we had no hot water.  The engineer left telling us he would return but he did not.  We were attending a conference on the first floor so we had to take cold showers in order to get to the conference on time.  In the room there was no internet connectivity.  In the conference room the connection was spotty.  Even the presenter was having problems with connectivity during the presentation.  The conference room was cold.  The participants all had their jackets on.  Not
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are very sorry to hear that you were inconvenienced with the poor internet connection, cold water, and no follow up from the front desk. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can learn about your experience with us. We would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have another opportunity to have you as our guest again in the near future.

Summary: What a great place to stay. We are a family of 4 so had 2 rooms next door to each other which worked really well. About a 10 minute walk to Disneyland which we didn't expect so were able to walk home each night and felt really safe. Spacious rooms and those warm cookies on arrival, yum yum. Nice pool and restaurant. Staff were lovely and helpful. Would absolutely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear nr0we,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us during your visit to Disneyland! We hope that you took advantage of our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland during your stay. At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that the little things mean everything, from our cookies upon check-in to our friendly staff and on-site amenities. We would like to thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have you again soon for another awesome stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This hotel makes you pay for parking. Visiting other hotels in area I have NEVER stayed anywhere I had to pay to park a rental car. Choose another hotel where you will not be put in a situation where you have no choice.
Manager Response: Dear Vernon,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are very sorry to hear that you were inconvenienced with the parking rates here at our hotel. Please call our CARE Line at 714-634-4500 so we can learn about your experience with us. We would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have another opportunity to have you as our guest again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The hotel has a great location being next to eateries and an outlet mall. The hotel provides a free daily shuttle service to Disneyland with great times. The hotel itself has a beautiful lobby and friends employees. The rooms were spacious but not as nice as advertised. Our room has some minor water stains on the lamp shades and in one corner of the ceiling. The bedding, furniture, and mattresses were in great condition. Pillows were horrible. As soon as you put any weight on them they were flat as pancakes although I do believe pancakes would have been fluffier. We stayed on the 11th floor facing the park and could see and hear the nightly Disney fireworks right from our window. The breakfast service left a lot to desire. Half of the breakfast kitchen/wait staff didn't speak
Manager Response: Dear Jaderbugs,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are sorry to hear that the pillows in your room and the breakfast buffet did not meet your expectations. At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make sure that all of our guests have a great experience during their stay with us. We are glad that you received excellent guest service and enjoyed your room's view of the fireworks from Disneyland. We thank you for choosing us and we hope to have you again as our guest soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I helped my (older) kids get booked into this hotel to attend an event at Anaheim Stadium.  They loved it!  Took the shuttle to DisneyLand and had breakfast at Downtown Disney while waiting for their room to become available.  Just a mile away from the stadium for the event and an easy taxi ride there.  Very good location for a family looking for lots of options.   My daughter asked the concierge (Mike) to arrange a ride the following day to the airport.  She explained that, since it was a very late flight, they would like to do several others things.  He suggested several options and arranged a car service.  When we got the bill - the car service was way more expensive than it should have been.  A call to the concierge desk (Julio) resulted in him making several calls to the
Manager Response: Dear JWilguess,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are glad you were our guest at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County while you and your family were visiting Disneyland! We are very happy to hear that you found our location and complimentary shuttle service to Disney convenient. We are also very glad to hear that Mike and Julio assisted you and helped to resolve the issues you encountered with the car service. We are always happy to assist and to be a resource to our guests' needs. We would like to thank you again for your stay with us and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great hotel!  comfortable room.  check in was fast and efficient.  My only complaint would be, when I made our reservation I thought I had signed up for HHonors, but I could not be found in the system.  But over all our stay was awesome.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor Review! We are sorry we could not locate your HHonors account. Please call our HHonors Customer Service line at 800-548-8690 so we can help get this issue resolved. We are glad you enjoyed your comfortable room and fast check in service. We would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Fantastic property, excellent rooms and very good service. The staff was very receptive and the valet was very helpful. The best location to visit Disney world and do outlet shopping.   Free shuttles to Disney and 10 minutes to orange outlets was the best thing. Also have a Starbucks outlet inside the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Diwyesh,  Thank you for your review. We are glad you thought our location, amenities and guest service as fabulous! At the Doubletree Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know guest satisfaction is important to receiving the best experience while visiting our hotel. We are pleased that you were able to get some shopping done and that you found our shuttle services to Disney convenient. We want to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another fabulous stay!   Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Our stay at this location was only overnight but we stay with the brand most times when we go away. Of course our welcome cookie makes us feel at home, and as always the staff is fantastic, the room clean, quiet and with an interesting view. On the 12th floor (forgot to use my Hilton Honors for a higher floor). We overlooked the US Irvine Hospital's helipad, cool! So some of the evening we watched the helicopter drop off and pick up.
Manager Response: Dear Kaye,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad you found your stay with us convenient and that our quality met your standards. At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make sure our guests feel at home and ensure they receive the best guest service. We're sorry you didn't get to utilize your Hilton Honors points during your visit but we are glad that you got to see UCI's helicopter action! We want to thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again soon for another great stay!   Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Best value for money hotel I have stayed at. EVER.
Summary: We stayed here for eight nights to finish off our U.S. adventure and it was a great choice on a number of different levels. I pre-paid this hotel and as a result we received a free hot buffet breakfast every morning and saved at least $1,000 USD when you include the free shuttle to Disneyland as a cab ride would cost around $20 each way. The hotel is a five minute walk to the Outlets of Orange so we managed to fit in some shopping before we headed home (including an extra suitcase for the all the souvenirs). Guest services were a great help. They organised transport for Universal studios and the Hollywood tour and looked after my Mustang car hire, which made things so much easier. Rey, the driver was of great assistance and was very helpful in every aspect and was very good to
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very glad to hear that you had a great experience with us and that you were able to save around $1,000 for your stay with us! At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we know that value and quality is important, especially for our out of town visitors. We are very glad to know that our Guest Services team was able to organize transportation to your favorite attractions and that they looked after your vehicle. It's always a plus to receive a room that faces Disneyland so the fireworks can be seen! We would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We had been staying for a week at a hotel that was almost 3 times as expensive and figured things wouldn't be quite as luxurious here at the Hilton Doubletree - but we were wrong.  The hotel, the room and the employees all exceeded our expectations and was wonderful.  From Rey and the other shuttle drivers to our check-in we received excellent service.
Manager Response: Dear Melanie,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are excited to hear that you had a wonderful experience with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location and that Rey's guest service was outsanding. We are also glad that you enjoyed the in-house amenities. We thank you for your stay and hope to have you return soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Why do I pay more to get less??
Summary: I love how nice and clean the rooms are, up to date and pretty. Customer service is always wonderful. The front desk gave me a day of parking for my birthday... or so I thought charge showed on my card a week later. I just don't understand why I can't get free parking, a fridge,breakfast, a microwave... I'm just saying... Twice as much as others and I get not much more.
Manager Response: Dear Natalie,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear that you did not receive the complimentary parking as promised for your birthday and that you did not receive the aforementioned amenities. Please contact a member of our CARELine at 714-634-4500 so we can address your concerns. We would like to thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest in the near future.  Sincerely,   Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I found this to be a very nice hotel. The lobby and rooms were clean and the decor was up to date. The staff was very friendly. The location was very convenient. I have stayed in this hotel for business and for leisure and have enjoyed both experiences. The restaurant bartenders were super friendly even with a large crowd one evening. Bonus - there's a Starbucks in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are glad you enjoyed the scenery of our hotel along with our friendly service. We know that it is important for guests that frequent our hotel to have a great experience such as you have had. We thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you again for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This hotel is everything you'd expect from a Doubletree, in fact I would rate it nicer than most.  Very friendly staff, two restaurants + room service, large rooms.  I had a great experience here and for $129 in this area, I think it's a pretty good value.
Manager Response: Dear Justyn,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you had a great experience with us here at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are pleased to know that you enjoyed our friendly staff and our in-house amenities. We also know that value and price are important and we are glad to hear that you found us valuable. We thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel across from the UCI medical center
Summary: Very clean, nice hotel. Room clean with adequate towels and supplies in bathroom extremely close to UCI medical center. Special discount if you are a patient in the hospital. No shuttle service except to Disneyland. $20.00 to valet park. Not many choices in the dining room. Waiters were excellent in service they provided. Beds are wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear Lulu,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you were pleased with your stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We know that our guests value comfort and excellent guest service and we aim to provide that the very best. Although you were not completely satisfied with our dining choices, we are glad to know that you received excellent service and a UCI Medical Center discount. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Service Team

Summary: The hotel was awesome. The hotel personnel were helpful, friendly, approachable, and knowledgeable with surrounding area and attractions.  Rooms were clean and comfortable.  Noise level was extremely impressive.  My room was located close to the elevators and I didn't even notice the sounds.  This was also the case for the next door occupants, never heard any sound for the other rooms (light sleeper problems).  Overall I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank your for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you had a great stay with us during your business trip. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that it is very important to come to a clean, comfortable room and experience quietness during your stay. We are very glad you enjoyed your visit to our hotel. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again soon for another awesome stay!  Sincerely,   DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The staff and the service make this hotel feel like a home away from home.  If I needed anything it was brought up to my room almost immediately.  I don't believe I have ever stayed anywhere with such an all around pleasant staff no matter who you were dealing with.  The room was ordinary Double Tree, but the best part of this hotel is the staff.
Manager Response: Dear Gail,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are honored to be your home away from home! At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that excellent service is key to our guests having a great experience. We are pleased to treat you like family and to make sure that your needs are being met. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to be your home away from home soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The Anaheim Doubletree was a very nice hotel....Only issue was the room was very stuffy and hot. I stayed there on a business trip and all was good. I have stayed at Hilton hotels before nd have been very happy for the most part.
Manager Response: Dear Teri,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very sorry to hear that your room was stuffy and hot. We want to thank you for being our guest at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anahiem-Orange County! We are glad you enjoyed your business trip with us despite the inconvenience. We are happy that you choose Hilton Hotels, particularly the DoubleTree by HIlton Anaheim-Orange, and we hope to have you again as our guest for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Convenient and comfortable hotel for a Disneyland vacation
Summary: I would definitely stay at this hotel again for a Disneyland vacation. We stayed the night before our visit to Disneyland and California Adventure so that we would be close by and could utilize the shuttle. The complimentary shuttle to Disneyland was very convenient. I wish we didn't have to pay for parking at this hotel, but at least the shuttle was complimentary so we didn't have to pay for Disneyland parking too. The shuttle starts making trips from the front of the hotel 30 min. prior to the parks opening, and makes trips every hour on the hour starting when the park opens. The last shuttle left at 15 minutes past midnight, and we utilized that late shuttle so we could have a full day at the parks. The room was comfortable and very spacious. The "Disneyland view" really just
Manager Response: Dear Salsalisa,  Thank you for your 5-star Trip Advisor review! We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us during your trip to Disney. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that location and convenience are very important when traveling, particularly for vacation. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service, our guest service and the view of Disneyland from your hotel room. We want to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Booked this hotel due to ease to get to Disneyland, shuttles are on time and fantastic 10 minute ride to Disney. Staff are very friendly and rooms are nice. Not much close by, apart from outlet malls, so it's pretty quiet. Great accomodation and views of Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Rob,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to know you enjoyed your recent stay with us. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that location and convenience is everything. We are happy that you enjoyed our complimentary Disneyland shuttle service, friendly staff and rooms. We want to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Love this hotel. This was our 3rd time here with our children & grandchildren (now 13 of us), for a Disney vacation, and it was again an excellent choice. The suite rooms are spacious, very comfortable, and clean.  Every staff member was awesome. The pool was warm (cold out) & the kids loved it.  The restaurant is so family friendly, but also very adult friendly.  The breakfast buffet is awesome & kids always eat free with an adult.  We were able to get a couple of wonderful Ruth Chris dinners in too - right next door. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Chestermere,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your Disneyland family vacation with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make every family's visit to Disneyland awesome and memorable. We are very happy to know our spacious rooms suited your entire family well and that you enjoyed our family-friendly restaurant. We are very happy to hear that our staff provided you with awesome service and that you were given an extra dinner perk. We would like to thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel perfectly close to everything and amazing amenities for business
Summary: The room is right near Disney and the Anaheim convention center and offers amenities for all your business needs. I selected this hotel because it was a perfect location from the Anaheim Convention Center. The staff at the hotel are so friendly, the hotel offers a shuttle to Disney at all times. Be sure to buy a tin of cookies while there too, they have the best chocolate chip cookies!
Manager Response: Dear Katina,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to know that you chose us during your visit to the Anaheim Convention Center! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we take pride in providing excellent guest service and complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We are glad you enjoy our cookies, too! We would like to thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have you as our guest soon for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Lived one block away, on Lewis & Lampson, for over 21 years. Had never even been inside here till now. Was visiting family over christmas.  and traded this hotel ($387. vs. $452 at the Sheraton) for three nights Not wild about the $15 parking fee. or REFUSAL to bring room service. I called one afternoon; a hispanic boy said  "oh we charge $4 delivery, just come down and get it yourself, I'll leave silverware for you, how many forks & knives you need?"    (after that, I hung up)  every day, in the restaurant, I was offered a tiny table, in the corner, behind a wall...  (???????)  so I had to ask for real seating.  the room was huge, well appointed. But the male servers in the "restaurant" are thoughtless-unintelligent.   The hotel itself is nice. not spectacular. The customer
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very sorry to hear that our customer service did not meet your standards. We would like to hear more about your experience; please call our Care Line at 714-634-4500 and let us know how we can make it right. We are very pleased to hear that you chose us as your hotel. We would like to thank you for being our guest and we hope you will give us another opportunity to have a better stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Location is great for Disneyland.  Not too close for all the traffic, but convenient and on time shuttle and amazing staff!  Highly recommend.  The staff goes above and beyond in all aspects.  Food was great and the hotel offered everything needed.
Manager Response: Dear Patrick,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor Review! We are very happy to hear that you had an amazing experience with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to be part of our guests' memorable Disneyland experience. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our on-time shuttle service and friendly staff and that you enjoyed our food and other amenities. We thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again soon for another amazing stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: One of the reasons I selected this hotel was because of the free shuttle they have to Disneyland. In addition, the cost was much more affordable than many of the hotels that are on the same street as Disneyland. For those other hotels you have to pay for the shuttle because they are obligated to use the Anaheim Transit shuttle. We did not check in until our return from Disneyland at about 10pm, however, when we arrived in the morning, I did notify the front desk that we would not be back till late to check in. The check in process was quick and easy and the gentleman was extremely courteous and friendly, I don't remember his name, but he was working Christmas Eve. The cookies they give you upon check in we're great, especially after a long day at Disneyland. The room was clean
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us during your trip to Disneyland! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that providing superior guest service is essential to our guests' experience, and the little things make all the difference. We are very pleased to know that our front desk clerk was able to accommodate your late check in and make the process easy and smooth. We are glad you enjoy our cookies as well! We thank you for your visit with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This hotel is nice and we had a nice time but beware that the only place to park is on the premise and as you depart be you will be hit with an amenities fee of 15.00 per night for your cars ability to spend the night at the hotel as well. I feel that hidden cost keep you from seeing the real price that they are surely ashamed of or why would they try to pack more cost instead of giving it free as cars come with the owners. I would have left completely happy and recommended to others but now I must leave you with, BEWARE....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We are sorry we didn’t get to provide the high quality of services you deserve. We apologize for any miscommunication with the additional charges for amenities at the hotel. Thank you for alerting us to this issue, and we hope you’ll give us another chance to make it right.  Thank you,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I was in Orange County for a baseball showcase my son was doing and the Double Tree was the hotel hosting all the guests for the showcase. Fabulous service from the time we arrived to  the time we checked-out. Thank you to all the Double Tree Staff for a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear Araceli,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor Review! We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us during your son's baseball showcase! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that it is important for families to enjoy their experience with us, from the time they arrive to our hotel to the moment they check-out. We are happy that you had a great time with us. Thank you for visiting us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another pleasant stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anahiem Service Team

Summary: The hotel looks average on the outside, but is spectacular on the inside.  I was very impressed with how classy the lobby, bar area and room was.  The cookies provided at check-in are out of this world.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you were impressed with our property! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that it's the little things that make everything worthwhile. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you enjoyed our famous DoubleTree cookies. We want to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Selected this hotel due to a great rate right around $100 and the free frequent shuttle to Disneyland. Parking is $15 a day and though I see no reason for the parking fee other than that other hotels nearby do the same thing, the parking lot is easy to use and very accessible from the hotel entrance.   The hotel room was great. I was a little nervous being right by the elevator but it did not seem to be noisy at all. The room was clean, comfortable, and had a nice view out over the surrounding area. Overall this hotel far exceeded my expectations for a Doubletree.   As a Gold I was offered an upgrade to a suite but declined it due to simply not needing it (I am sure there are larger families visiting here who could use that upgrade more than I could have). In return I was
Manager Response: Dear Storewanderer,  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us! We are sorry to hear that our Front Desk personnel was scarce during your stay. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we want to make sure that our guests are provided with a clean, comfortable room and that our HHonors members get to enjoy all the perks that comes with being our guest multiple times. We are very happy to hear that your expectations were exceeded and that you were offered a free hot breakfast in return for your generosity. We want to thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I was here for 1 night with my family for a little Disneyland Holiday Trip. The hotel is beautifully decorated for the Holiday. There is a huge decorated Christmas Tree right in the middle of the Lobby. Very open and welcoming. There is a cafe and a couple of dining options in the hotel that we did not take advantage of but are there for guest. There is a shuttle to and from Disneyland that makes your trip more convenient if you are there for the park. The hotel location is near plenty of dining options and I believe the mall was not too far. Our room was 1917 a beautiful upgrade where we were able to actually see the Disneyland fireworks. That was great to show our son! Parking is affordable and accessible. If the lot in front of the hotel is full there is a garage not too far
Manager Response: Dear Tinetina77,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your crib was not delivered to your room and that you were disturbed by our housekeeping team so late in the evening. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we want to ensure that our guests have a comfortable, quiet stay and that requests are responded to in a timely manner. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your view of the Disneyland fireworks from your room and that our property provided plenty of conveniences for your. We want to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again as our guest for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Great stay at a great hotel!
Summary: My son and I stayed at the Doubletree hotel Thanksgiving week! It was a beautiful hotel with wonderful staff. The price was great and we had an awesome time. Book at the Hilton site. When you book with your Hilton Honors, you get free WiFi. There was a free shuttle to Disney each day! The drivers were great and very friendly! When we came back at the peak time one night, the shuttle was full and they had sent a second shuttle right away! The only thing the could have done was give us a free cookie each day... We had a free breakfast (very good) and got a buy four nights, get one night free special!  The room was wonderful!! The front desk was awesome! The value was outstanding! We would go back in a hearbeat!
Manager Response: Dear Nicki,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to have had you at our hotel during Thanksgiving week and grateful to know that you and your family had a wonderful time with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that our guests love value and superior service, which is what we strive to provide. We are glad to hear that our shuttle serviced your needs in a timely manner and that all of our staff was friendly and accommodating. You definitely scored big on the free breakfast and night stay! We thank you for being our guest and we hope that you will definitely be back in a heartbeat soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed here as part of a Indian wedding party in Oct 2015. The rooms were comfortable and we had a great time at the wedding  - The ballroom was  great and everything was very well organised for all the wedding ceremonies (including the Indian baraat! )
Manager Response: Dear Swathi999,   Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you had a wonderful time with us for your family's wedding party! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make your special event memorable. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our ballroom and that everything went great! We would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Great relaxing evening at the bar and lounge!
Summary: As an out-of-state businessman always in the greater Los Angeles area -- especially in Orange County -- I highly recommend the Doubletree Anaheim as a place of solace after work.  After a grueling day after which you want to simply unwind at your hotel and not go out to fight the infamous L.A traffic, relax for the evening at The 100 (the main open lounge bar), where you will enjoy the superb attention and services of Messrs. Rafael, Rogelio, and a cast of many who will help you unwind and enjoy the evening before the next day.  You'll actually feel refreshed by the next morning!  Scott B. Hilton Diamond Member Frequent Traveler
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Service - Great For Going to Disneyland
Summary: We stay at this hotel with the family 2-3 times a year when going to Disneyland.  The staff is always top notch.  They have a free shuttle to the park (most other hotels make you pay for the Anaheim transit buses).  Once we missed one of the early morning shuttles and the next was about 45 minutes before departure.  They pulled up a van and drove us to the park.  The evening bus driver, Ray, is great - telling jokes, doing card tricks for the little ones and handing out cards, coloring books, and other niceities to the kids.  Getting Hilton Honors points makes this hotel even more attractive.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! It is always awesome to have returning guests stay at our hotel! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we love to hear about our guests' experiences, especially when they enjoy a complimentary shuttle ride to Disneyland! We are happy that you were able to receive an early shuttle ride, and Ray is always a pleasure with our guests. It is definitely great to be an HHonors member! Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you again as our guest for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Nice staff, but only so-so facility
Summary: The rooms have not been updated. The rooms looked to be 1980's or 90's decor. Bed was too soft and asked to switch rooms for a better bed. However the front desk said all beds were of the same age. They did add a board under the mattress, which helped. The light between the beds stopped working and light for calling the elevator was out. Food in the restaurant was good, but service very slow. Looked like they were understaffed. The wait staff were really hustling, but just too much to do. We nearly finished our meal before getting coffee. This location didn't seem to be up to the same standard of others in the chain, however, every staff person we encountered was more than helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Bbeukelman,   Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your stay with us was not enjoyable. We would like to hear more about your experience with us. Please call us at 714-634-4500 and let our CareLine know how we can improve. We are happy to hear that our staff provided you with friendly, helpful service. We thank you for your recent visit and we hope to have you as our guest again soon.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Very comfortable stay (Our Hotel choice in this area)
Summary: Booked a night here after attending a concert. As part of the HH club we stayed at the 15th floor. Room was clean, spacious, and noise free. Although bathroom was small. Tip: Choose upper floors (more quiet) and corner rooms (more spacious). Booked a package which includes 1 night, parking, in room wi-fi, parking, breakfast for 2, for $139, which is an excellent deal. We had a very good night sleep, comfortable bed, A/C working correctly. In-room safe was not working (seams to me dead battery). Breakfast variety may not be big, but enough to keep you moving throughout the day. Good service. Will return! We had a lite night drink and snacks at the bar, good ambient.
Manager Response: Dear Toto,  Thank you for your review. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us! We apologize for the malfunctioned safe. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anahiem-Orange County, we know that coming to a hotel with comfortable, quiet rooms mean everthing to our guests. We are very happy that you are an HHonors member and was able to enjoy all of the perks! We thank you for being our guest and we look forward to having you again soon for another comfortable stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The restaurant wasn't open in the evening for dinner. There was no free breakfast, the sink stopper didn't work, The lighting in the room was not adequate, The shower would not stop so I could not take a bath. The lighting in the parking lot was very poor. After falling in the parking lot because of this, my room keys did not work and I had to call for someone to open my room. The staff did seem concerned but I've heard nothing from them since returning home.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to relay your feedback regarding your experience at the hotel. As we do take any type of incident like this extremely serious and do believe it is very important, please accept our apologies for no follow up phone call after you checked out from the Hotel.
