The physical safety of all guests of our hotel continues to be our number one priority, and our staff works around the clock to help ensure everyone experiences a safe and worry free stay while with us.   Our Director of Safety and Security will be personally reaching out to you to follow up, check on your well-being, and discuss the incident further with you. This is the same person who met with you the morning after the incident as you were speaking to our Security staff.  We truly hope that you are feeling better and had a Great Thanksgiving with your family. Thank you again for your feedback.  Hotel Management

Summary: We normally stay at The Candy Cane Inn but since it was sold out we tried the Double Tree in Orange and it was great. I was very impressed with every staff member we encountered. From the front desk employee who checked us in and of course gave us our cookies to the waiters in the restaurant and especially the really nice evening bus driver who taught my kids magic tricks whom we waited to depart. Funny how all the little touches really add up to a lot. The nice white bedding and really great breakfast were terrific too. I'd highly recommend this property for a Disneyland vacation!  This might be my favorite place to stay in the area. We love the comfy beds.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are very happy to have had you and your family as our guests for your recent Disneyland visit! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that the little things mean everything, and we know that making kids happy makes parents happy as well! We are glad you shared your picture of your little one enjoying her comfy bed! We thank you for sharing your experience with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: this hotel has a clean, friendly and convenient feel and location. The staff was extremely accommodating and helpful.  If you have to be away from home, the beds were comfortable and the room was very clean and maintained nicely.  I would recommend this hotel to friends and I will stay there again and again for my business travels in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Beth,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anahiem-Orange County we strive to make sure that our guests are greeted by our warm, friendly staff and that each guest is welcomed to a clean, comfortable room. We thank you for recommending our location to others and we look forward to having you as our guest again very soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights during a business trip and couldn't have been happier. The hotel was very modern, updated, clean, and welcoming. I was on the 19th floor and the room was very large, more then enough room for a 3 night stay. The room itself was very clean and furnished with a modern flare. The location of the hotel was fantastic, tons of places to eat within walking distance and easy access to the freeway. Staff was friendly and efficient. Overall a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Tom,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent visit with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that our guests enjoy excellent service and our location, primarily for its convenience to shopping, restaurants and nearby attractions. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your room on the 19th floor. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again as our guest for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Hello,I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Doubletree in Orange California, centrally  located next to The Outlets of Orange formerly known  as the Block of Orange. My hotel check in was Fast and easy and the hotel personnel were all courteous and went the extra mile to make my stay at The Doubletree memorable which it was I can't wait to stay again.ok enough of the boring stuff,first there is plenty of hotel Self and Valet Parking, Everything a visitor may want is in and around and close by the Doubletree of Orange,freeways,Honda Center,Angel Stadium, Disneyland, Main Place Mall,walking distance of restaurants, movie theatres, super markets,down the block literally is the Former Chrystal Cathedral Now known as the Christ Cathedral, across the street from hotel is
Manager Response: Dear Mtorrey,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We thank you for sharing your detailed experience with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we aim to please our guests by providing superior service and our delicious DoubleTree cookies. We are very happy to know that you enjoyed our location, as it is very convenient to the Outlets at Orange, Angel Stadium, Disneyland and other nearby destination hotspots. We know that location is everything and we are proud to be near all of the great attractions. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again very soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: (Close to) The Happiest Place on Earth
Summary: From check-in to check out, the experience was consistently positive! Everyone provided excellent service and they always had smiles on their faces. That alone, makes my stay pleasant. This is my second stay at this location and recommended it to many colleagues. Convenient to my meetings and to Downtown Disneyland, which I visited on my second night. The hotel is very quiet and clean. Thank you Doubletree!! I will return the next time I find myself in Santa Ana.
Manager Response: Dear Geoffrey,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear about your second experience with us! We are happy to hear that our staff provided excellent service from the time of check in to check out. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, it is our goal to ensure that our guests receive the best of service from us during their stay. We thank you for recommending us to others, and we are glad to know that you found our location excellent. We hope to have you as our guest again for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: This hotel is okay, but not great...
Summary: As a Hilton Honors Diamond Member who travels a lot I have very high expectations.  My room was a connecting room, so not very quiet.  I had to wait at check in and was not offered any bell service.  Had to ask for everything.  Got up to my room expecting to see my water amenity, not there. Called down and was told it was at the front desk. Had to ask to have it delivered and front desk said, "I'll see if I have someone available".  Not the answer I was looking for...
Manager Response: Dear Sandra,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear that your visit to our hotel was not up to your standards, particularly as an Hilton Honors Diamond Member. We are also sorry to hear that the service offered to you was substandard. We invite you to call us at 714-634-4500 and request the CareLine so we can find learn more about your experience. We thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have you again as our guest in the future.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I stayed here for a quick Disneyland mini vacation for a couple of days. Our room wasn't ready, but it was nice to have the mall closeby. The room was clean and we were able to see the fireworks from Disneyland each night. I would definitely stay there again.. plus my cookie was wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear Rinthecutie,  Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We apologize for not having your room ready upon check in. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make sure that every guest has a great experience. We hope that you took advantage of our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We thank you for your stay with us and we hope that you come visit us soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I travel weekly for business and this is the first hotel I have stayed in in years that did not have a refrigerator and microwave in the room? Breakfast buffet there was $18.00 and it is the same eggs, bacon, sausage, etc. that you receive at any other hotel with the cost of your room. Would I stay here again, definitely not.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we want to make sure that each guest has a great experience with us. Please contact our CareLine at 714-634-4500 to let us know how we can make your next stay better. We thank you for your stay and we hope to have you again as our guest in the future.   Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: I am disabled and the front office staff as so helpful.  Cathy at the front desk assisted me way beyond expectation in checking in and getting me to my room.  The room was very clean, the restaurant staff and food were excellent.  The conference room, though chilly, was spacious and didn't feel crowded with 500 people in the room.  I would definitely recommend this hotel as well as stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Sunshinefun,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are very happy to hear that Cathy was a great help to you during your check in! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to ensure that all of our guests are provided with superior service. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your clean room and our Trofi restaurant. We thank you for sharing your experience with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Nothing special from a regular 'motel six' other than it is many times larger.  The room was adequate but it has no small refrigerator or microwave.  The coffee machine is ludicrous in that it is uber small.   I doubt I will ever stay there again unless they cut the prices by at least 1/4.  The restaurant was less than a Mickey Ds.
Manager Response: Dear Allen,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your stay with us. We would like to thank you for letting us know about your experience at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaehim-Orange County. Please contact us at 714-634-4500 and let our CareLine know how we can make improvements. We thank you for your visit with us and we hope to have you again at our hotel in the future.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Nice location for OC college visits
Summary: Very clean and comfortable hotel for parents making college campus visits in the OC area. It's located close to The University of California, Irving, and Chapman University.  Plenty of self on-site parking, restaurant/bar, and Starbucks in the hotel. We were greeted by very pleasant staff, and the rooms were modern and clean. Hilton Honors members rooms are on separate designated upper floors, so remember to include your membership at reservation. Highly recommend for a pleasant visit to Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Steve,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we make it our goal for our guests to have a comfortable, clean room and friendly service. We are glad that you enjoyed the HHonors perks, and that you recommend our location for visiting the college campuses in the Orange County area. We thank you for your visit and we hope to have you as our guest in the near future!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: So-So experience for the elderly with special needs.
Summary: Temperature of hotel was too cold. Temporarily misplaced our luggage. Valet did not return our valet car key. The employees followed company policy which are not flexible enough to accommodate guests with special needs. Other than that everything was great.
Manager Response: Dear Peter,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear of your experience with us. We are also very sorry to hear that your luggage was misplaced and your car key was not returned. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we make our guests' needs our first priority. Please contact us at 714-634-4500 and request to speak to our CareLine. We thank you for your review in addition to your stay with us and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The hotel is providing daily free shuttle to Disneyland on hourly basis which is very convenient. The hotel is within walking distance to Orange outlet and Wendy & Starbucks. Furthermore, all the staff are very helpful and friendly. The hotel is new and nice as well.
Manager Response: Dear Gotham0505,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that location is everything, and that being in close proximity to shopping and entertainment is very convenient for our guests. Our friendly staff does their best to ensure that every guest has a pleasant experience. Thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have you as our guest again for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed here for a couple day trip to Disney.  This hotel was approx 15 minute walk to Disney.     We liked this hotel.   It had a refrigerator in the room and more seating than just chair by the bed.    It had a real table to spread stuff out on which is great when you have three people.  The room was quiet as well which is great since I'm a loud sleeper.  Doubletree are usually always quiet!
Manager Response: Dear Kristi,  Thank you for your 5-star Trip Advisor review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope that you took advantage of our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland during your time with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your quiet room. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County it is our pleasure to provide a warm, comforting atmosphere. We thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have you again for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This location is a pleasant doubletree with a very nice staff.  While I don't like the strange orange and blue lobby colors, the sleeping room had good a/c, amenities, and a comfie bed.  I didn't like the available parking lot (self park was $10) that was around the corner and unstaffed at 1045 pm, but was able to enter the hotel conference center from a side door so I didn't have to walk far by myself.  Hotel bar was open until eleven pm.  I would stay here again.  Hotel had a shuttle to Disney.  With a Starbucks in the lobby, as well as conference facilities, a buffet breakfast, I could see bringing the family here.  My room had a small refrigerator and microwave as well.
Manager Response: Dear Marylander,  Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that our guests are number one and that the little things are everything. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our hotel bar, our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and our other in-house amenities. We hope that you definitely stay with us again and we thank you for staying with us!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The hotel itself is nice however I had to call and ask for room service as it was not done 2 days in a row, the pool was very dirty and gross my son was looking forward to swimming until we saw how unsanitary it was. The shuttle too and from disneyland was convenient.. warning if you get a 3 day or more park hopper for disneyland you get a "magic morning" which is early entry an hour before the park opens to public... well the hotel shuttle service does not accommodate to those times unfortunatel so my family missed out on that.
Manager Response: Dear DFOLLAND,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear about the room service and the unsanitary pool. We are also sorry to hear that our shuttle service did not accommodate the early morning Disneyland shuttle times. Please feel free to give us a call at 714-634-4500 and let our Care Line know about your experience. We would like to extend our apologies for your experience and we wish to welcome you to our hotel again in the near future.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This hotel had very bad customer service & the beds were very uncomfortable! This hotel is not child friendly! The men were nice but the front desk ladies were ornery and rude! My family and I booked 4 rooms for 7 nights so we spent thousands of dollars on the hotel rooms. I am mentioning the price because at the end of our stay they charged me $350 for pen marks on a chair that my 1 year old accidentally got on the chair!!! I am pretty sure it will not cost $350 to remove these pen marks!!! For the amount of time and money we stayed and put into this hotel you would think they would be a little nicer about not charging us for this or at least charging a reasonable price for this accident!!! Also, the beds were very uncomfortable, the rooms smelled bad & the bathrooms were tiny
Manager Response: Dear Debony S,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry you were unhappy with our customer service and the other issues that you experienced at our hotel. We appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we work to improve our guest experience. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future.  Thank you,   DoubleTree Management

Summary Heading: Interior needs improvement, Staff is first-rate!
Summary: What this hotel lacks in appearance is totally made up by the friendly staff. Although the lobby/bar/breakfast areas are very nice, we noticed a number of things that could be improved on the 9th floor- new carpet, fresh walls and general cosmetic upgrades are needed throughout. However the staff was super friendly and the room was clean. And we had an awesome view of the Angels stadium. The outlets were convenient for other meals.
Manager Response: Dear Sam,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for any inconvenience our appearance may have had during your visit to the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County hotel. We will be undergoing renovations on our floors, so we look forward to some of the changes that will take place soon! We are very glad to know that you enjoyed our lobby/bar/breakfast areas, the view of Angel Stadium and the clean rooms. It is our pleasure for our staff to provide excellent guest service. We thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you as our guest again for another good stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: I would rather have slept in my car.
Summary: This was probably the worst hotel I have ever stayed at in my life. We stayed here on our trip to Disneyland and chose this location due to proximity to the park and ratings. When we got there, it had stormed earlier and was very humid outside. Unfortunately, the room was the exact same. I brought the AC down as low as it would go and it did absolutely nothing. Our bed sheets felt like a wet plastic shower curtain and needless to say, I only got about 2 hours of sleep because I was so uncomfortable. We left early the next morning to catch the FREE shuttle to Disney (the only good thing about this hotel) and so we were unable to talk to anyone at the time. When we got back to the hotel that night we were told that the hotel was booked, no rooms were available, and in fact, they
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our hotel during your trip to Disneyland. We’re sorry you encountered housekeeping problems. We appreciate that you brought the room air issues to our attention. We have discussed this with our staff and will make every effort to be sure our rooms meet our guests' highest standards. Once again, we would like to thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have another chance to welcome you back.  Kind regards,  The DoubleTree Executive Team

Summary: We always stay at this hotel and they have consistent excellent service. VERY friendly staff. Excellent hotel for people on business or families travelling to Disneyland. great food at the hotel or convenient to fast food across the street.
Manager Response: Dear Diveservice,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us during your Disneyland trip! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we pride ourselves in ensuring that our guests receive the best of the best service. We are happy to hear that you consider us to be the best Disney hotel! We want to thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anahiem Service Team

Summary Heading: Personalized attention and service.  Highly recommend.
Summary: I was mostly impressed by the exceptionally friendly staff.  Jessy at the front desk was outstanding in making me feel special.  As a guest, I felt like I was getting the royal treatment.  Also, I never heard or saw housekeeping, but they were there - very sleuth like.  I appreciate not hearing carts rolling around in the hallways.  DoubleTree was very accommodating for my event on the premises and gave us great discounts.  I would stay here again and hire for future events.
Manager Response: Dear Jill,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we do our best in making sure that all of our guests receive the royal treatment. We are very glad to know that our housekeeping team was discreet in keeping your room clean. It is our pleasure to accompany you and your group and we look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future. Thank you!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great location right near the Outlets as well as the restaurant row of great restaurants.  Also conveniently located to the freeway.  Can view Disneyland fireworks each night from our room.  Large room with good ventilation system that doesn't keep you awake through night.  Very comfortable inside and outside.
Manager Response: Dear Suejsmith13,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, particularly our location and accommodations. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we take pride in being in close proximity to your favorite attractions, such as the Outlets at Orange and Angel Stadium. We are glad that you enjoyed your view of the Disneyland fireworks show! Thank you for being a guest at our hotel and we look forward to having you as our guest again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Ask for a room with a view. I watched disneyland fireworks from  my room. There is a free hotel shuttle bus that runs every hour to disneyland.  The baseball stadium and outlets are close by with Wendy's across the street. There is a bar, restauant, Starbucks and concierge in the lobby. The swimming pool is on the second floor and gym on the third  floor. Families and business people stay here. Rooms are quiet. As Hilton Honors member received 2 bottle waters, cookie, mini refrigerator, microwave and free wifi. There are selected floors only for members although I stayed on another floor could be because I checked in early. The self parking is close. Reception, valet, concierge was very nice and friendly.  I definitely would stay here again. Hardly ever had to wait for the
Manager Response: Dear Jtyamada  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anahiem-Orange County, we take pride in our guests' experience and strive to ensure that their time with us is an enjoyable one. From our in-hotel amenities to our location central to shopping areas and attractions, we know that our guests can find all of their expectations met. We thank you for your stay with us and we look forward to having you as our guest again for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Great stay @ Doubletree ! Very comfortable stay, the beds are " comfy" and very clean rooms and bathrooms. The shuttle was a wonderful and an efficient way to get to Disneyland: avoids parking issues and extra costs @ Park ! The staff is very accommodating and helpful. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed our comfy rooms! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we want to make sure that our guests enjoy a clean, comfortable room in addition to complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland park. We are also very happy that our staff was accommodating and helpful. We want to thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you again for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaehim Service Team

Summary: Staff was very nice.. the restaurant even made us food after they had closed.  the room was very comfortable..we recommend everyone to stay there.  They provided a free shuttle to and from Disneyland for us.
Manager Response: Dear Joanne,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we love to make our guests happy. We know it is the little things that make all of the difference with our guest's experience, such as our restaurant preparing a delicious meal after hours and providing complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We thank you for recommending others to stay at our location and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Overall a wonderful stay. We were given a complimentary upgrade to the presidential suite. It was close to Disneyland and very accessible. We had no trouble checking in late (after the park had closed). The hotel is slightly dated in hardware, but very clean and comfortable. Staff were upbeat and friendly. This hotel definitely deserves a recommendation and we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you very much for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we know that the little things make all the difference when it comes to our guest's experience with us. We are pleased that you enjoyed your complimentary upgrade and our staff's friendly service. We thank you again for your stay with us and we hope to have you again as our guest for another excellent stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Very friendly staff, a bit noisy in the rooms
Summary: Overall, I would have given the Doubletree 4 stars but I heard too much noise from other rooms.  This may have just been my room.  Positives: Extremely friendly staff (sincerely - I could tell it wasn't fake).  Clean.  Comfortable bed.  Decent lobby.  Breakfast was pretty good.  Internet was solid. Very good counter space in the bathroom (though the overall bathroom footprint was a bit tight).   Negatives:  This sounds ridiculous, but the toilets were power flush and loud, and between 6 and 7 in the morning I could hear toilets flushing constantly from all directions.   Admittedly, I am a light sleeper.  In the end, I would certainly stay again to see if I would get a quieter experience.
Manager Response: Dear Krawimi,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are very sorry to hear that you experienced a lot of noise during your stay with us. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we want to make sure our guests have a comfortable, enjoyable stay with us. We thank you again for being our guest and we definitely look forward to having you as our guest again for another good (and quiet) stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The hotel has a great location within 10 minutes of Disney land. I attended a conference and the conference rooms were big, but the food was rather bland. My room was a bit musty and damp even with the air on such that our underthings would not dry even overnight. The staff was nice. The hotel pool was a bit small but very cute and there was a little scenic pond. The hotel store had lots of items and there was an internal mini  starbucks with many of the items at a full blown store. This was helpful so one did not have to leave to cross a very busy street to the real starbucks. The location right next to a highway made it quite noisy near the pool although a screen did block the view of the traffic. I liked the little soft cookies. It would have been nice to have someone working
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are sorry to hear that your room was musty and damp. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we want to ensure that any issues are resolved in a timely manner. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our staff and the scenery surrounding our pool area. We are also happy to know that you found our in-house Starbucks and gift shop convenient. Once again we would like to thank you for being a guest at our hotel and we hope to have you again soon for another good stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Room and hotel were clean. The room felt humid to me.  Also, the in-room fan was very loud, but I was still able to sleep. The staff is great, except I asked for a soft copy of my receipt and didn't get it.  Wi-Fi was kind of sketchy.  Location to Disneyland is convenient and the shuttle drivers were great, but don't be late, they leave almost exactly at the scheduled time.  I forgot, it appeared that the shuttles are not cleaned every night because I found wrappers and used ice cream sticks on the seats on the first trip to the park in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Reynaldo,  Thank you for review. We are sorry to hear that you encountered our shuttles in that manner, as well as your room being humid. We are glad that you enjoyed our convenient complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland park. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to ensure that our guests have a great experience at our hotel. We would like to thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you again in the near future.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: It's ok  Wireless was not good Even some people were. Dry good but other r not Breakfast was great Room was not that good Burger was excellent  Close to outlet orange which is very good  Close to free way  ,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, ,,,,,,,,,,,.....
Manager Response: Dear Mohsen,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your room was not up to your standards. We are glad that you enjoyed your breakfast and burger during your stay and that our location served your needs. We hope you will return as our guest in the near future!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Helpful staff, clean rooms and hotel waiting/bar areas. Good happy hour. Nice outside area for a beverage and cigar.The only complaint would be the A/C would not go below 74-75 or so, never got cold enough to get over the humidity.  Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Ralph,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry that you encountered an issue with the A/C in your room. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you enjoyed the scenery! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to ensure that our guests have a relaxing stay with us. We thank you for being our guest and we look forward to having you again for another good stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: My stay at Doubletree was an excellent experience. Beautiful facility, clean and spacious rooms, friendly staff. Workout room had modern equipment and a wide variety, as well as towels and water. I would definitely stay here again. They also sell starbucks coffee in the lobby!
Manager Response: Dear Kirsten,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very happy to hear that you had an excellent experience with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We are glad that you enjoyed our property and friendly staff. We hope that you will stay with us again soon for another wonderful stay!   Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed in a 1bedroom suite. 2 queen beds per bedroom and separate lounge area. The lounge area was small but we weren't at the hotel much as we spent the days at Disney The hotel is very clean and the staff helpful Room was serviced daily  The bus to Disney stopped right at the front door and you can buy an ART ticket very easily which is helpful The hotel has a good buffet breakfast There is a coin operated laundry at the hotel The only improvement I would suggest is better lighting in the room as it was dark at times.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra,  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor. We are sorry to hear that the lighting did not meet your standards. We are very happy to hear that you had a very enjoyable stay with us during your trip to Disneyland! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make sure that our guests have a wonderful experience with us by providing excellent service and clean, comfortable rooms. We thank you for being a guest at our hotel and we hope to have you again in the near future for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: This hotel has several nice amenities, including restaurant, pool, state of the art gym, and a complementary Disneyland shuttle. Located near a number of other local areas of interest for shopping and entertainment. Staff was friendly and helpful with special requests that made our stay more enjoyable.
Manager Response: Dear Logan,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our in-hotel amenities, including our complimentary Disneyland shuttle. We are also glad that you found our location convenient to the Outlets at Orange, and that our staff was able to assist you with your special requests. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: We stayed at the Double Tree in Anaheim to visit Disneyland.  This hotel provided the perfect location and a complimentary shuttle to the park.  The room was comfortable and quiet and the staff was very pleasant.  One of the shuttle bus drivers was AWESOME, Ray, so friendly!!  I would recommend this hotel for comfortable stay and definitely if you are planning on visiting Disneyland, we will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Lori,  Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you enjoyed Ray, our shuttle driver. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to ensure that our guests have a comfortable room and that they are met with excellent guest service. We would like to thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Excellent venue for business meetings. There are plenty of places within walking distance for food at every price point.  Shopping and entertainment within walking distance as well.  This is also easy on and off
Manager Response: Dear Paula,  Thank you for your 5-star review of our hotel on TripAdvisor! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed our property and thought it was an excellent venue for business meetings. We are also very glad to hear that our location was convenient access to the Outlets at Orange and other restaurants. We would like to thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Service Team

Summary: nice rooms and starbucks in hotel, friendly staff as well. No issues at all with stay, and they accomodated my family. I do apprecaite how they were friendly with me since I parked my 6x10 trailer and gave me VIP access.
Manager Response: Dear Joe,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We are also very glad to know that our staff accommodated your trailer and granted you VIP access as well. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, our guests are our priority and we want to ensure that all of their needs are met. We would like to thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again soon for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Checking in was great, the staff were friendly and the room outstanding. I especially liked the room configuration. Went to the lobby restaurant for a quick dinner however it was just slightly slow. Would reserve here!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star review of our hotel on TripAdvisor! We are very glad to hear that you had an enjoyable experience with us during your meeting. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to ensure that our guests' needs are met through excellent guest service and clean, comfortable rooms. We would like to thank you again for being our guest and we hope to have you again for another wonderful stay!  Sincerely,  The DoubleTree by Hilton Service Team

Summary Heading: If you do what you've always done, You'll get what you've always gotten
Summary: All staff members and team of the Double Tree Hilton went far and beyond there duty to serve my wife and I. Management was incredibly outstanding. From the first phone reservation call to the arrival of our taxi home departure to the airport. It was the most amazing experience since my bicycle race in Venice Italy. Thank you for making this birthday for my wife an experience she and I will never forget. Your love and compassion for us are breathtaking. Thank you so much for everything. We want to come back
Manager Response: Dear Alvin,  Thank you for your 5-star review of our hotel on TripAdvisor! We are excited to hear that your experience with us was a terrific one! Thank you for choosing us as the place to spend your wife's birthday. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to ensure that our guests have a memorable and enjoyable stay. Once again, we would like to thank you for being our guest and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon for another awesome stay!   Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The staff members were very proactive and friendly. They were always concerned about your needs, recommendations, directions and things to do in the city. Housekeeper was very friendly and wiped down the phone and picture frames and bedding daily. This is a true test to see if your housekeeper pays attention to detail and she passed way above expectations. Great job Doubletree.
Manager Response: Dear Steve,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We are very happy to hear that our housekeeping staff were on our A-game in regards to cleanliness of our guest rooms. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, it is the little things that make all the difference with our guests. We love to accommodate guests with suggestions and tips for enjoying the city of Orange and the surrounding areas. We would like to thank you again for your stay with us and we hope to have you again as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely,   Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: The hotel was close to disneyland park. The staff was very friendly and was very accommodating when we needed more towels and soap.  The rooms were very clean.  There were many options for restaurants near by the hotel. I would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are very glad to hear that you had a very enjoyable stay with us. We take pride in our hotel rooms to ensure that they are clean and that our guests are provided with towels and soap when needed. We are very happy to provide excellent guest service as well. We would like to thank you again for your stay with us and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely,   Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: First as an Honors member was not placed on the 4 Honors floor.  Coffee in the room was very bland. Worked in the room and every 8 minutes the building would shake and this low level rumble. HVAC does not turn off. 2 settings Low, high and off.   Very high prices for food. Food was ok.
Manager Response: Dear William,  Thank you for your review. We are really sorry to hear that your hotel room was not placed on an HHonors floor. We would also like to apologize for the noise disruptions that you encountered with the room and the HVAC settings. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we strive to ensure that our guests have a pleasant and memorable experience with us. Once again we apologize for your experience with us and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future.  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Good Except For One Important Requirement
Summary: We visited the last weekend in August.  Staff was personality plus (except for 1), food in hotel restaurant awesome, and rooms comfortable to relax in between outings.  Only one mile from Disneyland/Adventure Land with the bus line stop conveniently in front of the hotel.  Having said this, an important factor not considered by check-in rep at time of check-in was customer vs. in-house event planned.  We were given a room on the 2nd floor and it was only after we "spread" out in the in hotel with belongings and snuggled in bed that we discovered that there was an "event" in the hotel that presented LOUD entertainment.  The room was muffled enough to deliver a LOUD muffled sound that was a THUMP THUMP until midnight.  After the 3rd wake up, I could not get back to sleep.  My 5
Manager Response: Dear Li,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are very sorry to hear that the noise disrupted your stay with us. We are also sorry to hear about the substandard guest service that you encountered. On the other hand we are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your room stay and the location convenience to Disneyland. We would like to thank you again for staying with us and we hope that you will choose our location again in the near future.  Sincerely,   Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Our room on the 15th floor gives a great view of the city and freeway. Everything is nearby and just walking distance to restaurants and shopping. We have a southwest view of the city. The Block shopping center is close to restaurants as well. We're staying her because my daughter's wedding is nearby and the hotel is close to the church and the Bowers museum.
Manager Response: Dear Andy,  Thank you for your review and for choosing us as your place to stay during your daughter's wedding! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We take pride in the fact that our hotel is in very close proximity to the Outlets at Orange and minutes to the Disneyland park. We would like to thank you again for your stay with us and we hope to have you again as our guest for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange Service Team

Summary: This hotel is in the top 3 that I have encountered (and I've even stayed at the Bellagio in Vegas, which was very nice.).  However, the customer service and cleanliness of the hotel was pristine and above and beyond my expectations!  I was on a "beer budget", but got "champagne treatment". Perfect for 2 or for the entire family.  I will be back - again and again when I visit Southern California.  Thank you!  Michelle Gomez
Manager Response: Dear Michelle,  Thank you for your 5-star review on TripAdvisor! We are very pleased to be in your top 3 hotel choices! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we strive to give our guest the best hotel experience for a great price. We are very happy to hear that you will be back to see us again the next time you visit Southern California. We look forward to having you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange Service Team

Summary: Great hotel. Very clean, nice and friendly, welcoming staff. I would stay there again. Pool was nice. Bar restaurant area great. Great location to mall, movie theater. not far at all to Disney land, LA convention center.
Manager Response: Dear Heather,  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor and for staying with us! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience at our hotel. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to ensure that our guests have a comfortable, enjoyable stay. We are proud to have our location easily accessible to nearby attractions such as the Outlets at Orange, Disneyland and Angel Stadium. We would like to thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have you as our guest again for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange Service Team

Summary: We booked the Doubletree Anaheim/Orange because we had a family wedding in Orange and we planned on going to Disneyland during our stay.   The Doubletree Anaheim/Orange was an EXCELLENT choice. The staff at this hotel are super helpful and friendly. The rooms are very clean and cozy. We are HHonor members so we stayed on a HHonor floor (take the time to sign up for HHonor, the perks are great--free wifi, later checkout time).   The hotel was no more than 10 minutes from Disneyland and had a shuttle that left every hour and picked up guests from Disneyland every hour until 15 min after park close. Although we didn't go, it was conveniently located to Angels stadium as well.   There is a bar, store, and restaurant on property.   I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mzito,   Thank you for your review and for staying with us for your family wedding! We are pleased hear that you enjoyed your friendly staff and the clean and cozy rooms. We are also glad that you took advantage of your perks by being an HHonors member! It is our pleasure to provide complimentary shuttle service to our guests. We would like to thank you again for choosing us as your hotel and we hope to welcome you again in the near future for another great stay!  Sincerely,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary: Staff was very helpful, the room was great, and I would definitely stay there again. It was very convenient to freeway for ease of traveling, lots of restaurants choice in the local neighborhood to choose from.
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we strive to ensure that our guests have a great experience with us and that our location is central to all of the nearest attractions. We appreciate you being our guest and we hope to have you again in the near future for another great stay!  Sincerely,   Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Service Team

Summary Heading: Decent proprety not far from Disneyland
Summary: I visited this hotel in August 2015.  I choose this property because it is not far from Disneyland and their prices are generally cheaper than closer properties to the Disney resort.  I paid about $300 for 3 nights which is very decent. Upon arrival, a very friendly clerk checked me in in no time. As a HHonors member, I had a room on one of the HHonors floors and free wi-fi, which is nice. The hotel caters for big groups and it feels like a big complex in the middle of nothing much. The rooms are a bit dated and the whole decor is anonymous and cold. The fitness room was small but decent. The concierge was rather friendly. The staff running the shuttles back and forth from Disneyland (about 1 shuttle per hour) was great:  always enthusiatic and kind.  The ride to the Disney
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the issues that you encountered with us during your stay and are glad that they were quickly resolved. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to ensure that our guests have a great experience with us. We are happy that you enjoyed our staff and the shuttle service to Disneyland. We would like to thank you and hope that you will reconsider staying with us again in the near future.

Summary: First time staying at this hotel but look forward to many more stays in the future. Staff was great < valets were awesome > made us feel they wanted to help and accommodate our needs not theirs ! Hard to find now days.  Thank you all again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are excited that you enjoyed your stay with us! Here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we want to make sure that our guests enjoy their stay with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our staff and their friendly service, particularly our valet team. We thank you again for being our guest and we hope to have you again for another great stay!

Summary: VERY satisfied with how polite and helpful their hotel staff is...great experience! The hotel is only about a 5 minute drive to Disneyland, so location was also PERFECT!!! I would DEF stay at this hotel again and highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want our guests to have a great experience. If you have not taken advantage of our complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland Resort, please do so upon your next stay with us! We thank you again for being our guest and we hope to have you again for another great stay.

Summary Heading: Extremely reasonable rate for a very nice room
Summary: Rooms were clean, bedding very comfy.  Rooms were equipped with a small fridge, microwave and coffee maker.  Beds could've been bigger, even though I knew they were only going to be doubles, they seemed extra narrow.  There were dirty wet ceiling tiles right under the front door, however when I brought it to the attention of the front desk staff, they had them replaced by the time we came back from dinner.  The pool area was very nice with a lot of seating as well as a Jacuzzi.  Upon arrival you get a very yummy chocolate chip cookie, there's a Starbucks and sundries type store as well as a nice bar area and a restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that we were able to take care of those tiles for you! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange, we strive to make our guests feel comfortable and to make sure that any issues brought to our attention are treated as a top priority. We are glad that you enjoyed the in-room amenities and our property as a whole. We thank you for staying with us and hope to have you as our guest again in the near future for another great stay!

Summary: Average to below average on the rooms. Service was good.  Bring lots of money.  Prepare to spend $15 per day to park. For $20 per day you can have valie parking. Construction outside my window starting 5 AM.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very appreciative of your feedback on your experience with us. We are glad that you enjoyed our service. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to ensure that our guests enjoy their stay with us. We apologize for the construction noise that took place nearby off our property. We thank you again for your stay with us and we look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future.

Summary: Not sure of the room number or floor. But, regardless it was a great stay for our first stay in LA. Great view. Great staff. Took great care of the car. The bar was fun as well. We actually went to the Powerhouse Concert at the Honda Center (where the Anaheim Ducks play), wasn't a far drive. The Angels Stadium was right down the block as well. We had a great time. Also, it is not a long drive from the mall and Disneyland! They have shuttle that comes every hour to pick you up and drop you off. It was awesome! Loved our stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to have been your hotel of choice for your first trip to Los Angeles! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we love to hear of great guest experiences, and we strive to ensure that our guests are well taken care of during their stay. We are glad that you enjoyed your time with us, and we hope to have you again as our guest in the near future for another great stay!

Summary: This was my first stay at a Doubletree property and I was pleasantly surprised. The room was clean and comfortable and the location was convenient to area attractions. There is a free shuttle to Disneyland that departed hourly during peak hours. This is also the first hotel that I have ever stayed at in which I was given two bottles of water and a cookie without charging a resort fee. I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are honored to be your first DoubleTree hotel! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to ensure that our guests have a very comfortable stay. We are very glad that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland and that you found our location to be very convenient to your favorite attractions. We would like to say thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Came to Anaheim on a business trip, but managed to get in some leisure time. I enjoyed this Double Tree, and their signature cookie. The property was beautiful and was within walking distance to Angel's Stadium (which I was able to catch a baseball game the day of my arrival). Also has a mall/outlet right behind which had some good food options. They do provide a shuttle service to Disneyland and have a Starbucks. Restaurant on their premises. Wonderful room and had a nice view of the stadium.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us while on business and that you managed to sneak in some leisure time as well! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to ensure that our guests have a great experience, no matter the occasion. We are glad to know that you easily accessed the Angel Stadium and the Outlets at Orange easily from our location. We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed your room view and the many amenities that we provide for our guests. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you again in the near future for another great stay!

Summary Heading: Good hotel but beware of old rooms
Summary: It's an OK hotel for a decent price given its great location. They put me in the third floor which is not completely refurbished so you can tell that the hotel dates back to the 70s by the ceiling paneling and the old bathroom wallpapers. I really think that $15 for overnight parking is quite steep. The breakfast at the hotel restaurant was quite nice however.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that the parking rates were a bit steep, but we are glad that you were satisfied with your overall stay and the rate you were offered. The DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County will plan on remodeling the third floor rooms. We are happy that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. Again, thank you for your stay with us and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future.

Summary: Was attending a lacrosse tournament with my boys and also adding on a few vacation days. This hotel worked great as the location was convenient to the venue and the beaches and had more amenities than we expected. My boys were thrilled to see the basketball and tennis courts. They played basketball one evening and we played tennis one afternoon for over 2 hours they were having so much fun. Of course, they like to have a pool and this one had a nice patio area we ended up eating lunch out there one day. I am a Hilton Honors member so WiFi was free. There is a charge for parking but that is common in the area so no big deal. Our group rate included the breakfast buffet each day and that was very nice as well. Our room was quiet, and I really liked that each floor only had a few
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us during your lacrosse tournament! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange, we strive to ensure that our guests enjoy their experience with us, no matter the occasion. We are happy to hear that our staff made your stay more pleasant, and that you enjoyed the many amenities offered to our guests. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again for another great stay!

Summary: This property was very accessible.  They even have a lift into the swimming pool for anyone who may need it & a true wheelchair van for shuttling guests.  The staff was very kind & assisted me w/o hesitation.  I will be happy to stay at this property again in the future and it's proximity to Disneyland is great!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County we take it upon ourselves to make sure that our guests have proper accessibility during their stay. We also are pleased to hear that our staff was accommodating to your needs. We thank you for your stay with us and we look forward to having you as our guest in the near future for another great stay!

Summary: This hotel is a great location if you are going to an Angel's baseball game or to Disneyland.  We have stayed here many times before.  This stay was a bit pricey however, $277 after taxes etc. but most of Anaheim was booked.  Possibly Disneyland's 60th Birthday??  Had it not been so expensive this time, we probably would have stayed another night and caught another baseball game.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you came back to stay with us! We enjoy seeing our guests over and over again at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. It is our pleasure to be in close proximity to our guests' favorite destinations such as Disneyland and the Angels Stadium. We thank you again for visiting us and we hope to have you as our guest at our hotel in the near future for another enjoyable stay!

Summary Heading: Great stay, great location, phenomenal staff.
Summary: Friendly staff, so helpful, spoke Spanish and greeted my daughter by name each day. Clean rooms and hotel. Delicious breakfast with real fresh squeezed orange juice. Love the little Starbucks inside the hotel and the laundry area by the pool. Was really nice that it was close to an outlet mall. Great schedule for the free shuttle to Disneyland. Amazing stay, would go back and recommend to anyone without hesitation. Thank-you to all the amazing staff that made our stay so comfortable even away from home!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are excited to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we make it our goal for families to feel welcome and at home during their stay with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the Starbucks located in our lobby, the friendly service form our staff and the amenities that we offer our guests. It is also our pleasure to provide complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland park. We hope to have you and your family as guests in our hotel again for another great stay!

Summary Heading: not my first time at this hotel
Summary: Its a hotel very clean the staff are so nice from the first employee you see at the door to the rest ...very polite rooms are enough big clean prices not bad , so in my concern its what my expectations from a hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we always look forward to our guests returning to stay with us again and again. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our staff's service and that your room was comfortable and that we met your expectations. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future so we can go above and beyond your expectations.

Summary: The overall hotel was nice. The lobby was welcoming, and the staff friendly. We did not have working air conditioning which made it hard to sleep. We only stayed the one night, so we do not know how quickly that would have been fixed. We did arrive early, and they were able to give us a room.
Manager Response: Thank your for your review. We are sorry to hear that the air conditioning was not working in your room. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want our guests to be comfortable and to feel free to address any issues concerning their stay with our staff. We thank you for your input and we hope to have you as our guest again for another good stay.

Summary: My husband had family here so we went to hang and catch up. It was clean and staff was friendly. I would stay here again if I get the chance! We are planning on going in October and will be choosing here... As long as the price isn't too high! OC tends to get pricey in season😔
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting family! At the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim, we pride ourselves in having clean, comfortable rooms for our guests and to ensure that they receive excellent service from our staff. Thanks for staying with us and we hope to see you here in October for another great stay!

Summary: The staff here at The Double Tree were very friendly and courteous. They will go out of their way to make your stay enjoyable. The room was clean and spacious. we picked this location because of its close proximity to Disneyland, and it did not dissapoint.  Thanks again guys!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! It is our pleasure and duty at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County to make sure that your stay with us is an enjoyable and helpful one. We are very happy to know that you chose our hotel because of its close proximity to Disneyland. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to be your hotel of choice again in the near future for another great stay!

Summary: 1 night stay and things couldn't have gone smoother. Checked in around noon. Cookie was great at reception and everyone we came in contact with were very pleasant. Room was perfect. Bar was open. Room had a view of Angels stadium which is why we were there. Only downfall was Red Sox lost!!!!! Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are excited that you enjoyed your stay with us while you saw the Angels/Red Sox game! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want you to enjoy your stay with us, whether for business or for pleasure. We are very happy to hear that your stay with us was excellent and that you enjoyed the view of the Angels Stadium from your room. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to have you again as our guest for another great stay!

Summary: The Double Tree by Hilton in Orange, CA is a wonderful, friendly, and very clean hotel. I would stay here again and again with our team or family. Gotta love the cookies and hospitality they deliver. Beatiful pool and welcoming bar are open late.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, it is our pleasure to make sure that our guests' needs are met by our helpful, friendly staff. We are also happy to hear that you enjoy our warm, delicious cookies. We thank you for being a guest at our hotel and we hope to have you in our hotel for another great stay.

Summary: No mention of nightly parking fees which totaled to $150 in extra charges. Transferred to overseas call center to make reservation, but told afterward that there is an onsite reservationist. Group reservation made as individuals and guests were told they would be charged on their personal cards before they could check in, even though a company card was provided during reservation process. Not happy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you deserve. We apologize for any miscommunication with the additional charges for amenities at the hotel. Thank you for alerting us to this issue, and we hope you’ll give us another chance to make it right.  Thank you,  DoubleTree Management

Summary: This is a very attractive hotel located near Disneyland, Angel's Stadium, the Honda Center and so much more. Our room was attractive and comfortable and check-in was easy. We were not able to make use of the pool this visit. It does have decent coffee in the rooms or you can stop in the barista counter for Starbucks. We had the American breakfast at the restaurant and it had a nice selection of hot and cold items.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear about your great experience at our hotel! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want our guests to feel welcome and at home when they are away from home. We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast and our coffee choices. It is our pleasure to have you as our guest, and we hope to have you again soon in the near future for another great stay!

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights.  Lobby is simple and classy. Room is cozy,with comfortable bed. Well,it lacks modern touch,I guess?The hotel itself is very clean and all,but it's kinda looks old with their yellow lighting and all.  Breakfast was okay.Their menus are always the same everyday.It's simple and healthy actually,but boring at the same time too.  Overall I enjoyed my stay here.And I hope they will do more upgrades and mix some fun things into their concepts.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback in regards to the appearance of our hotel. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to keep our guests happy and comfortable during their stay at our hotel. We have been making some updates to our rooms so we can keep our guests coming back for more. We hope that you will visit us again in the near future for another good stay.

Summary: Nice rooms although not top modern. Has refrigerator in room. The gym has unfortunately no bikes. Friendly and service minded personnel. Near the convention centre so convenient if you attend something there. 10 minutes walk to Disneyland. I had a room facing the pool and it was quite. Beds a little to soft for my taste.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to make sure that our guests enjoy their stay with us, and that our staff is friendly and accommodating. We thank you for visiting us and we hope to have you as our guest in the near future for another great stay.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here one night while on a business trip. As a Diamond Member, I am used to getting frequent upgrades at Hilton affiliated properties. When we checked in online, we found that they had upgraded us to the Presidential Suite. The room was extremely large, well appointed and had gorgeous views of Anaheim. The staff were all helpful and even helped us fix one of our pieces of luggage that had a piece break off. If you are a Diamond member, they will give you two free appetizer coupons to the bar, two free drinks, and free continental breakfast. The breakfast had some great breads, but was not as well appointed as other continentals I have seen. If you are hungry, you will likely want to spring for the upgraded hot buffet. Overall, a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you were extremely satisfied with your Presidential Suite upgrade! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we value our Hilton HHonors Diamond members and want them to experience the best of the best at our hotel. We are also glad to hear that you were assisted by our staff with your broken luggage. We thank you for your stay with us and hope to have you as our guest again in the near future for another fantastic experience!

Summary: Stayed here as a part of a large conference. The property was nice and clean and the staff was incredibly nice! Having attended this conference at other hotels, I have to say my experience here was 20 times better. My room was comfortable and the conference facilities and services were wonderful. The food was good and again, the staff was excellent! I did have a problem connecting with the wifi but in the end, that wasn't a deal breaker. Also, my king sized bed was a little small but it was so comfortable. Slept good my entire stay! I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you experienced issues with your Wi-Fi service. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to be the best and ensure that our guests have a great experience, from having a clean, comfortable room to our friendly service from our staff. We thank you for staying with us during your conference, and we hope to have you again as our guest in the near future for another great stay!

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel many times in the past and they are currently going through a few major remodels. They are building a parking structure which can be challenging but they are using valets to manage the parking challenges. It is supposed to be finished in the next few weeks. The bar has been completely remodeled and extended from 4-6 seats to a large arch seating 10-12. Several new TV's have been added and it is a lot more inviting and functional than in the past. One thing that hasn't changed is some key staff - Julio continues to welcome guests with a big smile at the front door and Rafael and Rogelio work their tails off making newcomers and  regular guests feel well taken care of in the new Bar/Lounge area. making guests feel welcome during a major remodel has got to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are excited to hear that our staff, particularly Julio, Rafael and Rogelio made you feel welcome at our hotel! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to make every guest feel welcome and taken care of, even during a time where our hotel is undergoing remodeling. We thank you for your patience and patronage. We definitely look forward to having you as our guest once again in the near future for another great stay!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay after a magical day at Disneyland
Summary: Best hotel to stay at after going to Disneyland. The rooms are extremely nice and spacious. It's super quiet. Great place to rest. They provide great customer service. You will enjoy your stay. Highly recommend without no hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to be your hotel choice during your visit to Disneyland! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make sure our guests are comfortable and that they enjoy our clean, spacious rooms. We are very glad to have had you as our guest and we would like to welcome you back very soon for another great stay!

Summary: The hotel staff performed their job to the highest expectations. I was extremely pleased with valet, bell-hop, front desk, waiter and maintenance services.   The cleanliness of the hotel was impeccable.   The pool was awesome! My wife and kids loved it!  My only problem was I was charged for a movie when it should have been included in my all inclusive rate. Please itemize your bill when you check out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about the movie charge that you received on your final room invoice. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had a great stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to have you as our guest, whether for business or for vacation. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the service from our staff. Please give us a call at 714-634-4500 if you would like to speak to a member of our staff regarding your final room invoice. We thank you for being a guest in our hotel and we hope to have you and your family return for another great stay.

Summary: We had a 3 night stay here for our Disney trip. Booked 2 rooms and requested they were adjoining. My coworker recommended the DoubleTree and said it was all about the COOKIE. When we arrived to check in they told us there were no adjoining rooms available ( I guess that's never a guarantee) and on top of that, WE WERE NEVER OFFERED A COOKIE!! The room service was decent but overpriced. The breakfast we ate in the restaurant was better. I had signed up for the Hilton Honors but was told that my stay didn't qualify since we booked through a 3rd party? No big deal, but the points for all the amenities we paid for should have been added but I still haven't received them. All in all a decent stay but the fiasco of waiting one HOUR to check in was not favorable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you did not receive your room request and that you did not receive a cookie upon your arrival. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, our chocolate chip cookie is a brand staple that we proudly give to each guest upon check-in. If you have any questions about the Hilton HHonors program, please feel free to contact us at 714-634-4500. We thank you for being a guest at our hotel and hope to have you as our guest again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great service, free Disneyland shuttle, small beds
Summary: This Doubletree is clean and what you'd expect from this level of the Hilton brand.  The staff was very friendly, and the free Disneyland shuttle left every hour all day, making it easy to travel with kids.  We had to ask for a fridge for our room, and the advertised microwave never showed up, although if we had really needed it, we could've had one delivered.  True to its name, it indeed has double beds, which are WAY too small for tired people, even when one adult and one young child shared.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that the size of our beds were not quite to your liking. We are happy that you chose us as your place to stay during your visit to Disneyland! At the DoubleTree by HIlton Anaheim-Orange County, it is our pleasure to provide our guests with complimentary shuttle service to and from the Disneyland park. We want to ensure that our friendly staff assists each guest during their stay

Summary: its nice area and near by Disneyland staff is very friendly and great breakfast and quite rooms. the rooms are kept very clean and the soap is great. clean towels and bed-sheets are great . the parking valet is great also so is the staff out their.
Manager Response: Thank your for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a good stay with us! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make sure that each guest at our hotel has a great experience, just as you have.We pride ourselves in maintaining our hotel and guest rooms so every guest has a comfortable stay. We hope to have you again as our guest in the near future for another good stay!

Summary: The Hotel was going through a computer upgrade. I was assigned a room, and not able to change the floor. The room was average at best. No Door on the closet. the Cooling system did not work very well, the room felt humid all the time, even after maintenance checked the unit. Also, there was no setting for Auto fan. This means the fan ran for the entire time. this was annoying when sleeping
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for the issues that you experienced with your room during your stay. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.   Thank you,  Doubletree Management Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel and the room was very clean. I love that they have a patio out back with a fireplace to sit and relax....you can watch the ducks, the fish, enjoy the weather, go swimming. We had an excellent time. We made reservations here because it is within 5 minutes to the Angels Stadium. We went to see the Yankees/Angels game. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We love that you enjoyed the natural scenery of the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! Our location is in very close proximity to the Angels Stadium, Disneyland and restaurants and shops. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed our service from our staff and that your room was comfortable and clean. It's our privilege to have you as our guest, and we hope to see you again for another great stay!

Summary: We loved this hotel, had great service, nice rooms, and would recommend to anyone.  Shuttle service to Disneyland was convenient, pool was nice, and above all the staff was fantastic.  As we were going to be driving around California as well, we had a car and the convenience to the freeways was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County was a super one! It is our pleasure to welcome you at or hotel and we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our staff as well as our pool and shuttle service to Disneyland. We hope to have you again as our guest in the near future for another great stay!
