Summary: I am a regular at doubletree hilton in anaheim my gf and I stay there every 2 weeks or every month just to getaway from everything.   I booked a king bedroom and as I came to the front desk the guy greeted me "Welcome back Ms. Sun" lol. So he said my parking is gonna be comp because I'm a gold member I didn't know the parking is free if you're a gold member because I was paying before (will ask about it when I get back)   Then they gave me my key card and it wasn't the room that I originally booked so I just let it go and to my surprise it was a presidential suite. Thanks to you guys! Really made my day :)  Will see you in 2 weeks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to have made your day by upgrading your room to the Presidential Suite! We value our guests who come to stay with us at the DoubleTree by HIlton Anaheim-Orange County. It is our privilege to be your hotel of choice whenever you feel like getting away! We look forward to seeing you again for another great stay.

Summary Heading: If We Turn on TV - People Will Think We Are Open
Summary: At 4 PM I went to the lobby bar, whipped from a day of hectic business meetings. All I wanted to do was sit, fire up the laptop return some emails and watch the woman's world cup featuring USA vs. Germany - a big deal in the sports world and source of national pride.    However it took an act of congress to get the bartender and cocktail server to stop for a quick second to push the TV "on" button. I never could get them to put on the match. When i inquired again, i was told by the surly barkeep that if they turn on the TV's people will think they are open. Hmmm, business/revenue, activity, customer engagement, excitement no matter who you rooted for...yes God forbid.   Apparently these are not the positive outcomes that this hotel F & B Manager is interested in. As a very
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We sincerely apologize for the unacceptable level of service that you experienced. We try our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay, and we are very sorry that we did not achieve that. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again so we can deliver a higher level of customer service.  Thank you,  DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: We stay here quite frequently in the summer so that we can walk to and from the stadium for Angels games. Mostly a good bargain, and the cookies are great, but they get you on the mandatory valet parking. Ridiculous.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry that you experienced issues with the pricing of our valet service. We are happy that you enjoyed the cookies and that you were easily able to access the Angels Stadium! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim, we want our guests to enjoy their stay with us, no matter the occasion. We hope to have you as our guest again for another good stay.

Summary: Hotel had great shuttle service to and from the Disney Parks and ran every hour. The breakfast was a great touch, we also enjoyed the Valet parking and internet. We purchased the inclusive package ( BEST VALUE)  and hotel room overall was okay, the double beds were a bit too small and we had issues with the TV.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you had issues with the television in your room. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland, as well as our valet and other amenities. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, it is our goal to make our guests feel welcome and comfortable during their stay. We thank you for your visit and we hope to have you again as our guest for another great stay!

Summary: The hotel was conveniently located to Orange county Civic Center.  The staff was extremely courteous and went out of their way to assist me.  The cookie at check-in is a bonus.  I had an upper floor room and the view was nice.  The room was updated and beautifully appointed.  And the shower was pretty incredible.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are thrilled to hear that you had an excellent stay at our hotel! We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed the friendly service from our staff. Our cookies are always a warm welcome for our guests! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange, we want each and every guest to enjoy their stay with us, just as you have! We hope to have you as our guest again at our hotel in the near future for another excellent stay!

Summary Heading: Decent rooms, but crappy parking and housekeeping terrible!
Summary: The hotel is nice and the pool area a little small.  Also, the laundry facility is very very small.  Only 2 washers & 2 dryers for the whole facility!!!! Crappy!!!  The beds are comfortable, but very small doubles!!!  More like twins.  Also, the fridge was broken and waited forever for a new one!  NO SELF-PARKING EITHER, ONLY VALET!!!! Have to pay the $15 fee regardless!!!  Wait a long time to get your vehicle.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your parking/valet experience at our hotel and we are sorry to hear that you received slow service in receiving a new refrigerator for your room. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange, we want our guests to have a great experience with us, from the time you arrive to our hotel. We hope to have you as our guest again in our hotel in the near future.

Summary: The hotel itself was very nice, but what I particularly liked was the service. We had booked this hotel last minute and they were almost full. I was pleasantly surprised to get an early check in. The room had a mini fridge and microwave (although we didn't need it) and 2 queen beds. The front desk staff were friendly and accommodating. One more thing I hadn't expected-free Wi-Fi access!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed the in-room extras and the friendly service from our staff! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange, we want our guest to have an enjoyable, comfortable stay. We are glad that you chose us as your destination on your quick trip and we hope to have you again as our guest in the near future!

Summary: It was quite a wait to check in - almost 15 minutes.  There was only one person at the desk and the person in front took forever.  By the time we got our turn the line was 6 long.  It was about 11:30 p.m.  We were upgraded to a family suite, which we appreciated.  The room was a strange layout, but it was clean and convenient.  The only unnerving thing was when someone would test the adjoining door.  It was loud and scary, but I see why they test it.  It's not really clear if it is locked or not.  We had breakfast downstairs twice.  It's a nice buffet spread at breakfast.  We were comped because we are Gold members, but I think it would still be a reasonable price if you paid for it.  Starbucks was in the lobby.  Parking was valet only, which wasn't my favorite, but there were
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your check-in experience at our hotel. We are glad to hear that you were upgraded to a Family Suite. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we strive to make our guests have a memorable and enjoyable stay. We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast buffet at our exclusive Trofi restaurant and appreciated the nearby shops and movie theater, as well. We look forward to having you again as a guest in our hotel in the near future for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: For families, this is good. Close to the Disney stuff. For business the wifi is fast enough to get work done. Close to freeway and a mall.  Lots if families and business folks. If you ate the kind if business traveler that gets chapped about others being on vacation when your not don't stay here.   It's close to SDN airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! Our hotel strives to fit your needs, whether you are a business traveler or on vacation. We take pride in knowing our guests enjoy the nearby restaurants and shops and that they are easily able to access the Disneyland theme park from our hotel. We look forward to having you as our guest again for another great stay!

Summary: I stayed here with my young family due its location to Disneyland. The service was very good and all the staff were very helpful. Our room was a good size for the family and very clean. We used the shuttle provided to Disneyland which was timely and had no issues. We used the valet parking as no other parking is available during construction and it is reasonable at $15 per night. On our next trip to Disneyland with the family we will for sure stay here again! Thanks double tree staff !
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a very nice stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to be a part of your memorable experience with your family, and we are glad to provide our guests with a comfortable room to stay in. You are most  certainly welcome, and we thank you for choosing us as your hotel! We look forward to having you again soon for another great stay.

Summary: Very pleasant all around. Clean (very important),quiet rooms , comfortable bedding .  The parking valet team were great; front desk staff very friendly, courteous and helpful.  I would make one recommendation to someone staying here: bring your own WiFi hotspot or tether to your phone.  We chose the $14.95 "Highspeed" option and it was everything but Highspeed. In fact I ran a speed test using Ookla and the Download speed was 3.52 Mbps!  The hotel was quick to refund that charge, they were very empathetic; there is just no control over the location of your room in relation to the location of the Internet access point- we stayed in a corner room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a very enjoyable stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We apologize for the issues that you encountered with the WiFi service you purchased, and we are glad to hear that our staff was empathetic to the situation. It is our pleasure to provide our guests with excellent guest service and provide you with a clean, comfortable room. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future for another enjoyable stay!

Summary: I needed to have a refrigerator in my room for my meds. Original room assigned did not have a refrigerator and I was told it was first come first served and I would need to request it. I could not chance not having a refrigerator available and considered changing hotels. I called the hotel and got connected to Myra who made sure I was placed in a room that had a refrigerator as standard. This solved my problem. When I checked in, the individual who assisted me advised me that the room had a refrigerator (I did not have to ask). This made my stay so much easier. I will definitely stay at this hotel if I find myself back in Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that Mayra was able to assist with providing you with a room with a refrigerator. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make sure that we meet the needs of our guests, even before arriving to our hotel. We look forward to having you as our guest for another great stay!

Summary: Excellent service. Had a nice stay with this hotel. shuttle to Disney was great. Next to the outlet and resturants. Valet parking awesome service. Rooms were clean. Prefer to comeback again. Great location.  Inside restaurant and bar. Had a great time with kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very excited to hear that you found your stay with us to be excellent! At the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make sure that all of our guests have a great and memorable stay. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the nearby restaurants and shops and our complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland. We hope to have you as our guest in our hotel for another great stay in the near future!

Summary: I stayed here with my family for one night for an Oakland A's game at Angel Stadium.  The hotel was very close to the stadium and was probably the best hotel choice in the immediate vicinity.  The property was clean and the staff was friendly.  They have a Starbucks in the lobby and I'd give the restaurant a B for overall food quality and service.  The rooms were on the smaller side but worked well for the one night.  All in all an a good stay.  I would stay here again and would recommend the hotel to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. It is our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel and we're glad that that our friendly staff provided you with great service. We appreciate your visit and we hope to have you as our guest again very soon!

Summary: If you want a nice, reasonably priced hotel with a great location... I would recommend this hotel.  I was there for a conference, but saw many vacationers.  Shuttle to Disneyland (no parking$).  Warm cookie upon check in is a nice touch.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you had a very nice experience with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It's our pleasure to provide you with a warm, delicious chocolate chip cookie when you arrive to our hotel, and to also provide complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland park. We are glad that you had a great time with us during your conference, and we hope to have you again in the near future for another pleasant stay!

Summary Heading: A Peach of a Place in Orange County
Summary: Very comfortable and accommodating hotel for business/conference activities.  The location is close to other off-site distractions including a shopping/night-life mall within a short walking distance.  This is a must-stay location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to be accommodating to our guests' needs and that you enjoyed our location being near your favorite shopping and nightlife areas. We hope to have you again as our guest in the near future for another awesome stay!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights in June 2015 to be close to Disney at the end of a West coast trip. There is a shuttle bus which takes you to and from Disney. We couldn't work out if this was complimentary or not as it was included in our room rate as an optional extra when booking but there seemed to be no checks about who went on it or not.  The room was fine, I think Hilton rooms are quite dark with poor lighting but there was tea and coffee in the room which is something I didn't see in other American hotels.   One major drawback was the lack of free WI-FI. We stayed in another Hilton earlier in our trip and it was free there - it made arrangements more difficult but the front desk were happy to answer all questions. There was a computer in the lobby but it wasn't
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that your experience with us could have been a better one. Just for future reference, the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County provides complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland theme park. We thank you for being a guest in our hotel and we hope to have you again in the near future.

Summary: Stayed last night on work trip, took the free breakfast instead of extra point......don't be fooled, the breakfast they tell me this morning is only the cold items from the buffet; it was another $7 for the warm food.  I skipped it because I was mad.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.  Thank you,

Summary: My family and I have stayed here numerous times over the years.  Convenient shuttle to Disney parks and within a mile of angel stadium makes this hotel a truly great experience.  Orange mall is within walking distance and has a lot of good shops and restaurants.  We enjoy the cookies at the front desk and this time we got the breakfast package with the room, and it's a good deal.  They are building a parking structure next door, so you have to valet park.  They are fast to get your car, even on a busy weekend like this weekend.  Our go to place when visiting!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We love that you have stayed with us numerous times here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are happy that our location has met your shopping and entertainment needs, and to always welcome you with a warm, delicious cookie. It is our pleasure to have you as our guest, and we look forward to you returning for another great stay!

Summary: service was extremely poor, valet parking 15.00 a day plus tips and have to wait for them to bring your car when you're rushing in and out. Mattresses very uncomfortable, do not recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Thank you,  DT Management

Summary Heading: Good stay for our 2 day visit !
Summary: Large rooms with two beds an separate living room with two TV an phones .bath with shower an vanity unit separated ....The beds  were extra comfortable an soft & silky sheets .....clean room with nice decor ! Free coffee machine in room too.  There's a coffee shop that sells Starbucks coffee an the lady was so lovely an nice an helpful as were the staff at reception desk .... There's a Disneyland centre in the hotel to buy you're tickets !!  Carparking was great value at $16 day !! Cheap !!$45 in Toronto !!   Wifi was quick an worked well !!   Disneyland is 30 min walk from hotel or take the art bus $5.00 daily !  $15 fro breakfast was a good price ,but choice to sleep in !!  Denny's is across the road  nice meals an across from Denny is a shell gas station an next door is a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable time with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to provide all of our guests with exceptional guest service and to make sure that you have a pleasant experience with us. We do provide complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland resort, so that is also another option available for accessing the theme park. We are glad that our location suited your dining and shopping needs, and that our amenities worked in your favor. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future for another great visit!

Summary: Have stayed here repetitively and enjoyed each visit. Cookies always a nice adder. This particular trip had a vast clientele of high school age students. Enough to fill six large transport buses which translated into crowded lobbies and elevators. Fortunately, I stayed on a different floor otherwise, I suspect neighboring room noise could have been a factor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Thank you for being a DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County frequent guest as well! We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us, despite the noise and crowds. It is a pleasure to welcome you with a warm cookie as well! We look forward to having you at our hotel in the future for another great stay.

Summary Heading: Hotel Stay for Chapman University Graduation of Our Daughter
Summary: Overall, we had a good experience except for the parking lot construction situation. The hotel staff was very nice, and the room was equally as nice. We had a premium room, which was very comfortable, and I would recommend the hotel to other guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry that the construction was a disruption to your visit at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. It is our pleasure to provide our guests with exceptional guest service and to ensure that you have a comfortable stay. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: I'm Hilton Diamond, work for an airline and somehow have no status here...the front desk mentioned "contracts", yet these idiots need to grasp the concept that I have status because of money I spend, not my employer.  Following up with Hilton...  Lack of consistency for someone with "status" .... Why bother?
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the issues that you experienced during your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Thank you,   DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: We stay at this hotel often and like the location and service.  It is centrally located near many places we visit in Southern California and right off of highway 5. Our room even had a view of the Disneyland fireworks show!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that you had an enjoyable time at the DoubleTree by HIlton Anaheim-Orange County! We love knowing that you frequent our location and that you enjoyed the Disneyland fireworks show from your room! It is our pleasure to provide exceptional service, and we are glad that we were a part of your memorable experience. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future for another great stay!

Summary: Down to Anaheim to watch the first two Ducks/Flames games (Oh well). We booked through a package organized by the Flames. Rumour is that this is the hotel the Flames usually stay at, but didn't this time to shake things up (playoffs, of course). Staff knew who the Flames were, so there is some cred to this.  Take on the hotel? Standard good quality business hotel (certainly not a boutique). Room was average size with a quality king-size bed. Average swimming pool for class of hotel. Hotel restaurant is okay with options in walking distance. WiFi not included in our room package which is idiotic in this day and age.  Free shuttle to that place (doesn't start early enough if you have an early-entry pass) and a close taxi ride to the Ponda Center.  What sets them apart? Staff was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you had an enjoyable stay and that you were able to easily access the Honda Center from our location. We apologize for the dissatisfaction concerning our WiFi service. It is our pleasure to provide excellent service to our guests, and to make sure that they have a comfortable visit at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We hope that you come visit us again for another great stay!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but a lot of sirens and construction
Summary: Stayed here during a recent business trip to the area. The hotel was nice enough, but due to some major construction in the area, it was very crowded to park, etc. Plus its proximity to a local hospital made it quite loud at all times of night. A room away from the hospital may have been different, but for the price, I expected better.  The upside is it closeness to a local shopping/dining area. It was an easy walk over at night for access to various restaurants and shopping.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry that the construction and noise from the nearby hospital caused quite a commotion. We are happy to hear that you were able to easily access the nearby shopping areas and restaurants. We are glad that you were our guest at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, and we hope to have you soon for another great stay.

Summary: From the moment we pulled up until the moment we left, the staff was very welcoming and helpful. Rooms, lobby and hotel were maintained well.  As soon as you check in each guest is given a fresh warm cookie. They were delist :) I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We love knowing that you enjoyed staying with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! It is our pleasure to have our staff welcome you and to make sure that you are given a delicious cookie and a comfortable visit. We are glad to have been a part of your vacation and hope to have you again for another great stay!

Summary Heading: Great location, nice hotel, construction nearby
Summary: Have stayed here a number of times.  Convenient to Honda Center, A Stadium, Disneyland etc.  Area is undergoing construction, so watch for entrance, it is off Chapman, not the City Drive.  Parking is valet only, didn't use to be this way. Stayed last night, very nice and quiet.  Ask for side by Chrystal Cathedral.  Restaurant was closed last nite, but menu was avail at bar.  Will stay again.  Very pretty lagoon and pool area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are excited to know that you have been with us before and that our hotel is easily accessible to your favorite locations such as the Honda Center, Angels Stadium and Disneyland. On behalf of the hotel, we look forward to having you as our guest again for another great stay!

Summary: Loved the center location to attractions and stores.  Clean and safe area. You could see the Angel's stadium from outside the hall lobby.  From my room floor 9, you should see the Disneyland firworks at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are excited to hear that you had a great experience with us and that you enjoyed the views from your room! We are also glad to hear that our location suited your needs and that you were able to access our neighboring shopping center. We are glad to know that you had a pleasant stay with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County, and we can't wait to have you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: Upon my arrival at the hotel, I explained to the clerk that I had a small problem with my online reservation and had ended up with two separate reservations for two nights. She quickly remedied the problem and since I had previously checked in online, there was no delay in getting my room key.   Since the hotel is currently building a new parking structure, the only parking option was valet parking. The attendants were quick and friendly, always offering assistance with luggage and helpful with giving directions. Although I generally prefer to self-park, I would not hesitate to use the valet parking option again at this hotel.   My room was clean and quiet. I had a great view of the city and a comfortable bed. My trip did not include a visit to Disneyland, but this hotel is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that our staff was able to resolve your online reservation issue. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the comfortable room, views, our location and that our valet staff was of great assistance to you. We are sorry that you did not enjoy your experience with the Starbucks located in our lobby. Here at the DoubleTree by Hilton in Anaheim-Orange County, we want to make sure that our guests have a great experience from start to finish. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Clean, comfortable lodging,  friendly and helpful staff.  Very accommodating!   all the staff were excellent... Especially our breakfast server, Carlos and the courteous hostess on duty this morning for the breakfast buffet.  A great place to stay for a Disneyland vacation without being trapped in downtown Disney.   Walking distance to shopping and other restaurants ame across the street from UCI medical center.
Manager Response: Thank you for response. We are glad that you had a great stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County! We are excited to hear that you enjoyed our staff, especially our Trofi staff member Carlos. We are glad to hear that our location suited your needs and that it was a great part of your vacation experience. It is important that our guests have a great experience with us. We hope to have you again at our hotel in the near future for another enjoyable stay!

Summary: Staff was attentive and efficient; rooms wer updated, clean, and well-maintained; restaurant had good food and a great staff and was reasonable priced. Overall, a good value for the business traveler.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We are glad that your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County was a pleasant and enjoyable one. It is important that our guests have an enjoyable experience with us, and we are glad that our staff and hotel suited your needs. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future for another great stay!

Summary: I booked this at the last minute and got a deal and I was not sure what to expect. I was blown away! Not that the hotel was all that special but the rooms were nice and clean. But the staff was outstanding! Everyone was SUPER friendly and helpful. I was most impressed that the guy who took our room service order was the one to deliver it and said if anything was not amazing to call him and he'd replace it.  It was five minutes from the angel game, which is where I was going so it was perfect. I will stay here again (and again and again!)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to provide excellent room service to our guests. We are also glad to be in close proximity to the Angels Stadium. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: The room and beds were comfortable. We were really able to relax. Enjoyed the chocolate chip cookies. Hotel restaurant and bar make it easy to stay to eat and continue to relax. Free shuttle to Disneyland was appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for our staff to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Check in was not welcoming.  Two of our three rooms were not ready for us and it was already 7pm when we arrived.  We were told they still had a guest in one of the rooms.   After checking in they forgot to give us our breakfast vouchers.  We didn't find out we needed them until we went downstairs to eat the next morning.   The restaurant and staff were VERY nice and helpful.  The Concierge was also extremely helpful. Other than the check in process, we were pleased with our stay.  Upon check out we noticed a lot of construction noise from the level above but since we were on our way out it wasn't much of an inconvenience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with checking in at our hotel, and for the noise from the nearby construction. Here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange, we strive to ensure that our guests have an enjoyable experience, from the moment a guest arrives to the very last moment of their stay. We are glad that our staff gave you great service. We hope to have you again at our hotel for another enjoyable stay!

Summary: We stayed here for a long weekend to visit Disney and participate in the tinkerbell half marathon. Very nice hotel. Clean and quiet. Staff and service great. There is a shuttle back and forth to Disney land daily. The day of the race there was no special shuttle. We could walk to another hotel and catch one. The food we had was great from room service. Great cookies and the coffee was very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to provide free shuttle service to the Disneyland Resort and it is our pleasure to serve you our warm, delicious cookies and great coffee. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary Heading: Awful front desk. Bad for business
Summary: Terrible experience. I called prior to the reservation to take care of payment. When I went to check in the information was not on my reservation. Took 20 minutes for a front desk manager to come down. Then another 5 minutes to acknowledge me in the lobby. Then they didn't accept the payment on the card I requested. Every employee that I spoke with was very unkind and rude. My wife and I travel weekly for business and needless to say, we will no longer be staying at Hilton properties.   I will sign up for every review service just to communicate the fact that I'm over this brand and they have no loyalty for long time guests.   Thomas & Stephanie Boran
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry for the difficulties with our policies. Your comments will be taken under consideration as a training to ensure that we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Thank you,

Summary: excellent service, clean, well located, best cookies!  Ricardo the bartender in the lobby lounge goes above and beyond to make his service excellent!!  I'm a very frequent visitor as a Chapman University parent, which offers hotel benefits.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for our staff to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We are pleased to hear that your experience at our lobby bar was enjoyable. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: I would like to acknowledge the front desk clerk that evening  . She maintained her professional composure as she dealt by herself with a long line of customers.   I been at this location several times and this has always been an issue. Fix it! Get rid of the enforce valet and hire more front desk attendants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. Hearing from your guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We are happy to read that you were provided excellent guest service from our Front Desk attendant. We are doing our best to ensure that our staff can accommodate our guest's needs. We can't wait for you to come back into town and give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay.

Summary: Awesome stay!  Exceeded our expectations full service property.  Comfy bed.  Well equipped rooms.  Nice hot tub.  Friendly staff.  Delicious cookies.  Wish they had better signage out front as well as express checkout options.  Otherwise, fantastic!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your experience. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for our staff to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: I want to highlight the staff at this Doubletree - They are fantastic! From check-in to check-out (and beyond because I got help later when I needed a ride to the airport several hours after check-out). What really impressed me was how they worked together and supported one another. They did their job with a smile and genuine pleasure. You may expect that from  hotel staff, of course, however the manner and style with which they served the public tells me that they are happy to work for this Doubletree - so there must be something good going on!  Eat a meal at the restaurant for extra good service, too. I recommend the Maple Glazed Salmon - yum!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for our staff to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. The staff made us feel at home and we even enjoyed taking the shuttle to Disneyland.  This will definitely be a hotel I plan to stay in again. The only thing is that you have to request a deluxe room if you'd like a refrigerator.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and at home during your stay. We are more than happy to provide free shuttle service to Disneyland for our guests. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: I attended a conference here, and as far as the conference it was excellent -- great food, excellent service, lovely facilities.  The air conditioning in my room was weird, though -- like motion sensitive or something -- and I was hot all night, even with it set to 65.  And my sink apparently got backed up when I wasn't there -- it was dirty like it had been backed up but nothing on the floor or counter.  So it was weird.  Small pool, but there is a nice hot tub,  Overall very nice, and an excellent location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are sorry to hear that the air conditioning and sink in your room were not working efficiently. We are happy to read that you had a good experience at our hotel. We are happy you found the rooms clean and facilities useful during your stay. We can't wait for you to come back into town and give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay.

Summary: fine hotel.  clean, pleasant.   fine staff.   Coffee need much improvement; and they should offer whole milk Lobby not too loud, could be a lot quieter.  Is there anyone who likes that horrible background music.  Just shut it off!  parking expensive and required valet service is annoying.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. Hearing from your guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We are happy to read that you had a good experience at our hotel. We are happy you found the rooms clean during your stay. We can't wait for you to return to the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange and give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay

Summary: This was our first stop after a 14 hour flight and everyone was very accommodating, we checked in and got a complimentary room upgrade, complimentary drink at the bar and a view of Disneyland from our room as we were on our honeymoon.  We found the location to be great we had a hire car but didn't use it much at all as they had shuttle buses to Disneyland every hour from early morning to around 11pm at night. It was also within walking distance of an shopping outlet were you could spend your time whilst you were not at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We always look forward to providing our guests with great guest service and it is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: I know I requested a room with a refrigerator a suite and to my surprise I did not have one...Second the first thing you see when you walk in is the restroom..not happy. I also did not want to Valet and the second day I was there they wanted my keys, I refused..then upon leaving I request a cart to take my items to car they said I couldn't that it was a Liability. I have been in many Hilton Hotels in Adelanto, New Mexico and I never had a problem with my taking my things in and out or using a cart.  Also when ordering breakfast a $20,00 item came out costing $40. 00 and change...oh there was a Trip charge,,yes for the attendant walking in our room..plus a service charge I understand that...but all these other service that I was put in a situation of having to comply with  I was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are sorry to hear that your recent stay with us was not enjoyable. We value our guests and want to ensure that you receive the greatest guest service and are happy with your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anahiem-Orange. We hope that you will stay with us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: It's better to be outside the Disney circle!
Summary: I absolutely loved staying at this hotel. We chose to stay here for a DL visit. It was great to be just a bit outside of Anaheim and away from the DL adjacent crowds.   The check-in was easy and the front desk clerk accommodated my request for a view of the DL fireworks. The room was nice and modern.  I especially liked the mattresses.  It's so much easier to enjoy your family vacation when you get a good night's sleep on a nice mattress.    The hotel has a complimentary shuttle with friendly drivers, so you save money not having to shell out for the ART shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very glad that you had a great visit at DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange. It is our priority to make sure that our hotel staff and drivers provide excellent guest service. We are pleased to accommodate your room request to view the fireworks and that you enjoyed our complimentary shuttle service to the Disneyland park. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Best hotel experience Ive ever had
Summary: This hotel exceeded my expectations. It was the best experience I've ever had at a hotel. The staff was incredible. I booked the AAA Family Fun package which include breakfast vouchers for each day as well as free wifi. The location is perfect. It is very clean and has the fastest elevators I've ever seen. A+ rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very glad that you had a great visit at DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange. It is our priority to make sure that our hotel staff and valet provide excellent guest service. We are pleased that you enjoyed our restaurant and the speed of our elevators. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We stayed here for a week in April for a visit to Disneyland. The hotel is conveniently located, very clean, and the staff members were great (especially Rey, one of the Disneyland shuttle drivers).  The free shuttle to Disneyland is fantastic. I wasn't too excited about Valet only parking, but the attendants were great.  The breakfast offered at the restaurant is WAY overpriced, for 2 adults and 2 kids, it was $54 and we honestly ate the same things we eat at the free breakfast from The Homewood Suites or Residence Inn. Save your money and grab a breakfast sandwich across the streets at Starbucks or even eating at Tomorrow Land Terrace in Disneyland is less expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy to read that you had a great experience at our hotel. We are happy you found the rooms clean and amenities useful during your stay, and that you enjoyed our Disneyland shuttle driver, Rey. We can't wait for you to come back into town and give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Hotel....whether you're scheduled at UCI Med Center or planning an escapade to Disneyland
Summary: Double Tree Hotel has been consistently wonderful for us and our stays - all required for the purpose of scheduled medical appointments at UCI Medical Center...as we live in San Diego. The rooms are more than comfortable, the staff is outstanding and courteous, and the nearby shopping & restaurants provide a wonderful reprieve when needed.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very glad that you had a great visit at DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange. It is our priority to make sure that our hotel staff and valet provide excellent guest service. We are glad to be right next to your destination. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: This is a beautiful and clean hotel near ( but not too near ) Disneyland, Angel Stadium and Honda Center plus outlet mall and restaurants within walking distance. Be careful on room selection if you are a light sleeper as rooms facing hospital can get traffic noise. Parking is $15 for valet only BUT is quick and safe - just make sure you calculate that into your room rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Stayed  here one night for business.   Pleasant staff.  Hotel and rooms are clean  and well kept. Small fitness room with some broken equipment.  In walking distance of an outlet mall with many shops and a few restaurants. They have a shuttle to Disney.   Would stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: When we first checked in we were told we could only valet. I just bought my car and was a littl unsure. We then over heard the valet talking about test driving other cars and taking them for a spin. Which made me very uneasy, but we couldnt park it. After that one of them then drove a bit reckless around the bend in another. I was not sure about leaving my car but obviously had no other choice. Then they never told the bell man where our room was so our stuff was just sitting downstairs for about 45 mins till I went down stairs to grab the food for our dogs. He apologized and said no one told him where to bring the items. The room was contiunley stuffy. Our fridge would not get cold very cold unless I put a bag of ice in it. I am on medications that need to be kept cold. On
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Thank you,  DoubleTree Executive Team

Summary: The room was quiet and clean. The hosts were friendly and helpful. Internet service is adequate once you are logged in.  There is no airport shuttle service and there is no contact phone number at Orange County Airport. Shuttle service needs to be arranged six hours in advance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We're glad you had a nice stay and a good experience with our staff.

Summary: Located in a nice part of town and it's close to Disneyland. Their shuttle only runs once per hour but it was on time every time when I rode it. Very clean. Nice beds. Well appointed. The breakfast isn't complimentary but at their restaurant they have a breakfast buffet which is exceptional. Their convention area was very nice and Starbucks is there too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of DoubleTree Hotel at Anaheim-Orange. We are glad that you had an enjoyable stay. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Orange
Summary: This is a wonderful place to stay.  Close to malls and Disneyland.  We chose this location to connect with family members who were vacationing from out of the area.  The staff was very accommodating and we were treated royally.  The restaurant has a limited menu, but the food was good and we are glad we stayed here to have dinner even though there are many restaurants to visit in the immediate area.  We will definitely stay at this hotel when we are back in Southern California.  There is no self-parking at this time with only valet parking available, but there is a parking garage under construction which should be available soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had a great stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC! It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We are glad that our staff was very accommodating and that you enjoyed our exclusive restaurant. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We choose this hotel because it is across the street from UC Irvine Medical Center.  It was a very good value for the amenities it offered.  I felt safe staying here at night while my husband had surgery.  Everyone was fantastic.  They did not offer free internet unless you were not a Hilton Honors of a certain level.  An extra charge for this service was needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange. We are glad that you had a pleasant stay here at our hotel. We hope that you will stay with us again soon.

Summary: Overall the hotel is excellent, particularly for the price.  It has the feel of a high-end property.  Furniture a little dated but the bed was outstanding.   The rooms are large rooms and very clean.  Starbucks in the lobby is a plus.  Lobby and lobby bar are huge and quite nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange. We are glad that you enjoyed your room and that our Starbucks and lobby bar were of great convenience to you. We hope that you will choose us again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: It was a great visit. The hotel staff could not have been more helpful. The valet parking staff was outstanding. The rooms were clean and well maintained. The meeting rooms were great. The restaurant was very good. The outlet mall across the street had everything anyone would need. Plenty of good eating establishments throughout the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very glad that you had a great visit at DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange. It is our priority to make sure that our hotel staff and valet provide excellent guest service. We are pleased that you enjoyed our restaurant and meeting room. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The room was very clean and quiet.  The bed was incredibly comfortable.  Wi Fi worked well. Valet parking is mandatory and breakfast is not included.    We ate breakfast both days at the on site restaurant, which had a pretty nice buffet including fresh fruit, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, toast, bagels, yogurt, granola, cereal...the waiter was very attentive.  They make a big deal about the cookie at check in.  I wasn't impressed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of DoubleTree Anaheim-Orange. We are glad that you enjoyed your room and that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet at our restaurant. We make it a priority to make sure that our guests receive excellent service. We look forward to having you as our guest again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: great hotel for visiting Anaheim and Disneyland. Across road to the Block-huge outlet mall with 200 shops, many restaurants, cinema complex, Hotel was very clean, lovely pool area, laundry facility, shuttle to disney. This was my second time at this hotel and booking a third trip early next year
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay. It is our main priority to make you feel at home during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel a few times over the years and have always found it to be a pleasant stay. Lots of sitting room in the lobby and rooms are a good size and quiet. Coffee shop is open mornings and afternoons. Included breakfast is the cold items--fruit, cereal, pastries--but can be upgraded for $7 to include hot items. Hotel includes a shuttle to Disneyland and is also very close to Angels Stadium and the Honda Center.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We take pride in providing exceptional service to our guests. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: We'll Always Stay Here When We're in Orange
Summary: I'm very picky and I love this hotel...the rooms are clean, the desk staff and valet are great and you can't beat the location. We've stayed here four times and you just can't find a better place for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Glad to hear that you had a great experience with the hotel staff. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary Heading: Nice rooms in a good location
Summary: I have stayed here for business several times, sometimes for a week at a time and have enjoyed my stay here. It is not outstanding, but what I expect as average service for a Doubletree. The staff is not as friendly as many other Hilton properties, but the location is great and the rooms are clean and comfortable. Parking is a bit overpriced, but I just consider it part of the room rate. The fitness center is spacious and has enough equipment to get a quality workout. I do like that you can walk to restaurants and shopping or a drive a short distance to get into downtown Orange or Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you had a reasonable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the room and our fitness center. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: Had a lot of work to do and long hours.  The hotel was relaxing, which I really needed.  Valet was very prompt and always a pleasure.  They went over and beyond to take care of you and your needs.  The outdoor area is very relaxing and nice to have a glass of wine out their and just unwind.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. Its always nice to have a place to enjoy a nice glass of wine. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: I was in Anaheim for a convention and stayed in this location as it was the host hotel for the convention. It is over and above most hotels. Our room on the 15th floor had a great view. There are excellent restaurants within walking distance. Of course Disney Land and Knott's Berry Farm are nearby.  The hotel staff was exceptionally attentive and on top of every little details. OVER and above most anywhere I've stayed.  The convention rooms themselves were very nice and comfortable too. The hotel rooms were clean, refreshed every day, the chair in the room was even comfortable. Great stay in every way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Aside from its ideal location in relation to the Disney Parks, this hotel did not given me any reasons to stay here again. My wife & I stayed here in the beginning of March with our daughter for 1 night after going to the Disney parks. Upon arriving to the hotel, one driveway into the hotel was blocked off due to valet parking cars in the driveway, had to circle around the hotel to find another entrance; not a big deal. Self-parking was full, so valet was our only option for parking; I prefer to valet, so again, no big deal for me, but it may be for others. Check-in process was fast, although I did have to ask about any benefits being provided to me as a Diamond level Hilton HHonors member. After asking, I was given 2 complementary breakfast tickets. I also had to ask for my
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Thank you,  DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: This Doubletree is in a convenient central location in Orange County, whether you're here for Disney or on business. There are plenty of dining options nearby, the rates are usually good, and the rooms are nice  My only issue was the almost constant sirens from ambulances heading to the hospital next door... Some days were better than others, but it's not something I could get used to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. Unfortunately, the sirens from the hospital is out of our control. We hope your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another stay.

Summary Heading: Would not stay again in this hotel
Summary: We paid for 3 days and 4 nights and we requested a small fridge and a microwave before our stay. I think they even gave us another room because they said they were so busy. The fridge was not delivered to our room until 2 days after. We complained to the front desk and they were very careless.   Our food got obviously bad since we didn't have a fridge. The room was not than cleaned and it was kind of smelly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We sincerely apologize for the unacceptable level of service that you experienced. We try our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay, and we are very sorry that we did not achieve that. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again so we can deliver a higher level of customer service.  Thank you  DoubleTree Management Team

Summary Heading: They don't take Discover credit card at the coffee & gift shop, and buy your Disney tickets online before you go!
Summary: Have another credit card. The hotel coffee & gift shops don't take Discover. Buy your Disneyland tickets online before you leave home, the hotel computers don't have enough bandwidth to purchase them there.. Save money and eat at surrounding restaurants, but not Lucille's BBQ 4 blocks away. our granddaughter's mac & cheese had a long hair in it, the food was extremely over priced and edible at best, and over an hour wait. Double rooms/double beds. Upgrade to a room with bigger beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We are glad you enjoy the restaurants around the area and unfortunate  with the incident with the BBQ restaurant. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay with your family.

Summary: This was a clean, tidy, good experience.  I always look for value.  IT was centrally located, had a good quality gym without broken equipment and the staff were so pleasant and nice to deal with.  The front desk person even got me a water when I checked in because I was thirsty. Very very nice.. I will always come back here when I come to visit my daughter who goes to Chapman for Film Schoo.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area to visit your daughter at Chapman University, so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The staff were very friendly and excellent.  Even though there is mandatory valet, they were EXTREMELY helpful and accommodating.  It was a perfect location to to visit all the sites in SoCal - would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: This was our big trip to Disneyland with our son and this was the perfect place to stay.  The staff made us feel welcome from the start!  They have a great shuttle to & from Disneyland and the drivers are all so fun!  Rey was so cute with our son. The rooms are spacious, clean & the views spectacular.  Highly recommend for any Anaheim trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC while visiting the Happiest Place on Earth! It's great to hear you had a great experience with our staff. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay with your family.

Summary: I stayed at the Doubletree for four night in  September 2014. The room was clean on the surface but upon climbing into bed I found the sheets to be dirty. Though I was gone all day each day without the sign on the door, I never received Housekeeping service. I had previously tried to contact the hotel but was accused on "making it up" by one person and told "sorry, i can't help you" by another.  I wrote a review once before and had the customer service finally contacted me, but they had the review removed. She apologized and offer points for my next stay, telling me they were worth enough for at least two night at a full service hotel. I couldn't book two nights at a Hampton on my next business trip. Hopefully this one stays...   Poor customer service would be the greatest
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback of your recent stay with us. I sincerely apologize for the housekeeping issues that you experienced; our hotel works hard to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of our guests and we are very sorry that did not meet your expectations. I am working with our housekeeping staff to prevent this from happening in the future. I hope that if you travels bring you back to the area that you will consider staying with us again.   Thank you,  DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: Excellent staff at front desk, lobby,valet service, maids and restaurant. Rooms comfortable and clean.Valet parking only, but they are prompt. Food at banquet was good but not great; chicken was a little too dry. Only real annoyance was the charge for internet service… something like $11.95 per day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Everything in the hotel is great, and they pay for it by charging guests for internet use.  This really bugs me.  I'd rather pay for the hairdryer and the shampoo than the internet.  On the other hand, the place is clean, quiet, and friendly.  The complimentary cookies look good, but they all have walnuts, which many people, including myself, are allergic to.  How about a chocolate chip without walnuts?
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really like staying at this Hilton. Room, including bathrooms, are really clean. Make sure to get the Disney high levels and you can see the fireworks at night.  Only issue I have is that they only offer valet parking... $15 extra on your stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: My Stay at the Orange, Ca Doubletree 2/12-15/15
Summary: I have stayed at this facility many times over the past 20 years and believe this one was the best for overall quality on everything from appearance, ease of check in, quality of food, and overall value for the money.   Thank you very much.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.We appreciate your feedback. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. Thank you for being a loyal customer and returning for many years. We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area so we can welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: This was a nice hotel to stay in. A night of celebration! Excellent view of Disneyland fireworks. We didn't hear anyone around us. Bring your own pillows because theirs are too soft. Breakfast buffet isn't included in your stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are happy to hear that you had a nice stay for your anniversary. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. There's nothing better than the Disneyland fireworks in the comfort of your own room. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Great time staying at DoubleTree Orange, Ca. for 6 nights!
Summary: My Mom and I enjoyed our stay for 6 nights at the DoubleTree Orange, California.  The room was cozy, the beds were just firm enough and the many pillows to choose were perfect! I was able to take advantage of the digital check-in service via computer before arrival which made the check in process quicker and easy.  We loved our warm cookies as we unpacked our suitcases!  There is a convenient bar and restaurant downstairs in the lobby. This hotel is centrally located to many activities in Southern California and I would highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you and your mother had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you and your mom back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Convenient to the University and medical center this is a typical business hotel.  Staff is friendly and helpful and the property is well maintained.  Restaurant is not impressive but there aren't that many options within a convenient distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had a reasonable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: i have written about this hotel before, but can't stop saying good things about it!  Went again for the NAMM convention in January and I feel like it's our home away from home when visiting Anaheim.  Here a few things I love to rave about.  First of all the staff is incredible!!  Everyone is there to serve and make your stay the best they can. I want to thank MAYRA especially, what a sweetheart!  Also Takeyah and Stacy and the wonderful Valet guys!!!!!  Yes, they have added valet for just a small amount more than regular parking, so I was fine with that!  The breakfast is great!  They have a Starbucks in the lobby, a gift shop AND.... a wonderful shuttle that will take you to Disneyland and they also added a shuttle to the convention center for the NAMM show.  Also the Orange
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. WELCOME BACK! We are very happy to hear that you have great stays with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We are glad you utilize our shuttle service to and from the NAMM convention and the Happiest Place on Earth and who doesn't like shopping?! We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you and your family back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Happy to call it home for a week
Summary: Stayed here for 8 nights with my colleagues for a tradeshow in Anaheim. Some would consider this a standard American business hotel, but I think it is better than that. Let me simply list come pros and cons  Pros: -Friendly staff; at checkin you're given a hot cookie als a welcome, all staff are nice and attentive. -Good beds: (I did stay on a hilton honors floor) Great comfortable kingsize beds. Nice duvets.  -Quiet, large rooms: next to no noise from the hallways, I have found this to be quite rare. Rooms on the non-freeway side are quieter (my colleagues who were on the I-5 side of the hotel complained about road noise, I was on the mall side, which is quiet). -Nice, roomy, new bar with friendly staff -Good restaurant with decent food -Usually enough room for parting -Close
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice clean hotel.   Very close to the City Block Shopping Center. Lots of restaurants and shopping.  The hotel is large and clean. The room is big.  I had a good stay there.  It is too far to walk to the convention center, so you need to use Uber or taxi.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: The Double Tree by Hilton in Orange is a good hotel for a fairly good price. Don't hesitate to ask for a bargain, otherwise the rates are definitely prohibitive. Rooms are big and comfy, the bathroom is clean, and you can "open" the windows to have some fresh air (the air of LA ...) instead of having the AC all the time. Ask for a room on a high level, the view can be cool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the conveniences of your room. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: Attempted anniversary stay on 1/31/15  The only reason I didn't go with one star is because it did look like a nice hotel... from the lobby.  My wife and I were in town for our first wedding anniversary and booked a room here through Expedia.  We got to the hotel at about 11:00pm after spending time at Disneyland.  After bottoming out in a giant pothole while trying to turn into the building from The City Dr. (apparently the actual entrance is on Manchester), we finally got to the valet and parked.  There was hardly anyone in the lobby, aside from a couple of people in the bar and a guy trying to get cookies from the counter (which they were out of), so we walked right up to the front desk and asked to check in.  The lady couldn't find my check-in information and asked to see my
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with our policies. Your comments will be taken under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Thank you,  DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: The rooms were nice and we appreciated the free shuttle to Disneyland. My only complaint was that the hotel parking lot was undergoing construction and so valet was the only option. Therefore  valet was forced and was charged... We arrived in 2 cars so double valet charges and tips made for extra costs we were not anticipating. I think if you are under going construction leaving guests with no choice you should comp the valet fee.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel a number of times.  Most recently a few weeks ago.  The location is nice.  Lots of restaurants within easy walking distance, and Angels stadium is walkable though a bit of a hike.  Their staff is fine.  The biggest negative is their recent switch to valet only parking.  That is a huge hassle and adds an unnecessary expense of having to either stiff the valet or pay a few bucks every time you get your car.  Of the Doubletrees in the Orange County area this is my favorite and I'd recommend it for a business stay.  Also - if you ask, they'll give you free passes to the nearby LA Fitness so you can use a full gym rather than the hotel workout room.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: DoubleTree is value priced and Dog friendly
Summary: Love this place! Thank You DoubleTree. Very nice friendly and clean. Valet staff was wonderful with my rescue pup Snickers. I love the cookies when I have checked in to DoubleTree on a cold rainy night. Very comforting.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Glad to hear that you and your pet had a great experience with the valet team. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: This hotel was booked for us through our travel agent for a break in LA. The hotel, rooms, staff and rates were all perfect.  Clean rooms and very friendly!  We were in the honours suites so we got free wifi and the room was spacious and had everything we needed.  The only downsides are that they do not have safes in the room so I had to carry all of my valuables at all times.  Also the location is only really great for Disney.  To be fair we didn't check this before we left so I can't criticise. We managed to visit LA, San Diego, Universal using local tour companies who pick u up from you're hotel.  All in all a great stay. Would come here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to hear that you had a great experience with the hotel staff. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: They give cookies when you check in, Nice welcome in a perfect hotel. The hotel offers a very nice view from anaheim. Rooms are neat and nice, also very comfortable. The service from hosts and very friendly. In general its a great hotel to stay. They offer shuttle service to go to Disneyland every hour for no charge.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you have great stays with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC! It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We are glad to have welcomed you to our hotel with our delicious cookies. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County area so we can welcome you and your family back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Disney? Check. Outlet stores shopping . Check. The best cookies? Check. This Doubletree is yiur best destination for a Disney adventure with the family. Regular shuttles conveniently take you to the parks. A grat outlet nearby roovides for good dining and shopping. And because it is a Doubletree, expect the cookies! Bice and warm, it is a symbol of great hospitality. We had a great time here. I had a fantastic early morning run around the area. Safe and clean. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to provide free shuttle service to the Disneyland Resort and it is our pleasure to serve you our warm, delicious cookies.
