It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: Stayed there for 6 nights (because of tour package).  Location: The hotel is a good choice for those going to Disneyland as they provide a free return shuttle. Takes away the hassle of parking. It's also a 5-min walk away from The Outlets with plenty of shopping and food choices.  Staff: The staff were really friendly, ie. the valet, the reception, the concierge and the breakfast room. They all served with a smile and provided great service. The warm "welcome cookies" were a nice touch. I also appreciated the washing/drying machines in the hotel.  Rooms: Clean and neat. Quiet and peaceful. But needs upgrading as it's a bit dated.  Wishlist: Check in time should be way earlier. 4pm is way too late, especially after a 21-hr flight! I also wished they provided bottles of water,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good service  at a reasonable price
Summary: The Doubletree is a comfortable full service hotel with impeccable large rooms with comfortable bedding. It also includes bell service, valet parking and they accept pets ! Despite this they are reasonably priced however thats probably because they are one of the farthest of the Disneyland hotels.  One minor nitpick; they are surprisingly cheap about free food. Nowadays even budget hotels offer complimentary continental breakfast, this one doesn't even offer complimentary  coffee
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here for one night, on business.  If you are looking to book here, keep in mind:  -WIFI is not free in-room -Parking is $15 a day and you will not be able to easily access your car as they don't allow self-parking  FYI They suggest using WIFI in the lobby if you don't want to purchase it for your room. I was on business, and have a cap to keep in mind. It was so fun using WIFI in the lobby next to intermittent loud construction noise.  I travel a ton for work, out of state, in state etc. I arrived very tired, after sitting in typical LA and OC traffic. The front desk did not seem prepared for the arrival of guests and I waited in line (there were two lines) for the sluggish process to finally allow me to check-in. I did not find this to be appropriate, as check-in is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very sorry to hear that your stay here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC was not an enjoyable one. We are working hard to make improvements to our hotel and we strive to provide our guests with excellent customer service. We want all of our guests to feel welcomed and comfortable, and we hope to have you stay with us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Poor Management in a CRISIS situation
Summary: Alarm sounded in the hotel...we were asked to clear the building and walk down 12 flights of stairs, when we got to the lobby nobody had any clue the alarm was going of on the 12 floor, I was blown away by the serious lack of management in a potential crisis situation. Worst part was we were on a family vacation and this scared the heck out of our child, nobody even informed the folks in the lobby that it was handled and sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused..we spent a GOOD amount of money while here and I feel robbed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent stay - we appreciate your honest feedback, and we are very sorry for the difficulties that you experienced. Your review provides details that our hotel team needs to re-evaluate guest needs and meet guest expectations. Again, we apologize for any inconveniences, and we hope to have another chance to serve you and make it right in the future.

Summary: Everything was great, the location, the employees, etc.. the only negative thing I have to say is that the rooms and some areas of the hotel need renovation as soon as possible. Is the first time I stay in a so ugly DoubleTree Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our pleasure to provide our guests with great service and we are glad that our location is central to serving your needs. We are continuing to make improvements to our property. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary Heading: Need a Disney base? Look no further!
Summary: We have stayed here as a family (2 Adults and kids 12,10 & 8) three times for trips to Disneyland. What is most striking about the Double Tree is that the staff have real pride in where they work. It shows that they like what they do.  The hotel itself is a pretty big complex though manages not to feel like a big hotel. The location is very convenient to Disneyland. If you walk one block left of the hotel and then walk across the road you can catch a Disney Shuttle from the Woody carpark.  We love the rooms at this hotel. For a family we never feel cramped with the separate bedroom. The furnishing are homey and neutral and the bathrooms are well appointed and clean. Of course none of it will blow you away particularly but it just feels nice. It's got the hotel X factor.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to hear that you had a great experience with our hotel staff and to provide you with our warm, delicious cookies. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel. It was close to Disneyland and provided a shuttle. We were able to check-in early and the fee for valet parking was waived. They made our time in Anaheim/Irvine enjoyable. Thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our pleasure to provide free shuttle service to the Disneyland Park. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: They charge you $15 a day, but do not tell you this.  Had I known I would not have tipped $5.00 everytime I came and went.  Another than the valet everything was wonderful.  I even went into the dinning room for a large coke to bring to my room and they didn't even charge me.  What a great surprise, the gentleman was so nice so when I left I gave him a big tip and he just looked at me and wished me Merry Christmas...that is what is's all about.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff are friendly, the restaurant is delicious for breakfast and dinner; as well as fairly affordable. The hotel offers a free shuttle bus to Disneyland!! Staff were very helpful in organising our adventures and getting us to/from the airport. The hotel itself was very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to know that our staff was able to assist you with organizing your adventures and transportation needs. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: My Family of 7 stayed in 2 rooms for 4 nights at Doubletree.The rooms and staff were excellent we had a great view of the Disneyland fireworks from our room window which the kids loved . I loved the facilities nice bar, pool and restaurant the coin laundry was so convenient only $3 a load wash and dry. There is no wifi in the room but it is fast and free in the lobby be sure to ask for wifi password.  Become a hilton member online its free it has its advantages . Also Look online and book directly Thru Hilton as there are many promo's. I chose stay 4 nights get 1night free per room overall I saved $$$$  there are many promos from free breakfast to $100 food and beverage credit.  If you plan on going to Disneyland this hotel is great only a free 5 minute shuttle away its next to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to hear that you had a great experience with the hotel staff and that our amenities served your needs. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: We stayed at the Doubletree for two nights while visiting Disneyland.  We arrived early, but our room was ready, and we were able to check in with no problem.  The warm cookies were a nice treat.  We were also granted a late checkout because of our Hilton Honors status.  We didn't want to miss the next shuttle to Disneyland, so we rushed to the room to drop off our bags, then headed back down with a few minutes to spare.    The room was very clean, spacious, and comfortable.   My husband and I both slept wonderfully.  The shuttle was convenient, though I do wish it ran every 30 minutes instead of every hour.  I also wish that there was one more late shuttle.   I don't remember his name, but there was a shuttle driver in particular who really did a fantastic job, to make the ride
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was trying to figure out which hotel was the best to stay in while we visited Disneyland and I ended up choosing this one. It has a Wendy's, Starbucks and Quiznos across the street. The hotel is very nice! We got there early and they let us check in early. They give you warm cookies upon arrival, and they were very delicious! They have a schedule to shuttle the hotel guests to and from Disneyland, which was very convenient since we didn't have a car. This hotel is also pretty close to the Angels stadium, so if you are looking for somewhere close but not right next to the Stadium, this would be a good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our pleasure to provide free shuttle service to the Disneyland park and to provide you with our warm, delicious cookies. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: I am writing this review at the lobby eating free cookies (3rd time) while waiting for my shuttle to LAX. Stayed here for 5 nights, my kids love their cookies so much that they keep asking everytime we pass by the lobby. I also got lots of upgrades from check-in..free wifi, free fridge and microwave. Room was clean, beds were comfortable, shuttle to and from Disneyland was prompt and orderly. We will stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our pleasure to provide you and your kids with our warm, delicious cookies and to provide free shuttle service to the Disneyland park. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: Everyone from the bell captain to the front desk manager was so concerned that we were satisfied and taken care of to our complete satisfaction.  They really mean it when they say "if you have any problems or concerns, let us   know immediately so we can correct it".  We highly recommend this hotel and its excellent staff!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very clean. Laura who checked us in was very professional and pleasant. Great experience. we asked for a higher floor and a corner room, she gave us a corner suite. The room had great view of Anaheim. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to hear that you had a great experience with Laura and that your were accommodations were met. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary Heading: Overall a solid hotel for the star range
Summary: Just returned from a six night stay with my fiance while visiting Disneyland, and I was very pleased with Doubletree. The room was clean (very important to me), obviously updated recently, and spacious for a standard hotel room. With just two of us in the room we didn't feel cramped for space when trying to get ready in the morning, but I could see families with children being a bit tight. The king sized bed was a California King, which I was not thrilled about since it is narrower by a few inches than a standard king sized bed, but I only ended up kicking the fiance a few times.   The shuttle to Disneyland was excellent, since the ART system in Anaheim is a glorified city bus. The hour long wait time if you miss the hotel shuttle can be a bit long, but still beats stopping at
Manager Response: none

Summary: We take our children annually to Disneyland. We have stayed at the Doubletree in the past and love it. The staff is exceptional. The shuttle driver Ray is the best. He made our trip, this year fun and the kids can't stop laughing and talking about his jokes and magic tricks. Everyone is helpful and ready to help. Love our stay and recommend this hotel highly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad hear that our shuttle driver Ray helped to make your family's trip to Disneyland a memorable one. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: Went to Disneyland to get into the Holiday Spirit.   Hotel is nice, good place to stay while visiting Anaheim. Had the breakfast buffet at the Hotel, very good and they have starbucks coffee in the building.    ART bus made going to Disney hassle free.  All and all good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: A quick business trip over-nighter in the Orange-area, and this hotel was closest to meet our needs. The front desk staff member that checked me in was very friendly, room was clean, ate at the lobby restaurant as we didn't want to venture out in the heavy rain, had fried mac n' cheese balls with 'homemade bacon ketchup.' Yes, an interesting combination, and it was an experience. To note: this hotel is close to Disneyland, and lots of families were staying here, so that may turn-off some travelers; however, we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to provide you with a memorable experience from our exclusive Trofi restaurant. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: This was a short business stay for me.  The hotel is clean, spacious, and the hospitality was top notch.  The hotel is centrally located and even on my short stay, I was able to visit the ocean, LA, and Hollywood.  Although I didn't go, there were various bus times to Disney, which is also close by.  I would highly recommend this hotel and gladly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to provide top notch guest service and that you were able to visit some of California's famous locations. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel off and on for business travel for nearly 2 years and would welcome it to any with similar purposes.  When I stay there severl days, they provide me a refrigerator and microwave in the room at no additional expense.  The staff does try to make things right.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our pleasure to have been there for you on your past business trips and to provide you with extras at no additional cost. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: I stayed here because it was close to a business meeting I was going to attend the next day.  I really expected more from Double Tree and Hilton.  The room is average and the bathroom fixtures were old and there was actually mold growing in a corner of the ceiling.  The air-conditioning was not working properly.  It was noisy and didn't really cool anything.  The valet parking was mandatory. Their excuse is that the parking lot in under construction.    If you stay here, ask to have a room opposite the hospital across the street.  The siren noises will keep you up if you are a light sleeper.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Generally this hotel is better than any other hotels what I experienced. All staffs are polite and over my expectation. Whenever I stay, I have felt same feeling and this is really good for business man who is too tired.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was SO impressed by the hospitality of ALL those who worked there.  They were kind and courteous, no matter how stupid my questions were, and wanted to do all they could to make my stay a good one.  Thank you!  Loved staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad to be able to provide quality hospitality to all of our guests and be able to answer all of your questions. It is our main priority that you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: The property is definitely dated and needs a facelift badly. The room service menu is very mediocre but well executed. It can be a time consuming task to enter the property.  Despite these shortcomings, the staff is first rate from top to bottom. They deserve better than what they have to work with.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Doubletree standard... Great comfortable beds & the famous Doubletree cookies!!! This hotel is by the best location!! UCI Medical center is across the street & The Block in Orange has all the shopping & restaurants you need!! This property was especially beautifully decorated for Christmas!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of the Hotel is very good.  The view from the hotel room is excellent.  Staffs are friendly and everything is very convenient.  However, only Valet Parking is available and it costs $15 per night.  The biggest problem is the charge of Internet services at the room.  At most hotels, you can get free WiFi.  At this DoubleTree, you have to go to lobby to get on the Internet if you don't want to pay the extra.  It is not convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time staying here.Was here for 2 nights for our Disney trip after our 5 days in LA.We arrived early around 11.30 way before check in time which is 4pm. The lovely lady at the front desk checked and said we could check in early as our room was ready :) perfect!  We checked in, changed and took the free shuttle at 12pm to Disneyland. The free shuttle to and from Disneyland is the only reason why we booked this hotel. The shuttle was always on time. This hotel is also 5 min walk away from the Outlet store, really handy if you are in the area during Black Friday sales. The pros end there.  The rooms are pretty average and the fan for the AC in our room was quite noisy and even at night the noise from outside and room next door and upper floors does get a bit annoying, esp if
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here with a group of colleagues for five nights in October 2014, and we had an excellent experience. The rooms are spacious with large desks, the beds are very comfortable, and the staff is professional. The restaurant had a good variety of food and provided service reasonably quickly, even for a group of about 14 people. I did not have a car, but you might want to investigate the parking situation because they do charge a fee. The hotel is located within walking distance of a mall (The Block) with several restaurants, freeway close, and within a few miles of Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, and the Crystal Cathedral.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice place to stay, staff was fantastic!!!  Everything was very quiet, clean!  It made our reason for being in that area much more pleasant!!!  Will recommend this Doubletree to anyone who will be in that area & in need of a place to stay!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pro's of the hotel: 1.Great shuttle to Disneyland and wonderful bus drivers 2.Great breakfast buffet, which was included in our stay 3.Cookies when we check in...delicious 4.Our air conditioner was making a banging sound and someone came right away (on Thanksgiving) to replace the motor...it was quiet the rest of the visit 5.That same person that fixed our air conditioner saw that we had a small refrigerator and offered to give us a larger one...brought it right up 6.Very friendly staff from the valet, bellmen, restaurant staff, to the front desk  Con's of the hotel: 1.Housekeeping was a problem. Two of the days we came back to our room and it still wasn't done. The first time it was about 1:30 p.m. when we got back and the 2nd time it was almost 3 p.m. We were visiting
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights on 11/28-11/30 and we enjoyed our stay.  Hotel only does valet parking since they are doing a renovation of the parking lot.  Its $15 a night and the valet staff were very nice and fast.  The front desk staff were welcoming and pleasant.  We checked in early about 1pm and they had a room ready for us.  They didnt charge us a early check in fee and even upgraded us to a premium room.  They also give you cookies any time and have fruits at the front desk for us to grab.  The room was big enough for my husband and my son.  It was clean.  There is also a restaurant and starbucks inside the hotel.   The main reason for our trip was Disneyland and this hotel is perfect as they have a free shuttle to Disneyland every hour and also pick up every
Manager Response: none

Summary: My two night stay here was very pleasant. Room was clean, quiet and in good shape. Staff was professional and friendly. The location is excellent being near the factory outlets and some great restaurants. You can see Disneyland from the upper floors, so it's close enough to be only a few minutes away from Disneyland yet far enough to feel away the craziness when you're done with that. Overall, I am very pleased
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great for Disney / shopping / great staff experience
Summary: We stayed in this hotel for 3 nights in November 2014.  We chose it for its location - close to a shopping mall, and with a free shuttle to Disneyland.  The rooms are nice and luxurious - nice big twin beds, a desk and a couple of chairs and a nice big television. Also, the bathrooms are nicely decorated and spacious.  The mall is a quick walk away and there are restaurants like TGI Fridays and Buffalo Wild Wings if you don’t wish to eat in the hotel. The food looked nice but was a little expensive.  The shuttle to Disneyland is on time for both pick up and drop off to and from the resort. One of the drivers - Rey - is absolutely fantastic entertainment and if you are fortunate enough to have your ride to or from Disney with him then you are in for a fun time, bad jokes and a
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the double tree for 3 nights, we arrived early than check in time but there was a room available and we got a free upgrade!! The staff were helpful in giving directions and the disney shuttle is by far the best and most convenient way to go to Disney land which was the purpose of our stay in Anaheim! They run all day long and with friendly bus drivers!   Rooms were nice and spacious with a comfy cosy bed!   And you get a cookie in arrival, what could be better than that!! :D
Manager Response: none

Summary: It's not my first stay here.  However it's definitely a "go to" place when coming to Orange County.  The location is perfect.  Next to plenty of restaurants, Angel Stadium, Honda Center and Disneyland.  Usually rates are lower than awful hotels closer to any of those locations and so much for the money.  The hotel is beautiful.  EVERYONE is nice.  I can't imagine anyone complaining about rude people unless someone had possibly been rude to them.  Because we had nothing but nice.  Mentioned it was my birthday in conversation and ended up on the top floor Disneyland side and a view of the fireworks.  Are you kidding me?  Rooms are super clean as is the bathrooms.  Our neighbors were a little loud on our first night, but settled down before needing to contact the desk.  If there is
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great if you want to afford it
Summary: Hidden costs, kind of impersonal, but if you can afford it and are good with paying a lot, it is a nice hotel. Left an item in my room accidentally when checking out - security could not find the item (I assume it was not turned in by the cleaning service) so that was unfortunate for me and rather soured my stay. I admit, that was my fault, but it would be nice to have it all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was nice but the service and reservation fiasco was unacceptable.  I made a change with my reservation and they ended up cancelling the entire reservation.  The "customer service" rep was less than helpful, didn't even attempt to correct the problem and wasn't very friendly.  If it wasn't for the location and a business trip, I wouldn't have stayed there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We sincerely apologize for the unacceptable level of service that you experienced. We try our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay, and we are very sorry that we did not achieve that. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again so we can deliver a higher level of customer service.  Thank you,  DoubleTree Management

Summary: First impression was that this hotel doesn't want you to actually get to the entrance.  The address is on The City Drive in Orange but you cannot get to the hotel off of The City Drive.  This is especially confusing for out-of-town visitors (like us) arriving after dark. Once inside and checked in this Doubletree is much nicer that other Doubletree hotels we have stayed at. The lobby area is undergoing some renovations but it is spacious and bright.  Free internet in the lobby but in the rooms - pay up.  The business center has allows free computers with some software and free printing.  Meeting rooms are nice.  The breakfast buffet at the restaurant is a reasonable value.  There is a free regular shuttle to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here two times for a total of four nights.  Front desk team is very welcoming and knowledgeable of the area.  Housekeeping is thorough and consistent.  The beds are comfortable.  The linens are new and fresh.  The carpet was clean.  The bathrooms in the two rooms I've seen were very small but the room itself was spacious and comfortable.  We ate breakfast in the lobby restaurant two times and were pleased with the food offerings and quality.  They have a shuttle to/from Disneyland.  There is shopping and restaurants within walking distance. We will stay here again and we will recommend this hotel to others looking for a full service hotel in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay here fairly regularly and we have never had any problems at all.  Rooms are comfortable and clean and staff has always been great.  Location is good, with easy freeway access in any direction but it's quiet enough you aren't bothered.  Nice outlet mall with restaurants right next door is a plus.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It is a little older, but they really try to keep it kept up. There was minimal construction going on in the lobby but they really tried to keep it to a minimum. Rooms clean, beds comfortable, pretty nice place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Having stayed in the Doubletree located at The City Drive in Orange, California a number of times, it was disappointing during my latest stay from October 10-13, 2014 to see badly chipped furniture, dark streaks on the ceiling extending from the air vent, and obviously mismatched replacement ceiling tiles in the entry way (between the bathroom and the closet).  The maintenance of room #702 was a step down from what I have come to expect from the Doubletree brand.  I slept well, but the room was something I would expect from a lower quality brand. Also, it is very frustrating to be able to see your vehicle in a partially filled parking lot that is located directly in front of the building, but not be allowed to go get it and drive it to your meeting.  Instead you have to wait
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for the issues with your room during your stay. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.   Thank you,  DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: simply what the tittle says, very helpful and very nice staff, the location was perfect next to the outlet mall, and the rooms were spacious and nicely oriented. Cleanliness was never an issue and they did a good job in making the whole hotel clean let alone the rooms.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were tired of staying in the outdated hotels/motels near Disneyland so opted to stay at the Doubletree - Orange County.  What a great decision!  We enjoyed a nice, comfortable room and lost no time getting to Disneyland with the free shuttle (much faster than walking to the park from the Disneyland area hotels).  I also enjoyed being right next to the outlet mall and theaters.  So much to do!  I have a child with special needs, and the Doubletree was very accommodating.  Thanks Doubletree for making our experience a little easier!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Me and some friends tried to make an annual trip to Disneyland. One or more of our party is disabled. The staff at the Doubletree is always accommodating, friendly and professional. It is the only place we will stay when we visit Disneyland. They offer free hourly shuttle service to and from the park. With handicap accessible transportation. We have stayed here for the last three years and come back to the same familiar friendly staff each year.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although this hotel is a 5 minute drive from Disneyland, in my opinion it was much better than anywhere else we have stayed that was closer to the park.  The service we received was OUTSTANDING, the room was spacious, clean and quite.  Additionally, the free shuttle service that they provided to/from Disneyland was efficient and easy to use.  I will definitely stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I always stay for business but it is a such pleasant hotel to stay. The amenities and services are great. Also the bar is very good. The food is a little expensive but there are many restaurant nearby. Also there is a shopping mall walking distance. For vacationers, there is shutter going to Disneyland all day long.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a very good stay.  The staff was welcoming and very helpful.  Not perfect but nothing ever is.  The front desk was very helpful and whenever i had a problem it was taken care of immediately.  I would stay here again Thank you
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Stay During a Trying Time
Summary: I ended up staying two nights when a procedure my mother had a UCI Medical Center ended up requiring a second night's stay.  This is a great place to stay when you need to be by UCI Medical Center.  If I wasn't so close to Disneyland I think it'd be great for that, too, or an Angels game.  Very comfortable.  Great service in the lounge. And I really needed that cookie.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Located right by the UCI medical center, you can hear the ambulances all the time.   A/C made noises all night (probably just a faulty unit). Loud water pipe noises in the walls kept us up all night.  Mandatory $15 valet parking, was not told about this upon booking. Ridiculous.  Charged $10 nightly fee which was also not in the original booking cost.  Friendly staff and all, original rate was pretty good, but once you start adding on these extra fees it adds up and is not a good deal anymore.
Manager Response: Sasha,  Thank you for your review. I am very sorry for the difficulties with your stay. We will take your comments about the noise that you experienced under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. Regarding the fees, I can understand your disappointment however these fees are listed on our website. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time you are in the area.   Thank you,  DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: We were celebrating my cousins birthday and had to find a hotel in the  Anaheim area. All the other hotels were either booked or priced to high because of the Disneyland Halloween Event. This hotel was affordable and the staff had amazing customer service. My only gripe would be that there is an extra charge for a refrigerator. We were traveling with my 1 yr old son, so it was a must. Great hotel though.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for work for the week. Hotel lobby very nice , also includes bar and Starbucks which is always a plus for me ! Valets are very nice , and I found worth the price of paying valet to be able to call ahead and have my car available . They were all very nice helping with bags and directions and tips on traffic ! Check in staff also very nice , although it seemed slightly understaffed at times. My room was okay , a little dark , and often did not get very cool , although I did not contact the staff , thinking it was due to the huge windows . Overall nice location , very close to restaurants and outlets behind the hotel . If in this area again I would stay here for another trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I took our 2 daughters to disneyland for vacation last week . This hotel is an excellent place to stay at. I am so glad we decided to stay here. The staff throughout the hotel were very professional and very nice, also very helpful when we had questions and needed directions. The breakfast buffet was excellent and fast, which is nice if you have small children. Disneyland was only 5 mins away. The hotel has a shuttle that runs all day. All i can say is if you are looking for a great hotel with an excellent staff, this is the place . Very affordable too. Lorenzo
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel offers a quiet room, a comfortable bed and a good location. The gym is passable, and includes a few free weights as well as cardio. It is very convenient to the freeway and to the UCIrvine medical campus. There are reasonable dining options within a short walk to the Outlet Mall, or across the street at the Ayers property. The food offerings within the Doubletree are not worth trying. Its nice that they offer a free shuttle to Disneyland as well, and have plenty of parking. It is also not far (though Motel 6 would be closer) from the biking and running trail that runs along the usually dry river, all the way to the ocean if you like. It was a safe place to run.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good service, decent room and quiet night ... even with a huge wedding held while I was there.  Nothing fancy, but exceeded my expectations of a DoubleTree.  Location was great for business in Orange County.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel - valet staff is excellent.  Security staff was slow to respond to a situation and seemed a bit rude - but overall not bad for the price.   Location is very good - near The Block outlet malls and close to all major freeways.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This has always been a great place to stay for business or leisure. Excellent staff, clean facility and close to all the great things to do in Southern CA. I would highly recommend this to my friends and family.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, convenient to Airport & freeways for Business Traveler
Summary: This hotel looks like it has been remodeled recently.  It is very nice inside.  They have a full bar with appetizers.  The room we had was nothing special.  Your typical 2 queen beds with a small nightstand between, dresser with a flat screen tv on top. It happened to be the best priced hotel in the Hilton Family of hotels during this particular trip, so we stayed here.  This was a business trip for my husband.  His company will not pay for valet parking or bellman service.  This hotel says they have self parking, but when we arrived, we were told that they no longer had self parking and it was all valet.  I felt bad for the poor valet guys.  They literally RAN to get the car every time, in 100+ degree weather!.  We were in and out several times a day, and after the first few
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good location for freeway access. Nice setting, very comfortable rooms & beds. Staff are very customer service oriented, pleasant & helpful. Pool area & gardens well maintained and relaxing. This was an off-site business trip so I didn't do much more than sleep a few hours, but everything I needed was available.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Doubletree By Hilton Anaheim - Orange County
Summary: great hotel, perfect service, good location. breakfast buffet was very good but little too pricey...(18$ ???..) valet service since self parking is under construction. close to an outlet, bestbuy.  close to the hospital so sometimes you hear the ambulances sirens. definitely will come again . very recommended.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is a nice, central location. The room is big and there restaurants near by if you choose not to eat on site. Easy access from both the I5 and Hwy 57. There was no self parking so I had to valet the car but the price was reasonable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My room was great.  I was on the honors floor.  I think the parking situation is ridiculous.  Paying an additional $15/ day for parking is ridiculous.  Also having to use valet, is a pain in the morning when everyone is leaving.  Also, you could not see the TV from the sofa chair or from the desk chair.  The TV had to be watched from the bed only.  It is a bad layout.  That is why I rate the room low, otherwise the room was nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: good hotel with unusually cheerful and happy staff
Summary: I picked this hotel largely based on room rate and chain reputation.  The physical hotel was good, but nothing special.  The advertised "pillow top" bed was better than most, but not all that well padded or special.  The bathroom was in good shape and well stocked.  The decor was not memorable: nothing special but nothing wrong and well equipped.    My room was facing Angels baseball stadium and I-5.  Some highway noise definitely seeped into the room, but it wasn't bad.  The OK kept the room cool, but not cold.  The elevators were quick and efficient and the room was clean.    The only available parking was valet, but at $15 per night, that seemed competitive with other area hotels.  I did not use the pool or the restaurant.    The one major difference is how happy the staff
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We are happy you had a good experience with every staff member you encountered. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: My mother and I stayed here for 5 days/4 nights during one of the most stressful events of my life: The California Bar Exam. Every single staff member we encountered was warm & welcoming, our room was quiet (so important during the bar!) clean, comfortable, and offered a great view, and the restaurant served a delicious breakfast each day. Overall, this is the nicest Hilton I've had the pleasure of staying at, and I would highly recommend it to anyone else thinking about making a reservation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Bed appeared to be queen not a king as requested.  View of room was modest, staff was very friendly and helpful.  If we can get a better room we may stay there again...maybe.  Were used to staying at the Hilton next to the Anaheim convention center and expected the same level of awesomeness, but were left a bit disappointed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a very good place to stay, although a little expensive. The Rooms were very clean and the service was very outstanding, My only problem was the cost for parking and the fact that you had to use valet parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel on a visit to Disney Land, great location, a short 15/20min stroll up a straight, lit, safe footpath crossing only 2 streets. Good value. I looked at all hotels around this location and ended up confused so went with a well known name and was pleased. Nothing flash, breakfast average, but was clean enough, good location and good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had a good stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: We found the room excellent. The housekeeping people were superb--courteous and quite friendly. Your morning breakfast was excellent..BUT....make sure your people let guests know that anything beyond the "basics" is EXTRA...it does not say that anywhere. Also impressed with your health club. BUT...asked that a morning Wall St Journal be held for me at the front desk but the staff NEVER passed that along...and that lasted for four days.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. I apologize for the incidents with your morning Wall Street Journal. This will be brought to the staffs attention. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: This was our fourth time staying at this Doubletree, which is well-maintained and reasonably close to Chapman University. There was a significant issue during our previous stay, and because we had booked on Travelocity the hotel could not comp us a night. Instead they were supposed to send us a certificate that never arrived. However, the amazing and wonderful Stephanie at the front desk was extremely helpful, and not only did she get us the certificate but also comped us parking and internet. And best of all, she took the initiative to call me back instead of my needing to track her down--excellent and exemplary service. Anyway, our room was comfortable and extremely clean, the front desk was friendly and helpful, and the valet was very efficient. We will definitely stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: they tried to empty our wallet
Summary: Hotel is good, however now they require you to  valet you car and you are not able to self park. On top of that they charge you for every day and if you come and go from the hotel it is a pain to go through the process of getting your car. Of course then you are also supposed to tip the valet. then you get to your room and they also charge you for internet.. The rooms are loud and you hear all the sirens and traffic outside. Made this our regular hotel for business, but will not stay there again..
Manager Response: We value your business and appreciate your feedback about our amenity costs. As we continuously reevaluate our offerings, we will keep your input in mind. We hope you'll reconsider giving us another chance to serve you.  Kind regards  DT Management Team

Summary: This was a good hotel for those visiting Disneyland because the hotel offers free hourly shuttle to Disneyland. The hotel is not within walking distance to the Disneyland, but is near an outlet shopping mall which has dining and entertainment.  From the moment we arrived the valet attendant were friendly and very helpful.  Jessy, the front desk person who checked us in was was nice and greeted my group and I with chocolate chip cookies.  The room was a bit small, but overall was nice. The downside was there was no refrigerator, microwave or safe in the room. For guest wanting to put valuable in a safe have to go down to the front desk and ask for a locker to put valuables.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. I do apologize for the inconvenience with the safes in room. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Planned a trip to Disneyland for daughter's birthday and was looking for a nearby hotel that provided shuttle service to Disneyland. It worked out quite nicely as it was only a few miles away from the park. The hotel personnel were great and accommodating. The shuttle driver was entertaining as he interacted with hotel guests on the trip back from Disneyland. Great to have Starbucks onsite. It was nice that the hotel was located right across from a mall where they had shops, movie theaters and plenty of restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. Were glad you had a good experience with the friendly shuttle drivers. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Rooms are very nice and even its right Next to the highway you dont hear the noise much. The breakfast is below average and the staff is short, the barman can be something to handle but the concierge makes it all up and lands this place as average. Its convinient close to "the Block" mall with average restatrants.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This past June/July 2014, my husband & I spent 5 nights at this wonderful hotel.  The room was spacious, decor was beautiful which made it a very relaxing stay. Front Desk staff, bellhops, restaurant staff, room service staff was very attentive to any of our needs.  This establishment also, provides a free shuttle to Disneyland.  Avoids parking lot fees at Disneyland.   Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Los Angeles, Orange County area.  Note: Also short drive to the Anaheim Convention Center.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We originally booked this hotel as it was 2 blocks from Disneyland. Now we had no concept of HOW BIG a block is in Anaheim... Disneyland is about a 15-20 minute walk from the hotel which is manageable unless you have small children. The staff are friendly, courteous and generally have a sense of humour.  I misheard our room number so I had the bellhop traipsing around the 4th floor with us and our luggage trying to find our room.  The cookies on check-in are a nice, tasty touch.  The room was comfortable, clean, well-maintained.  The one thing I found a bit strange though was that the pool and pool area was a bit small.  I thought being in LA the pool would be larger considering the weather.   I was very surprised by the fact that the WiFi was free.  That was very unexpected and
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked through Hotels.com at a very good rate.  However, the room was bare bones - no fridge, no microwave, no free internet access on lower floor.  We were only staying one night, so no problem. Very clean, comfortable, no noise.  Very helpful check-in clerk placed us not too far from elevator because of some mobility issues, without even being asked. Valets, bell, housekeeping, wait staff all very courteous.  Took quite a while after calling for someone to come collect the luggage when we left.  Definitely do NOT recommend the breakfast buffet in the hotel dining room.  Not one item was hot or even mildly warm.  Pricey for that kind of thing.  Lunch menu was exceptional.  Starbucks in lobby was nice but not full service. Would love to stay here again, but probably on a higher
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. Do sincerely apologize about the breakfast buffet but happy you enjoyed your lunch. We look forward to your next visit to Orange County so we can welcome you back for another stay.

Summary: We had been on the road for a week and thought we would treat ourselves. Checked in had to pay $15 extra for parking, 'you want Wifi' that will be another $15. Had a bottle of wine to chill, no fridge in room, no problems I will get a bucket of ice, ice machine not working on level 3. Thought I would plug in my phone using the lamp on the bedside table, plug not working.....plus no complimentary breakfast. Back to the Comfort Inn for us, no value for money here. Bed was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Rhonda,  We’re very sorry we didn’t provide you with the high quality of amenities you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the malfunctioning ice machine and outlet in your room. We’ve reported the problems to our maintenance team. We appreciate the opportunity to help make it right and address the issues with the room amenities. We hope you’ll consider giving us a second chance if you return to the area.  Kind Regards,  DT Management Team

Summary: I love the Double Tree hotels, they always seem to be clean and fresh but this stay was horrible.  The service was good and staff were friendly but the room was disgusting.  We had dirty towels, room smelled musty and there was mold growing around the bathtub.  I will not stay here again and I wish I would have spent my money elsewhere.
Manager Response: Christina,  Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay with us. We are very sorry that you were disappointed with the cleanliness of your guest room. We try to be very vigilant in this area because we know how important it is for our guests. Based upon your review, we are actively working with our housekeeping staff so this situation doesn’t happen again. We hope that if your travels bring you back to the area, you’ll give us another opportunity to serve you and make it right.   Kind Regards,  DT Management Team

Summary: Excellent hotel, accommodating staff.   Little irked at new parking policy and fees for wifi (if not at appropriate program level).   I incurred neither of these in my previous stays.  Otherwise, it is my choice of hotel to do business in the area, convenient to SNA
Manager Response: none

Summary: The facility and services I received during my stay we excellent. I was on site for a conference and the Double Tree provided a very nice breakfast and lunch for each day of the conference as well as snacks during the day. The rooms were very well appointed and clean, with the bed being very comfortable. I would use the Double tree again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The hotel is very clean and customer service was great from the Valet to Concierge to Front Desk check-in, everyone greeted me with a smile and was very helpful.  Located right across the street from mini mall and close to freeway.  Breakfast bar had good selection and food was good. Who doesn't like that complimentary chocolate chip walnut cookie at check-in. All in all it was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: average for the price and not a lot of staff that knew what they were doing.  they were nice but if they can not deliver wat is the point! If I had to go back  would prob. not go back to this one. many hotel right there. would try a different one
Manager Response: none

Summary: Valet too many people  Restaurant too slow   food very expensive  checkout not so freindly Valet too many people  Restaurant too slow   food very expensive  checkout not so freindly Valet too many people  Restaurant too slow   food very expensive  checkout not so freindly Valet too many people  Restaurant too slow   food very expensive  checkout not so freindly Valet too many people  Restaurant too slow   food very expensive  checkout not so freindly
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Short stay.  Hotel great location iffy.
Summary: Arrived on a Friday and departed Saturday.  The staff was great, the room was comfortable.  If you care about being close to restuarants, this is a bit out of the way.  They are close to the City shopping and restuarant area, but to get there, you have to walk a very uneven sidewalk that isnt well lit at night.  It's close to the John Wayne Airport and as always, the warm chocolate chip cookies are delightful.  Be cautious if you are allergic to peanuts though. They have a lobby bar and a restuarant.  I did not eat in the restuarant, but had food during a meeting and it was acceptable.
Manager Response: Thank for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had a reasonable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We're glad that you got to visit the close by restaurants and shopping stores. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: May sound crazy, but the valet staff were awesome and when you're popping in and out of a hotel on numerous occasions and they run and get your car with a smile every time, it's a really nice thing.  Good clean rooms, internet connection needs some work, but nicely located and a good experience overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC.  Glad to hear that you had a great experience with the valet team. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another good stay.

Summary: The staff in the restaurant was outstanding.  Carlos specifically.  Each morning he was there to greet us and start our day with a smile and great service.  Please pass on our sincere appreciation and he is a great representative of your property.  We were there for a Taekwondo Tournament and Disneyland Adventure.  The hotel was in a great location and the staff was helpful in making our stay comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Our Event in the Grand ballroom went very smooth working with a Pro staff and very good service. We will have our National Tournament here every time we have it in Calif. The area around the hotel has so much to offer the block, Angles, the Ducks, the Grove of Anaheim, the bus rides all day to Disneyland. At the hotel pool, workout room, tennis court 8000 sq. feet Grand ballroom and smaller meeting rooms we all used for our event thank you
Manager Response: Hello Gary Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate the feedback. We enjoy having your Taekwondo team on property. We are happy to hear that you enjoy all the amenities in and around the Hotel. We look forward to hosting your event next year.

Summary: Stayed at The DoubleTree over a long weekend in September.  The common areas of the hotel are nice, but the rooms and bathrooms are horrible.  The beds are the worst I've ever NOT slept on - I slept on the floor 3 nights in a row.  The mattress is super soft that you sink into the bed and can't get out.  The linens and pillows are quality but smelled horrible like smelly feet. The air conditioning was not properly working in the rooms.  It was blowing but hot air only.  That being said, the staff was wonderful and very accommodating; but I will avoid staying at Doubletrees in the future.  There are many other hotels that provide a higher level of comfort.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about the A/C problem. We’ve worked with maintenance to fix the issue, but we’re very sorry that it wasn't resolved sooner. We apologize that you were disappointed by the comfort level of your bed as well. Thanks again for your review. We hope you will consider staying with us the next time you return to the area so we may help make it right.  Kind Regards,  DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: My room was on the 11th floor, quiet with cozy sheets and many pillows to choose from.  The room was clean and the amenities were supplied each day.   I love the wi-fi and self parking deals!   I had dinner one night which was easy and delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We were welcomed with a smile. All amenities were ready and the accommodations were as represented. I recommend the "All Inclusive" package as it made parking, breakfast, internet, and an evening movie was wonderful!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: A one night stay for business,  I could have been the only one not on my way to Disneyland. But found the room terrific and the floor nice and quiet. Friendly staff despite the volume of people, too.  Beautiful property, easy off Interstate 5. Saw multiple large and comfy shuttle busses for easy transportation for the park.   Lots of large groups waiting in the lobby. Definitely an area favorite.     Will consider this for my next trip whether for fun or pleasure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: I always stay here when I come to Disneyland
Summary: I've been coming to this Doubletree for years. I would always try to stay at the other Doubletree that is closer to Disneyland but my reservations were mixed up one trip so I was given a room here instead. Ever since that trip I have booked here instead.   Love the free shuttle to Disneyland and the free cookies! I also enjoy the restaurants breakfast buffet prior to starting my long day at Disneyland.   The rooms are nice with comfortable beds and the bathrooms have nice showers with above average water pressure.   I've been down to the pool area and duck pond to look around but haven't really spent any real time using this locations facilities. The pool is jive though.   Location is a real plus, it's close to the shopping outlets, Angels baseball, Anaheim Ducks and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: LOVE, LOVE this hotel.  We arrived at 6:00 in morning and normal check in is at 4:00.  We had our room ready by 7:30 AM after explaining that we just drove 3.5 hours with a 4 yr old! The shuttle drivers are amazing - Ray is the best ever!  Lobby is very clean, pool/patio area is very clean, rooms are great with comfy beds!  We ALWAYS stay here when we go to that area.  Would NOT stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Staff at the Double Tree in Orange
Summary: The staff at the Double Tree in Orange California were extremely nice and very accommodating. All of the staff members were helpful and friendly. The rooms were clean and we were given a complimentary upgrade. Thank you for a great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Happy to read from your review that you had a good experience with our staff. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The accomodations were top notch. The facilities and amenities were outstanding.  The food and service in the restaurant were very good.  The concierge service was very helpful,   We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: They go the extra mile.  From earlier stays they recognize me now and do everything they can to accommodate my needs (in room fridge, microwave, etc.).  The check in and check out process is always very smooth.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had yet another enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Fine to stay, failed to send receipt w/o calling
Summary: I booked directly with Doubletree rather than using Expedia or some service. The stay was fine. Typical overpriced buffet breakfast (for oatmeal). Price was above average. Sort of off the interstate and out of the way; extra to park when there is really no other way to get there. Main problem is that they emailed the customer satisfaction survey but not the receipt. I had to call to get it, navigate automated system, and eventually call back to get person. Too much work for something that should be automatic.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. Hearing from our guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We’re sorry that the comfort of your stay was interrupted and we’ve shared your comments with our team so we can do a better job of emailing guest receipts. The next time you travel to the area, we hope that you’ll be our guest again.  Kind Regards,  DT Management Team

Summary: The staff was incredibly friendly and even helped speed up the line when we got there as a conference group was checking in. The room was clean and comfortable! I've been here a couple of times and have yet to be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Staying for a trade show in the hotel itself. Staff were pretty friendly. I ate at the bar in the evening and the bar food was not great. A kid tried to buy some snacks and he was shown an empty box and told that everything was sold out. The bell staff were very efficient in shipping my display materials. Nothing really stands out - just a middle of the road aging property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. Its unfortunate to hear that you had a middle of the road stay. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope you give us an opportunity to WOW you during your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: just an over night business stay.  the staff was nice ,the was room nice.  well located to where I needed to be. a variety of shopping and restaurants were within walking distance. did not like that I had to pay for parking.  always think that is a money grab.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. Our parking charges are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding district. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: A great hotel, perfect for business
Summary: I have choosen this hotel a few years ago when I went to the NAMM Show for the first time. And I take it every year now! The hotel itself is perfect, I never had any problems for the room, the bathroom or anything else. Beds are extremely comfortable, bathrooms are always clean. And all people (reception, room service, restaurant, parking valet, etc...) are always taking care of you and do their best to help you. The only possibly negative point for me is the price of Internet access. For such an hotel, it should be free. Breakfast is excellent (I recommend the buffet) A very good point if you come for the NAMM Show : the hotel provides a free shuttle service between the Convention Center and the hotel every 30 minutes during the opening hours. And they even sent back the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit for NAMM so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Good: Hotel may give discount for Disneyland tickets, if the package is ordered on their website. Beware, read the fine print.  Good: Free shuttle every hour to Disneyland. Good: Our room had microwave and fridge, family friendly, view of Disneyland fireworks.   Bad: 2 Doubletree hotels by Disneyland, check address to know which one you are booking so there are no surprises upon arrival. Bad: Room service will cost $12 upfront ($8 fee for calling and $4 fee for the waiter to bring food to your room). + CA state taxes in addition to price of actual meal= $$$$$ room service
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you had a great experience during your stay here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County and that you took advantage of our complimentary Disneyland shuttle. We hope that next time you come into town you return to our hotel for yet another great stay.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times in the last 2 years. Usually the staff is very friendly. This last trip was an exception. At other Double Tree hotels I am provided access to the Executive Lounge. At the Orange CA hotel this has never been offered. Thus I have been staying at the Embassy Suites nearby. I do have a trip to the area coming in next few weeks and I am undecided where to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: nice hotel however the rooms were a little run down.  Carpet filthy.  My socks were black after walking on the floors.  The concierge was very helpful and the front staff certainly did what they could to make me comfortable.  With that, the staff was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We apologize about the cleanliness of your room. WE have taken your comment and forwarded to the staff. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Great place to stay - welcoming staff.  Try not to be on the side facing the A's stadium as you hear the sirens from the hospital all night.    Dinner menu is OK but nothing to write home about.  Breakfasts are great.    Staff will do anything to make your stay the best they can.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We could not say enough good things about our experience at The Doubletree. The customer service is outstanding...hotel is beautiful and shuttle to Disneyland is a bonus(especially with Ray!).We will be back in the future without a doubt.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review about your recent stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are very happy to know that you and your family had such a wonderful experience. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. On your next visit to Disneyland we look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay - Convenient Shuttle to Disneyland is Free!
Summary: The hotel is very clean and friendly and very family orientated. I stayed here three nights with my family. I got a 2-bed room but the beds were full size and my wife and I did not sleep well the first night it was too small of a bed. I am 6ft tall and my feet were off the bed. I requested to be moved to a King bed but was not able to be moved till 3rd night. Pool is great for kids since it is not very deep.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you had a lovely time with your family while staying with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable. We hope that next time you visit Disneyland you will also give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Restaurant food was awful, not taste or overcooked. Bartender was not overly sharing of the happy hour specials (food or drink) and when asked for the wine special, he poured less. Also never said when happy hour was over and my last drink was full price.  Check in was great, super courteous, quick.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From a Business point.. I and 2 others were on 1 credit card.. I am a hilton honors member to boot. The issue was that only 1 of us could get Wi-fi access and the others were charged 11.99. Then there was no free continental breakfast. Just didnt feel welcomed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I travel alone for business three weeks of every month.  I stay here every few months and after a long day of traveling I get the most sincere friendly greeting from the bar staff.  They make me feel welcome and as if they remember me, which makes me feel like I am home and someplace safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review about your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are so happy that we could provide you the warm feeling of home because it is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. When you are in town again on business we hope that you will give us the opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable visit.

Summary: The room was average and there was a faint smell of cigarettes in the air.  The bathroom tub had mold in the caulk and it seemed like a warn room.  The room needs updating and it was dingy.  The staff on the other hand was very courteous and friendly.  They made the stay nice for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We value your feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced because it is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. However, we are very pleased to hear that our lovely staff made your stay nice. We hope that the next time you are staying in town you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back and show you our true commitment to guest satisfaction.

Summary Heading: I couldn't have stayed at a more friendly hotel.
Summary: I have been staying at the DoubleTree since March 2014 and will be there through Feb. 2015. I can't begin to compilment this staff enough. From the parking lot ladies, dining room, hotel sales, concierge and front desk staff to maintenance and valet attendants... they are always pleasant, professional and make me feel like family. From day one they have all greeted me by using my name. They have even prepared a special meal for my dog when she was sick! Now that's customer service! The grounds are beautiful and private. I would not think of staying anywhere else!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so wonderfully pleased that you have had and continue to have such a wonderful experience while staying with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay so having you feel like family is one of our greatest compliments. We hope that for all future trips you have in this area you will give us an oppurtunity to welcome you and your dog back family-style for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Great location but very busy year round
Summary: I've stayed here many times for business.  It is adequate.  You get nice grounds, mall nearby and a roof to sleep under.  Staff often harried and confused whether you are using the dining facilities (fair) or meeting rooms.  What you get is a hotel 2 miles from Disneyland, Anaheim Stadium, $35. Cab ride from John Wayne Airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Thank you as well for your comments and concerns. We value your input.  We can be quite busy throughout the year but we apologize if there was any inconvenience due to that fact. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope the next time you are in town you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: As a Hilton HHonors Diamond member, I'm used to receiving relatively good service, however, my most recent stay at this Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim in Orange County left a lot to be desired. As a Hilton HHonors Diamond member, I have very rarely been disappointed with a stay, but this stay was one of them. First, I have an electric car, and I was given wrong information regarding where I could charge my electric car, second, I requested a King size bed for my wife and me, but instead we got a room with double beds, third, the A/C unit in this room was particularly loud, so my wife and I had difficult sleeping through the night, and fourth, the water pressure in the showers seemed like a slow trickle. Needless to say, I have no plans of staying at this property in the future,
Manager Response: I appreciate your candid review of your recent stay with our hotel. I apologize for not being able to supply you with a king size bed as comfort and safety is my highest priority for our guests.
