While room type requests cannot be met every time, I have reviewed your comments with our front desk team as well notified maintenance of the A/C unit noise. I invite you to stay with us the next time your travels bring you to the area.  Kind Regards,  DT Management Team

Summary: Once again, after being told that as members of Hilton Honors, we would not be charged for connecting to the wireless provider, charges appeared on our credit card for this service.  Restaurant, though somewhat overpriced, did offer a very nice continental breakfast buffet with lots of fresh fruit, cereals, oatmeal, pastries, etc.  The turkey sandwich I had for lunch was not of the "deli" variety but seemed to be actually carved from a real turkey. Quite good and offered with avocado.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We appreciate your loyalty as an HHonors member and apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay so we are happy to hear that the rest of your experience was good. The next time you are in town we hope you give us the opportunity to welcome you back and show you our true commitment to guest satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Very Nice Hotel for Business Meeting
Summary: I just returned from a business meeting at this hotel.  I was very pleased with the experience.  The room was very clean, bed was comfortable, wifi was strong and bathroom was spotless.  The shower had good pressure.  Since we were so close to Disney Land, I had assumed that it would be a little loud due to the excited children but surprisingly it was very quiet.  Each day of the meeting, the room was stocked with breakfast pastries, hot coffee and water.  The room was ample size and very quiet with no distractions.  The hotel provided our lunch and both days, the lunch was very good.  After hours we visited the bar in the main lobby.  Good bartender who helped us recover from the day of long meetings.  Although I was not involved with the selection process of this hotel for our
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that everything was to your liking and that you had such a wonderful experience while staying here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay and even during your business meetings. The next time you are in town for business, or pleasure, we hope that you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We've stayed here twice while visiting Disneyland. The free shuttle to the park is very convenient and has been right on time. The drivers were very nice - our late night driver told jokes and did card tricks with the kids on board while we were waiting to leave the parking lot.   The rooms are clean and comfortable. Our first stay was in an upgraded room on a high floor, thanks to my husband's Hilton status. The room was nice and we enjoyed a pretty good night's sleep, but we could hear the elevator every few minutes, which was a bit annoying. Our second stay, we brought our pet, so we were placed in a smaller, less nice room on a lower floor. This was actually much quieter than our high floor upgrade - no weird elevator noises. We slept very peacefully and had a view of the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience during your stay here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are so happy to hear that you had such good conveniences and interactions with our staff. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay so we are happy your pet was able to join you on your latest trip. We hope the next time you visit Disneyland you will let us welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Had a one night stay on Saturday the 16th of August.  Had won a bid for the room at a charity auction.  Hotel was busy with two weddings and family vacationers.  12th floor room with fridge, microwave and large flatscreen with good channel selection.  Comfortable bed and the room clean and decent size.  Quiet on the 12th floor throughout the night.  A little worried about hearing ambulances arriving during the night at UCI hospital across the street.  Heard several when out at the pool area, but did not hear any during the night.     Pool area is small, but adequate.  The building blocks the sun out fairly early.  Never overly crowded.  Jacuzzi as well.  Tennis court also near pool area.  Did not use the gym located on the 2nd or 3rd floor.    Dined at the lobby restaurant.  We
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that you had such a pleasant time and great attention from our staff during your stay here with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope whenever you feel like getting away near home you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Room with a view of Disneyland's fireworks
Summary: This hotel is one of my "go to" hotels when I am at UC Irvine or at the Medical Center across the street. The hotel is up to DoubleTree standards with a well-appointed room, a very comfortable bed, plush towels in the bathroom and a bathtub actually large enough to take a relaxing bath in. Room service had a good variety and was promptly delivered and reasonably priced. I get free breakfast buffet coupons and appetizer coupons and they asked if I wanted to combine them for a complete breakfast. That is great, because I never use the free appetizer and drink coupons. Every so often I get a room with window from which I can see the fireworks at Disneyland at 9:15pm each night. I never remember to ask for a room on that side of hotel, but am always happy to watch the fireworks off
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are honored to be one of your "go to" hotels when you are in this area. We are especially happy to hear that you had a pleasant time and were well taken care of by our staff during your stay here with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay so we apologize about the inconvenience with the carpet. However, we do hope that the next time you are in the area you will give us the oppotunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay, fireworks and all.

Summary: We spent one night here while vacationing in the Anaheim area.  Our check in was quick and easy and the cookies they gave us were great.  The rooms were nicely appointed, but only having double beds was not my favorite part of the stay.  The bed itself was somewhat uncomfortable, and again all they have are double beds.  My wife and I are accustomed to a king size bed, so going to a double was not my favorite.  We went down to the pool area and swam.  The pool is a great size, and has a nice hot tub.  Our kids enjoyed the pool and the sports area they have.  The rooms themselves were very nice and we had a great view of the pool area from our room.  I would definite recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. We are sorry that the beds were not up to your expectations because it is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. However, we are happy that everything else was enjoyable during your stay here with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We hope that the next time you are visiting the Anaheim area you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: This is a nice hotel. Outdated, but clean and well maintained.  Location is good.  Hotel staff good.  Comfortable beds.  My only complaint is when I was in the restaurant for breakfast and the staff was in the corner talking and laughing so loudly, I don't think they realized how the sounds travels.  They were three times louder than the patrons in the restaurant.  Plus, the entire time I was there they stayed in that corner and never came out to help the customers.  There was one guy who was very attentive and hard working but all the ladies just hung out in the back chatting and laughing.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. We value your opinion and are happy to hear that you had a good time here with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We also would like to apologize for the inconvenience during your dining experience. However, we hope that next time you are in the area you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another pleasant stay.

Summary: There was no sink space in the bathroom at all.  My wife had to put her makeup bag inside the sink to apply her makeup.  There was a lock on the outside with a handle and on the inside with a handle to the bathroom.  Somehow, it got locked and we had to call Maintenance to open the door for us when he came back in at 10:00 p.m.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC and thank you for your honest review. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay so we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. We hope the next time you are in the area you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: Felt like a 5-star experience.  Rooms were large and extremely clean, bathroom was especially clean and big.  Great location near Disneyland, without being right on top of the crowds.  Local dining very convenient.  Would have liked free internet for the price, though.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you had an awesome stay here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that the next time you are staying in the area you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another 5-star experience.

Summary Heading: The best hotel I have ever stayed in AMAZING ********
Summary: Stayed here between the 1-16th August with my wife and had an amazing time, the hotel is brilliant and the front of house staff really do step up to the plate ( Management  you should look after these as they are doing an amazing job. Especially Javier, Sean S and the gentleman who works behind the bar)  The facilities including the hot tub and the jacuzzi are great do be sure to be down the pool by 6 if you want sun as its blocked off after that time due to the large buildings. The rooms are cleaned daily and they are left spotless.  The only bad thing about the hotel is the bar, there's absolutely no atmosphere there and 70% of the staff don't care and will have no repertoire with the customers. Drinks are really pricey as is the food and to be honest i've seen more life at a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We love hearing that you and your wife had such a wonderful time while staying with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Our main priority is to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay so we are happy we could provide that for you. We regret that the bar ambience was not up to your standards but we look forward to your return visit in a couple of years so that we can welcome you back for yet another wonderful stay.

Summary Heading: adequate for a one night stay
Summary: Would not recommend for a vacation hotel lukewarm hot tub unfriendly front desk clerk uninviting pool poorly equipped work out room very few activities inside hotel for guests bathroom seat sticky, not clean
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about your recent stay here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Your feedback is very important to us. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay so we apologize that your expectations were not fully met. We do hope that the next time you are in town you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back to show you our true commitment to guest satisfaction.

Summary: I stayed here whilst in Orange County for work and found it to be a very good hotel.  It's very handy for a number of freeways, notably I-5 as well as the 57. The lobby is spacious and the reception staff, valet staff and concierge are friendly. The rooms are very satisfactory, spacious and clean.  I'm also a sucker for the cookie they give you at check in.  I didn't eat at the hotel, although it does have a starbucks coffee kiosk, but instead went across the street to the regular starbucks store. There is also a Wendy's directly opposite the hotel and a number of eating options a short walk away in the Outlet mall, which is very good. You can also walk to Angels stadium, although it's a few minutes away and you have to walk under the interstate, I didn't feel as though this was
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are very happy to hear that you had such a pleasant stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. The next time you are here for business or get to visit Disneyland we would love to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay, and more cookies.

Summary: We reserved this hotel and stayed due to the fact that I stay here for work on a regular basis. The facilities did not disappoint. The staff, as well as the facilities do not disappoint. The pool is wonderful, the fitness center is adequate, and the shuttle service to Disney is wonderful.  Plus, FREE COOKIES!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are so pleased to hear that everything was on point for you because it is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope the next time you are visiting Disneyland or in on business you will let us welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: I have stayed here numerous times and am never disappointed. The hotel accommodations are very nice, comfortable beds, and clean rooms. It is located near many Southern California attractions, including; Angels stadium, Disneyland, Knott's Berry farm, and outlet malls. Staff is always friendly and helpful, and offers a free shuttle to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are very happy to hear that you have had many pleasant stays with us and that we continue to keep you pleased with us. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay so we are happy to provide that for you. We hope next time you are in town you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another pleasant stay.

Summary: This is a high end hotel and it shows in the decor, furniture etc. The beds were comfortable and the internet was fast.  The restaurant was a buffet for breakfast and could not ask for better.  Would chose this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Not only next to Disneyland but the shuttle takes you there and picks you up which I did not know til I got there.  Restaurants and shopping in walking distance. Very Clean. Nothing negative to say I really did enjoy this hotel stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay so we are glad that our shuttle helped with that. Next time you are visiting Disneyland we hope you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another great stay.

Summary Heading: I would not stay at this hotel again
Summary: The room was kind of damp.  It was kind of gross walking on the damp carpet and sleeping with damp bed sheets.  Also assigned to a room with wheel chair accessible bathroom.  My kids like to take bath and it didn't have a bath tub.  When I called to ask about this, rather than apologizing for their mistake, the manager told me I requested it that way.  If they couldn't switch rooms, they should've at least apologize.  I would not stay at this place again. P.S. Only good thing about this place is people who drive the shuttle.  They are friendly and very service oriented.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate your feedback, and we’re very sorry you were unhappy with the condition of your guest room. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us. We are taking your comments into consideration as we take the steps necessary to make it right for you and our future guests. We hope to have another opportunity to serve you if your travels bring you back to our area.   Thank you,  DT Management Team

Summary: We stayed here as my sister and brother-in-law were going to be staying here as well.  They have good taste so why not?!  The pillows were like placing your head in a cloud - love those pillows. We went to the bar one night and the margarita's were EXCELLENT!  The hotel was very clean and the gym was good, better than most.  I also discovered, when I got home, that I had left my hair dryer and flat iron in our room.  I called a the next day and they had it and were mailing it to me, much to my surprise and pleasure... I was disappointed with the no cookie on the bed or even when we checked in. Would I stay here again...... yes! But next time can I get my cookie???
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Our biggest apologies about the cookies at check in. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Always enjoy my stay here. Check in is fast and efficient. Staff are friendly. Rooms are always clean/modern. Food is great. Great location.There is a nice shopping mall and restaurants within walking distance from the hotel. Will recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We arrived here for 8 nights.  Reception and check in was efficient. We dealt with a lady called Jesse who was very helpful and professional and resolved our issue with our door keys very well.  The room was an HHonors room on the 9th floor and was lovely and spacious. It was a corner room and we were happy with it.  It is the only hotel during our stay in the States this time that didn't have a fridge in the room to keep the babies milk cold and I felt we should not have to rent one when we are paying so much for a hotel room.  Wifi also isn't included but it was available free of charge at Starbucks across the road and you could enjoy a coffee at the same time.  If a coffee shop can provide wifi free of charge, surely a hotel the size of a Hilton can in 2014!!   The concierge
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location, Free Shuttle, And Good Ole Cookies
Summary: What more can I say close to Angel Stadium, Amtrak and Disneyland / From the start you get greeted with a smile from the front desk which always set the tone for your vacation.  / I upgrade to a premium room with a great view and that comes with internet which is nice.  I like the fact that a key is needed to get up the upper floors make me feel safe and secure . Also they have a wonderful place downstairs the brew starbucks coffee in the morning if you need your fix.  There is a cost for parking but the rate is fair and lowest in the area  Beds - 10/10  Staff 10/10 Disneyland Shuttle is great and it's free 10/10  Gym, Pool, and Tennis Court and I also believe a basketball court what more can you ask for.   So my overview of my stay is a 10/10  Great staff, Good Location, Great
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We have just returned from a 5 night stay at this hotel and were not disappointed. We were checked in upon arrival by Courtney and she was very helpful from the start. I hadn't realised that the free wifi was only in the lobby but Courtney very kindly gave us a code so that the children could use their devices in the room each evening after a busy day at the parks. The children were also supplied with plenty of free hot cookies during our stay (mostly by Courtney!) which was great. We liked the pool area with the towels provided and often enjoyed a drink outside in the sunshine during happy hour. The children also made use of the free tennis courts. The concierge staff were very helpful with our questions about the area. We used the free shuttle to Disney and back which was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had such an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. It is our main priority for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to your next visit so we can welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Staff was friendly and helpful at check in.  Room was clean and modern, just what you would expect from a doubletree.  It is located near a mall with lots of food options, and even though I didn't use it, it seems to be one of the few hotels who still have a hotel operated shuttle, which is a nice bonus.  Check out was a little difficult, I was leaving every early (around 4:30a) and it was somewhat difficult finding somebody to help me at the desk.  Overall, a good hotel, I'd stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay hear with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. The next time you are visiting Anaheim, we hope that you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Great location for shopping and other activities. Good money for value. Close to Angel's stadium, to the Disneyland and few minutes drive to Baboa Island, Newport Beach. I have visited Irvine many many times, and this time staying here, instead of right around John Wayne Airport, gave me a completely new experience. I would be happy to introduce this hotel to my friends and colleagues.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had good experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. It's always fun to have new experiences. We do hope you stay with us during your next visit for yet another wonderful experience.

Summary Heading: Great Value, Free Shuttle to Disney
Summary: Great value for money.  Free shuttle to Disney was plus.  Close to food and Orange Outlet.  Grocery shopping is about 1 mile away.  Customer service was very good.  Breakfast was expensive at $16.00/adult, $9.00/child.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay hear with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. The next time you are visiting Disneyland we hope that you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Not so friendly - just money grabbing
Summary: Only stay here if you like getting nickeled and dimed to death.  Pay for internet ($12 a day), parking ($14 a day), breakfast, etc.  I'll never stay again.  I stay at Hilton properties often but the front desk wouldn't even consider giving me the code for internet.  Sadly customer service was lacking and unless you pay you don't get anything...
Manager Response: John,  Thank you for your honest review of your recent stay with us. At our hotel, we like to provide a personalized experience for each of our guests, but also look for ways to keep costs low while providing comfort and convenience. We appreciate your feedback and we’ll keep it in mind as we work to make our services better.  Kind Regards,  DT Management Team

Summary: We recently stayed at the hotel and had a very good experience. We were allowed to do an early check in which is great if you have young children and you've just come off a long flight. The reception service was friendly enough. The concierge service and especially Dave was of great help and assistance with our park bookings and shuttle requirements. They also held our bags for the day until we left on our late night flight. The hotel was further away from the Disney Parks than what we expected and is not within easy walking distance of the Disney Parks however the hotel does provide a shuttle service to the Parks and the main strip for those who like to explore and walk around. Nice pool and courts for the kids to play. The restaurant, shop and kiosk is also a nice convenience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had a great experience while staying with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim -Orange County. We were happy to read from your review that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town for Disneyland, you will choose to stay with us again and have yet another enjoyable experience.

Summary: My boyfriend and I recently stayed here from July 20th to July 25th for a Disney Vacation. Reading the reviews from earlier I was a little eerie  of how service would be. We booked this through Get Away Today. Check in at this location is at 4:00pm so it is a little later than most hotels. We arrived at 4:00pm after a full day at the beach to find out that our room still wasn't ready. The front desk promptly checked us in and apologized for the wait (30 mins) and gave us a complimentary upgrade to a premium room where we were able to watch the Disneyland fireworks along with a few extra perks that included a fridge in the room The room was really clean, private and comfortable. Front desk had no problem with us wanting extra towels and any of our additional requests and was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County.  We are so pleased to read that you had such great attention from our staff.  It is our main priority for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay.  We hope that on your next Disney Vacation you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another pleasant experience.

Summary Heading: It was okay....not what I expected
Summary: The hotel was nice....but expensive for what I received.   I had to pay to park and the restaurant was under par and expensive.   I like the Best Western better for what I paid.   Also I got overcharged quite a bit for my stay.  It was good thing I looked at the charges before I checked out.  I was overcharged 999.00 for a quest room.  And my account was not charged correctly.   I am very disappointed.   Please let me know if there is anything that can be done for this inconvenience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel twice and it is my now go to hotel when I come to Anaheim on business travel.  The service is good and the rooms are nice and comfortable.  The gym facilities are standard and suitable for business travel.  I will continue to stay here when I am in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County.  It is our main priority for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay so we are very pleased and more than happy to be your go-to hotel for all your business travels.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next business trip so that we may welcome you back for another comfortable visit.

Summary: Near disneyland and outlet complex (really good deal for the fashion  outlet) The hotel property a little bit old , but good location , free shuttle to disneyland , but near this locatian they have another double tree by hilton , the similiar hotel name , some tourist get to another double tree by taxi or shuttle , wifi only at the lobby , and the breakfast almost same menu everyday , our group stay for 3day really bored with the breakfast menu ,but the restaurant really good hospitality to our group , hope they change they menu everyday ;)  and at night in this area , all the restaurant closed and no minimarket near this hotel. Prepare your food, beer,cigarette and etc
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay hear with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. It is our main priority to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. The next time you are visiting Anaheim, we hope that you will give us an opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The hotel property a little bit old , but good location , free shuttle to disneyland , but near this locatian they have another double tree by hilton , some tourist get to another double tree , wifi only at the lobby , and the breakfast almost same menu everyday , our group stay for 3day really bored with the breakfast menu ,but the restaurant really good hospitality to our group , hope they change they menu everyday ;)  and at night in this area , all the restaurant closed and no minimarket near this hotel. Prepare your food and etc

Summary: Title says it all. Disney, Crystal Cathedral, UC-Irvine, Angels Stadium, Amtrak Station-Anaheim (though I DO wish to lobby for a free shuttle to this destination just as the property provides to Disneyland) Such a benefit would've prevented an accidental $1215.00 charge from the cab co. instead of the $8.80 plus tip $12.15 charge the fare was supposed to cost me. Not the hotel's fault, obv.,  just a ripple of a problem that's easily solved and surely i'm not the only one who traverses Angel's Stadium parking lot to/from the nearly completed ARTIC?
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC.  Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. It's unfortunate about the cab incident and we hope that got resolved for you in a timely manner. We hope that next time you are in town, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: I stay a week for business.  On the good side, the bedroom was well appointed and had enough space for a person or couple to spend a few nights.  The room had a large HDTV, and had a great view, which allowed to enjoys Disney's fireworks every night. The Outlets were within walking distance and had all kind of dinning options and plenty of shops to satisfy most buyers.  On the bad side, the bed was very uncomfortable and seem to be of really poor quality.  Dining at the hotel is very expensive and you have to pay for parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second time staying at this property, the first time was several years ago and the rooms were a bit on the dated side.  Although we only used our room to sleep for a few hours each night while visiting Disneyland, we enjoyed the bed, decor and cleanliness.  We were given a complimentary upgrade to one of the higher floors.  We love that we could use the shuttle to go back and forth to Disneyland and save us on the parking and congestion at the park.  Its great to see that the Doubletree and Hilton standards are being upheld at this property (I am a former Doubletree emloyee) and I hold every hotel to high standards.  Will definitely stay here next time we come to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC.  Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Enjoyable Stay at this fine Hotel
Summary: We stayed at the Doubletree as part of a Disneyland Visit and to roam around Orange County.  We loved the location... next to a large Outlet complex which also contained numerous restaurants.  The Hotel had a free shuttle to Disneyland which was fantastic.  The shuttle ran every hour, and was very comfortable.   The Hotel staff was very friendly and our room was very clean and comfortable.   The hotel had a Starbucks in the complex, along with a restaurant and bar.  Our 15th floor room had a wonderful view of Angel's Stadium.   We will definitely stay here on all our future trips to the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC.  Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: As a part of a great 3 day trip that included mountains, fireworks, the ocean, Lego,  fine dining in Orange county,  a concert in LA, and a beautiful girl , this hotel exceeded expectation. The room and overall hotel experience was far better than I expected for 119$ per night.  The view from the panoramic windows in the room was a great scene of the stadium with the mountains in the background.  Late night with the curtains open the atmosphere of the room was perfect for enjoying the very comfortable king bed with an awesome chick.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC.  Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: just what I expected from a Hilton
Summary: Travel a lot for business and have stayed at many Hilton properties. This was just what I expected...friendly staff, very clean and comfortable room, close to freeways and restaurants.... AM staying here again on  my next business trip....
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had good experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. We do hope you stay with us during your next stay.

Summary Heading: Terrible rooms just a fancy lobby
Summary: We stayed at this hotel during a visit to Disneyland park. The lobby seemed nice & well lit & decorated but as we reached our room, we were extremely disappointed.  We had booked a room with two queen beds that would accommodate 4 people & the size of the room was ok bug the decor was just so old & meh!!! It looked in need of a face lift, there was pretty much no personal touch to the room , no wall paintings or decorations just two very ordinary beds and a old dusty looking carpeted floor!! The bathroom wasn't modern & clean looking either.. The price seemed a lot for such a below ordinary room.   The hotel had a complimentary shuttle to the Disneyland park that we used & the breakfast, included in our package was just ok!!   All in all everything was just about somehow doable
Manager Response: Shruti,  Thank you for staying with us at our hotel during your recent visit to Disneyland. We appreciate your candid review of our property. New perspectives about our hotel and our guestroom appearance help us make improvements to our guest experience on an ongoing basis. Please share any additional comments or suggestions with us any time.   Kind Regards,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange Management Team

Summary: Nice hotel and has shuttle to Disneyland.  Our hotel faced Disneyland and we could see the fireworks from our room.  The hotel is close to shopping and food and the pool is clean.   They also wi-fi in the lobby, but you can pay to have it available in your room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had good experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County.We are glad that you had a great view of the Disneyland firework show from the comfort of your room. We do hope you stay with us during your next stay for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The room was clean and tidy, no HH diamond acknowledgment or upgrade. Parking is easy and the shuttle to Disneyland was free and prompt. Breakfast was nice and plenty of choices. Would defiantly recommend this property. The outlet mall is a short walk through the carpark.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had good experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. We do hope you stay with us during your next visit to California.

Summary: The hotel was great. Great location for disneyland. Shuttle service was great.The beds were so comfortable.The cookies are the best. We had the breakfast buffet and the food was outstanding. I would highly recommend this hotel to all my friends and family. The pool was nice and clean
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had good experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. We do hope you stay with us during your next visit to the area.

Summary: We stay at this particular Doubletree because it is close to Chapman University.  The staff are extremely friendly and go out of their way to make the stay enjoyable.  This last time without asking, they upgraded our room to a suite which was great because there were 3 of us in the room!  I will say that the couch in that room was very worn and the coffee table as well.  Just needs to be updated.  The restaurant and bar are really great and the food is quick and good.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had good experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. We do hope you stay with us during your next visit to this area.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because that's where my Daughter's Tahitian Dance competition took place, Property is nice and clean, the front desk and house cleaning crew were nice, Pool is average. The main thing that I didn't like is that knowing that a lot of families with small kids visiting Disneyland will stay here there was not Microwave or Fridge at the Rooms, we had Milk and some other food for our daughters that needed to be refrigerated and so we had to rent a Fridge, YES I said RENT a fridge, $10 per night which I think is ridiculous just another way to make money, It's nice that they give you cookies when you check in but paying an extra $10 for a fridge, $10 for a microwave and $15 per day for parking is not really worth it, We visit Disneyland at least 2 times a year
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: I choose this hotel because of the free disneyland  shuttle, bad night vision was my main reason. I chose the business package and got the parking and wifi included for 10 dollars more a night, also was upgraded to a suite from Hilton honors for and additional 35 dollars. Ray the night shuttle driver was awesome with his music selection on our way back from disneyland. The rooms were comfortable and the sheets soft. The cookies delicious as always. Right across the streets from the outlets and uc medical center. I would definitely stay again the next time I go to Disneyland. They let me park early before I checked in and took the shuttle st 10am and checked in at 11pm. Best part I did not have to drive in the dark!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had good experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. We do hope you stay with us during you next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: I'm a regular visitor to the OC for Angels and Ducks game but this was my first time at the Doubletree. Typically I've stayed at the Embassy Suites on State College or the Ayres by Honda Center. This time the Doubletree was much cheaper so I gave it a try and wasn't disappointed. Rooms are spacious and nice, hotel has extensive facilities (a good restaurant, a Starbucks, a bar and a shop). There's a regular free shuttle to Disneyland and they can also help you out getting to Angel Stadium (or it's an easy 15-minute walk). Keep in mind with the price wifi and breakfast are typically not included (there's a good breakfast buffet for $15 and they gave me wifi for free). Also the showers are needlessly complicated, but were fine once I got the hang of them). This is a good hotel for
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had good experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. We do hope you stay with us during your next stay.

Summary Heading: Double Tree near the Big A
Summary: This is a popular hotel due to the convenience of the "Platinum Triangle".  There is a shopping mall within walking distance.  The UCI hospital complex is across the street. Convenient for those with family as patients. The Angel stadium and the Honda center as well as Amtrak are easily accessible.
Manager Response: Thank you for review. We are happy to hear that you had a good experience here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are happy to read that you were able to utilize all of the amenities available around us to our guests. We hope that next time you travel to Orange County you choose to stay with us for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The hotel was very clean and comfortable.  The people in guest services were the very best that I have ever dealt with.  They arranged for a trip to Santa Anita Racetrack (40 miles away) and made a great recommendation for seafood.  They were all very personable and made us feel very special.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We hope that next time you are in town, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay there, the room and facilities were very clean. The staff was also very helpful. Great location, the mall was near by, fast food places as well, in a good location and an extra extra plus the hospital was across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We hope that next time you are in town, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We were here as part of a group block for an event.  Our room #828 appeared OK, until we tried to make coffee but was filled with molded, smelly water, the toilet seat was wobbly, we found half eaten fruit under the beds and the rug was dirty that left dirty residue on our feet after showering. Brought to the front desk who immediately addressed the situation.  We brought it up on the last day because we were too busy with the event. Warned the front desk that the room should be thoroughly cleaned after each vacancy. There was a discrepancy with our bill that the Mgr. immediately wanted to resolve but quoted us $100 more than the actual bill until the desk clerk corrected her that it was actually $100 less.  Lunch plates offered at the event were extremely small in portion and
Manager Response: Magdalena,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in our area for your event. We are very sorry for the problems you encountered with the coffee maker and your bill when checking out. We have addressed the room issue with our housekeepers and will take your comments about our lunch plates under consideration. We hope that you give us another opportunity for a better experience.  Kind Regards,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange Management Team

Summary: Nice for business meeting.  Bar needs more staff in the evenings. Staff in hotel is friendly and accommodating.  Restaurant staff is great.  Starbucks staff is not nice in the am. I would recommend hotel to people staying to see Disneyland as much of the clientele seems to be there for this reason.

We hope that next time you are in town, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel - Wonderful Staff - Comfortable Bed
Summary: I stayed here for a Passion Parties conference this past weekend.  The food they served for both lunches and dinner was wonderful.  The service was very quick and friendly.  The staff always went out of their way to help us out.  The bed was very comfortable and the room was clean.  It even had a microwave and small refrigerator which was great to keep our water in!  I would definitely recommend this hotel for business or family trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We hope that next time you are in town, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: $12 Internet - $13 to park your own car
Summary: See my headline. This is why I don't stay here. C'mon. Its 2014. Everyone uses WiFi so stop with the crappy charge. Charging $13 to self park my car is rediculous. And why not post this on your website!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. I do apologize about the parking but our parking charges are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding district. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: I'll start with I LOVE Doubletree beds - sooo comfortable.  I usually make reservations directly with HHonors account.  This time I used Get-Away-Today because our child's school district gets a % of proceeds.  Our check in requests were flatly denied and the front count person was rude.  She informed us that the hotel was fully booked and that they would give us a room that was available.  She stated 3rd party booked rooms were no guarantee of ANYTHING.  It certainly didn't get us courteous service or tact.  That said: the guys who run the shuttles to Disneyland are pure gold and saved an otherwise poor customer experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct  the problems you experienced. We are happy to read that you had a great experiene with our drivers and you can't go wrong with a DT bed.  We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you bak soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: My family and I stopped here on a road trip through the West coast.  We picked it because of the proximity to Angels Stadium as we had tickets to a game there.  The valet and bell service guys were awesome.  Since we were on a road trip we had a ton of bags and stuff to unload and they were a major help.  They even left our car sitting right up front so we could get to the game quickly after checking in.  The room was quiet and the bed was so comfy that we didn't want to get up.  We will stay here again when we return for a Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are happy to read that you had a good experience with our staf. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: #1- The cookie #2- The shuttle to Disneyland= super convenient and the driver was really funny. He picked on my husband a lot since we were always on the shuttle. I loved his cheesy Disney jokes. I still share them with my students.  #3- Clean!! #4- We got upgraded to the business floor which was awesome
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad that the complimentary shuttle to Disneyland was at your convenience. We hope that during your next trip to Disneyland, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay.

Summary Heading: The distance is mitigated by fast and prompt shuttle service
Summary: The shuttle service to and from Disneyland was wonderful and prompt. One driver (Rey) specifically was wonderful. He always engaged the children and told jokes. Even in the evenings when people were run down from a long day at the park Rey would have fun, upbeat disco music on. People would sing or clap along. He made our experience at this hotel even more enjoyable and is one of the biggest reasons we would choose this hotel again!! Thanks for a magical trip!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad that the complimentary shuttle to Disneyland was at your convenience. And also happy that you had a great experience with our driver. We hope that during your next trip to Disneyland, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay.

Summary: Room I reserved was booked so they moved me to floor 11. This was not a Hilton  Honors floor so it did not have all of the amenities I was accustomed to. The room had no chair for reading/watching TV. The air conditioner was not working properly so teh room was often hot.
Manager Response: We’re very sorry we didn’t provide you with the high quality of amenities you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize that you didn’t receive your reserved room and for the malfunctioning A/C. We’ve reported the problem to our maintenance team and we are sorry we couldn’t reward your loyalty with room amenities this time around. We hope you’ll consider giving us a second chance if you return to the area.  Kind Regards,

Summary: I was there for biz but if I come back for Disney land I will stay here. Clean, location to outlet mall next door. Great food at hotel. free rides to crazy land daily , I meant Disney land rooms were vary nice the pool was fun
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to read that you had good experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. We do hope you stay with us during you next business trip or a family trip to Disneyland.

Summary: After comparing local hotel prices, we decided to stay at the Doubletree for a one night getaway. I am very happy with the decision. Rooms were very clean. Staff were extremely friendly and courteous. We walked across the street to the Outlets at Orange. Overall experience was great. We even had an unobstructed view of the Disneyland fireworks show from our room! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are happy to read that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town  you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Very friendly staff, lovely room, Nice breakfast in the dining room.  I was not happy that there was a charge for WiFi.  I did not use the WiFi as there are plenty of places to get free WiFi.  I also had to call the desk as the TV was a mystery, you could only receive pay TV and since I had stayed there before, I knew there was free TV but could not access it until they sent someone to show me how.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are happy to read that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town  you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: We used this hotel because of a wedding we were attending. The lobby is nice. There is a starbucks inside which is nice. The room was average. Our bathroom had a bad smell and when I was taking a shower it smelled like cigarette smoke.  The restaurant has a breakfast buffet. A bit over priced for what it was. This is to be expected.  I was mostly curious about the large smear of something on the inside of our bedroom window. A little less emphasis on the cookie, a little more attention to detail on your cleaning procedures.
Manager Response: Than you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim -Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Granddaughter's first trip to Disney for her birthday
Summary: Front  line reservation clerks very cold. No personal interaction. Just felt rushed and there was only one person in line. We even ordered extra towels,pillows  and certain views  when we booked this on the phone. We had to reorder it all when we arrive at our room.Our room rate included daily breakfast. Which they could not find in the computer. So they sent over their mgr. Who was very sweet but need proof from me with my paper copy of my reservation.I then had to leave my family and go to the room to round up my print out of the reservation to confirm we were correct.Upon returning they found their mistake. We were so embarrassed and exhausted trying to explain all this while other patrons could hear this... and a hunger child to boot....  Of course everyone was super nice
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and concerns, we truly value the opinion of our guests and are working diligently to assure we corrected the problems you experienced. On behalf of myself and my team I would like to extend an apology and hope we may have the chance to redeem ourselves in the near future. I do hope we will see you again so that we may show you the changes we have made.

Summary: Since you come here just to sleep at night: Beddings are great. Complimentary Shuttles every hour until midnight Hotel Parking is $14.00 which is better than parking at disney and is valid until the entire checkout day. Surrounding is very open, quiet and neat. Wendys and quiznos next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad that the complimentary shuttle to Disneyland was at your convenience. We hope that during your next trip to Disneyland, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay.

Summary: To start the hotel was overall nice. However, we went to the restaurant for a meal and the stood there for over 10 minutes never getting waited on. When we ask someone, well he basically didn't speak English, only spanish. So we left and went across the street.  The rooms have NO refrigerator, No microwave.  Internet is charged at $12.00 per day.  The sad thing is the next night we had to stay at a Super 8 motel and guess what….. Half the price, nicer spa AND free internet and a fridge in the room… Makes you think!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim -Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Hotel Good - Room Quality NOT so good
Summary: We have been to your hotel a couple of times now at this location but this very last time was not comfortable whatsoever. We were given a room that was "special needs" room, we were not told it wouldn't have a bathtub, we arrived late and were very tired so all we wanted was to sleep. Beds were not comfortable as usual and the room we were given we could hear the water/toilet pipes ALL night. Again we've stayed here before and our past experiences have been close to perfect but not this last time :/
Manager Response: Than you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim -Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: I've been to this hotel many times because either my mom or my boyfriend's father was staying here at one point or another, but this was the first time that we had actually stayed here. We've also been staying at a lot of Hampton Inns and Garden Inns on our way to and from Minneapolis, so we have some experience with Hilton hotels. I'm not sure if all Doubletree hotels are like this one though, because this is the first and only one I've been in so far.   Parking is always a big deal to me, so it kind of irked me when we had to pay to park. And in reality, with parking and taxes it ended up to be almost as much as a night at a Hampton Inn or Garden Inn, which has parking included in the price. Another thing was the Internet, which was also not included. Again, at all of the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is so nice and clean.  The beds were very comfortable.  I loved how there was a Starbucks right in the lobby and how the shuttle went to Disneyland every 30 minutes.  We got to avoid all the hassle that comes along with parking your own vehicle at Disneyland.  It is about 2 miles away, so it's definitely not in walking distance.  We went down to eat breakfast one day and we had a miscommunication about how many people were in our party, so we ended up cramming 8 of us into a table for 5.  The waiter was so nice about it & ended up giving us our breakfast for free just for the inconvenience.  The bartender made the best bloody mary's and my husband would order one a night, by night 3, the bartender knew exactly what he wanted when he went down for it.  Overall it was a

Summary: Amazing experience. totally cool hotel with awesome staff, tasty free cookies and a cool location. have nothing to fault absolutely whatsoever. the shuttle bus to disneyland made it all worth while and would happily recommend this place to anyone!

Summary Heading: My Medical Home Away From Home
Summary: The rooms are beautiful. The staff is always helpful and the rates are very reasonable. For my family it's a quick walk or drive to the medical center and hospital. The staff goes out of their way to help us when I come for medical treatments.

Summary: Usually stay at Embassy Suites so my disappointment was great when I realized I was paying more money for a smaller room, no breakfast, no cocktail hour, location was not as convenient as Embassy Suites so not likely to return without greater financial rewards; unable to get AAA or AARP discounts at time of check-in

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Hotel for one night. I had some business to cover and our nieces were playing in a softball touramate in which she attended. A perfect location at reasonable price. Everything the person discribed about our hotel room was accurate when taking our resveration. I hope to stay this property again soon. Thanks, Dr. W.J. Manos

Summary: The Doubletree was close to main roads, so it was easy to visit the LA area and beaches.  We were able to walk (about 20 minutes) to Anaheim Stadium to Angels games. Very safe area. Doubletree Staff very helpful with directions and any questions. Room was fine. Halls quiet. Starbucks handy. Nice pool and hottub, but access a bit strange.

We are happy to read that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The gentleman that checked us in was rude and not very helpful.  This was our first time staying here.  I feel this hotel charged too much for parking and we were disappointed that breakfast was not included.
Manager Response: Than you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim -Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: Stayed for a whole week--mix of business & pleasure.  Room was very clean, layout very quiet--we heard no noise from next door in our bedroom even though there was a baby next door (the room layout puts a living area between bedroom & next door room).  The suite has completely separated bedroom, living room, bathroom.  Also refrigerator/coffee maker.  Bed super comfortable.  Restaurant & deli downstairs both delicious.  All staff went above & beyond.  And of course the cookies at check-in were great.  Location within walking distance of Disney (not really our thing, but maybe yours), a Target, Walgreens & numerous restaurants.  I am a picky traveler, & rarely feel moved to leave reviews.   You can't go wrong here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are happy to read that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town  you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Hotel nice but far from Disney
Summary: Overall - OK.  Hotel is FAR from Disneyland and all the best restaurants in town. Oh yeah, this hotel isn't even in Anaheim, it's in Orange. Yes, the hotel has a Disneyland shuttle but it only runs on the hour. Maybe that's fine for weekdays and off season but it should run every 30 on summer weekends. I missed it everyday and had to drive (annual pass with free parking - otherwise I would've waited.)  Hotel is close to UC Irvine, a massive church and some outlets.   Hotel info: Room 2008 is considered an upgraded room on top floor.  -no refrigerator  -no in room snacks (vending machine in hall) -room was spacious and clean -bed was comfy  -ultimately, cleanliness & comfort is all I really care about. -view of a parking lot & freeway -complimentary WiFi  Restaurant: -COLD
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good facility, great location and fantastic service!
Summary: I would like to start the review by thanking all staff members for going out of their way to make our stay such a fantastic one. Special thanks to Liz Avecedo at the front desk!  Location:  15 min. away from J. Wayne Santa Ana airport ($10 by shuttle from airport). 10 min. away from Disneyland (free shuttle by hotel). An outlet mall and a best buy right across the street. A few min. from Santa Ana freeway (main highway to LA and other cities). Excellent location!  Check-in: Fast although I arrived early (10 am). I called them the day before and they had my room ready. You're greeted with the warm and delicious Doubletree cookies at check-in.   Room: Average size, clean, comfy beds and pillows. I recommend higher floor rooms as the hotel overlooks a couple of roads and traffic
Manager Response: Thank you for review. We are happy to hear that you had a good experience here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are happy to read that you were able to utilize all of the amenities available to our guests. We hope that next time you travel to Orange County you choose to stay with us for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: As Disneyland Annual Passholders, my daughter and I travel to Anaheim several times a year. And, we have stayed at a lot of different hotels. We just stayed at this property and we loved it! Check-in was smooth and efficient. I loved the easy parking access. The lot was big and secure. And, they actually had parking spaces specifically for check-in! We had a suite. It wasn't the largest suite we've ever had. But, it was very comfortable. The pool area was nice although they did run our of towels and took a while to have them replaced. Overall, I would highly recommend this hotel. We plan on staying there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We hope that during your next trip to Disneyland, you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay.

Summary: The hotel itself is very nice, it's just nothing to write home about. It's proximity to Disney and Angels Stadium is great, but if you're looking for some good local flavor you'll need to go exploring a bit. The room was very much run-of-the-mill. The overall size was acceptable, but the bathroom was predictably tight. Also, I would not recommend a high floor - as full as this hotel usually is, the ability to take the stairs (especially down in the morning) should not be overlooked.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We hope that next time you are in town you choose to stay with us again here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County.

Summary: When I first booked this stay, it was for one night at a nearby Hilton hotel. Prior to the stay, I had decided to add a day to help with the trip travel for an earlier arrival. the great customer service people offered to move me to the Double Tree for the same per night rate for two nights. Accepting this offer, I was skeptical that this would be a lesser hotel. I was wrong. the staff and service was tremendous and the room was pleasant. The staff were helpful and obliged many of the requests our family asked. And of course, the cookies offered were always helpful in putting a smile on our faces.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to read that your stay was better than expected. I was happy to read from your review that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town you make the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim OC for first choice.

Summary Heading: Large clean room & extremely pleasant helpful staff
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for six days while on business in Orange County.  From the time I checked in until the time I checked out every staff member I met was extremely pleasant and helpful. I made use of the cloud-based printing service several times and it worked perfectly--and copies were free. My room faced the Univ. of CA-Irvine Medical Center, but when I used the noise-muffling fan in the room, I couldn't hear the ambulances or the helicopters.  The exercise room was small but very adequately equipped.  Although the prices in the restaurant were high, the food was very good and the service was excellent.  The only downside--which surprised me given CA's reputation for trendy--was the lack of many gluten-free options on the menu.  However, the wait staff suggested
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Hearing from our guests helps us provide the best experience possible. I was happy to read form your review that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope to see you next time you are in town for business.

Summary: We stayed here for four nights over Memorial Day weekend.  We’re HHonors Gold and frequent guests to the area; we picked this hotel after becoming increasingly dissatisfied with our previous preferred property.    We were assigned a low-floor room; apparently the higher floors have been renovated and are rented for a premium.  This turned out to be a blessing as Disneyland was in the distance and we had an amazing view of the nightly fireworks display!  The room was clean, albeit a bid “tired” looking, and bed comfortable.  The high speed internet worked great!  At booking, we requested robes, extra pillows and a blanket and they were in the room when we arrived. The continental breakfast was limited in selection (plenty of fruit, cereal, yogurt, oatmeal, bagels and muffins) but
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. Hearing from your guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We are happy to read that you had a good experience at our hotel. We are happy you found the rooms clean and amenities useful during your stay. Also that you enjoyed the food from the restaurant. We can't wait for you to come back into town and  give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay.

Summary: Outstanding service.  The shuttle to and from Disney worked like a charm.  The hotel staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. Additionally, the hotel is located in a great location. Close to Disney and the outlet mall.  This hotel exceeded my expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. Summary: all was very good , we spend  two night a this hotel and we take the shuttle for Disney. The servive was Perfect. The breakfeast was 1 st Quality. The room was very clean.  The outlet was close to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great time here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. We are glad that the complimentary shuttle to Disneyland was at your convenience. We hope that during your next trip to Disneyland, you give us the oppportunity to welcome you back for yet another great stay.

Summary: I stayed 5 nights at this hotel for business.  Last time I stayed here was very quiet, but this time for some reasons, I kept hearing the siren from the fire engines or ambulence.  Otherwise it was a nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you had a good stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-OC. Being so close to the hospital does make it noisy at time and we apologize for that. We hope that next time you travel for business into Orange County, you stay with us again.

Summary: Great accomodations, however I didn't quite understand why as a guest of the hotel, I had to pay an extra $14/day to park in the hotel lot.  i was a little surprised by that.  Otherwise it was a fine stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear you had a good stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim OC. As to our parking, our parking charges are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding district. Thank you again for you review.

Summary: I stopped by the hotel the previous day to pay in advance and "grease the skids" so my visiting elderly father wouldn't have to produce a credit card and he would feel "treated like a king".  The check-in desk ruined the entire "king thing" and completely embarrassed me (making me appear to have serious financial problems).  The first check-in person demanded he produce a credit card for "incidentals" even though I had previously signed paperwork where I agreed to pay for all charges in advance.  Even after I stepped in, she remained adamant that dad was required to reach into his wallet.  Finally,  the front desk supervisor straightened things out.   As the check-in resumed, the supervisor pulled me off to the side and said my AmEx card was no good.  Then she ran my VISA card
Manager Response: We’re sorry we didn’t provide a high quality of service when you were checking in with your father. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned. We try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel and your satisfaction is important to us. We apologize that the credit card terminal was faulty and your feedback helps make us aware of the situation. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity soon to make your stay the best it can be.  Kind Regards, DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange Manager

Summary: Customer service was outstanding.  I booked two rooms for my family, and the rooms were clean, and very neatly arranged. The service was so good that we extended another night of stay.  By the way, the complimentary cookies were delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange. We aim to make every stay the best stay possible. We hope to see you again next time you are in town to welcome you back with a cookie.

Summary: Visited for 4 nights to see the Disneyland attractions. Great service, welcoming staff. Older property, but clean. Awesome military rate that includes breakfast. Enjoyed the valet service, but didnt like that i had to pay for parking at the hotel. Nice location, convienient to shops, etc. Free shuttle to the parks daily. Would stay again, but only for Disney visit/free shuttle, as I would pay $15 for disney parking anyway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear you had an excellent stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We hope that next time you are in town to visit Disneyland, you will stay with us again and have yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The room was very clean and the staff was very responsive. My only dislike was having to pay for parking. That should be a standard perk available for hotel guest. Other than that, the location was great. We stayed at the hilton because we were going to a concert at the honda center. The taxi drive was very short - it cost 8 dollars each way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to read that you had a good experience during your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange. We hope to welcome you back soon for another great stay.

Summary: A good experience since the beginning I enjoyed the Doble Tree facilities and good service that I received! It is a very good option for business, workshops, etc. and have fun at the same time! The staff is very kind and they are always ready to help you!

We hope to welcome you back soon for another great stay.

Summary: Staying at the Double Tree by Hilton at Anaheim-Orange County for a week long hosted business conference was one of the better experiences that I'll had at such an event.  Staff was extremely courteous and service for both the business conference and the rooms was first rate.  Probably one of the things that made the biggest impression was the speed of the elevator system.  Easily one of the most efficient bank of elevators I've run across.  The two things I missed were a second phone on the desk, and mini-refridgerator.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to read that you had a good experience during your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay.  We hope to welcome you back soon for another great stay.

Summary: Stayed here while in Orange for business, as a longtime Marriott member I was surprised at the quality of the hotel. Nice friendly staff and great customer service. This will be our hotel of choice when we are in the area for work again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to read that you had a good experience during your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay.  We hope to welcome you back soon for another great stay.

Summary: Just spent a week at the Doubletree.  Consistent with most Doubletrees:  Solid internet, clean and updated rooms, quality food, etc.  The difference was the service.  Some of the best valet service I have experienced anywhere.  Quick, friendly, and always helpful.  Bell services was always eager to help (even helped carry bottled water and powerade up to our room).  The front desk staff was friendly, attentive, and quick to resolve any issue or need.  Room service was very quick, and everything was correct each time.  The hotel was great.  I've stayed at many, and this ranks up there in its class.  Do yourself a favor, stay here.  It's a 2 minute drive to the Angel's ballpark, and 10 to Disneyland.  Only negative, you may have to pay for internet if you aren't an elite member.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to read that you had a good experience during your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay.  We hope to welcome you back soon for another great stay.
