Summary: the hotel is a little old but properly maintained. it's convenient to local shopping center, restaurants, and close to freeway. guess room carpet appears old and the air conditioning is noisy. furnishings are mixed with older and newer ones. internet connection kept being interrupted whenever my laptop went into sleep. hotel foods are fairly good. we had five breakfasts and lunches there. services are pretty good overall. may consider coming back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had a good experience during your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange. We glad you enjoyed our nearby attractions. The next time you travel to the area, we hope that you'll be our guest again.

Summary: This hotel is convenient to the freeway and shopping.  The staff is wonderful.   A good place to stay in Orange.  The draw back is the expensive daily internet charges.   The restaurant in the hotel has prompt service and pleasing menu.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had a good experience during your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange. We glad you enjoyed our Trofi Restaurant and hope to welcome you back soon for another great stay.

Summary: Had a great experience at this hotel..We were only there one night to go to an Anaheim Angels game..short cab ride to the stadium...everything was awesome...great location..outlets very close..Our room was not ready at check-in but front desk was very accomodating..room service was great
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had a good experience during your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange. We glad you enjoyed our nearby attractions and hope to welcome you back soon for another great stay.

Summary: Great service as always.  Very pleasant, friendly and professional from the time we walked in and met your lead driver, Robert, to Dawn at the front desk. Very helpful staff, and a great place to stay for only one night to a long stay as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for review. We appreciate your feedback. I was happy to read from your review that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority  is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town you stay with us and give us the opportunity for yet another great stay.

Summary: I have been to this hotel several times over the last year on business and have had consistent service and only minor problems when there. When a problem is identified, the staff makes the correction and makes them quickly and cheerfully. I enjoy the buffet breakfast option as it is a quick way to get a healthy breakfast and get on the way for the day. I have worked overnight shifts while here and the hotel staff accommodated my irregular schedule. I can manage to get the room dark enough to sleep during the day and have rarely been awakened by noise in the area of my room. It is a close walk to multiple restaurants and shopping venues.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. It is always a pleasure to hear from guest. That helps us provide the best experience possible. I was happy to read from your review that you had great experiences with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. The next time you travel to the area, we hope that you'll be our guest again.

Summary: This hotel is clean, comfortable and convenient to 3 major freeways. It's situated close to shopping and multiple restaurant and movie theaters.  There is a restaurant and two bars on site that are open until a reasonable time if you arrive late and need a bite to eat.    They staff is very helpful and friendly.  It is located across from UCI medical center, so you are a light sleeper, you will hear an occasional siren or two
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you a great experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in  town you come and stay with us once again.

Summary: I stayed here over WonderCon this year and would recommend it for any business or family visits to the area. They offer free airport shuttle service, as well as having ample paid on-site guest parking. There is a restaurant and bar within the hotel, and a Starbucks in the lobby. Rooms were clean and comfortable work desk and power available to work in room as needed. Business center in lobby available for printing and faxing also appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear you had a good stay with us. As for our parking charges, they are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding district. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it was close to the surgery center where we needed to go the next day.  It was very nice, quiet, and a convenient location.  My only complaint is having to pay for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear you had a nice experience during your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim -Orange County. I do apologize about the parking. Our parking charges are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding district. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Hard to believe it was a Hilton...except for the lobby
Summary: The room was fairly nice, absolutely no view.  But, it is Southern California.  Close to quite a few stores and malls. Close to freeway.  But I had two major complaints: 1) The lounge had the worst possible service imaginable.  Getting a drink was a task, I almost felt like I was back in London, and expected to walk to the bar to order, then point out my table. 2)  The restaurant was way below the standards I would expect for a Hilton. The fish and chips were absolutely horrible, tasted like they were just out of the freezer.  And took forever to be served. The menu is very, and I do mean very, limited.  Pot roast and a hot dog on the same one page menu? If you are not going to make it a dining experience, then make that the bar and serve finger foods, and turn the lounge into a
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important  to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Amazing Staff - Dawn & Victoria are the best! We loved our room!
Summary: This will always be the hotel we stay at for future overnight Disneyland trips, thanks to the amazing staff here. My husband and I spent the day before our first wedding anniversary at Disneyland, so we decided to spend the night there to maximize our experience. We chose this hotel because they have a shuttle so we could go in and out of the park easily (we wanted to be there open to close, but knew we'd want a power nap at some point!) Their shuttles run all day until 15 or 30 minutes after the park closes, and shuttles start coming back from the hotel to Disneyland at 2:30 - perfect for nap time for husbands or small children. ;) And the shuttle drivers (we rode the shuttle four times) were all SO nice! We also noticed the drivers were really accommodating to the families
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We really appreciate your feedback. We are extremely happy you had a great experience here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim -Orange County. We are glad that you had a wonderful anniversary stay. I have shared your review with Dawn and Victoria and their Directors to make sure their hospitalitydoes not go unnoticed. Our main priority is for you to feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay.We hope that next time you are in town you choose to stay with us here again.

Summary: Used to stay here all the time more than 6 years ago, then moved to another location in Orange County. Last year decided to return for a work trip and was reminded what a great hotel this is. Staff is very friendly and helpful, rooms are well appointed and clean, and location is convenient for activities. The available breakfast buffet is a good start to your day. Will be returning many times in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to welcome you back and hear that you enjoyed your stay. We are glad you had a great experience with our staff. Our main priority is to make the guest feel welcomed and comfortable. We hope to welcome you back during your next stay in Orange County.

Summary: This was my second time staying at a Double Tree Hilton and this one was just as great as the first. The room was stocked and clean for us. Also I forgot my toothbrush and the care service brought me up one and some toothpaste. Overall my stay was great and will looked forward to my next Double Tree Hilton stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you had and continue to have good experiences with the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim -Orange. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: We live 5 minutes from this hotel and chose to stay here for the weekend while some work was being done on our house.  We had a great experience.  The hotel was very clean and every employee we encountered offered exceptional customer service.  If you are visiting from out of town it is a great location to visit nearby tourist attractions, as well as walking distance to the Outlets at Orange with restaurants, shops and movie theaters.  The only improvement I could think of is if the delicious cookies were provided every night!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We always appreciate the feedback especially from our locals. We are glad you chose to stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim -Orange County while your house underwent repairs. We are happy to hear you had a great experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during you stay. Thank you again and we hope that you will refer your friends and family to our property when they come to town to visit.

Summary: I found the staff not very helpful, and the room furnishings drab and old. I was really disappointed at the accommodations and won't be staying here again.  I also thought the hotel was way over-priced for what you get.
Manager Response: Patricia,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry you were unhappy with the furnishings in your guestroom. We appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we work to improve our guest experience. We hope you’ll stay with us again soon and tell us what you think about our improvements.  Kind Regards,  DoubleTree Executive Team

Summary: I chose to stay at this hotel because of the excellent price but I got much more than I bargained for in terms of outstanding service and prompt responses to my needs and questions.  You will not go wrong if you choose to stay here because they go out of their way to keep everything so right.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear you had a good experience here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. We are extremely happy that you had a great experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay.  We hope to see you in the near future for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Clean modern hotel. The front desk was very helpful and let me check in a little bit early. The rooms are spacious and super clean. The city views are amazing. They also offer a shuttle to Disneyland and we took it to Downtown Disney to have dinner.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to hear you had a great Valentine's Day while staying with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. We are glad you had a good use of our complimentary shuttle for guest to Disneyland. We hope to see you in your future travels to Orange County.

Summary Heading: No Wifi in room and no free breakfast for AAA members
Summary: We had a Disneyland trip and wanted a hotel close by.  It was a good price for the distance (only one exit away) but when I went to book the hotel I asked about Wifi in the room and they have a free breakfast to their customer support/booking clerk.  She said yes to both.  Well when we arrived Wifi is only in the lobby and the free breakfast was not allowed because we used our AAA discount to book the room which I was not told about by the booking agent.  I will not stay here again because I don't like being lied to.  The two full size beds were supposed to be queen beds.  The room was okay.  Two of the three staff I dealt with were not friendly.  First the lady I asked about getting the free breakfast just said "you have to pay for it because you booked with AAA" and nothing
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and concerns, we truly value the opinion of our guests and are working dilingently to assure we corrected the problems you experience. On behalf of the DoubleTree Executive Team, I would like to extend an apology and hope we may have the chance to reedem ourselves and see you in the near future so that we may show you the changes we have made.

Summary: The Doubletree Anaheim-Orange County was an excellent venue for a business conference.  To a person, the staff from arrival to departure was attentive, friendly, and personable.  It is also in a perfect location.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had a great experience with the staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The hotel's cleanliness and physique weer excellent as most large Double Tree hotels are. The front desk experience with a young man (forgot his name) was less satisfying than a part time fast food checker.   There are many nice hotels to choose from but services will win repeat business.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Hearing from our guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We always aim to provide the most comfortable and cleanest stay for all our guests. We hope to see you back during your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: This is a very nice DoubleTree - good location, fairly new, good showers. No free parking option, but I guess that's the SoCal way, and it is close to Disney (I was there for an event at Chapman University, so this was meaningless to me).  The "Coffi" shop in the lobby is far from a real Starbucks; if that's your cup of coffee, go across the street. My iced coffee was too week and also even more burnt tasting than normal Starbucks.  Room service does not do any sort of turndown, so if you don't want to get up early, make sure you close the blackout curtains yourself.  One complaint: my colleagues were delayed in travel, called ahead to let them know I was coming, and they did not keep a record of this. Instead, they insisted upon calling my CEO at 3:30 a.m. Eastern because his
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Hearing from our guests helps us provide the best experience possible. From what you have said I couldn't agree with you more and we will have a lively discussion about how things should have been handled differently. Thank you for sharing your experience we apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: Was a little disappointed with a few things. The bad was NOT comfortable at all. Someone left my door ajar but they did NOT clean my room because we had just arrived that day. So no one should have been in there! We used room service and my salad wasn't as stated in the menu. And we were kept awake by two noisy neighbors until 4AM. We were expecting so much better. For one night should have just stayed in a motel....Would have been no different (except this was clean)!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. We were dissapointed to see that you did not enjoy your stay. On behalf of the team I would like to extend an apology and hope we may have the chance to reedem ourselves in the near future. Again, I do hope we will see you in the near future so that we may show oyou the changes we have made.

Summary Heading: Good place for a business stay
Summary: I had a two day engagement locally and chose the Doubletree in Orange because I prefer the Hilton chain whenever possible. This was one of their better properties in terms of value and customer service. The desk staff were very helpful and all other staff, from the dining area to housekeeping were efficient and all were very friendly. They make you feel welcome and act as if your business is truly important to them. All in all, a comfortable place to stay for the business person.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you had a great stay with us. And even more happy that you had a great experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town for business you choose to stay with the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: This hotel is outdated, the rooms are big but old, the place is clean, but I was expecting more for the price, close to attraction (Disney, the crystal cathedral, etc.) The breakfast is fine, but was not include on the price of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear had a good experience. We always aim to provide the most comfortable and cleanest stay for all guests. We regret you did not have this experience but would like to welcome you back soon for a better stay.

Summary: My friend and I had a nice stay. We didn't spend much time at the hotel but it was conveniently located and the mattresses don't hurt my back (that's a GOOD thing!) Check in was a little slow.  We had dinner reservations and between northbound traffic and only one person handling check-in, we had to change clothes in the lobby restroom!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that the little time you spend here it was comfortable. We hope that next time you are in town you five us the opportunity to welcome you again and have another enjoyable stay.

Summary: very average rooms, rates completley out of line. Bar service very average Entrance to Hotel not accessable  How strange that my review needs to be at least 200 characters in stead of max 200 characters!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are wokring diligently to make every stay and wonderful stay. We apologize for  any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: I traveled with some friends and I liked it. There are better hotels that I've gone to but this was very good one. mostly because i was traveling with friends and everything is fun... well, there's plenty of space in the parking lot, so if you rent a car its an amazing option. the people were so so so kind. THE COOKIES ARE AMAZING YOU HAVE TO EAT THEM I MISS THEM. the hotels were clean and comfortable with the perfect space. the bathroom was clean but (dont take it personally) 've always disliked the shower in the hotels. but the shampoo smell was amazing. its a good hotel, comfortable and big and there is plenty of space. i didnt have breakfast/lunch/dinner there. but its amazing that there is a starbucks. and the little store was full of adorable things that you'll LOVE. i
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We hope that you come back during your next visit to Orange County. We'll have a cookie waiting for you.

Summary: Our stay was very excellent, the staff was friendly and helpful. Went with a group of 40+ students and chaperones. They put extra shampoo, conditioner and lotion for each person. The buffet was fantastic our DSPS students were very impressed and enjoyed their stay. Would definitely stay again. Our check in was a breeze had over 20+ rooms. They are truly professionals. Thank you Stephanie and Aimee.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County. We're glad that you had a great experience with our team members. We hope to welcome you back in the future for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at the Doubltree Anaheim
Summary: As usual, we know what to expect from a Hilti hotel. This stay was excellent.  Love the bed and the beddings and robe!! The room was very clean, the hallway was clean, no smell of smoke.  I was given the room I requested, higher floor and away from the elevator. The continental breakfast came with the room.  It was very nice and well presented. I did not have the chance to check out the pool. We were in Anaheim to watch Joel Osteen's "Nigh of Hope" at the Honda Stadium.  The hotel was very convenient to the stadium.  Also, a block away from the hotel was a shopping mall and lots of restaurants to choose from.  I highly recommend this DTree.
Manager Response: Thank you for review Regina. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County. We hope you had a great time during your show at the Honda Center and hope you consider us next time you are in town.

Summary: Very clean higher end hotel.  Super comfortable hotel walking distance to angel stadium. I'm all about saving on a taxi, and not getting a DUI! The lobby bar was convenient but big surprise, pricey. but I would totally stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We always appreciate the feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County. We hope that next time you are in town for an Angel's game, you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel for two years in a row for our annual Disneyland trip.  The offer a free shuttle to and from Disneyland every hour and it's just about a 5 minute trip.  This location is right next to a mall and restaurants if needed.  Will definitely be going back next year!
Manager Response: Thankyou for your review. We are happy to hear that you have had a great experience with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton - Orange County. We hope to see you again during your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: My only complaint would be the charge for internet service. I think that this should be complimentary for guests of the hotel in the rooms, the lobby, and all the surrounding property areas. Otherwise, my stay was very nice with a very comfortable bed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you had a nice stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County. We hope that next time you are in town for business or traveling with family you choose the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Stayed at the Double Tree with my daughters choir tour, there were 176 people in our group. Double Tree bends over backwards to make sure everything runs smoothly. Jeremy was infinitely patient with all our requests. Any issues or request we had were handled quickly and without any rolling of eyes or heavy sighs!  From the attendant at the parking booth, bell boys, front desk to the maids. Everyone is very friendly and helpful. We usually like to stay close to Disneyland when we visit So Cal. Will consider staying at Double Tree on our next visit. No resort fee,  they have a shuttle that takes you to Disneyland. Great mall within walking distance.  Clean and beautiful hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you had a great time with your group when you stayed with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County. We are glad you had a great experience with our staff. Our priority is to make you feel welcomed and comfortable during your stay. We will see you during your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Great hotel, service was great, near to outlet for quick shopping, friendly staff. The shuttle to Disneyland was fantastic and the drivers are very friendly and entertaining too which makes the ride very enjoyable. Shuttle service are always on time. I have been staying at this hotel for all my business trip stopovers. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear you had a great time while visiting the Orange County area. We are glad you got to experience the complimentary Disney shuttle. We hope you continue to stay with us during your personal and business trips in the future.

Summary Heading: Very good option for visiting anaheim
Summary: The hotel is really nice, I stayed on a premium room and they are great I would recommend to try and upgrade to this type of room for what I've read in several reviews. If you're planning a Disneyland trip the hotel has a free shuttle to and from the park several times a day which is very convenient, you avoid parking fees. Also nice is that is closed to orange outlet center so you can shop/eat close by. If you bring a car use the self parking option, valet is slow and I saw very little personnel available. The hotel has a Starbucks for you to grab something fast in the morning. Looks like is more a business hotel so It helps to avoid crowds for Disney shuttle service; after a long day at the park the last thing you need is lines for the hotel shuttle. You have a hospital next
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/ Orange County. We are happy you got the enjoy the complimentary shuttle to and from Disneyland. We hope that when you plan your next plan to Orange County, you stay with us and give us the opportunity for another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Very nice hotel comfortable rooms, bed was a bit lumpy. Side I was on faced the hospital so heard the roar and sirens of fire rigs and ambulances at night. The nearby shopping center was very nice and convenient. Loved the hot tub though!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County. The next time you travel to the area, we hope that you'll be our guest again.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in 2012 and we're very impressed, which is why we decided to stay there again. Upon arriving at the hotel, the check-in the front desk associate continued to talk with another associate before realizing that we were standing there. Finally, when we were helped she was extremely rude. We were assigned to the 8th floor and when we opened our room door the smell of "wet dog" exited the room. It was extremely hot and the room itself was very outdated. The shower kept clogging and the water barely drained. I attempted to speak with someone at the front area, however, they were no help. I am sad to say that I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. You can definitely find a better hotel and rate closer to Disneyland and for probably the same price.
Manager Response: Daniel,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We’re very sorry your recent experience at our property wasn’t up to our usual high standards. We’ve addressed the smell you mentioned with our housekeeping staff and have talked to our front desk department about the importance of delivering quality service to our guests. Thank you for alerting us to your shower issues, and we hope you’ll give us another chance if you return to Disneyland sometime soon.  Kind Regards,  DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange Manager

Summary: you had me with the warm cookies! Also the size and room were a great value,  the only thing i would advise is to upgrade to queens instead of a full size bed. Other than that it was very close to Disneyland and Westminster.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at The DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay where we will have a warm cookie waiting for you.

Summary Heading: Decent hotel close to Orange Shopping Outlet
Summary: We were group of 4 travelling on business stayed here in 2 interconnected rooms for 5 nights. The room was comfortable and hotel staff were excellent. The bed and pillows were comfortable  and bathroom was ok with basic stuff in it. The hotel does not offer free internet or parking. It does have a restaurant and Starbucks café. Disney and conference center visitors will find the hotel far unless they have a car. The downside was we had to pay parking both in the hotel as well as conference center. Overall it is nice hotel to stay if one has own transportation as nothing except Orange Shopping Outlets and Best Buy is within walkable distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County during your business trip with your colleages. We hope that next time you are in town, for business or pleasure, we hope you stay with us and give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located. It seemed more relaxed; less crowded and chaotic than those located closer to Disneyland. We stayed here while attending an event at the convention center. The nearby shopping center is nice and there are plenty of restaurants to choose from. The hotel itself was nicely maintained. Check in and out was very nice, valet was great. Service at the restaurant was also nice.  To highlight a couple small but very nice perks that might not have been mentioned here already: Hairdryer works great; more quiet than mine at home but just as powerful (a definite plus for moms getting ready while kids are still sleeping) and a mounted bottle opener was very useful for a nightcap.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at The DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County. We are glad you had a great experience with our staff at the front desk, valet and restaurant. We do hope you return soon and give us the opportunity to welcome you back soon for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Disappointed in service that was provided by the staff.  It seems as though, there were not enough people to assist customers.  There are many hotels in the area to choose from, I will select another next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience by hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: Location was good and hotel was excellent. Very clean and great service. Breakfast buffet was great and good value in our package. Lounge was good with good specials. Pool and hot tub were okay. Would stay there again and it was good enough for NHL players
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County. Our priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Great Value, Great location, excellent rooms. Near Chapman university and freeways. Close to Disneyland and other attraction. This hotel provides lots of great service for extremely reasonable prices.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you had a great experience at our hotel. We hope that next time you are in town you return to the DT by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County.

Summary: My stay at the Double Tree Hilton was a pleasant experience.  The only regret is the soup I order from the resturant.  I ordered chicken tortilla and it was mostly all both.  That was the only disappointment.  The room and service was excellent! I would stay there again, no problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/Orange County. We hope to see you back when you visit the Anaheim area in the future.

Summary: The stay was fantastic.  The hotel staff was always helpful and professional.  The breakfast buffet and service at the restaurant was above and beyond as well.  The shopping center next door was a short walk and offered many choices for food and shopping.  Thank you for a great vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are so happy that you had a great experience in our hotel. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you are in town you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: Would have been nice to have at least a Continental Breakfast included.    The Cookies were great!  Also, the shuttle bus leaving every hour was very convenient.   The room was spacious and the beds were quite comfortable.  Convenient check in time and check out time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We were happy to hear you had an enjoyable stay. We hope that next time you visit the Orange County area you give us the opportunity to welcome you back and you can enjoy more of our signature DoubleTree cookies.

Summary: I was so glad we stayed at this Doubletree, everyone was so very nice. From the front desk staff comping a roll away, to the bar tender who helped me open a bottle I had lost hope on. Thank so much for the bday surprise you gave my godson, he loved it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear you had a great experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We are glad your godson had a great birthday and we are happy you decided to stay with us during the celebration. We hope you join us next time you are in town for yet another great stay.

Summary Heading: Convenient location, a little too big and how about some free WiFi?
Summary: 2 nights here for business.  Close to shopping and some restaurants.  Nothing really stands out at this hotel, just a big Hilton property.  If you're coming to Anaheim for Disney, you probably get more room for your money than at one of the hotels closer to the park.  They do offer shuttle service to the Magic Kingdom.  For a business traveller, it was quiet and had enough plugs to charge all my gadgets.  Starbucks coffee in the lobby was a plus.  I was assigned an accessible king room.  I really don't like the bathrooms in accessible rooms as I wear contacts and need space to put the bottles of solution, etc.  This room had absolutely no counter space.  I think the front desk should have asked if I was OK with this kind of room.  I would like to see full service hotels offering
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad you chose the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim / Orange County when you were in town. We apologize for your troubles with the room. We agree that the Front Desk should have asked if you would have been happy in that room. Your feedback is very important to us and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: I stayed one night.  I checked out early the following morning.  When I went to retrieve my car from the motel parking lot about noon the same day I realized I had left my GPS in my room.  I went to the front desk and reported my error.  Hotel staff checked and could not find the GPS.  When I got home two days later I called the motel and left a detailed message with Security/Lost and Found.  I never got a return call.  I recognize it was my fault to have left the GPS in my room.  But I would have hoped to recover the GPS.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you missplaced your GPS. We will follow up with security and see what we can do to locate the item.  Again, we apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: Actual rating = 3.25  We chose the Doubletree in Orange for its relative closeness to Angel Stadium instead of Disneyland. There are dozens of places in the same price range as this Doubletree that are closer to Disney. There is a free hotel shuttle to and from the park. The walk to Angel Stadium is straight, safe and easy from the Doubletree in Orange.  This property is a little older but not worn out yet. Our two queen room was a little cramped and the bathroom quite small. Older hotel design. The room and bathroom were both clean. The deck area outside the lounge is very pleasant, as is the lobby. The pool space is very small, especially for a hotel this size. There is a sport court as well as a tennis court. There is guest laundry outside the main building in a cabana by the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here. We are glad you chose our hotel for your visit when coming to the Angels game. We hope you consider us next time you are in town.

Summary: Wonderful hotel, great price, loved everything about it! Even through an earthquake the hotel staff was professional and compassionate. Wonderful stay for me and my daughter! We spent hours looking at the pond, using the facilities, sitting in the lounge and enjoyed the quietness of the hotel in all hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim/ Orange County. We hope that next time you are in town, you and your daughter can stay with us again and enjoy the amenities once again.

Summary: We stayed here for 7 nights in March, 2 Adults and 2 Children (4 and 8).  We booked a standard room with 2 double beds and found that we had plenty of room. The beds were very comfortable as were the pillows.  The room itself was perfectly acceptable, a good size TV with heaps of selections.  We had a view of the Disneyland fireworks which was great for the kids.  The bathroom was also fine, clean and tidy.  The only thing i would have liked better was a stronger shower head, but it was ok.  We had no issues with housekeeping, they actually made some towel creatures each day in the bathroom which my kids thought were cute.  The hotel itself is very well appointed.  The lobby is clean, tidy and looks great.  Check in was fine, we arrived an hour early for check in and it was no
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We love to hear from our happy guests. We are delighted to hear you had a great stay. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We are glad you experienced this. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: We were there for a family vacation,  Check in was fast an friendly.  Staff was great.  Rooms were clean but could have been better .. found a Lacrosse ball and a jelly bean on the floor.  We had two rooms reserved and it was so nice of them to give us rooms next to each other.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay. We always aim to provide the most comfortable and cleanes stay for all guests. We regret you did not have this experience. We do hope to welcome you back and show you our true commitment to guest satisfaction.

Summary: I am a HH member and always stay at DoubleTree hotels. This was the worst experience that I had. The shower drain was horrible slow and every morning there was black sewage in the tub. I made three calls to the care line for additional towels, coffee, etc and none of the items were delivered.
Manager Response: Jaime,  Thank you for your feedback about the comfort and appointment of your guestroom and the issue with water in your shower. We’ve worked with maintenance to fix the issue, but we’re very sorry that it wasn't resolved sooner. At our hotel, we are constantly updating our facilities and hope this prevents any additional issues. Thanks again for your review and we hope you stay with us the next time you return to the area so we may demonstrate the complete quality stay you expect and deserve.  Thank you, The DT Executive Team

Summary Heading: My first experience at DoubleTree by Hilton  hotel in Orange CA accomodation
Summary: I have never chosen this hotel before so this is my first look and my opinion about DoubleTree by Hilton hotel in Orange CA. My visit to the USA was related to my business thus my accomodation fee in this hotel was rated on exceptional condition. So, I have had the great experience in staying here. There was very friendly staff and comfortable and clean room. Very good location of the hotel relativeto attractions and shopping area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We truly value the opinion of our guests. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We hope that next time you travel to the United States you come back to Orange County and give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Old and dingy! Overpriced, paid for parking for no reason, no security and no one monitoring who comes and goes. Do not say you have a vehicle because no one monitors who is coming or going. Check-in was painful after a long day of travel. Had to listen to club music in the lobby and waiting in a long line with one desk agent. Terrible!
Manager Response: Staci,  Thank you for sharing this quick feedback on your recent stay with us via TripAdvisor. We appreciate your honest input and apologize you were disappointed in our value and atmosphere. We will keep your comments in mind as we constantly look for new ways to improve our guests' experience moving forward and we hope you will return to stay with us the next time you are in town and let us know how we are doing.   Thank you, DT Executive Team

Summary: We were given disabled rooms even though we booked and paid for our room 4 months in advance. We were told these were standard rooms and that was all that was available. Charge for internet these days is just not fair when wifi is free in almost every little cafe in  USA
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and concerns, we truly value the opinion of our guests and sorry that you were not happy with your stay. We will keep your comments in mind as we constantly look for new ways to improve our guests' experience moving forward and we hope you will return to stay with us the next time you are in town and let us know how we are doing.

Summary: Me and friend stayed at your hotel to go to Disneyland. When we got their the person at the front Desk was not helpful! When we booked the hotel the was a deal for park tickets. If we got a tickets from your hotel we would get $50 off our room. We had a lot of trouble  trying to get our tickets. The computer was down and it took 4 different people to try and help us and in the end they just sent us to the Business room. And We did not get the deal  which was one of the 2 reason we stayed at your hotel. The  people were not helpful and they didn't know anything.  We very unhappy with the service we got!
Manager Response: First of all, thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. We always appreciate hearing from our guests- including when comments help identify ways we can improve. I am sorry that no one was available to help you while you and your friend arrived at our hotel. We have taken your comments into consideration and we are looking in ways to improve our guest experience. Again, I apologize if you went through any inconveniences during your stay and I do hope the next time you return to the area you consider staying with us again.

Summary: The front desk staff was very accomodating and helpful with directions.  Additionally, the room was very clean and relaxing.  They also provided a discounted rate for parking if you were staying at the hotel, which is nice for the CA area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear from your review that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We hope next time you are in town you will return for another wonderful stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County.

Summary: Our experience at the Double Tree in Orange, CA was great, except for the condition of our room which reeked of cigarette smoke. When we called the front desk to ask if we had accidentally been put into a smoking room, they informed us of their non-smoking policy throughout the entire hotel. We were not offered a different room, or anything else to compensate for the stench. We were given a "too bad, so sad" attitude by the front desk.   Other than the smell in our room, our experience was great. Conveniently located near where our convention was, quick breakfast stands in the lobby, the room (despite the stench) was cleaned thoroughly each day, beds are very comfortable, and pretty decently priced.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We always aim to provide the most comfortable and cleanest stay for all guests. We regret you did not experience this. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: Room was nice but they blocked the AC from going down past 65 degrees and TV was difficult to use..Over all the staff was great and the Hotel was very clean. The main bar was inadequate, small and out in the open
Manager Response: Thank you for comments and choosing the Double Tree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced. On a brighter note, we were happy to read from your review that you had a good experience withour staff and neatness of your room. Our priorities are for guests to  feel welcome, comfortable and have the cleanest stay. We do hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: The infamous doubletree cookie was a rock. No A/C just a fan which kept me awake blowing constantly and never cooling the room.  Attendant opened my door around 3:15am creeping me out so that they could put my invoice in the doorway...why don't they just put it under the door!?!?  They tried to charge me parking after I had told them at check-in that I was with the party checking-in next to me and didn't drive.  They had to fix this the next morning.  They looked at me like I was an alien when I asked if they had any coffee and they told me it was in my room I had checked out of and therefore unavailable.  I'm sure others would find this place fantastic, but for the price it was awful.
Manager Response: Kyle,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your recent stay with us via TripAdvisor. We appreciate your honest input on our service and appointment and apologize you were disappointed in your visit. We will use your comments as we continue to evolve our guests' experience moving forward and we hope you will return to stay with us the next time you are in the area so we may better demonstrate our commitment to your satisfaction.   Thank you,  The DoubleTree Executive Team

Summary Heading: Musty, outdated rooms. Hated every second.
Summary: I was in Anaheim for an Expo being held at the COnvention Centre, and our travel agents booked us into this hotel in the absence of anything closer (to the C/Centre).  The exterior and reception area of the hotel looked reasonably promising - neat and tidy, with a few premium touches such as beautiful flower arrangements and appealing lounges. The accommodation levels however were completely charmless, with stark corridors lacking any warm touches such as flowers or prints on the walls, old shabby elevator doors and dark dated carpet. The first room I was given absolutely STANK of cigarette smoke. Reception were readily agreeable to giving me a new room and promptly brought the new key up, and while the second room smelt a lot better I could still smell a faint cigarette smell
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our hotel during your business trip. We’re sorry you encountered housekeeping problems. Cleanliness issues are not typical at our hotel, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention. We have discussed this with our staff and will make every effort to be sure our rooms meet the highest housekeeping standards. We've also personally thanked our staff for their dedication to friendly helpful service and hope we'll have another chance to welcome you back.  Kind regards,  The DoubleTree Executive Team

Summary Heading: Great Hotel/Nice Area of Orange,Ca/Overall Enjoyed our Stay
Summary: I recently stayed on 3/8/14-3/11/14 with a colleague. The staff were very attentive, helpful, polite and pleasant overall.   The room was kept clean and the bed was comfortable to sleep in. Our conference was in Disney, they ran out of rooms so we opted to stay here and we were not disappointed at all and was pleasanly surprised. Thank you to the staff, Ray (Our Shuttle Driver), concierge staff for the restaurant, organic market recommendations, to the Lady at the front desk --Petta? sorry unable to remember her name but we were so happy and appreciative of her help. The bonus was a free shuttle service to disney. No hassle to drive or worry about parking and fees.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim- Oraneg County.  and sharing your experience. We were happy to read from your review that you had a wonderful experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you soon for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The property is in good shape with typical amenities. My bathroom was fresh in decor and attributes. However, my bedroom was 20 years outdated. Really, not a big deal for me. But the noise was horrible. The fan on the ventilation in my room was always on and sounded like I was sleeping next to a clothes dryer. The mini frig was 'gergely' and also ran all the time. And the toilets are the hard suction type, allowing me to hear both of my neighbors. Add in all the ambulances outside and this was a poor sleep stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced.  We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: Was here for a conference but couldn't get a hotel near the convention centre so took this, wasn't expecting much but pleasantly surprised. The hotel is in Orange and only 2 miles from Anaheim convention centre. On arrival I asked for a high floor quiet room and was given exactly this. There was a smell of cigarette smoke in the bathroom but reception arranged to have the room deodorised or have me moved. They comped my parking charges because of this. The room was clean, the bed comfy and the bathroom adequate. Room service food was hit and miss but no worse than comparable style hotels. Breakfast was quite good with a decent selection.  In conclusion I would stay here again if visiting Orange or the convention centre.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. Hearing from our guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We are delighted that you had a great experience while staying with us. We do hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: Had the usual ammenities that can be expected from a hotel. Front desk and concierge were helpful and friendly.  Extremely disappointed that timeshare owners did not receive things like free WiFi and free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for you review of your past stay at our hotel. We always appreciate hearing from our guests. We were happy to read from your review that you had a good experience with our staff.  Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during you stay. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: The customer service was great and I had no problems for except for the one below:  The tub was dirty upon my arrival of the room. I called and it was cleaned immediately but I wish I did not have to see that in the first place. I recommend ensuring both bedroom and bathrooms are clear before handing a key to a quest.  Overall customer service and place is great. They have a great lost and found department as well. It is a convenient location.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. We appreciated your honesty. We always aim to provide the most comfortable and cleanest stay for all guests. We regret you did not experience this. Thank you for your review.  We apologize for any inconvience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: I booked this hotel through a 3rd party discount service. They hotel was clean, the rooms were well appointed and the pool area was nice.  The location was only a short drive away to the convention center.  They did not offer shuttle service to the convention center however they did offer service to Disneyland- which is right next to the convention center.  The restaurant has great food and the breakfast buffet was also very good. Nice stay and well kept, well managed property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay with the DoubleTree By Hilton  Anaheim-Orange County. We hope that during your next visit you give us the opportunity to welcome you back for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: I attended a California Mathematics Council, Community Colleges conference and stayed at the hotel.  Both were excellent.  The conference facilities fit the type of conference very well.  The room was clean and comfortable.  We appreciated the continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreiciate your feedback. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and your conference with California Mathematics Council, Community Colleges. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for yet another enjoyable stay.

Summary: The breakfast, the beds, the service and the customer relations is top notch.  Cannot be beaten.  However the Parking situation is ridiculous.   It is quite unneccessary.   It is a rip-off.  The try to charge valet.  The self service parking is a rip off.  They do not monitor all of the parking lots like they advertise, 24-7 and yet they still charge no matter what.  If there is inclement weather, watch out, you might get blocked out of the lots for no reason.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. As for our parking, the charges are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding district. We hope  for the opportunity  to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: There was nothing really wrong, but nothing really good.  It may have been because I had just spent 10 days in a Doubletree in Aurora, CO, where I got breakfast everyday, a king bed and a more friendly environment for half the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We regret to hear that your experience with DoubleTree Hilton Anaheim - Orange County was not your best. We apologize for the inconvience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: The Nicest and friendly staff!  Rooms are comfortable, clean and quiet. The hotel is in a great location as well! The cookies are always an added plus!  Starbucks in the lobby is wonderful. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I hope next time you are in town you will consider us again.

Summary: I stayed at the Doubletree for a week for business. The on-site staff was ok, some were helpful, others were more on the rude side.  The breakfast at the hotel restaurant was not worth the money, even though it was all expensed through the company. Although the stay was ok, what happened after I left has been an ordeal for the past few days and is still ongoing.  If you stay at the Doubletree in Orange, I suggest you check your credit cards with a fine toothed comb. Without any notice, they charged for for damages to the room (hole in the wall). Damages I Never caused.  I never saw the hole in the wall and I never caused it.  The hotel manager says a report was filed because the cleaning lady saw it and they automatically assumed I was guilty.  They charged my corporate card
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear about the poor service experience you had and billing discrepancy. We certainly want to be nothing short of helpful and invite you to contact us directly if you would like to discuss your concerns.  Kind regards,  snacc-sm@hilton.com

Summary: Sent my friends here for an overnight stay as a couples night. They both were so happy and when I went to check them in beforehand and set up a few things, the front desk person was extremely welcoming and friendly. She even had room service send up a bottle of champagne for them to make it that much more special. Definitely grateful to all of the staff and the hotel itself for such an amazing night for two of my good friends.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are so happy that your friends enjoyed their couples night. We are happy that they had a great experience with the staff. We hope that when you and your friends are in town you stay with us again.

Summary: Stayed at the Doubletree for 1 night as we were on our way to another destination.  Everything was seamless...from the front dest staff to the comfort of room.  Rooms were clean and beds were comfy!  Would definitely recommend and stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anahiem  - Orange County. We hope next time you are in town you will come back and stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great location and good reliable service
Summary: Across the street from UC Irvine Medical Center and near shopping with selection of restaurants. Near the Angels Stadium. Rooms spacious, pleasantly decorated. Staff friendly and can't avoid mentioning the hot chocolate cookie upon check-in for a bit of fun. I'd stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim-Orange County. We hope to see you back here soon where we will have a warm cookie waiting for you.

Summary: All was wonderful.  Important that for me close to UC Irvine Hosp. as had family member in surgery there.   thanks for all  buffet breakfast was terrific.   Arrived late and fellow in parking valet was so nice to help w/ guidiing me to self - park.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had an excellent experience with us.  We wish your family member a speedy recovery and hope to have you back when you visit Orange County again.

Summary: Met daughter and boyfriend who were there earlier, doing Disneyland.  Four of us drove to LV the next morning. The one night there for us was perfect.  We all loved every aspect of the hotel and all the staff we encountered, bar none.  Dinner and breakfast at Trofi top knotch service.  Will make sure future plans include a Doubletree.
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County. We hope you enjoyed your Las Vegsa trip and we hope you stay with us next time you come to Disneyland.

Summary: We spent the night here as I had to come from Riverside County to get a medical procedure done and didn't want to face the Friday night traffic home.  The pillow-top beds were quite comfortable and the beds were stacked with two firm and two (down?) soft pillows each. There was granite in the bathroom and on the counter and table/desk. It was a little tight to get to the bed by the window and the table was too heavy to move.  They were nice enough to bring up a mini-fridge so I could re-freeze my ice pack.  We had dinner in the restaurant. The menu was a bit disappointing as it was sparse and more like lunch, so we settled for grilled cheese sandwiches and tomato basil soup. (I think it was because it was off-season.) The menu isn't the only reason I didn't give them a 5 rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and are sorry your husband had discomfort with the cheese. We wish him a speedy recovery and hope to see you back during your next visit to town.

Summary: I was disappointed in the service at the front desk - staff was not very friendly or pleasant and waiting was too long on multiple occasions.  The location near the outlet mall was excellent - walking distance to shopping, movies and dining.  Restaurants was overpriced for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We have taken your comments into consideration and we are looking in ways to improve our guest experience. I apologize you went through any inconveniences during your stay and I do hope the next time you return to the area you consider staying with us again.

Summary: This hotel was clean so if that is all you want then go ahead and stay here but I thought the price was a bit expensive considering that there was no mini fridge or microwave in the room, which would have come in handy with some of the leftovers that we had.  They have a restaurant in the hotel but why do they think it is OK to have overpriced food?  Can they just charge a normal price?  Again, my room was clean but it was just a room with 2 beds and a bathroom.  I could have received much more in another chain.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback. We truly value the opinion of our guests and are working diligently to assure we corrected the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: EXCELLENT!  This is the ONLY hotel we will stay at when in the area.  Employees are super nice, rooms very clean, never a complaint.  The warm cookies upon check in are always a PLUS!  So convenient to have FREE shuttle service to Disneyland.  Can't go wrong staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We aim to make our guest feel at home. We will see you next time you are in town!

Summary: Very clean and fresh environment; offers convenient amenities (Starbucks, restaurant and gym inside facility). Walking distance from outlet stores and several restaurants - wonderful evening walk; Complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland/Downtown Disney, which is only a 5 minute drive away; friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay here and that you enjoyed the facilities on our property. We hope you will consider us for your next stay when you come back to town.

Summary: All staff were very welcoming and made us feel very special.  i hope we have our conference here again next year.  This was our 2nd year here and the care and service is consistent - excellent!  Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate it your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay. Even more glad that you had a great experience great customer service. It's what we like to hear. We hope that your company continues to hold their conferences here and we hope to see you again at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County.

Summary Heading: More like a Holiday Inn than a Hilton property.
Summary: Let me say first that I was a little on the fence with this property.  It was centrally located to all things in the OC and LA, which is why I chose this location. I had booked one of the remodeled rooms, but unfortunately they had over sold the hotel and I was given an older room at a cheaper rate. With that said, they had given me lower parking fee (which I think should've been comped).  Also, I should've gotten free wifi for my room as well.  There is free wifi in the lobby, but you have to lug your computer/ipad/phone down to the lobby which is less private to get wifi. Coffee wasn't complimentary as with the other Doubletree we stayed at this weekend.  Starbucks in the lobby.    Ok that out of the way.  It's a great property for families who are visiting the OC/Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County. We always aim to provide the most comfortable stay for all guests. We regret you did not experience this. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back  soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights for a show and I can say I would spend a few more dollars to stay down the road.  This hotel looks to be old and service was not very good.  The staff at the desk was great but at the lounge was horrible.  I just wanted a nice place to relax and have a drink and it took over 10 minutes just to get an order in and then I had to remind the waiter about my drink.  This would be a last resort if other hotels are booked out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and concerns, we truly value the opinion of our guests and are working diligently to assure we corrected the problems you experienced. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: Conference room was too cold, difficult to keep warm.  Felt this was the cause of my catching a cold.  Hotel room less than expected. Had what appears to be blood stain on drapes. Reported it and nothing was done to replace them. Staff was friendly but not accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County. We appreicate your feedback. We always aim to provide the most comfortable and cleanest stay for all guest. We regret you did not experiece this. We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: My hotel stay was excellent.  Everyone was very courteous and helpful. I loved the housekeepers extra touch with the towel figures-brought a smile to my face, after a long day.   This is my second stay at this hotel and they continue to provide excellent service.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you back in the near future during your next trip into town.

Summary: Room was cleaned extremely well each day.  Everyone was customer service orintated.  The food was wonderful during the conference and at the resturant the night I ate in.  I would come back to this location anytime I am in town.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and for choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are so happy that you enjoyed your lunch and late dinner. We look forward to seeing you again during your next visit to town.

Summary: We stayed here in December of 2013 while visiting Disneyland.  We have always stayed at the Embassy Suites on our previous visits but decided to give this hotel a try.  It seemed updated and the rooms looked nice online.  Our stay was average and we spent the entire trip wishing we were staying at the Embassy Suites for the following reasons.   1) The rooms here are very tiny and we were very tight for a family of 5.  There was not enough room to place our suitecases or store our clothes, stroller etc.  2) Breakfast is included at Embassy Suites and if you are not a frequent business traveler at the Doubletree breakfast is very expensive. 3) The room was very warm when we arrived and it took 3 phone calls for someone to bring us toothpaste and an extra blanket.  While this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important  to us, and we are working dilingently to correct the problems you experienced.  We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity  to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: One of the Best Hotel in the area.
Summary: The place was easy to find, and the staff were helpful. The hotel is very clean and a non-smoking environment. It is good for family and business activities alike.   I am a frequent guest of the hotel, and over the years I have seen no degradation with the quality of its services. There was one time when I was not too happy with a room, and they transferred me to another room immediately.   I tried the restaurant (Tofi) of the hotel too. Both the services and the food were good to great! I am not thrilled with the complimentary breakfast, so I suggest ordering something else.   Over all, I would say this hotel gets an excellent rating from me!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoy your stays with us. We are happy that you had a wonderful experience with our staff. We aim to please our guests and make them feel at home. We hope you continue to stay with us during your future visits to town.

Summary Heading: While their facilities are fine, their reservations are poor
Summary: While I was there, I asked for a future reservation at their front desk.  They told me they were done, but when I showed up the following week, they had make the reservation for a month in the future and had no other rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by hilton  Anaheim- Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback si very important to us, and we are working diligently to correct the problems you experienced, We apologize for any inconvenience but hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon for an enjoyable stay.

Summary: Very satisfied with this hotel. Clean, comfortable and friendly staff. Location is great and prices are good. Small restaurant and bar downstairs serving good food with good atmosphere, coffee shop in the lobby serves Starbucks which is a plus. Hotel is 20 minutes form John Wayne airport
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy to hear you had a great experience with our staff. We do what we can to enjoy your stay.  We hope next time you are in town you stay with us again.

Summary Heading: It was okay for a conference and hotel stay
Summary: I stayed here for a church conference and I stayed by myself in a room with double beds.  The beds were comfortable and clean and the maids definitely had a sense of humor since I found washcloths made into different shapes such as a rabbit, penguin, etc.!  I wasn't too keen that they touched my toothbrush, however, to place it in the rabbit but I thought it was cute.  Rogelio in the bar was especially sweet and made sure our drinks stay filled and had a great sense of humor even when he accidentally spilled a drink on me.  I wasn't upset (things happen) and he and the bartender gave me a free drink.  I'm not a big drinker, however, so they really didn't need to do that but I appreciated the gesture!    My major problems were that there was a charge for wi-fi and there was no
Manager Response: First of all, thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. We always appreciate hearing from our guests- including when it comments help identify ways we can improve. I was happy to read from your review that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. We hope you return with your family for that Disneyland trip in the future.

Summary: Loved the free shuttle to and from Disneyland. Bummed there was no refrigerator in the room. All hotel staff was very friendly! Omelets were delicious for breakfast! Beds were basically the equivalent to sleeping on a cloud. Nothing fancy but exactly what you need for a weekend in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you next time you plan a trip to Disneyland.

Summary: Courteous staff from the desk to the room, waitstaff, consierage, and even the valet people. Clean everywhere. Roellio at the bar was great. I just wish the rooms had a mini fridge and microwave. The cookies are a great signature addition.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you had a great stay and that you had a great experience with our team. We strive to make you feel at home. We hope to see you in the near future during your next trip into town.

Summary: The hotel was great.  The food was delicious.  The staff were very friendly and helpful!  The meeting rooms are spacious, clean, and versatile.  I would recommend this for conferences, business travel, or family travel.  There is a shuttle that takes you to Disneyland.  There is a bus stop near the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We look forward to seeing you during your next visit to town or visiting Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Great for business travel in Orange County
Summary: The DoubleTree in Orange, CA was a great option for business travelers. It has quick access to freeways - which is helpful when your stay is for business travel - but also close to restaurants and play which is very helpful when the work is over! Great amenities - wireless internet, working desk, a great view when actually taking a break from work, and very friendly and helpful staff. I received an upgrade to the 17th floor which had especially nice views, complimentary wireless access, and food vouchers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay. We hope you come back on your next business trip. We are here for all your business travel needs.

Summary: The Doubletree at Anaheim is a nice hotel.   If everything goes smoothly you will probably have a good stay,     I reserved a king room on the hilton honors web site and then called the hotel direct to inquire about a rollaway for the room.  I was told that was perfectly fine.    In the website I gave them all the information about who was in the room.  two adults, a 4 year old and an infant.  When I go there they ran out of rooms and upgraded me to a premium king room.   However they would not provide a rollaway for the premium room.   I called the front desk to complain and asked for a manager to call me back.  No call.   I went down to the front desk to ask about the status of fixing my situation.   They did not know about it and said that they would call me back.  No call.
Manager Response: We thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent trip. Reading your comments, it appears that we fell short of your expectations and for that, we sincerely apologize. We are accustomed to receiving very positive feedback from our guests and are disheartened that you did not experience the level of excellence you deserve. Please be assured that your concerns will be shared with our management team so that corrective measures are taken where feasible.  We do hope that you can give us another opportunity to regain your confidence in our hotel if your travels bring you to our area again.   Sincerely,   The DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for four nights from January 31 to Feb 4. The room was at hhonors floor. Pros: Spacious Room, large TV, Clean, helpful staff (especially Jay at concierge) Cons: No Complementary Internet, Parking or Breakfast. No hairdryer, minibar or microwave in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feed back. We are glad you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you back next time you are in town.

Summary: I had a very pleasant stay. The buttons on the A/C took some time before they started working. I had to keep pushing them to get the temperature to rise or decrease. Other than that the room was very roomy, very clean, and I was very nice to have a microwave and mini fridge in the room. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you the next time you are in town.
