Summary: No continental breakfast, extra charge for Wi-Fi and parking, old and outdated. Popcorn texture on ceiling was ugly, stained and dirty. Poorly insulated for sound so quite noisy. Very friendly staff and close to Angel staium and Honda Center.
Manager Response: Jon,  Thank you for your honest review of your recent stay with us. At our hotel, we like to provide a personalized experience for each of our guests, but also look for ways to keep costs low while providing comfort and convenience. We appreciate your feedback and we’ll keep your comments on comfort and amenities in mind as we continually work to improve our guests' experience.  Thank you,  The DoubleTree Management Team

Summary: Needed to book a hotel reservation for a 2-night stay on the day of, and the customer service was able to assist me with no problems. It was a choice between the Double Tree or Hyatt for 4-star hotels in the Anaheim/Santa Ana area. We went with the Double Tree since it was about $40 cheaper in price.   Got to the hotel, and the lobby looked fairly modern. But when we  checked in and went to our room, it looked too dated to be considered 4-stars. More like a hotel room fit for the 80's. Only modern thing about the room was a 42" LCD TV.   We noticed the room did not have a mini fridge. When we called the desk to request a room with a mini fridge, they said our only option was to rent one for $10/night. I would expect a 4-star hotel to provide  one already in the room, not for an
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim- Orange County. We appreciated your honesty. We always aim to provide the most comfortable and easy going stay for all guests. We regret you did not experience this. Thank you for your review.

Summary: the staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  they even offered us to move rooms in order to see the fireworks from disneyland after we had showered!!i wish we could have stayed for a  few more nights but we will definitely go back again. the warm cookies are always a treat. the beds were extremely comfortable. when i called for extra blankets they were delivered promptly. the women at the starbucks counter were also very helpful and friendly. hilton is a great chain and i will try to book with them when i travel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are beyond happy you enjoyed your stay and had a chance to view the Disneyland fireworks. That's always a great show. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: King Bedded Room #1522 in Anheim Hilton
Summary: My wife and I stayed for 2 nights on Jan 31, 2014 and Feb 1 2014. The room was clean and had everything we wanted, except for the bathroom.  It was the smallest bathroom we have ever had, which was a problem since my wife had an operation at the adjacent hospital and could not prepare easily.. The room could have used a walk-in shower, for I nearly slipped in the tub and my wife could not get into the tub....her legs are too painful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange County for your recent visit. Your feedback is very important to us. We were disappoined to see that you had an issue with our guestroom bathrooms which have been renovated in the recent years. I am sorry they were not up to your expectations. I wish your wife a speedy recovery.

Summary: It's the third year I go to this hotel (travel purpose being the NAMM Show), and there is simply nothing negative to say about this hotel. It's clear that rooms are not specially cheap, but the quality of the rooms deserves the price you pay. At least, you are sure to sleep well, which is far being the case for all hotels located in this area. All employees in the hotel know what service mean, and they simply make their job well. The restaurant located within the hotel (TROFI) is a bit expensive, but menu is good and service is excellent. I recommend the breakfast buffet. I do not like driving in USA, and having no car in California can easily become a pain, but this hotel offers services for free which makes this option possible. There is a free shuttle for NAMM every 20
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are extremely glad that you enjoyed your stay here at the DoubleTree Anaheim. We look forward to seeing you next year for the next NAMM Show.

Summary: We just had our annual conference at this hotel so my feedback is from a business function standpoint.  I had done site visits for about 10 hotels in the area and chose the Doubletree mainly because of their amazing customer service they showed and I was convinced our group would be treated in the same manner.  Overall I will say I was pleased and we didn't have any major issues. However, although I don't have major complaints, I also don't feel we received the same service I was blown away with initially.     The positives - the food was good, the rooms were nice, everyone was attentive, the location was great since it was walking distance the Outlets at Orange.  The negatives - I had complaints that the air conditioning was not working in several rooms and when they turned it
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your candid feedback of your business meeting.  Your comments are helpful to us and we will pass them along to the appropriate departments to make future business meetings more successful.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to host your group.

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel for 5 nights. The hotel is minutes away from Children's Hospital of Orange County and is within walking distance from the Orange County Outlet Mall. The hotel is also a block from the Irvine Medical Center. My room was on an upper floor but was located directly behind the elevators. There was a lot of noise from elevators that took a few days to get used to. The walls seemed thin; I could often hear others in the room next to me. The bed was comfortable and the room was clean. It would have been nice to have a refrigerator in my room. The bathroom was small. I turned the water as hot as it would get for my showers. The towels were fluffy. The TV was a large flat screen. Being a Hilton Honors member, I received a voucher for a continental breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate that you are a loyal Hilton Honors member. Next time, dont hesitate to ask the front desk for a room farther from the elevators.  We appreciate your feedback!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel since our daughter was participating in a skateboard competition as the Vans Skatepark only a short walk away.  The room was comfortable for my wife, daughter and me.  I actually slept well for once.  The room was clean, good service, and friendly/courteous staff.  The only problem for my wife was that there was not a refrigerator in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy that you got a good night sleep!  We look forward to the next Vans skate competition! Thanks again!

Summary: The air conditioning was noisey. The restaurant was not that great, lunch was average. Parking was OK although we had to pay $13.00 per night. Location was good for our activities. The lounge was nice and quiet and service was very good. Hotel is very nice and has a variety of activities for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Stayed 4 nights for a conference. Great location not far from John Wayne airport and walking distance to cool restaurants and shops. That helped keep our group together throughout our stay. My standard room was exactly that, but comfortable none the less. Minus points for not having the lounge open during the NFL playoffs and early closing times. Overall not bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy that you found our location to be convenient for your needs!  Please think of us again in the future!

Summary: My family and I have stayed at the Doubletree Anaheim a handful of times when going off to Disney. Service at the desk is always fantastic and everything is always as pleasant as advertised. Shuttle service takes you to and from the park with no issues. One time we missed the shuttle and they sent a private van to pick up our group. Great place!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and our Customer Service! Can't wait to see your group again in the future!

Summary: Stayed at the Doubletree for a conference.  The location is very central to lots of activities in Orange County.  The hotel is very nice and the staff was friendly.  My room was large, clean and attractive and the bed was fantastic.  I had an issue with my sink and they fixed it almost immediately.  There a shopping area behind the hotel with lots of restaurant choices too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay!!

Summary: we had a very nice stay. the location of the hotel is very close to the orange outlets mall. we did not eat at hotel due to a family dinner arrangement, however the dinning room looked inviting. the hotel also has a gift shop.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary: This year as in the past the Royal Order Of Jesters held their party at the Double Tree Hilton in Orange, California. We had excellent service. Especially worthy of praise is the prime roast beef dinner that was served on January 8, 2014. That was undoubtedly the best cooked beef I have ever eaten. Kudos to the Chef. Jose J. De Luna
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to host the Royal Order of Jesters!  We are looking forward to hosting your event again!!!!

Summary: Needed a place to stay overnight for daughter's volleyball tournament.  Booked this hotel over the phone.  Was happy upon arrival nice area, great looking exterior, lobby etc.  Room was nice, big and clean! Great value for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy that you found great value in our hotel!  Please think of us for your next volleyball tournament!

Summary: Stayed here for one night and the location was excellent. Right next to the block of Orange and we did not use their shuttle but from what I saw many guests were utilizing the free shuttle to Disneyland! The rooms are pretty awesome too, standard hotel rooms but very clean and great decor. Would definitely stay here again and would recommend to fellow travelers. Customer service is awesome and that is always a big plus for me! Only reason I won't give it the full 5 stars is the parking fee, that's always a drag.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We appreciate your comments and we look forward to having you again in the future!

Summary: I will definitely recommend and stay again at this hotel again, location is perfect, close to strategies places nearby, including Disney, and was really close by to my family reunion at Santa Ana. The pool area is awesome! My parents really enjoyed their time and the price for parking is really affordable! The Lady at the parking lot was extremely helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and thank you for your compliments!  We love that you are going to recommend our hotel!  Thanks again!

Summary: We stay at this property for both business and pleasure.  It is in a convenient location, the staff is friently, and the free shuttle to Disneyland can't be beat.  We've stayed at a variety of hotels in the area over the years, but after one awful stay at an old Best Western, we had enough.  We've stayed at this property ever since.  It also has a coin laundry facility adjacent to the pool, so we usually are able to do laundry while playing in the pool.  The lack of a free breakfast is my only complaint, but we make due with keeping milk on ice and buying cold cereal at a local grocery store.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so greatful to have loyal guests.  Thank you again for your feedback!

Summary: We booked this location for 2 nights while doing the Dizzyland experience.   Staff was wonderful, no matter what time or what the job!  They were some of the best people we've encountered.  Kudos to management for the great staff !!   Our room was a "suite" with an additional sofa bed.  This due to the full instead of queen beds and that many hotels in that area no longer allow a roll away in most rooms.  I will say the sofa bed was something out of the 1970's.  At check out we mentioned this, we were told they are remodeling from the top down and they were well aware of the "old" sofa beds.   A good thing, because no one would want more than a night or two on those dated pieces.   On the other hand, the rest of the room and the beds were great and very clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and the value for your dollar.  We hope to see you again on your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary Heading: 2.5 miles from Disneyland + free shuttle + quiet
Summary: 1. RESERVATION: I booked this hotel on behalf of our family under the government/state tax rate. I was told by 2 agents over the phone that working for the CSU system was counted under this rate but this wasn't the case upon checking in. Thankfully the front desk staff (who was gone for 1 hour causing us to wait in the lobby disgruntled after our 6 hr. drive) cleared this up upon checking in. Make sure to checkmark the AAA discount code when you are reserving on the hilton website even if you don't have AAA and more hotel rooms and packages will appear (don't know why this happened).  2. CHECK IN: We weren't given a cookie which I was looking forward to upon checking in...However, we asked for cookies in 2 separate occasions during our stay and were given them. Call ahead of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreiate your feedback.  Any insight you have will help us grow and become a better hotel. Thanks again for your comments.

Summary: This is a well-priced and generally well-maintained hotel with excellent service in its reasonable restaurant - but where are the Reception staff?  We often saw Reception completely unmanned and usually at most there was one person there, harassed and over-worked and trying to deal with everything.  C'mon Doubletree - this is the beating heart of any of your hotels!  We also had a problem with Disney tickets.  The hotel boasts it has a Disney desk and you should buy tickets there on arrival.  Don't.  It's a lottery as to whether they have any tickets to sell you and in our case they didn't.  So we had to go online, buy the tickets and then get Reception to print them because their free printers were so poor the barcodes don't work on the Disney entrance gates.   That - and
Manager Response: Thank you for your reivew.  We appreciate your candid feedback and will pass along your comments to the appropriate departments.  We hope you stay with us again in the future. Thanks again!

Summary: Great value for the price.  The place was clean and convenient.  We used the pool, basketball court, shuttle to Disneyland, buffet breakfast, free parking and wi-fi for 2 nights.    The only negative was the beds were full instead of queen size.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear your made good use of our facilities!  Please think of us again the next time you are in Orange County!

Summary: Great stay after long drive in the area - a little busy with all the Disney Traffic and kids running around - you could see the fire works nearby.  Lounge priced for business traveler and was out of the cookies but the front staff assured more were on the way - nice location
Manager Response: Thank you for your reivew.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and your room after a long drive.

Summary: We booked the hotel for my husband's company Christmas Party weekend event.  We had the Presidential Suite and it was very nice.   The view was great and the room was clean and quiet. It was pretty spartan in decor.  The cleaning staff skipped our room one of the days but the hotel staff brought us clean towels and supplies.  We would defenitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay in our Presidential Suite.  We look forward to seeing you next time!

Summary: We (the grandparents) stayed at the DoubleTree while our kids stayed at Disney. We were a couple of miles away. We were able to enjoy Disney with the kids and then the quiet and comfort of this excellent hotel in the evening. No problems. No complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for your reivew.  We appreciate you taking the time to give us feedback and for the positive comments about our hotel!

Summary Heading: Average room but helpful concierge and close to Theme Parks
Summary: Room - Clean and big with comfortable beds but toilet is miserably small. Old coffee maker with a broken cap and TV which took about 10-15 mins duration to load i.e image appeared. Free ice from vending machine located along corridor of each floor.  Breakfast - Simple but sufficient. You can ask for fresh orange juice, milk and easy egg from the service staff.   Concierge - Friendly and eager to help. They could arrange day tour for you.  Location - 5 mins drive to Disney and California Adventure Park. Hotel provides hourly shuttle. Be punctual. Walking distance to 1 shopping mall and electrical mall.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We hope you stay with us again the next time you head to Disneyland!

Summary: I have never stayed any place as good as this hotel.  I have traveled the world and the space and staff here are the best I have ever encountered.  We were even at the wrong DoubleTree and that staff got on the phone to sort things out for us while we ate our warm cookies.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy to help, and happy to serve you our famous warm chocolate chip and walnut cookies.  Thanks again!

Summary: I had the absolute worst sleep in any hotel I have stayed at in my entire life. A constant water/plumbing/gurgling noise coming from a roof vent was the culprit. When I called the front desk at 2:30am asking for help, all I got was the insensitive..."we'll look into it." Nothing happened. I was able to fall asleep by using my earplugs and two pillows. In the morning they asked how my stay was. I explained my disappointment and with no apology the front desk person simply responded with, "Here's your bill with a zero balance." No empathy - No action - Horrible Service!
Manager Response: Paul,  We’re very sorry we weren't able to provide you with the high quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the noise issue experienced from a water leak and we’ve reported the problem to our maintenance team. We’ll be sure to address the issues with the room amenities and hope you’ll consider giving us a second chance to impress if you return to our area in the future.  Thank you,  Roger Barrantes Director of Sales and Marketing

Summary: Nice view from window of Disneyland's nightly fireworks was pointed out by the bellhop.  Heat was not on and room was cold.  The location of the hotel is very good and the lobby was beautifully decorated for Christmas.  We attended a group function and ate in the room off of the main lobby.  The food was so/so, somewhat typical for banquet/hotel dining.  There was some badly stained moulding at bottom around bathroom door.  Some maintenance was needed.  The front desk, bellhops, and servers were all very nice and courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad you liked our location and our service.  Thanks again!

Summary: My daughter wanted to spend her birthday at Disneyland.  We like staying at the Double Tree Hilton because they have a shuttle to Disneyland, the rooms are always comfortable and clean.  There's a mall located close by.  The staff is always helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad you had a great birthday at Disneyland and enjoyed our hotel!  We look forward to seeing you again next year!

Summary: When we checked in for the two rooms that we had requested, one of them was not ready.  At 5:00 PM I checked the second room to see if it was ready to find out it was not ready and that someone had smoked in that room.  When I called the front desk to let them know the room had been smoked and had not been cleaned yet.  They said they could move us to different rooms, I ask them to wait on moving us as we had just received our food from room service.  Just as we started to eat our food they came to our room to move our things, so after the bellman had left with our luggage we proceeded to pack up our food and head the rooms 4 floors below the rooms that we where moving out of to find out the keys that they had sent up would not open the doors to our new rooms.  I then went down
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for the disappointing service and conditions of your recent stay. We know our guests deserve the best and we will use your comments as we continually evolve to best meet and exceed our guests' expectations. We have shared your comments with our team and assure you appropriate steps have been made to correct the issues you encountered with service and comfort. Should you return to our area in the future, we would love to have you back so we may better demonstrate the complete quality stay you expect and deserve.  Thank you,  Roger Barrantes Director of Sales

Summary Heading: nice room, great hotel reception counter staff.
Summary: Location wise, it's good as it's near an outlet. Room are nice and clean. They uses crabtree and evelyn toiletry which is nice too. Their reception counter staff are friendly too. Now the negative, The housekeeper does not replenish our complimentary water bottle after 1st day, they do not have fridge (at least not for our room) and i wished they just remove the carpet outside the room so that it's easier for me to push my luggage (i have a 25kg luggage and it's hard to move when the wheels sink into the carpet).
Manager Response: Thank you for your reveiw.  We appreciate your feedback and apologize for your waters not being replenished.  Please think of us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: The hotel exceeded our expectations. After a long drive from San Francisco, we arrived and were greeted with warm delicious cookies.  We got to our room and were surprised at how large the room was and nicely appointed.  The best part was the second bathroom (toilet/sink) which made getting ready in the morning easy for my husband and sister (who stayed on the roll-out bed).  A small sink and refrigerator was also helpful for storying water (gotta stay hydrated at Disneyland)!  The hotel is also dog friendly.  We have stayed at other dog-friendly hotels near Disneyland, and this one is by far the best hotel and we will return.  It's not too far from Disneyland and you can walk to the Orange outlets if you want a change of pace.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for your reveiw!  We are so happy that we execeeded your expectations!  We look forward to having you stay again!

Summary: i stayed with the property for two weeks i.e 15 days such a long stay ,,,, though i had a very comfortable stay no issues ,, they had a nice swimming pool , jacuzzi and a nice fish lake .  only problem I faced was with the front desk , they kept on swiping my card till the last penny , they left me with NO DOLLARS !!!!   They had in house self laundry , i had free parking though the property has paid parking which is bad . I stayed with my 2 yr daughter and they had free shuttle to disney which was a blessing . Overall a memorable tour...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay! Please think of us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Good sleep, very average everywhere else.
Summary: Pros:  Sleep Quality Bar Service Location  Cons: Expensive! Basic/dated rooms  I stayed for 4 nights on business in November.  Check-in was as usual for a DoubleTree. I did enjoy the warm cookie. Parking is $15/day which is insane. I've stayed at several local hotels in the past few months and parking is never above $10, if there is a charge at all. You have to take a ticket each time you return, and when you leave, the attendant has to write down your name and room number. It's cumbersome at best. Why is the $15 not just automatically added to the bill without all of the hassle?  I'm a Hilton Diamond member and was not placed on a Hilton Honors floor. Not a big deal, but it is noteworthy. I was given coupons for continental breakfast and appetizers each day.  Breakfast: They
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate you choosing to stay with us.  As a valued Hilton Honors Diamond Member, we would like to apologize for any inconveniences that you experienced.   Your feedback is important to us, and we will forward your comments to the appropriate departments.  Thank you for taking the extra time!

Summary Heading: Would come again, and plan to!
Summary: We arrived at the hotel after a long day of travel and were greeted kindly by helpful bell hop and front desk reception. Every single employee was helpful. We purchased the full breakfast package and enjoyed a delicious meal every morning. We used the free shuttle to and from Disneyland. Can't say enough about how much we loved this particular Doubletree!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thanks again!

Summary: Can't beat a warm cookie! The woman checking in and out was kind and fast. Facilities are older than the DoubleTree near Disneyland but I think it's a better value if you don't mind the 2 mile-away location.   I thought I had booked the Disney DoubleTree but their rooms and parking were more expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Thank you for choosing our DoubleTree. We have a complimentary Disney Shuttle that runs every hour on the hour, that will save you time and money instead of walking or parking at Disney.  We look forward to seeing you next time!

Summary: The staff was friendly. The room was clean and good sized. We were on vacation to Disneyland and although the hotel is about a 10-15 minute drive to the park, the hotel offers a free shuttle to the park. It runs every hour ,and every 30 minutes after 10pm until park closing time. Nicely located close to shops.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary Disney Shuttle!  Thanks again!

Summary: Great Hotel with a great location.  Close to Disneyland, shopping and easy access on and off major freeways in Southern California.  Hotel itself is clean and the service and staff there are exceptional.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We appreciate your feedback and hope you stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Very good hotel. Excellent shuttle service to Disneylan
Summary: The hotel is conveniently located. We went to Anaheim for a short vacation. The shuttle service to Disneyland is excellent, this makes your life easier for visiting Disney parks, specially if you're dealing with kids or want to take a rest in the afternoon and don't want to spend your time and energy driving, the service runs every hour in the morning/afternoon and every half hour by the end of the day. There's a good outlet mall located three blocks away from the premises.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so glad that you enjoyed our Disney Shuttle!  Please think of us again in the future!!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel near UCI med center
Summary: Stayed one night on business. Staff was friendly. Room was nice and spacious. Bed was comfortable. Bathroom was a little small but adequate. Parking was expensive. They did have shuttle to Disneyland. Gym was small with only a few trendmills. There is a pool and basketball/tennis court. Good location if visiting UC Irvine medical center (across the street).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: At least there's shuttles to Disneyland
Summary: As usual, when you check in, they give you warm cookies, which is always a nice gesture.  However, at check-in, that's when my first disappointment came.  The check-in process took forever and the lady who helped me out was trying to cover for another person, so it slowed the process down even more.  I was also informed that  I would be charged a parking fee, which I didn't really expect since we were so far away from the big attraction, Disneyland.    Not the best Doubletree I've stayed in terms of the room, but the room's fairly spacious, but we were also placed next to the ice machine so you can imagine how annoying it can be but luckily there wasn't much activity going on at the ice machine.  Everything worked fine in the room, which is always a good thing!  The hotel also
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your candid feedback of our hotel.  To address some of your concerns; we apologize for your longer than normal check in experience- that is not typical.    As far as parking changes, our pricing is very similar to other full service hotels in the surrounding area.    We will pass along your comments and thank you again for staying with us!

Summary Heading: Double Tree is a good stay
Summary: While somewhat costly, this is a really good place to business conferences and offered my group a great rate and its located in a prime location with numerous attractions located all around the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you had a great rate while with us.  Please think of us again in the future!

Summary: It has been many years since I stayed at this property, and I had forgotten how nice it was. I will be returning soon. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and the accomodations were better than expected. The quality and variety of food in the restaurant were very good, and having Starbucks in the lobby was convenient. Also, the location of the property was very convenient for the activities that we had planned for our trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you chose our hotel for your trip!  We'll see you next time!! Thanks again!

Summary: Stayed at this property for its somewhat close location to John Wayne Airport. The staff was very friendly and overall the hotel was quite nice. My only complaint is that the mattresses on both beds in my room were too soft. They seemed to be quite used as there were the deeper than usual dips in the bed and it felt like you sank to the floor when you laid on them. It was okay for one night but definitely did not get as good of sleep as I would like because of it. Rooms were clean and facility was well kept for a older hotel. Good location to a lot of major sites and businesses. Breakfast was expensive but quite good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and will pass it along to the appropriate departments.

Summary: This hotel has an extreme lack of amenities and upgrades for a Hilton Diamond member. The only amenities seem to be a bottle of water and a voucher for a cold breakfast. Room upgrades are not available unles they are paid for.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property and for selecting our hotel when staying in the area. As a Hilton Honors member we strive to make your experience the best possible and we apologize that we have failed to meet your expectations. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are taking your comments into consideration as we work to improve our on-property experience. We hope you will give us another try so we may demonstrate our commitment to your loyalty to the Hilton Brand.  Best Regards,   Roger Barrantes, Director of Sales & Marketing Roger.Barrantes@hilton.com

Summary: Very conveniently located, but just outside the hustle and bustle of the Disneyland area.  Great outlet mall and restaurants within walking distance. Hotel has a nice restaurant and great conference facilities.  Catered food at conference was average, but the overall conference experience was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad you liked our restaurant and conference facilities.  Please think of us again the next time you're in the area!

Summary: We stayed a few nights at this hotel and though the overall property is nice in a very convenient location in Orange County, the service left little to be desired. The evening we arrived, the guest service employee seemed a little unsure about several things including our breakfast vouchers and giving key information on the parking arrangement for guests. We ended up paying a parking fee of $13 every time we left and returned during the day not knowing about the flat rate for guests. When arrived for breakfast the next morning, the lady at the restaurant informed us that we could only eat from certain parts of the buffet (this seemed petty and tacky since we had a preferred status and executive suite {note: that our executive suite was just two rooms with adjoining doors with
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property and for selecting our hotel when staying in the area. As a Hilton Honors member we strive to make your experience the best possible and we apologize that we have failed to meet your expectations. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are taking your comments into consideration as we work to improve our on-property experience. We hope you will give us another try so we may demonstrate our commitment to your loyalty to the Hilton Brand.  Best Regards,   Roger Barrantes, Director of Sales & Marketing Roger.Barrantes@hilton.com

Summary: Felt things told were not addressed, ie. faucet hot/cold seemed reversed, complimentary bottles of water were not given since i'm a gold member. seemed the front desk staff were very stingy and reluctant to address questions. tub had residue left and house keeping had to be called in to resolve but took more than 30 minutes to arrive. very inconvenient to get my son bathed for bed in the evening because tub was not sanitary.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property and for selecting our hotel when staying in the area. As a Hilton Honors member we strive to make your experience the best possible and we apologize that we have failed to meet your expectations. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are taking your comments into consideration as we work to improve our on-property experience. We hope you will give us another try so we may demonstrate our commitment to your loyalty to the Hilton Brand.  Best Regards,   Roger Barrantes, Director of Sales & Marketing Roger.Barrantes@hilton.com

Summary: The staff here were terrific, but the room I was in looked as if it had not been updated in 20 years.  The furnishings, wallpaper, and carpet all had a pretty work appearance.  It's a beautiful hotel.  They just need to upgade some of the rooms to match the beauty of the lobby and the banquet halls on the first floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We have recently updated our higher floors and have plans in the works for updating the lower floors.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and we thank you for your feedback!

Summary: The front desk is always at a level of perfection when arriving at your hotel.  Dawn and Petti, at the front desk, are always very friendly and greet everyone with smiles and professionalism!  I always make my reservations directly with the hotel because they provide exceptional service; much better service than with the general reservations department.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy that you enjoy staying with us and thank you for the compliments on our font desk staff!  We look foward to seeing you again!

Summary: This hotel is nice enough. They have clean rooms, a bed and shampoo. The Doubletree charges $13 for internet and you pay for breakfast. The rooms are outdated so if you want a nicer space, this wouldn't be it. I forgot my toothbrush so requested one per their complimentary list. It was a flimsy plastic brush with a small "free sample" toothpaste pouch. For the price I paid, I would have expected at least a travel size tube. I also oddly found a bottle opener attached to the back of the bathroom door. I may not have thought more than odd if it was in the room but it was next to the bathtub. This makes me think they promote drinking in the bathtub which is just strange. Overall a place to stay but probably would look elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We will pass your comments along to the appropriate departments.  Your feedback means a lot to us, and we value you as a guest.

Summary: The location is great.  The only drawback is the onsite restaurant.  It is overpriced, with a limited menu and mediocre food.  The Block is nearby and I would recommend eating off premises. There is a shuttle to the amusement parks and it's close to the Pond.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your feedback and will pass along your comments.

Summary Heading: Love the hotel but not the Restaurant
Summary: We stayed her over Gay Days at Disney. The hotel staff was great. Very accommodating. we decided to have dinner at the hotel restaurant after our first night.  We ordered the Fish and Chips.  How can you mess up fish and chips?  Well they came our still frozen.  Now tell me we are in California and they are serving us frozen fish and chips really.  The Waitress was nice about it but after we sent it back we got another one still half frozen I ate my fries as I was hungry after a full day at Disney. We went back for breakfast the next day and my partner is a Hilton Diamond member and we had to pay extra for hot food on the breakfast buffet that was not that good anyway.  I recommend the hotel to anyone. but the hotel restaurant leaves a lot to be desired.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are sorry that we did not give you the best possible experience in our Trofi Restaurant.  I will forward your comments to our restaurant manager.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention.  Please think of us again the next time you are in town.

Summary: Stayed here for 12 nights after a long journey from Scotland was met by a friendly receptionist named dawn. Hotel was very clean service was great couldn't ask for a better hotel will definetley visit again.Just a mention to Jay booked our trips for us great service thanks Jay
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Thank you for the compliments of our staff, we strive for excellent customer service.

Summary: was there for a business conference.  The service was great, people friendly.  No gouging for internet if you are honors member (they are learning)  It was clean and quiet and the wifi was fast.  You can walk to some nice places to eat so you dont have to eat at the hotel.  They gave me a free breakfast as an honors member… can't beat it.   The staff are responsive to requests and aim to please.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We appreciate your kind words.  Please think of us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary: Great place, can't wait to stay there again. Everything was clean and well kept and the staff was very helpful!   If you can get one of the northwest corner rooms so that you can see the fireworks from Disneyland at 9:30PM
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Yes, the view for Disneyland fireworks is a popular request!  Higher floors are the best for that!  Thanks again for your review!

Summary: This hotel was a great place to stay, each member of the staff made me feel important. The restaurant is to die for! The room was clean and the shower was not one of those rinky-dink poor pressure showers. The whole stay was fabulous and the Shuttle to Disneyland was a plus. The shuttle driver was funny and friendly as well and made it a nice 10 minute trip to the park. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We will pass along you compliments!

Summary: A very nice hotel. The staff is very helpful and the driver to Disneyland are nice especially Rey! He's very fun and interactive with the kids on board. I felt safe in the Hotel, people greet you as you enter and leave and our room was quite.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad that you enjoyed our Disney shuttle!

Summary: First off, I travel a LOT of business. I usually stay at Hilton or Marriott hotels, because they offer the best mix of price and convenience. I get offended when I have to pay extra ($11/day) for internet access, and $12/day for self parking (not valet). The room smelled damp and musty, and had some sort of paper product plugging a hole in the ceiling of the bathroom. Really not what I expected from a hotel of this price point (especially after figuring in the cost of internet and parking). I'm in this area 4 times a year, and plan on checking out other options next time around. Really not impressed at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We would like to apologize for the condition of your guest room.  This is not our usual standard.  We strive to provide clean, well maintained rooms for our guests.  Regarding internet and parking, our charges are similar to most of the branded full service hotels in the surrounding area.  We do value your feedback and will share with the appropriate departments.  Thank you again for your review.  We hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Needed a room for one night in Anaheim. Booked through website and added Hilton honors points. We checked in @ 8:30 pm and right away noticed a lot of noise in the room. They gave us a room behind the elavators. The noise was awful and nobody got much sleep. We were already in pjs and in bed before we realized how bad the noise was. What a waste of money to stay there!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. I'd like to apologize for the noise issues that you encountered during your stay with us. When you come to a hotel you're expecting to get a great night's sleep and unfortunately we were not able to provide you with that. Again, I thank you for your review and we'll be sure to keep your comments in mind as we make future improvements to our hotel. I'd love to have you back to give our hotel a second chance.  Best Regards,  Roger Barrantes Roger.Barrantes@hilton.com

Summary: We stayed October 15-19 on the twelfth floor.  Had a fridge and a microwave. Location was great.  Close to Disney and good restaurants. Ate breakfast at the hotel every morning. It was very good--homemade granola and a different special entree every day. The two beds were only doubles but very comfortable.  Crabtree and Evelyn toiletries were a nice touch. Every staff member was friendly and helpful. We would certainly stay here again. We especially appreciated not paying the 15% hotel tax in Anaheim (Orange is only 10%).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy that you found our staff to be friendly and helpful!  We hope you stay with us again the next time you're in the area!

Summary: Booked this hotel because of it's proximity to Disneyland.  They had great shuttle service. The entire staff was very helpful and nice. We really had no problems at all.  There is a parking fee of $13 per night or $16 for valet.  The business facilities were clean. The bed could've been better but other than that, everything went well. We'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and the compliments!  Our free Disney shuttle service does make it convenient for our guests to get to the park- we are glad you enjoyed it!  Thanks again!

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights and the accommodation was great - the room was clean and so too were the beds and linen, etc. Although this hotel is situated a little way from Disneyland, a free shuttle is provided which is a nice added extra.  The Outlets are adjacent to the hotel to break up the theme park visit with a little retail therapy.  The hotel staff were courteous and helpful on arrival. The coffee bar which is open in the morning was great to pick up a bagel and coffee before going on our way. We booked this hotel "sight unseen" and were not disappointed as we got a very good deal for our 4 night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy you found our property to be a good value for your money!  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: The staff here is very nice and the rooms were very up to date and nice. The only negative thing I have to say is the restaurant seemed understaffed. I sat at the bar for 10 minutes waiting to get a drink and menu and no one assisted me, I moved to the lobby bar and had dinner there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay, and we will look into our staffing needs in the restaurant.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

Summary: As a regular contributor to Tripadvisor I always view reviews before booking. This time the reviews failed me. This accommodation was by no means clean or modern. We arrived and usually Hilton provides a warm welcome and acknowledges our status as Hilton Honors members which usually comes with some perks (we stay in Hilton properties 20+ times a year) No such acknowledgment or perks and not even an offer of assistance with directions information about Disney just a here are your keys. We requested a room away from the elevator and were reassured the room we were given was indeed away from the elevator. It unfortunately was right behind the elevator shaft and the room vibrated and was noisy with the sound of the elevator going up and down. We were given another room a few doors
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property and for selecting our hotel when staying in the area. As a Hilton Honors member we strive to make your experience the best possible and we apologize that we have failed to meet your expectations. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are taking your comments into consideration as we work to improve our on-property experience. We hope you will give us another try so we may demonstrate our commitment to your loyalty to the Hilton Brand.

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel in a great area
Summary: The DoubleTree is an attractive hotel in a popular area close to Southern California attractions. The staff members we interacted with were all pleasant and helpful. Our room on the 16th floor was perfectly temperature conditioned and except for occasional muffled traffic noise (this is California, after all), it was quiet. We heard practically no sounds from inside the hotel even though it was purported to be fully occupied. The bed and pillows were outstandingly comfortable and everything was very clean, roomy, and attractive. Everything in the room worked great, from the plumbing to the TV to the air conditioning, to the Internet to the alarm clock.   There is a snack bar and Starbucks counter in the lobby and a nice bar and restaurant, though we didn't frequent either one as
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Our goal is guest satisfaction, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: This is a very nice hotel close to Disneyland. The hotel is very clean with very friendly staff. Hotel provides a complimentary shuttle to Disneyland which is very convenient. Great place to stay with your family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you found our hotel to be nice and clean!  We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Looks and feels upgraded and comfortable
Summary: We were 4 people staying in the hotel for one night, and I wish we could stay there longer. Very courteous personal of the front desk [cookies are fresh and warm :-)]. The price included breakfast for 4 of us, which was so far the best breakfast we had in USA hotels - a lot of choice of fruits, hot meals, teas etc - great value for the money. The only things to grade it excellent - add free wifi and free parking and this hotel would become our first choice!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay!  Please think of us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary: This is close to my office and I look forward to coming back.  When I tried to book it again for this week, I was told that they don't have rooms available.  Otherwise, I would be back there again.  Keep up the good work.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  And thank you for thinking of us 2 weeks in a row! You should be a Hilton Honors member, and earn points for your stays!  Just in case you are not a member already:  http://hhonors3.hilton.com/en/index.html

Summary: I stayed here to be closer to Disneyland for the weekend. They provide shuttle service to Disneyland but I did not use the service. It was a quick drive to the theme park. I definitely would recommend this hotel.  It is convenietly located near The Outlets at Orange and not far from Disneyland Resort and the Garden Walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Well Run Hotel That Caters to Business & Tourist
Summary: This Doubletree targets both corporate business and tourist business.Very nice staff.Fairly good business center with a printer that worked well and 3 computers. Breakfast buffet at $17.50 is a bit high.Has a Starbucks in the lobby area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Please think of us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary: Sadly, this hotel failed miserably in meeting my basic needs, which made everything else irrelevant. I checked into the hotel on a Tuesday evening after a very long day at work. My initial encounter with the front desk agent was average, nothing special. I specifically asked her about happy hours and she informed me that it goes until 7:30 p.m. Since it was only 6:55, I ran up to the room and put my small bag down and headed back downstairs to go to the bar. I arrived at the bar at 7:03 and observed the happy hour menu wide open and standing at the bar. Two men working behind the bar talking to each other. One of them looked at me and went back to his friend. The other one who appears to be the bar tender turned around and looked at me, so I asked him about happy hour and he
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for the hassle and frustration you experienced on your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to make every guests' stay a pleasant one from check-in to departure through quality service and amenities, and we regret this was not your impression. We will use your comments as part of our ongoing service training and hope you will give us another opportunity to show you the quality stay you deserve should you return to our area in the future.

Summary: I have to say the hotel rooms is nice for the price. I stayed here during labor day weekend and had a great time. They had valet for self parking. The only thing about self parking is the front parking lot can get full and you'd have to walk to the other side which isn't necessarily a bad thing. The staff were very professional and kind from the front desk to the parking attendant. It was great to see that they knew me by name since I did stay there for 3 nights.  The cookies were warm and delcious, I had to come back a "Few" times to get some and didn't have a problem. Ahh..it was all too good and made my trip more exciting.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and compliments!  We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: Was pleasant.  automatically upgraded immediately during registration: Was great (took me by surprise).  Staff @ registration were smiling and friendly, aided to my needs immediately.  Every staff I met were happy and codial.  Shuttle was available and clean.  Staff were accomodating. surely was a treat experience.  Lobby was wide and bright. Was decorated lightly, quite tidy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your reveiw!  We appreciate you compliments and hope to have you back in the future!

Summary: We always stay at this hotel when we are in town visiting our son at Chapman University. We love the service and friendliness of the staff. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Manager, Peti Prescott-McDonell, provided excellent customer service. We will continue to stay at this hotel every time we are in town!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear that our front desk staff is serving you well!  Thank you for the kind words!

Summary: Overall stay and staff were ok but there were some hugely glaring problems. 1) we had 2 fed ex packages delivered to hotel; 1st one sat for 4-5 days and nobody notified us, 2d sat for at least a day.  Both times we had to call down. 2) my room was burgled and two laptops were stolen, which I reported to security and police.  I have requested but not recieved Hilton's written policy on theft and what Hilton intends to do. 3) when business center computers were all unable to print manager offered to print document for me at 10 cents per page. 4) on several occassions valet watched me load or unload many boxes without offering to help, but looked disappointed when I did not tip him.  Wow
Manager Response: Please accept my sincere apologies for the incidents that occurred during your stay with us. Please contact me directly to discuss these in further detail.  Best Regards,  Roger Barrantes Roger.Barrantes@hilton.com

Summary: Nice hotel, very clean and upgraded. Check-in staff was very friendly and quick. Cookies were amazing, as usual. Ordered room service and it was delivered in less than 20 minutes- a little pricey, but regular prices for room service. Frequent shuttle to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and for your compliments!  We will pass along your kind words!

Summary: Room was nice and clean, did have remodeled room on 19th floor. Shuttle times inconsistent with schedule. Continental breakfast fair but extra charges for additional items not posted. Overall liked the hotel and room and would stay again Hot  cookies at night a treat
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy you loved our cookie as a late night snack!  We will see you next time! Thanks again!

Summary: I had a wonderful stay at the Double Tree in Orange Ca. The staff are Great!!, Rooms are very clean and the hotel is in a great location for Orange County, right off Interstate 5. You can get to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm with too much of a drive and access many local business. Right next to the Orange County Block mall, which has great shopping.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and found our staff to be "great"!  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We stayed for three nights and really enjoyed our stay. Nice to get away from the craziness of Disney at night. In a nice area. Close to restaurants. Staff was all very accommodating. Especially the doormen, room service staff etc. Lobby was updated nicely but agree that the rooms could use a little refresh (vents, doors etc) But still comfortable and worth the money. We would stay there again if in the area
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay!  We hope to see you the next time you're in the area!

Summary: I didn't like the fact that you have to pay for parking even when you are a hotel guest. They told me that all hotels in the area do. So that is their answer. Overall, the hotel is nice and the costumer service is just ok. I tried calling the front desk for some items, and the phone didn't work. I had to go downstairs to ask and get the items myself. My only good review for the actual workers would be for the girl who booked my room, I think she was the manager. They were sold out but she saved the last room for me, I just wanted to stay for the night. She was awesome! I'm not sure if I would stay here again, but my stay was just okay. it is close to fast food restaurants, and the out lets
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We have noted your comments and will be following up with the managers to help resolve these issues.  Thanks again for your review.

Summary Heading: Nice area and hotel but room number was confusing
Summary: I stayed at Double tree last week and the location is a bit confusing. There is only one entry into the hotel and that is only by Chapman Rd. Although we got a free upgrade to the very top level of the hotel.. it was very confusing with the hotel numbers.. We stayed in room 2007 but everytime we went up to our room we were confused with room 2004 and 2009..  Other than that the hotel is clean and well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We hope you think of us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Even though it's a little further from Disneyland we were happy to walk to the theme parks each day 15mins no hills and then was only a $5-10 cab ride home including tip. Walking distance to the convention centre and lots of restaurants and a convenience store close by.  The hotel itself has a great cafe and restaurant. Kids eat free with paying adults at the restaurant so was great value for the buffet breakfast (excellent food) and dinner. The pool was a bonus. The suite had a separate bedroom for the adults and the two kids slept in the lounge on a divan. Two TV's were welcome for downtime. We chose this hotel not so much for the location as for the layout and size of the room. We were not disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you liked our location and our family suite!  Please think of us again the next time you're in the area!

Summary: The lobby was nice and clean and very welcoming.  The check in went very smoothly and the added warm cookies at check in was a pleasant surprise.  I was upgraded to a 19th floor room which was recently renovated.  The room was large, clean, and felt comfortable.  There was a great view of the Angel Stadium.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and loved your Angels Stadium view!  Think of us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary: We chose this hotel because we are Hilton members, and we were heading to an Angels game. The hotel was not the nicest, however the service made up for it.  The front desk ladies were very courteous and it seemed like they enjoyed working there.  The hotel provided us with an upgraded room which was also nice for only 19 more dollars we could not pass that by.  My son who is five years old loves hotels and he really enjoyed his stay.  The surrounding area of the hotel was very clean and the baseball game was fun.  The Angel Stadium is also very clean and it is much different then a local baseball team that neighbor's the Angel's, I wont mention names.  I would recommend this hotel and I am very picky when it comes to hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We appreciate your compliments and look forward to seeing you again in the future!  Thanks again!

Summary: The Hotel was very nice.  It was quiet and very comfortable. The Shuttle service to and from Disneyland was excellent.  It was always on time to and from the park. The Shuttle drivers, were very informative and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed our Disney Shuttle service!  We look forward to having you in the future!

Summary: If shopping is your thing you won't be disappointed with the location of the Doubletree.  It's yards away from the Outlets at Orange and there's no need to worry about a parking space (unless you plan to do some serious shopping).  The hotel was functional, airy, spacious and very clean.  Rooms are in a good state of repair and well-maintained.  The only minor complaint we had, if you could call it that, was that the bed wasn't as comfortable as the one we had had for the previous week in Puerto Vallarta.  Staff were pleasant and helpful and the restaurant serves a great breakfast.  We'd planned to use the pool but there was so much to do we didn't get around to it.  We had the bonus of a good view of the Disney firework display each night from our room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you like our location!

Summary Heading: Stay away from the high price Disney options
Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for the first time at Christmas. We were there to spend some time in the area and celebrate our first wedding anniversary at Disneyland. First of all the location is very good. We weren't sure at first but being away from all the Disney hubbub is not a bad thing sometimes. There is a large outdoor mall with a Cineplex, bowling, lots of shops and restarants in easy walking distance. Also, close to John Wayne Airport, which is great.  The hotel staff are very friendly. The front desk staff are prompt and approachable and of course the cookies are great! We loved our room, roomy, clean great toiletries and lots of plump white towels. The Disney bus is the best, it is always on schedule and the driver is always cheery , even at 1am. He even goes
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Its always good to hear from happy guests!  Thanks again!

Summary: I booked a same-day reservation for a last minute trip to Disneyland. I was a bit hesitant due to some of the other reviews I read, but decided to check it out for myself.  This Doubletree is right off of the freeway, with a ton of attractions nearby. During check-in, I was greeted with a smile, a cookie, and a free upgrade. Our room was on the 19th floor and had a nice view. The room was clean and spacious. There was no mini-fridge or microwave, but I knew this when I booked. We had breakfast included with our reservation and it was pretty good. They had a ton of selection, fruit, oatmeal, eggs, bacon, french toast, cereals, breads, muffins, etc.  We used the free shuttle to and from Disneyland. Everything went smooth, was on-time, friendly, and clean. The trip was fast.  Check
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  "Overall, I was very satisfied with my stay and will plan to come back." - We are excited to have you return!  Thanks again for your compliments!

Summary: Every September we come to the OC for Women of Faith.  There are hundreds (thousands?) of hotel choices in this area, but we love the friendly staff, the comfy beds and those chocolate chip cookies!  One year I let my girlfriends talk me into another location and I HATED it.  When in the area, I will always choose this Doubletree.  It feels like home.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to hear that our friendly staff make you feel at home!  Thank you for being a loyal DoubleTree guest.  If you havent already, sign up for Hilton Honors so you can earn points for your stays!  www.HiltonHonors.com > Join now.  We look forward to having you back!

Summary: bed lines were stained...no fridge in room...all the shuttle vans reeked to high heaven with marijuana and staff did nothing to get rid of the smell...horrible.  did not open doors.windows and we had to beg them to turn on air conditioning..driver kept turning off air so he could tell jokes..finally another passenger got him to shut up and put the air on...but the shuttles were on time, staff was friendly (if u dont count the bland woman at the starbux cafe inside lobby)..and quiet.  would not be my first choice-is 2 exits away on freeway from disneyland. cleanliness marked low because of the smells.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We value your feedback and will pass along your comments to the appropriate departments.  We hope you visit us again.

Summary: When attending the Women of Faith Conference at the Honda Center, we stayed at this hotel.  It was so comfortable and more reasonably priced than those hotels recommended by the conference.  The restaurant was excellent.  Waiter was professional, accommodating and the food was great.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We love to have happy guests!

Summary: I am very dissatisfied with my recent stay, staff ignored my requests to be compensated for being placed in rooms with wet carpet twice! I was given nothing but the run around until I gave up and left.  Wet carpet is just not acceptable! and being treated like wanting dry carpet was silly or unreasonable....
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I have called the appropriate departments and found the source of the problem, and it as been taken care of.  We are very sorry for the inconvenience you experinced while staying with us, it is highly unusual. We hope you consider us the next time you are in the area.  Thank you again for your feedback, it only helps us improve!

Summary: I have to start by saying that I didn't actually stay overnight here - yet, but I will be! I did a site visit for a possible location for our company conference and ultimately have chosen them to move forward with. There were a lot of factors involved in making my selection but it was the staff that really sold me. The hotel is very nice! I loved the resort feel here and that was the kind of atmosphere I wanted for our group. Even though we are near Disney and I originally thought I wanted more of a Disney feel, I saw this hotel and quickly switched gears. The hotel is beautifully hidden from the busy streets and hubbub of the area so you real do feel secluded. The rooms are very nice, especially for the group price we were given so its hard to beat the value you get here. I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love that you found our staff to be helpful, friendly, and fun!  We are looking forward to hosting your group!  Please feel free to give us a call if you need anything!  Thanks again for your review!

Summary: Check in staff was not very informative.  We stayed at the hotel to see a concert at the Verizon Ampheithetare.  We asked the front desk about the shuttle service and they told us it was $3.00 a person.  Later, we found out it was $3.00 each way for a total of $6.00 a person.  We all felt the price should have been only $3.00 a person both ways.  As we took the shuttle back to the hotel, a total of 14 people were in the shuttle.  It was very uncomfortable and no one could wear their seatbelts.. too many people.  We had to leave the concert 30 min early because the shuttle would only make one last pick up at 11:15pm.  About the room, it was ok.  The room was clean,  It did not have a mini refrigerator.  At night in the hallway, I smelled some one smoking and it got it to our
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We will pass along your feedback to the appropriate departments.  We hope you think of us in the future.

Summary: First time I stayed in this hotel.  Won't be the last (in fact, I'm staying there this week)!  Clean, quiet and close to the places I need to be.  I'll make another reservation to stay here in the next couple of weeks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to see happy returning guests! Be sure to sign up for Hilton Honors so you can earn points for every stay!  Thanks again!

Summary: When I travel, I have made it a point not to get a room by the elevator because of all the noise people make while waiting or getting on/off. We arrived on a Saturday of a holiday weekend and the hotel was pretty busy. The clerk at reception worked for some time trying to find a room that met our reservation. When we got to our room it was the nearest room to the elevator, room 605. I decided since the hotel was full, I'd give it a try and if it was too noisy I'd ask to change rooms on Sun/Mon. Now, my husband and I are senior citizens and have traveled quite a bit and one of the things we have learned is to always bring earplugs with us (although sometimes that's not even enough when people are really rowdy or the walls are thin).  Either our floor was filled with well-mannered
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Your thorough feedback is appreciated!  We look forward to seeing you in the future!  Thanks again!

Summary: If you are looking for a Friend Welcome and Excellent Rest look no further. This Hotel is close in proximity to Freeways, Shopping and Entertainment. Angels Stadium, The Block Mall at Orange, Disneyland, Knots Berry Farm, and BEACHES.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to hear from happy guests!

Summary: Previously stayed in Costa Mesa, and as intended to go to a few beaches, possibly Disneyland, and the baseball (Anaheim Angels) we looked around Anaheim for hotels.  On price, the location, reviews etc this place stood out.    The rooms were very big, we had two double beds, not sure on size, they were possibly queens, for one person were huge (though others in our party sharing a bed said they weren't too spacious).  Lot of space, a desk and chair, big television with plenty of channels, and a decent size bathroom.  Hotel was clean, room was clean, and was made up each day.  There is wifi in the lobby available for free, but it was intermittent, the passwords they gave you (there were a couple in use) sometimes worked, sometimes didnt, generally though they did or it was just a
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed reveiw! We look forward to having you back in the future! Thanks again!

Summary: I have stayed at this location numerous times, and I will continue to stay if on business or pleasure: even if means traveling 30 extra mile.  My stay is always above and beyond from customer service at the time I walk in the door being greeted from the door me/drivers like Robert, to being helped at the front desk from Dawn and Petti. They are both extremely courteous , kind, professional and very helpful every time I arrive.  Service is excellent. The service in the bar area is always a great place to unwind and relax with the excellent and friendly service from the bar tender, Rafael, and his aide, Rogelio. Thank You all again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, and wonderful feedback.  We will be sure to pass along your compliments!  Thank you for being a loyal DoubleTree guest!

Summary: This hotel is extremely nice for the price-point. Super close to Disney, shopping, and the Angels Stadium. Short ride to Hollywood, beaches and other attractions. Clean, lovely hotel that is great for anyone. I would gladly stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 night on a recent visit to Disneyland. This is the cleanest hotel we've stayed at in a while. We are annual passholders so trust me when I say we've seen it all. The staff are all very friendly and helpful. Our mini fridge was huge compared to the other hotels around the area. I used to be a Hyatt member but I'm canceling my membership and am going to continue to stay at this double tree location. Granted the freezer is small but this is a hotel not an inn with full on kitchen. Price was right, we booked directly through the site. Would highly recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We love to hear that our guests enjoy their stay!  Also, you can sign up for our Hilton Honors program to reap the rewards of your loyalty!  Its great because you can get Hilton Honors points and double up and get frequent flyer points just for staying at our hotel- by inputting your airline number as well!  Signing up is a simple - www.hiltonhonors.com!  We look forward to having you back!  Thanks again for your review!

Summary: I was on business and stayed for 3 weeks.  The room was clean, but needed to be redecorated as well as did the entire hotel.  The laundry room had no working washing machines (a true inconvenience for those having an extended stay).  Microwave did not work (reported 3 times - including once in person) never fixed or replaced. Mini frig did not have a freezer - again an inconvenience for those having an extended stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We will forward your comments to the appropriate departments.  Thank you for your feedback, and we hope you consider us the next time you are in the area.

Summary: We have stayed at this property at least 8 times in the last 3 years. We go to Disney often. Its a hit or miss with the front desk staff, some are very accommodating with providing a room with Fridge and Microwave for my disabled son's dietary needs others not so much. However I used Priceline for most of my hotel bookings and when I visit Disneyland we usually end up with this hotel on the bidding option. We have been able to get a rate in the range of $46-$70 a night. This is an older property however they keep it very clean. The pool is decent size with plenty of towels.  The shuttle drives are all very nice and helpful as well as concierge. We have never eaten at the restaurants there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy that you are loyal to our property!  We look forward to having you in the future!

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel for three nights. I have to say we were wonderfully surprised. The location is fantastic - right off the interstate and close to outlet mall. Lots of great places to eat and the Disney Shuttle? 10 minutes - always on time - and very courteous drivers. The rooms were very spacious, extremely clean and the folks that worked at the hotel were absolutely fantastic. They always greeted you with a smile and seemed ready and eager to help! Peti was FABULOUS - she followed up prior to our arrival about a note I sent concerning medical needs of one of our party - she then followed up with us after check in - and how wonderful at check in for the note to be acknowledged and assured that our requests were taken care of. Do not hesitate in booking this hotel -
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are always happy to hear from valued guests!  Thanks for your feedback!

Summary: Spent a lot of time researching hotels that would accept my dog in this area. Made so many reservations, but in the end came here because it seemed more dog-friendly. Really didn't want to walk my dog in the concrete jungle of Harbor Blvd. This was a major improvement over my previous Anaheim race accommodations!!  Everyone on staff is very friendly, from the parking lot attendant to the maintenance workers. I have 2 minor complaints: 1) There are no in room safes and 2) Although they have there own very nice private shuttle to Disneyland, they did not offer any help getting to the races at the crack of dawn. No one offered me any advice whatsoever on this, nor did they know where I could get food in early AM. Turns out the ART shuttle stopped right across the street, but was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We hope you think of us again next year!

Summary Heading: Very helpful staff, clean and quiet hotel, perfect location.
Summary: Perfect location, near Disneyland, close to outlet malls and lots of good restaurants.  Hotel provides shuttle service to Disneyland.  Quiet hotel with a great pool, staff very friendly and accommodating.  Got a really good rate at high season.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you love our location!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Awesome Hotel at a Great Price
Summary: I love staying at the Double Tree.  It is very convenient to most everything. The lobby is pretty and the pool is also quite nice.  The rooms and bathrooms are clean and updated.  The staff is always friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your reveiw!  We are happy that you love to stay here- we love to have you!

Summary Heading: Great for Disney and outlet shopping!
Summary: After travelling from England, we changed our plans and arrived 2 days early. The staff on reception ( I think her name was Peti) were so amazingly helpful and welcoming. She sorted us a room which we could stay in for the entire 6 days, without having to move to another. As we had a terrible time previously in Redondo Beach, which was why we checked in early, we were kindly upgraded to an 11th floor room, received the yummy cookies and were given brilliant free Internet access!! We shopped, used the hourly shuttle to Disney, and wandered over to the malls for nice reasonably priced meals. It was a very enjoyable stay.  I highly recommend this hotel, particularly for the staff who helped us every time we needed anything!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Helping our guests have an enjoyable stay, is our goal.  Thanks again for your review!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, will stay here again
Summary: Very comfortable firm  beds, clean, quiet, thick towels, bathroom big enough,  fast elevators.  We upgraded for $16 to get a "renovated room on a high floor". I do wonder what is on the other floors without paying an upgrade. But very happy.  Only complaint- double beds ARE double beds- they are so tiny for 2 fit people. Good thing we are in great shape, but turning over at night we would collide with each other.  Doesn't make for great sleep..  Really- why not queen size beds? They would fit very well in this room.  Double beds, if you have to share are just absurd at these prices.  That is my only complaint, so big people- don't plan to share a bed. Hope to be able to get a King next time just for the 2 of us. Location is great for University in the area and the hotel is next
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy that you liked our hotel and location.  We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thank again.

Summary: This hotel is in dire need of a makeover.  The lobby would indicate that it has had a makeover, but then you open the door to your room and discover, that in fact, it has not!  The smell of old musty carpet greets you.  I bought a candle and even with burning that you could not mask the smell enough.  The beds are ok, but for a double bedded room, I think they could upgrade to queen beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We will pass along your comments to the appropriate departments.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Hotel is a quick drive from Disneyland and is extremely plush for not that much more expense than nearby Disneyland hotels. The pool/spa area was very nice. The curtains are full length and actually block out all of the light. Plus Orange county taxes are about half compared to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy you enjoyed your stay!  Thanks again!

Summary: My 8-year-old daughter and I stayed here the night before a Disneyland visit. She loved the welcome cookies and the beautiful views of the city from our room and the windows throughout the hotel. Our room was super clean, and our bathroom was very nice. We also really liked the gift shop. The drive to Disneyland was quick and easy if you aren't using the shuttle.
