If you're willing to stay at a hotel that isn't RIGHT next to the parks, I would definitely recommend this one -- you get more for your money, too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so glad to hear you had a great stay with us!  We look forward to having you back! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Average Hotel not sure why so many positive reviews
Summary: This was my third trip to Anaheim/ Orange area and would say that amongst the previous two stays this stay was quiet average. The only good thing about the hotel was the Troffi restaurant which served good food. There's a Wendy's and a Starbucks across the road if needed a cheaper breakfast option. Shuttle service is poor - one shuttle in an hour so if the shuttle is full you have to wait for an hour for the next one or take a taxi. Similarly the first return shuttle starts at 2:15 PM - if you want to start early then also you can't do that. The drop off area is way outside where as almost all other shuttles drop at a better location. Its strange that the hotel caters mostly to Disneyland visitors but doesn't have anything for kids - no kids play area or a toddlers pool
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your feedback.  We hope you think of us the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Room is good.  I experience trouble checking in and getting an internet access code.  I travel to the location often and this year I have had to fight, yes I mean fight, to get front desk staff to get me a code.  When we follow-up with the General Manager, he assures that this is to be included in our hotel rate but it continues to be an issue for me to get this simply request.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are sorry for the inconvenience you experienced with the internet access during your stay.  We will be sure to look into the internet connection.  Please think of us again the next time you are in the area.  Thanks again for your review.

Summary Heading: Great option if not staying on Disneyland campus
Summary: From the moment we arrived we were impressed with the excellent service. We were able to check in early without a problem. It was an easy walk to the Angels game and only a $7 cab ride back. The shuttle to Disney is very convenient and the drivers couldn't have been nicer.   Because of last minute planning we actually stayed here 2 nights and on the Disney campus 2 nights and I have to say the Doubletree is an amazing value and excellent location if you are shopping or planning to catch a baseball game in addition to Disneyland. Overall we were very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We hope you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: We choose this hotel, because of the free shuttle to Disneyland. We can't complain about anything ! The best thing this hotel has to offer is the people and their service ! Everyone was very helpful, very nice and ready to help. It's somewhat old, but it's very very clean. The shuttle service is excellent. Location is perfect is you want to shop. It's a 5 minute walk to an outlet mall, with lots of restaurants. Will stay there again for sure !!! Did I mention the delicious moist chocolate chip cookies they offer you when you check in ?
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We love when our guests enjoy their stay!

Summary: The reason why we choose this hotel was because it was cheaper than most hotels nearby the Disneyland park, and it offered a free shuttle service. The shuttle was always on time and never took more than 10 minutes to get to and from the park. The drivers were extremely helpful and we never had any trouble going to and from the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed our Disney shuttle!  Thanks again!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights at the start of august after a 14 hour flight from Australia and was happy with this older hotel. The only complaint i had was that the carpet in our room smelt musty and was a little tacky underneath. Apart from that, everything else was fine and the staff were extremely helpful and friendly.  There is a Starbucks across the road if the coffee stall in the lobby is closed or not up to standard. Food is plentiful with all the eateries at the Orange Outlets a short stroll away.  Yes - parking is a paid extra but is covenient to use. The hotel location is very convenient at the junction of a few major freeways and it is very easy to get around Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: ITs always our GO-TO hotel! Everyone is great, hotel is clean and Disney Shuttle is so convenient! They also serve Starbucks coffee! Only about 10-12 minutes from Disney and 15 min from Knotts and Medieval Times!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy to be your "go to" hotel!  Thanks for being a loyal DoubleTree guest!

Summary: This is a great hotel! We were made to feel welcomed immediately. That includes the front door staff and the check-in team with their famous to-die-for "warm cookies"! Never ran into a grumpy or surly employee. I mentioned it was my wife's birthday in hopes of maybe a nice room assignment. I got that ... 15th floor with a nice view and also received four free drink vouchers which we enjoyed later in the stay. The rooms were clean, the beds very comfortable and when we had a problem with a lamp .. it was fixed promptly along with an apology and more cookies. Free shuttle to Disney and a 20 minute walk to Anaheim Stadium. Pool gets shade from 2:30 on but was refreshing after walking and line-ups! You will enjoy Rey ... the shuttle driver ... GREAT with kids! All in all .... a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to hear from happy guests!  We are so glad you felt "welcomed" immediately- that is our goal!  We look forward to seeing you next time! Thanks again!

Summary: Was here for my high school reunion and my room was a premium. When we first walked into the room, it smell like someone was smoking. This is supposed to be a smoke free hotel. But everything else was great. They allow pets which I LOVE and only charge you 75 for your ENTIRE stay... Disneys hotel don't even offer pet stays. Nice location cause there's an El Torito, BJs, TGIF, Denny's, and the block. The pool and gym is nice too. And they also offer bus service to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love it when guests enjoy their stay!  Come see us again!

Summary Heading: Great service, excellent rooms and awesome shuttle drivers :)
Summary: All was just fine but above all, the shuttle drivers to Disneyland made it perfect. After a whole day walking in Disneyland, our way back to our room in the shuttle was made very pleasant by driver "Rey". As a plus, there is a nice Outlet just a few meters walking distance as well as dinning options. Very recommendable!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We are glad you liked our shuttle service!  We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: The hotel was in a great location to all areas, with a outlet mall less than a 5 min walk away offering plenty of food choices too. the disney shuttle was great with more than enough drop offs and pick ups the hotel clearly knows where it buissness is.the rooms were a decent size and had a comfy bed the only thing it lacked which i think most people staying here would want was a fridge which was a bit dissapointing but not a big deal. the things that did annoy me about this hotel was the cost of parking which i thought was a bit steap $13per day but once again wasnt a massive issue. The internet ot the other hand was another story, dont get me wrong i dont have a problem paying for internet in my room but at $14 per day per device that is just obserd, especialy after staying at
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We appreciate your feedback!

Summary: I stayed here for a few nights, and was surprised by the poor quality of the room in general.  The carpet was pulling away from the connection between the bathroom and the room, exposing nails and the floor underneath.  The furniture was very worn.  Additionally, $13 a night for parking is outrageous for the area!  Other hotels nearby have free parking.  However, it was clean and the staff was great!
Manager Response: Thank You for your review!  We hope you think of us the next time you're in the area!

Summary: Excellent hotel for a base to explore Disney parks. Very clean, spacious rooms and excellent service. Didn't use the swimming pool, but looked very good. Other amenities all at hand if you like tennis etc.   We didn't use the resteraunt, but did use the star bucks across the road. Alternatively there's plenty of good places to eat very nearby.   Only downside was the hospital across the road and sirens almost 24/7, but overall don't let that put you off. It really wasn't that bad.   Good outlet shopping just up he road, but if you are going to travel to other locations around California, Nevada or Arizona, we found better prices and shops outside of LA.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We appreciate your comments! Please stay with us again the next time you're in the area!

Summary: I recently stayed here for 4 nights. I had a King room. It was very clean and the bed was very comfortable. It is a 10 minute shuttle ride to Disneyland and the bus runs at 30 minute intervals at night for returning. The only criticism I have is the exorbitant fee for parking. $13 a day!!  No other hotel around there charges that for parking.  I would, however, stay here again. Nice staff and, of course, cookies!
Manager Response: Thank you for your reivew!  We are glad you had a comfy bed and enjoyed our Disney shuttle.  Just to let you know, our parking charges are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding area.  We hope you think of us again in the future!  Thanks again!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights .Staff were helpful and accomadating and we were greeted with a warm cookie!The bus stop to Disney is just outside the hotel and less then 10 mins away.We only had coffee there but the rooms were spacious and clean.The concierge was great helping us with ideas of what to look at when we werent at Disney arranged transport for us back to LA.Highly recomend for people who dont want to stay right in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We hope you think of us again the next time you are in the area!!

Summary Heading: We have found our Anaheim hotel
Summary: I am a business and avid leasure traveler who spends 150 nights a year in hotels.  I stayed 6 nights here (4 for business, 2 with my family). The hotel was very accommodating and booked me in the same room so that when my family arrived  on Friday while I was still at work they would have a room waiting for them. The entire staff from the front desk, valet, bar staff and shuttle drivers were very friendly.  I have to recognize Rey who drives the shuttle to Disneyland.  He was hilarious, told jokes and performed magic tricks with our kids.  Heads up management he deserves a good raise at his next review. We love Disney and this was our third trip this year.  We have previously stayed at hotels on and off site.  We will stay here from now on.  The shuttle is very convenient and it
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to accomomodate you and your family!  Its good to hear that the drivers get our guests excited to go to Disney! Thank you for the compliments!

Summary Heading: Disneyland Fun and a place to relax
Summary: The staff in the hotel where very helpful and very accommodating, they ensured that we were getting everything we needed during our stay. We did also use the Disneyland shuttle from the Hotel to the Park, what a easy and great convenience for the hotel guest. We would stay at this property again, this is why I am a HHonors member and plan to stay a member. Thank you again for a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We are so glad you found our staff to be helpful and accommodating!  We look forward to seeing you again, and thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member!!

Summary: We couldn't have selected a better place for rest and relaxation.  Many things can ruin a trip and in a Hotel  there are many.  Here at the Doubletree we found absolutely nothing but the peace and quiet we were looking for.  When dining we found the menu to comprehensive, delicious and not too pricey.  The staff from the very beginning were fantastic!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love that you found the peace and quiet you were looking for! Think of us again in the future!  Thanks again for the complimetnts!

Summary Heading: Awesome Customer Service, Hotel and Location
Summary: Stayed here for a wedding a couple weeks ago. Got to the hotel early (11:00am) and tried to check in. Donny tried to get us in a room and said that we would call as soon as room was clean and ready. He called me an hour later at the room was on the 3rd floor and not an upgraded room. We asked if we could wait for a higher floor and an upgraded room. He said no problem.  I got a call back an hour later and said he had our room. He had already check us into it and all we had to do is pick up our keys. This was by far some of the best customer service I have experienced when it comes to checking in early. We loved the room. Nice comfy bed and clean room. Nice bathroom and well appointed amenities.   We did have a couple of cocktails in the restaurant and the service was great and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We're always happy to accommodate whenever possible!  Good tip with the Angels Stadiuim view - also, the Disney view is great at night as you can see the fireworks from the higher floors.  We look forward to seeing you next time!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Near Disney, but not at Disney
Summary: Took the kids to Disneyland and stayed for a week.  We stayed in a standard hotel room. The room and common areas are clean and non-stinky.  We used the room as our base camp and not much else, didn't have time to jump in the pool or any other amenities.  The beds were very comfortable esp. after 11miles at Disney.  The shuttle is very nice/free but parking costs at the Hotel (Valet and self parking are $3/difference)  This isn't a destination resort by no means, if I was on business it was better than good, for our family it worked out just fine.  There is a large mall next door w/restaurants.  Grocery store is a little bit further and is a little sketchy, lets just say the the baby formula is locked-up with the cigarettes.  It was a good financial value for us with the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Please think of us for your next Disney vacation!

Summary Heading: Great location to shopping and restaurants!
Summary: I would high recommend this hotel for location and value when going to Disneyland and surrounding areas. Shuttle service to the park was great and we were around the block from an outlet mall with an excellent variety of shopping, restaurants, bowling and movies. Rooms are perfect size, nice toiletries - microwave and fridge were helpful as well! There is a pool area to cool off at after a hot day and washing machine and dryer on premises. I found this hotel to be very very good value for the money. I didn't eat at the restaurant but did purchase breakfast from the Starbucks in the lobby. Love the warm cookie at check in! I will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and liked our Disney shuttle service!  We look forward to seeing you again next time!  Thanks again!

Summary: Great for business travel in resort location... far enough away (2 miles) from Disneyland to avoid the traffic, both in the hotel and on the road. Typical superb Hilton quality rooms, bedding and decor. Tip for light sleeper: ask for a room away from U.C.I Medical Center.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you are in Orange! Thanks again!

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights while my husband had surgery at the UC Irvine Medical Center which is just across the street. The hotel is also close to Angel Stadium, the gigantic outlet mall (both walking distance), and Disneyland is just a short shuttle ride away. The staff was very attentive during my stay, and the room was very large and clean with many amenities including a microwave and a mini fridge. The beds were super comfortable. I was on a high floor with a great view. (Caution - a couple of the elevators were wonky!) On the other side of the hotel you can see the Disneyland fireworks each night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you're in the area!

Summary: The staff is excellent, and the hotel has a wonderful breakfast.  The location is excellent if you need to visit Chapman University and UC Irvine Douglas Hospital. There were issues with the air conditioning, though, and if you do not need to be completely cool, then you will be fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel!  We are glad you found our location to be convenient and our staff- excellent.  Please think of us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Losing my son's iPod ruined our trip!
Summary: We planned a fun family trip to Disneyland for the fourth of July. First of all, we were given a handicapped-accessible room with a tiny bathroom sink and no countertop at all in the bathroom. Our carpet was stained and the room seemed, overall, shabby. We have stayed many times before, but this was one of the worst rooms we've had. We asked for a different room but only another handicap room was available. We tried to make the best of it. We spent all day July 4th at Disneyland, came back exhausted, and left the next morning. We realized about 4 hours down the road that we had left my son's brand new iPod behind. He had saved his birthday and Christmas money to buy it and was heartbroken. The security and housekeeping manager said they would check, but nothing had been turned
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your feedback and please accept our sincere apologies. We take all comments we receive from our guests very seriously. We're very sorry that we were unable to locate your son's iPod in your guest room. Again, please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you experienced. If we can help in any way, please feel free to contact us.

Summary: Great Stay! We have stayed at this Hotel before.  It is very convenient and the Customer Service is exceptional.  Also enjoy the Block of Orange Mall right next door.  And, Disneyland is very close by with Free Shuttle to and from the Hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to hear from happy guests and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Stayed for a long weekend at the Doubletree Anaheim-OC.  This is actually the 2nd time I have stayed and it was great both times.  The rooms were spacious, clean, and comfortable.  The staff were all very nice and helpful.  The location is awesome, walking distance to Angel Stadium(which was my reason for my visit), next to the shops at The Block at Orange, and easy access to the 5 freeway.  The only downs were $12/day for internet and $16/day to park your car, but I guess that is fairly typical for the area.  Even with the 2 downs, I would stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We look forward to seeing you the next time you're in the area!  Thanks again!

Summary: The room was supposed to be reconditioned which I guess that means paint.  The bathroom was dirty upon check in.  It was just a so so room.  For families it's probably a good deal but the hotel charges are too high.  Pay for parking pay for internet.  You feel nickel and aimed.    The location is great its close to freeways
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are sorry that our room wasn't up to our usual standard.  As far as parking and internet charges go, our pricing is typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding area.  We hope you stay with us the next time you are in the area.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel from June 22nd through June 27th. On arrival after a long flight we were met with a really friendly Hotel receptionist who asked how our flight was and was really interested in where we had traveled from to get to the hotel. We had asked for a high room as to be able to see the fireworks or Angel stadium. We were given a room with a view of angel stadium on the 10th Floor. As a side note, Anything above the 10th floor was accessed using a key for added security. The room had a direct view of Angel stadium as can be seen in the photos. There was a ball game on the night we arrived so we watched it on TV while being able to see the Stadium which was pretty cool. The Room was large and spacious with lots of room to be able to wander around in. The bathroom
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to hear that our guest enjoy their stay!  We look forward to having you again!

Summary: From bell hopper to valet to front desk staffs to food service were accommodating, friendly and helpful, made our stay at ease and definitely will stay at the Doubletree again. Stayed at many other hotel, but Doubletree in Anaheim/Orange, CA made my family feel at home. Looking forward to our next stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We greatly appreciate your compliments!  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: I love staying at the Doubletree hotel because of how wonderful the staff is; they are very friendly and helpful if any issues come up. This is a great hotel to stay if you're expecting to get well taken care of.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to hear from happy guests!  Thanks again!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights while going to Disneyland with our two children.  We were pleasantly surprised with the hotel, it was nicer than we were expecting.  We loved the cookies on check-in!  The room had 2 double beds and was nicely updated and very clean.  The bathroom was also very clean.   We used the complimentary shuttle to Disneyland and found it convenient.  However, we had a magic morning 7am admission and the hotel shuttle does not start until 730 am, so we had to find our own transportation that morning. We also found the lack of wi-fi in the rooms a huge inconvenience.  All in all, it was a good stay and we would go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We look forward to seeing you on your next Disney vacation!

Summary: We travel to Orange County a few times a year to see the Angels baseball games. This is a great place to stay, you can walk over to the outdoor mall and to plenty of restaurants and movies all from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to have you for fun baseball weekends!  Till next time! Thanks again!

Summary: This place was excellent from stem to stern.  Everyone, from the Auto Valet, Desk Clerk, Maintenance Personnel, and Restaurant Staff, were kind, helpful, and informed.  The place was very clean and the staff made sure it stayed that way.  Excellent place to lay your head down and relax.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We appreciate your positive comments and we hope to see you the next time you're in the area!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, comfy bed - would stay again
Summary: We just got back from a 4 night stay while visiting Disneyland for the 4th of July.    The good: Comfy beds! Starbucks Pool area open until 11p, which is great for post-Disney spa soaking! Very friendly staff  The not-so-good: No fan in bathroom or separate vanity, which makes it difficult for women to do hair/makeup while others shower, or in a fogged-up mirror post-shower (nit-picky, but I don't understand why all hotels don't accommodate this)  No mini-fridge  Overall - very good stay and we would stay again if the price is right.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: The hotel staff were unfailingly helpful and friendly. Restaurant food was good, large servings as per American sizes. Rooms were very comfortable and clean. We had a relatively nice view over the city.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your Excellent Recommendation!  We look forward to seeing you next time!

Summary Heading: Best hotel I have ever stayed at when visiting Disneyland
Summary: This is a nice hotel but it is old and décor inside rooms is very tired. Our room was very clean and despite being old was very nice. Hilton Honors members get their famous cookies which were fantastic. The hotel offers free shuttle service to the park the only downside is that you are dropped off and picked up almost by the main entrance to the park so it is a good walk. The hotel is quite far from the park but there is no traffic jams and there is plenty of places to shop and eat within a close driving distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We look forward to seeing you for your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Good Location.  Close to Orange Outlets.  Excellent Shuttle Service to Disneyland.   However, Air Quaility in rooms was terrible.  Musty Smell, Dirty Air Vents, High Humidity.  Would not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. We're so glad to hear you found our location and shuttle service to be of your liking. We're very sorry however, that you were disappointed with your stay and for the inconveniences that you experienced. We thank you for sharing your feedback about our guest rooms and the ventilation issues you experienced. We will be sure to share these comments with our maintenance team so we can address these issues immediately. Thank you again and we really hope you'll give us a second chance if your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary Heading: Nice room, comfy bed, would stay again
Summary: I was a little hesitant to stay here, given the distance to Disneyland, but I got a good deal, and the Doubletree name gave me some comfort. I was impressed, and this will be the first hotel I check the next time I need a room for a Disneyland run. Check-in was fine, a tad slow, but the cookie made up for it. Parking wasn't great, but was adequate; the closest lot filled up, but the overflow wasn't much of a walk. I was on the top floor, and had a nice view of the Crystal Cathedral next door. The room was nice, reasonably spacious living space. Bathroom was a tad cramped, but adequate. The whole place seemed like it's just a tad on the old side (the small bathroom definitely contributed to that feeling), but I didn't mind; it was still clean and well-maintained. The room was
Manager Response: Thank your for your review!  We hope you stay with us the next time you're in the area!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel in Excellent Location with cookies to boot!
Summary: Stayed at this hotel in mar 2013 to attend a birthday in the area. Hotel is easy to find and is very centrally located, off the 5 freeway! Close to Angels Stadium, Disneyland and the Outlet Mall. Check in was a breeze-front desk was very friendly and we loved the Doubletree Chocolate Chip cookies which are absolutely the best in world! Room was spacious and quiet even though the lobby had a Bolivian Carnival event at the time. Comfortable beds, amenities, pool. Wish we had more time to enjoy the facilities because between Disney and the birthday, we had very little time spent-but will certainly come back and stay here next time we're in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to hear that our guests enjoy their stay!  Thank you for the compliments, and we look forward to seeing you the next time you're in the area!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Our stay at the Doubletree by Hilton in Anaheim
Summary: This is a very nice, clean hotel.  Comfortable beds, free shuttle to Disneyland, nice pool area.  Yummy free cookies at check-in, but avoid buying snacks in the gift shop as they are really expensive (maybe bring your own).  Good location right off the 5 freeway, close to Disney Parks, and several nice local restaurants to choose from.  Family friendly, Disney Channel on the TV, room service and hotel cafe has a good selection on the menu, and you can get food and drinks brought to you at the pool area, which is also nice.  Price was right too!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Please think of us again the next time you are in the Anaheim - Orange County area!

Summary: We stayed for the Fourth of July + Friday, Saturday. The hotel staff go above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and at home. We did valet parking ($6 daily) and the staff was very diligent.  They have a restaurant, gift shop and Starbucks in the hotel which was great. The location is awesome, outlets nearby, disneyland, etc. They also offer shuttle service to Disneyland.  A couple of things though..we got our room with the breakfast package. Which I would not recommend because it is just cold breakfast (cereal, fruit)..if you want an omelette, bacon, sausage etc you still need to pay $7 extra. The room also had a musky smell. Overall I would recommend this hotel. 😊
Manager Response: Thank you so much for you review!  We are glad you found our hotel to be convenient and felt comfortable and at home while staying with us! We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: I am writing this review in the hope that it will help others when choosing accommodation as the reviews did for us.  We recently stayed at this hotel and we couldn't praise the hotel or staff enough.  We were there for 4 nights and found all facilities to be excellent, they even have a coin laundry which is extremely handy if you have a family.  The hotel provides a shuttle service to Disney/California Park which is excellent.  They start at 7.30am for those that want to start early and finish around midnight, which is perfect for those who want to stay late.  For those who may want to catch a baseball game at Angels Stadium it's within a 10 minute walking distance, which is very safe.  There is also a factory outlets shopping mall across the road which I think would cater for
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  Wonderful to have our guests give such a high recommendation!  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and found our facilities to be excellent!  This is what we strive for!  Thanks again!

Summary: Not a lot to really say good about this hotel. There is another double tree closer to Disneyland and I almost think some of the reviews on here are for the wrong location. I've heard good things about the other one. This one is not walking distance to disneyland but they have a good shuttle system to The park so that in itself may sell this hotel for a family vacation (note no free shuttle from the john wayne airport and its about a $40 cab ride) outlet mall is across the street and there is a a few fast food places within a 2 min walk. So lots of food choices for families. (No fridges in rooms). I myself like the pool and this pool was disappointing. Maybe 15x25' and not near big enough for the hotel. the sun only hits it in the morning until about 1:30. After that its chilly
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. We're very sorry that you were disappointed with your stay and for the inconveniences that you experienced during your time with us. We thank you for sharing your feedback about our guest rooms and the pool area, and will keep those in mind as we're constantly working to improving our guest experience.

Summary: We could not have asked for a better location.  The outlet mall is just across the street and the hotel is very close to Disney. Grab some Krispy Kremes to have for breakfast before heading to the parks.  We were very pleased with the Disney shuttle.  It ran on time, saved us from parking fees at the park, and were entertained by the driver Ray.  He was exceptionally nice and sang to us en route.  We had a wonderful view from the 17th floor where we enjoyed Disney's fireworks.  Our room was spotless and very spacious.  The pillows and bedding were very comfortable - we all slept very well.  Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone planning a Disney visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  It's always great to hear when our guests enjoy their stay!  Thanks again!

Summary: I stayed 5 nights at this hotel and was more than satisfied.  The room was comfortable and quiet.  The staff is extremely friendly and go out of their way to help you in any way they can.  I am a single woman traveling alone and was completely at ease at this hotel.  I will definitely return when I am in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We are glad to hear you were comfortable and satisfied with your stay.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you're in the area!

Summary: We chose this hotel because it sounded like its close to Disneyland..and they offered shuttle service to/from Disney every hour.. So be sure you are on time for the shuttle or else you wait for another hour.. The hotel is close to the orange outlet and has few restaurant near by. The room is clean but has a strong smell upon entering the suite. It suppose to be non smoking room...but guess not..  The a/c in the room makes a loud noise when it's on... However, the room we got had a really nice view... You can actually see the Disney fireworks from the window. If you like Starbucks..there is also one right by the lobby.. but their staff didn't seem interest helping customers. The coffee tasted old.and food was not fresh either... therefore, I strongly recommend you to walk across
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We hope you think of us the next time you are in the area! Thanks again!

Summary: From the moment we arrived, we were treated with respect and felt "at home." We arrived well before checkin time, so we took advantage of the free use of the tennis and basketball court.  We were able to borrow balls and rackets from the bell desk!   Josh at the front desk is very kind and responsive.  Enrique and Karen at the bell desk are sincere and patient.  Our room was SPOTLESS.  I was traveling alone with my 10 year old and every effort was made by the staff to make my son and I feel welcome.  The hotel is less than a mile from the Anaheim stadium where we went to see the Angels play.  Restaurants and the outlet mall are within walking distance.  The hotel even offers a free shuttle to Disneyland- Leaving every hour.    Not only will we be back very soon, but I have
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We are always happy to hear from valued guests!  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the area!

Summary: We picked this property as it was far enough away from the park to be quiet, but close enough to get their via hotel shuttle.  Hotel is exceptionally clean, including the rooms. We were very pleasantly surprised. Linens were clean and room staff attended to the room very well.  Bed uncomfortable, but room exceptionally quiet. Food service very good as well.  Great service from all staff.  Would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay!  Please think of us again the next time you are in Orange County!

Summary: Clean hotel and friendly staff.  We could see Disney fireworks from the room.  Shuttle to Disneyland was fantastic.  Departs hotel every hour and departs park at 15 minutes after the hour.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love that you found our Disney shuttle to be FANTASTIC!  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights. The restaurant was above average in dinner. Great food. The pool lost all of its sun by 3:00. Poor layout. WiFi was disappointing. Should be wireless and free for every laptop not per room in this day and age. Other than that good safe stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you liked our restaurant!  As for internet, our pricing is typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding area for guestrooms.  We do provide free wifi in our lobby.  Again, thank you for your review!

Summary: My husband and myself just return from a six night stay . We were very impressed by hotel. Positive, friendly staff at check in, that accommodated our requests. Delicious warm cookie and as I was Hilton Honours member, we were given free  Internet . The purpose of our visit was to celebrate my husband's 60 birthday - he is a  big kid at heart  -so we went to Disneyland. The shuttle service was once again excellent plus we had a very entertaining driver named Rey whom went above and beyond. He had stickers for the children , did a magic trick and told very funny children jokes on our rides home. The shuttle was always on time and had enough room for everyone .  Our room had a very comfortable bed , a fridge and we could see fireworks nightly.   Very quiet  Only negative was the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay!  We make sure to run a Disney shuttle every hour for your convenience!  Thank you for the compliments and thank you for being a Hilton Honors member!  We look forward to seeing you the next time you're in the area!

Summary: I was attending a business event hosted at this location so was doing a price check initially. There were other options around that were walking distance but for the price, amenities, and convenience I chose to stay here. However, from start to finish I was surprised at the level of friendliness and helpfulness the staff offered. The location made it easy to grab dinner and drinks at off-site locations (we wanted to explore), and then come back to a quiet room with a view. We didn't want to leave! For personal or business, I'd recommend this hotel if you're in the area. We got a great rate and couldn't be more pleased with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are so happy that you were pleased with your stay! We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the area!

Summary: Quite frankly, my Hilton Gold status is starting to wear on me and this hotel did not help. The Hilton HHonors program was once very nice and very accommodating.  We stayed at the Doubletree.  parking was $13.00 per night and it is what it is... Most hotels in the past have given breakfast vouchers to Gold members.  Here you were given continental only vouchers and the waiter was snarky and advised they would charge full price for both my 7 and 5 year old.  The hotel would not provide transportation six blocks to the Angels stadium and said they only go to Disney.  That seemed insulting seeing as they had like 5 shuttles parked out front of the hotel.  The sad thing is this seems to be the trend at most Hilton properties.  Overall the rooms were clean, nothing special.  Frankly
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review of our hotel. We're sorry to hear that we did not provide the highest quality of services that you and your family deserve. We will be sure to keep your feedback about the shuttles in mind as we continue to improve on our overall guest experience. Thank you again for the review of your stay and we hope you'll come back and stay with us again if you return to the area.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel cuz I had the impression it was close to disneyland but it is a lot closer to the orange factory outlet and angel stadium.  In short, I don't understand why they charge parking fees for the guests.  You have to take a shuttle which seems to be available every hour.  so if you missed it, you might as well take a nap.  so if I am going to disneyland, I might as well stay somewhere else where parking is free.  At least, I can park my car @disney and leave anytime i want. i don't have to wait for the shuttle - besides, the difference between disneyland parking and doubletree parking is only $3 and when the shuttle arrives at disneyland, they let the family with kids board the shuttle first.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we hope you stay with us the next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Watch Out For Those Incedental Fees!
Summary: This hotel was physically appealing and convenient.   However ..., we:  1). Paid $17 for a supposedly "complimentary" breakfast.  2). Paid $13 per day for parking (?!?)  So much for the impact of the Triple A "discount".
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.

Summary: The staff was very helpful and nice.  The rooms are super cute.  I am not the biggest fan of hotels but I'd definitely stay at another Doubletree.  The shuttle to Disneyland was easy and convenient as well.  I'd definitely recommend for somebody that wants to stay near Disneyland but not pay the hefty prices of the Disney hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy that you found our staff to be very helpful and nice.  We appreciate the positive energy about our Disneyland shuttle and how you felt it was easy and convenient.  Please visit us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary: The staff was very nice and let us verify if we liked the room before actually checking in. the warm cookies they give at check in are delicious by the way. We really enjoyed our stay, the bedroom was bright an clean and the bed sooo confortable! the only thing we missed was complimentary wi-fi! we also loved the fact we could access the spa whenever we wanted. and it was close to a couple of highways which made it easy to drive around. only downside was that we were woken one morning by the helicopter of the hospital in front :-). We definitely recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! Please think of us the next time you are in the area!

Summary: Made reservation by calling the 1800# (talked to an actual person), 6 months prior to our trip.  Reserved 2 connecting rooms (20th anniversary with the kids).  Called today to confirm my reservation, and not only does that hotel not have connecting standard rooms (only suites), they could barely get us on the same floor (literally each end of the hall).  My children are 13 and 15, and although well traveled and aware, I didn't want them all the way down the hall.  Even asked for a different combination of rooms in order to get us closer and the management would not budge (said they were booked).  The manager quickly turned the blame on their reservation service (I hate it when people in the service industry pass the buck), and the only one who could help me wouldn't be in until
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We’re very sorry your experience at our property wasn't up to our usual high standards. We've addressed the problems you mentioned with your reservations and the level of service you received while attempting to make modifications. Thank you for alerting us to this issue, and we hope you’ll give us another chance if you return to our area.

Summary: I've stayed here on three occasions, and have always had a very positive experience. My advice is to join Hilton Honors program and get free Internet access. Restaurant is first rate, work-out facility fine, staff very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank You so much for your review.  We are always happy to hear from our Hilton Honors members!

Summary: My hubby and I stayed at the Doubletree over the long memorial day weekend and had a fabulous time!  At check-in, Dawn was amazing!  She took very good care of us.  I wanted a corner room, no problem.  I'm a hilton honors member and asked to upgrade to a full breakfast, no problem.  I asked for extra pillows, no problem.  What a nice way to start the trip!   We were spending the long weekend at Disneyland with family and celebrating my hubby's B-day as well.  We mentioned the B-day to Dawn and she sent up a bottle of champange that evening as a nice surprise.  I was shocked!  Now that's customer service.  The day we checked out I spoke to the Asst Manager about how impressed I was with the hotel and most importantly, Dawn.  Kuddos to Doubletree for making our stay so memorable!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We are always happy to hear that our guests enjoy their stay!  Please think of us the next time you are in the area!  Tell your husband Happy Birthday!  Thanks Again!

Summary: We stayed here on our Honeymoon as part of a Las vegas to California trip. When we arrived we had the cookies which were yumm. When we got to the room it was very disappointing, worn and not appropriate for a special holiday. We complained and they moved us to a higher more refreshed room on a higher level which was great. Bed really comfy and relaxing room after Disney. The shuttle bus service was brilliant. Staff friendly. A basic Starbucks in the lobby which has comp WIFI. Restaurant was expensive but only ate there once. Short walk from some great shops but this all closes early so no-where to go after Disney as the Downtown also surprisingly closes by 10pm on weekdays.   If I returned to Disney California I would definitely return but ask for a higher room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy that we were able to get you a better room for your honeymoon.  Thank you for communicating your concerns while here.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: Stayed here for a family birthday celebration and it's close to an outlet mall and a Starbucks (very important). We had a wonderful experience and the manager was just great! Customer service can make or break an experience and she knows how to keep customers happy!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  The Outlets at Orange mall and Starbucks are a huge attraction to our guests, and we are happy to be so close for your convenience!  Wonderful experiences are always welcome!  So glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary Heading: A great place to stay if you don't have a car
Summary: I picked this hotel based on price, brand, location and the fact that they have frequent shuttles to Disneyland.  Although they do not offer any local shuttle service (for shopping, etc) they do run a very smooth Disney shuttle operation. Shuttles every hour and return shuttles hourly for the later half of each day. Very friendly drivers and brand new vehicles. Seeing how many shuttle vans they have sitting idle however, I would recommend a shopping shuttle to the nearby Target (or somewhere similar) so that guests don't have to pay $10 each way for a taxi. Even a small charge for the shuttle would be fine. It would keep the drivers busy and put those idle trucks to good use.  The staff were all very helpful and courteous, with the front desk staff in particular having to field
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are glad you enjoyed our Disney shuttle, helpful staff, and comfortable rooms.  As far as parking and internet go, our pricing is similar to that of all full service hotels in the surrounding area.   We do have free internet in our Lobby as well.  Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you the next time you are in the area!

Summary: Though the DoubleTree brand is synonymous with the delicious cookie upon arrival, the team at this property goes the extra step to welcoming all guests. The hotel is clean, easy to navigate & the staff is extremely knowledgable & kind. I highly recommend this property for anyone whose future travel takes them to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and you found our staff to be knowledgable and kind! Please visit us again the next time you are in the area! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Drain Back up, Missing Luggage at Midnight
Summary: Its easy to kill someones's stay.  1.) Lose their luggage at Midnight when it should be in the room  2.) Have a smelly Drain Back up  3.) Only comp out $13.00 for my troubles  This was the 3rd time in 45 days I stayed at the hotel and previous visits were great. The reason for the frequent stay was the hotel offers a free shuttle to disneyland and the last 2 visits the customer service and rooms have been great. This time the literally sunk the ship with poor management.   Should have made more of a stink but I have 2 year old twins and midnight is not the time.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for your unfortunate experience during your stay at our hotel. Thank you for letting us know about the situation quickly. We have followed up with our security department to help us avoid this situation in the future. If we can help in any way, please let us know. Thank you.

Summary: Double Tree is nearest hotel to "Block" of Orange which has changed name to Outlets @ Orange - very dated - staff is extremely personable - has to be as hotel is dated and it shows - mattresses very uncomfortable etc; left call for wake up for 6 never received - bell hop for 7:15 never came
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at our hotel. We appreciate your candid review of our property. New perspectives about our hotel and our guestroom appearance help us make improvements to our guest experience on an ongoing basis. The issues you mentioned with the services you requested have been addressed with our team to ensure we are not missing the ball with these services. We apologize for any inconvenience. Please share any additional comments or suggestions with us any time

Summary: I have always stayed in Disney properties or in hotels down the street whenever staying over for a family visit thinking it would take too long to get to the parks if we were over a mile away. Wrong!!!  On a recent visit we booked a "newly remodeled property" across from the main gate and were sadly disappointed in all but the location.  All other nearby hotels were booked so we were "forced" to book a hotel an entire exit away!  The Doubletree has a warm welcoming staff, delicious cookies, spacious clean rooms, plenty of outlets for our many chargers, cooked to order complimentary breakfast, and free hourly shuttle service to/from the park entrance.  A 5 minute ride door to door!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We like it when our guests are pleasantly surprised.  We would love to have you back on your next Disney trip!

Summary: We like to stay here whenever we visit the area. Very close to The Block for shopping and dinner. Kids love to watch the stunts in the back of Van's. They have very nice beds, a great shuttle service to Disneyland, and of course yummy cookies!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are always happy to see guests enjoying our hotel.

Summary Heading: Another good choice for Chapman U parents
Summary: This property is an easy ten minute drive from the Chapman University dorms. The Chapman rate they offered me was $126 / night. Because I'm a Hilton Honors member, I was upgraded to a slightly better room when I checked in.   The rooms are clean and well-kept - slightly better than the Hilton Suites just a couple of blocks away. There is a mix of business and Disney travelers. I didn't eat in the restaurant, but did order once from Room Service, which was delivered promptly by a friendly staff member. Every staff member I encountered was very pleasant and helpful.  One note - the hotel is across the street from the UC Irvine hospital. There is occasional siren noise throughout the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to see you enjoyed your stay. Also, we are glad you found our staff members to be very pleasant and helpful.  We strive to keep our guests happy and comfortable.  Again, thank you for your review!

Summary: Great for Disneyland or otherwise, breakfast great and the shuttle to Disneyland was really good!  Room and service was excellent!! The cookie at arrival was great and the friendliness of the staff was very nice to experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel! We are so glad you had a Wonderful experience staying with us!  Please think of us again the next time you are in the area!  Thanks again!

Summary: Breakfast buffet, scrambled eggs a little cold. A special request for toast, I thought this a bit strangely done.   Excellent hotel, Doutbletree hotel by Hilton, Anaheim, CA. City Block.  Very nice complimentary ride to Disneyland with this hotel. I went there primarily to see that attraction.  Two blocks away, was a major shopping mall and a large AMC30 Orange theatre
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are always happy to see guests enjoy their stay.  We apologize for not having warmer eggs at your breakfast buffet- that is not typical of our restaurant.  Please think of us next time you are in the area!  Thanks again!

Summary: Nice hotel for sure but I paid for an upgrade and received the same room as I had stayed in before. Thought I would have a nicer view and got the helicopter pad of the hospital next door. Thought having the Disneyland Shuttle is awesome. Breakfast is nice but only free when you pay for a more expensive room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We are glad you enjoyed your room and shuttle. Please think of us the next time you are in the Orange area!

Summary: We stayed for a night and it was a very clean, professional hotel. Excellent quality rooms. Disappointing that they have to charge for wifi in the rooms. We just used the free wifi in the lobby. Cookies were a quaint touch. Charging for parking at about $15 was another price-gouging feature that I found annoying, (the carpark was largely empty). Walking distance (under 5 mins) to the outlet mall at the Block, Orange, and quite a few dining options within walking distance also. Handy location. Paid $110 for the room plus parking so okay value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad you found our hotel to be clean and the location convenient.  To address your concerns about wifi and parking charges, please know that our charges are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding area.  We do appreciate your feedback and hope that you stay with us the next time you are in the area!  Thanks again!

Summary: We stayed here for one night in mid April and decided to pay up a little for a suite. We liked the fact that it was a real suite with doors that close between the living room and bedroom. The staff was very friendly and responsive. The room was clean and basically decorated. I think a lot of people stay here as it is close to the convention center. It is a fairly long walk to Disneyland but there is a shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  We like to hear that our guests enjoy our rooms.  Thank you for staying with us! Please remember us next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Great rooms, Awful Service all around
Summary: First i must say this is a very nice hotel as far as rooms and the way it looks. Now as far as the service goes Ummmm Not So Much! I went to the restaurant if that's what you want to call it. I always look at the employees to gauge what the environment is going to be like, they are all very sad and depressed looking like they don't want to be there first of all. we waiting 5 minutes to be seat even though it was almost emoy, then we waited 20 minutes for cold hard bread, at that point we got up and left. We told the front desk about what happened, after a deer in the headlights look, she said to me, "Oh yeah i hear that all the time. You should eat off property". LoL thanks for the advice. So to sum it up. The rooms are very nice, but don't ecpect anything else from this
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We have noted your comments and will forward to the appropriate departments.

Summary: So I have stayed here before in a two room suite. I don't remember being able to hear the neighbors so much. This time, we were put near the elevators (loud kids running), including the staff elevator (clanking carts). It is a pretty place and it is close to Disneyland. The staff were great. I am sure if we asked to move, we might have gotten another room. But we might not have. We were there for an event. I never know why hotels don't do like the trains in England with a quiet area, a family area and an area for parties. At the very least, it would have been nice to be put with our group.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for being a returning guest.  We apologize for a noisy floor.  Please, next time, call our front desk and they will move you (assuming we are not sold out). Also, thank you for the compliments on our staff- we try to accommodate any way we can.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you're in the area!

Summary Heading: The Happiest Place on Earths, Best Friend
Summary: I expect Db tree to be a great hotel. It comes with the name.  However this Hotel went above and beyond.  The staff met our every need, with a smile. The shuttle drivers were helpful, friendly, informative, and even came and picked us up one day when no shuttle was scheduled for two more hours.   The Room are nice and kept very well. The beds are pillow top and quite comfy.  The only I have is The Elevators are very Noisy. Vibrating like a freight train. Make sure to get a room far from them or you will be up all night.   Happy hour in the bar from 5 to 7, $ 4, Beer and well drinks. hard to find that even at a regular bar. Much less a Hotel.   The onsite restaurant serves good food, although we found the prices pretty spendy. ten Bucks for fruit and oatmeal. There is a great
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so happy you found our hotel to be "above and beyond."  Making your stay great is what we strive to do!  Thanks again, and we hope to see you next time you're in the area!

Summary: We just got back from our Disneyland trip (5/5/2013). We parked out car in the parking lot that we paid $13 a day for. First night our car was broken into multiple items were stolen & our door lock is broken. Minimum $300 to fix lock now. Made police report & they still haven't found burglars so they're on the loose! The hotel says they're not responsible for it but at least could have better lighting, cameras, security etc.?? Next our room as soon as we walk in the curtains are stained with some sort of chocolate stains:( Beds were HARD as a rock had to sleep on floor one day because my back was killing me on the bed. Kind of outdated popcorn ceilings, stains, mold in tub, needs to be painted, ceiling stains of the few I remember.  Pros: close to freeway, free cookies.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize for your unfortunate experience during your stay at our hotel. Thank you for letting us know about the situation quickly. We have followed up with our security department to help us avoid this situation in the future. If we can help in any way, please let us know. Thank you.

Summary: We left some things in the hotel and the hotel is sending them to us at no charge, what great service.  We have never stayed at the Doubletree before it has always been the Hilton or the Hampton and we will definitely be staying at the Doubletree from now on.  In fact after staying at the Doubletree we were scheduled to go back to the Hampton in San Diego where we would catch our flights. I tried to change the reservation to the Doubletree and was told the particular Hampton we were staying at needed a 24 hour cancellation notice.  I defintely wanted the Doubletree experience again.    Thanks to all of the staff for the excellent service my family was given during our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Stayed here for two nighs in late April.  Room was on 20th floor.  Standard size and nicely decorated.  Ate breakfast each morning at the restaurant on site.  Breakfast buffet was average but included cook to order omelettes with standard fare (fresh fruit, pastries, cereals, breads, yogurt, juices, etc,l.  Service was quick.    Free shuttle to/from Disneyland about 10 minutes away.  Shuttle left and picked up right on time.    Parking extra nightly fee.  Lodgenet iPhone app ready tv service, but the app TV guide was inaccurate.   Valet personnel very friendly and helpful.  Pool area was nice, but not large.  Access to pool was a little odd. Access is through conference area on 2nd floor, then down an exterior flight of stairs.  The day I used it, there was no one else around,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear you had a nice stay!  Please think of us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Five star quality at four star price
Summary: In our first visit to California, we had the honor of staying at the Doubletree Anaheim. From the valet guys parking your car to the person who cleans your room, we felt like royalty. We stayed on the 17th floor and had the best view of the city. The area is near to malls, movie theaters, restaurants and Disney. We were within close range of los Angeles, long beach, Santa Monica, Venice beach, marina del Rey. We enjoyed the cuisine and beauty of california. The weather was perfect. Similar to Aruba. We will bring the kids next time and stay at the double tree again!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and kind words!  We are also honored to have you as our guest!  Looking forward to having you and your family stay for your next California trip! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney with Great Shuttle Bus.
Summary: Stayed here to be near Disney. We received an upgrade room on the high levels. Nice spacious room but a bit outdated. Great Bell Boys. Very helpful and chatty. Drivers on the Shuttle Bus were fantastic. Kept us amused with jokes , tricks etc. Breakfast was adequate but basic. Hot choices were not included which was unusual for a Doubletree. Visited the open air outlet mall near the hotel which had a great selection of shops and movie theaters.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We are happy that you enjoyed your stay! Please think of us again, the next time you are visiting Orange!

Summary: No fridge, no microwave, tiny bottles of shampoo and outrageous charges for stufff in the room (water, snacks, etc.)  In room coffee also terrible, and incredibly low water flow in the shower.  Very clean.  People almost tried too hard to be helpful, like used car salespeople.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and will take your comments into consideration when making future improvments.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, Outdoor Mall. That's It.
Summary: This property is ideally located if you are planning a trip to Disneyland. I like the fact that it's away from the location of "hotel row" which is located just outside the main gate of the park. That's a definite plus. It's also located adjacent to an outdoor mall with shops and restaurants.   But otherwise, the property is nothing more than your run of the mil Doubletree property. The rooms are a bit antiquated, although they've upgraded the lobby and the restaurant in recent years. Please understand my stay was fine, just nothing special. I did like the fact that my room had a large flat panel, HDTV. The room itself was clean and efficient with a nice sized desk for working.  consider this property if you are planning a vaction to Disneyland, or if you are in town for a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: This hotel needs a facelift. Rooms on floor 16 and below are dated, furniture is scratched, and carpet feels dirty. The price compared to the Hyatt, crowne plaza, sheraton, etc is way too high. The property has lower end rooms, poor customer service, and you can tell staff don't care about the guests. I would pay more to stay at the Hyatt or Sheraton any day. Always have great experinces there. Unless everywhere I'd sold out nod you HAVE to stay here, I would not stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback of your stay at our hotel. We are very sorry that we did not meet expectations and we’re actively working with our housekeeping team to focus on cleanliness and comfort throughout our property. We have noted the condition of your guest room was substandard. We’ll keep your concerns in mind as we evaluate refresh options at our property. Thank you again, and we hope you’ll stay with us the next time your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: good for disney trip, free shuttle!
Summary: Booked this with priceline for a last minute trip to Disney from our area in San Diego.   I had stayed here a number of years ago with my kids and it has since then been significantly remodelled. The lobby now has a starbucks - yeah!...  BEST: you can leave your car here while you visit disney for the whole day. Self parking is $13 but that is better than Disney and there is a free shuttle which now a days is rare. Most hotels near disney use the anaheim transit which is slow and crowded. NOTE the last shuttle of the day is REALLY busy!!  very good sized room and bathroom. As is in the city of orange the taxes are much less than Anaheim. I think 8% vs 18?  across from a shopping center with pretty much everything you could want food and entertainment wise. We didnt have time to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and liked our Disney shuttle.  We hope you stay with us again in the future! Thanks again!

Summary: Staff is very friendly.  Everyone always said hello! Slept great.  Very comfortable! Would go back and stay at this hotel again.  In fact we are thinking of planning a summer trip. Had a great time staying there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We cant wait to see you again this summer!

Summary Heading: Average Stay with a few hiccups
Summary: Plenty of good things about this hotel including great rates, big clean rooms, great pillows and delicious cookies. But there were plenty of negatives that we experienced personally as well.   We arrived quite late so were happy to have a smooth check-in with of course, delicious cookies for all. The shuttle, although always on-time, was a bit of a pain. It was often full, especially if it was first or last shuttle of the day, and a few of the drivers were a bit iffy. Often we had to stand or squeeze 4 people to 2 seats. We found it very frustrating that the first shuttle left only 30 minutes before park opening as we had an early morning entry to Disney one day and an early breakfast reservation another. We ended up having to spring for a cab a few times. We also were woken up
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We would like to apologize for the hiccups you encountered while staying here.  We do not usually have smoke detector problems, and we very rarely have to turn the water off- we are sorry about this.  We are happy that you did like the value, size, and cleanliness of our rooms, and we will pass your comments along to help fix these issues.  Again, thank you for your review.

Summary: TOO OVERPRICED; not just rooms, but everything else as well. (i.e. - $3.00 for a bottle of soda?! Over $30.00 for an AVERAGE dinner?! ALSO, unless you're familiar with the area & location or just driving east on Chapman Avenue it'e somewhat difficult to find the entrance. There should be better signage for tourists. Also, I was not provided any information about any shuttle services.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are sorry for any inconvenience that you experinced while staying with us.  We have noted your comments and will share with the appropriate departments.

Summary Heading: Comfortable Hotel with Pros and Cons
Summary: My son and I stayed here recently while visiting Chapman University.  Pros - Great location for Chapman University and close to mall (with restaurants) and StarBucks.  Comfortable and clean rooms.  Cons - Elevators were very slow (i.e. always waiting for them).  Treadmill in exercise room was run-down.  Not only did they charge for parking but for wifi as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad you found our rooms comfortable and clean.  We are sorry that your found our elevators to be slow, and our treadmill not up to standard.  We are always thankful for feedback that helps us grow and improve.  As far as parking and wifi go, our charges are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding district.  Again, thank you for your review.

Summary: We stay in many hotels and this one has them all beat. Very professional staff, extremely clean room, excellent location for Disney vacation with excellent shuttle service, walking distance to lots of restaurants and shopping. Definately a family place to stay. This is our second time in this location and will definately be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, and thank you for staying with us again! We look forward to seeing you next time!

Summary Heading: Comfortable and clean stay while visiting Disneyland
Summary: We chose this location b/c we were taking the kids to Disneyland.  It was quick 10-15 minute trip between the two. We checked in for our 2 night stay, and got our warm cookie.  We received an upgrade to a king suit, which was nice and spacious. Kids had plenty of play space.  The room had a microwave and a fridge, which is always nice when you travel with kids and all the snacks and drinks that come along with them.  There was a large shopping/restaurant area, within walking distance of the hotel, where we went for supper.  We were a little surprised at bedtime, when we discovered the couch did not pull out into a bed!  So we pushed the two chairs together and made a short little bed for our 6 year old, and madeup the couch for our daughter.  they thought it was just the
Manager Response: Thank You so much for your review of our hotel! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay! Please visit us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Comfortable Stay after a long day at Disney
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights while we visited Disneyland (my sisters, mom and I) and enjoyed our stay. BUT we did not know that the "Doubletree Anaheim" is not technically in Anaheim - it is in Orange. We had paid the shuttle (Zippy Shuttle) who was great but took us to the Double Tree actually in Anaheim and a walk away from Disney.  At first we were disappointed that we were not at this hotel as it looked very nice but were also pleased when we arrived at the Doubletree Anaheim IN ORANGE. We got our yummy cookies upon arrival and made our way to our room which was comfortable although the room was a bit cramped with a small size. We were out and about the whole time mostly so we did not mind.   The shuttle leaves every hour from the hotel and picks up every hour at a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear you found our Disney shuttle service convenient and our hotel comfortable! Looking forward to having you back the next time you are in Orange!

Summary: At check in no problems and got my cookie, king size room, came with mini fridge.  Free shuttle which helps a lot.  The shuttle runs every hour.  good quality hotel for a good price.  5 mins. away from Disney but close to best buy, outlet, target, Walmart, cvs and restaurants.  Would stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank You for your review of our hotel!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and look forward to seeing you next time you're in the Anaheim/Orange County area!

Summary: This is a perfectly fine Doubletree, especially if you want to stay a few minutes away from the madness near Disneyland. The hotel is located just down the freeway and features a friendly staff, clean rooms and delicious chococolate chip cookies. It's also right next to a huge shopping complex that has plenty of great dining options.   The WiFi here is good, but you'll pay $11.95/day to access it in your room (it's free in the lobby area), which is pretty annoying. You'll also pay $13/day for self-parking, which was surprising since you'd pay about that if you were staying on Harbor near Disneyland. You'd think parking would be free since you're not on Harbor, but you'd be wrong. Anyway, there's a small lot to park in directly in front of the hotel, but it seemed like it was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  To address your concerns about add on charges: our internet and parking charges are typical of all the branded, full service hotels in the surrounding area.  We appreicate you feedback and hope you stay with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Great location for Disneyland, large comfy rooms
Summary: We stayed at this DoubleTree hotel earlier this month and really enjoyed our stay.   Although I would say that the hotel is rather corporate (if that sort of thing bothers you), the rooms are luxurious and very well priced (especially with the free Disney shuttlebus service). I particularly liked the ensuite; ours had a shower/bath and was well stocked with rabTree and Everyln shampoos and bodywashes. Contrary to some of the other reviews, I didn't encounter any dirt during our stay.    The buffet breakfast was a bit expensive but it had a very good selection of foods, including a full English, croissants, cereals, fruit,and juices. I think that there's a Denny's opposite the hotel if you want to be frugal.   Anyway, we would definitely stay here again and try other DoubleTree
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: Hotel was clean, the employees where very friendly and helpful. The shuttle service was great and the drivers where great.  It's about a 20 minute bus ride to the park, drop off is at main gate. They add extra shuttles depending on need.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We love to see happy guests! Please think of us for your next Disney trip!

Summary: We paid in advance for 2 nights stay, but when we arrived we were told they overbooked. We were given a tiny room with no actual bed, just a pull out sofa for 2 adults and 3 children. The only compensation they would offer for us having to sleep on the dirty carpet on the floor was free parking. When I went down to get some blankets and pillows they were telling a group of girls that had also prepaid to call Expedia and tell them to find them something else, they refused to help the girls in any way. They did move us to another room with beds the second night, but it was still small and the carpet was dirty. Then in the morning there was a bill in the door for the parking! Also per my hubby the worst of it all is that we were never given the Doubletree cookies.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your review of your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize for the accommodations you experienced. This is not typical of our hotel and a team member will be reaching out to you to further resolve this with you. Thank you again.

Summary Heading: 10 min from Dland & 3 min from shopping/restaurants.
Summary: The beds and pillows where great. The breakfast was also great and what I really liked was how close it was to Disneyland. By the end of the night we just walked  2 min over to TGIG restaurant to have drinks. The mall has great shops and even a vans indoor skate park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: After a conference at Cal-Poly my family relocated here to the Doubletree to take our daughter to Disneyland. The hotel staff and accommodations were very pleasant and clean. I can't rave enough about the free shuttle to Disney as they run on the hour and were helpful and convenient. I had two very minor issues:1. We requested a small fridge for our room since we were traveling with a small child but never received it and 2. The staff could not provide me with a detailed bill for our room service charge.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are so glad you liked the Disney shuttle service.  About your 2 minor issues:  We are sorry to hear that you did not recieve a room with a fridge. Unfortunately we have limited rooms with refrigerators in them, and if those rooms were already occupied, then there would be a waiting list.  Also, we are sorry for the inconvenience of not providing you with a detailed bill for the room service.  That is not our standard.  We are glad you had a pleasant stay overall.

Summary: What a little gem of place this is. We arrived early and bags were taken care of and we walked to the Outlets at Orange which are only 5 mins away. The room consisted of a double double which was clean and provided complimentary Wolfgang Puck brewed coffee. Although we didn't get the cookies on arrival it was no biggee. The shuttle service to Disneyland operates hourly and they have 2 large buses to cope with crowd. We had a brilliant driver (Rey) one evening who entertained the kids and adults alike with corny jokes and card tricks. We also had a bag go missing, which we notified to the bell desk and security. They were efficient, courteous and wanted to 'make it right'. As it turned out we had left it at a restaurant on the first day (retrieved), although the hotel had already
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We are dedicated to excellent service and we are so happy you ended up finding your bag!  Please stay with us again the next time you are in the area!  Thanks again!

Summary: After all these years, this was my first stay at the Doubletree.  Wasnt expecting too much, but was actually pleasantly surprised.  Check in was easy and the cookies they gave were delicious.  Staff was very nice and attentive.  Close to Disneyland, but not too close.  Within 5-10 minute drive from tons of shopping and dining.  Pool, gym, etc. was in excellent condition.  Rooms-small, but functional.  Wish they had two queens for a standard room rather than 2 double beds.  Very well kept and clean although you can see it is a little older by the chair and the nicks on the door.  Ample space for our family of 3.  Bathroom-small, but very clean which I appreciated.  Newly upgraded sinks, tubs and toilets.  Housekeeping staff did a wonderful job.    Overall it was a good stay.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are very happy to see that you were pleased with your stay.  We appreciate your recommendation!  Have a great day!

Summary: Being an employee of another Hilton property, I really enjoyed staying at another Hilton property. Loved that they drove to Disneyland for drop off and pick up. Helped us out a lot during our stay. One reason why we picked this hotel. The van drivers were also so friendly and helpful. Also liked that it was close to the outlet mall for some shopping and eating out. Close enough to even walk. Good choice I think for our Disneyland trip this year.
