Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  I'm glad you found our drivers friendly and helpful!  Hope you see you again, the next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Nice stay. Great shuttle service to Disney land!
Summary: Hotel a little tired but service good and beds were comfortable. Across the street from hospital, so heard ambulances a lot.  No controls for heat in room and the floor seemed dirty.  Check in process and check out process fast and friendly! Coffee good in room and Starbucks conveniently located in hotel and across the street along with Wendy's   Location was good by a shopping mall.  Everyone very friendly!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We hope you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: The hotel is quite close to the Disney theme parks (be aware that there are 2 Doubletrees in the Anaheim area, the other one is closer to Disneyland). The room was quite comfortable and had a coffe maker, a microwave oven and a mini fridge. The staff was very, very helpful. Our flight was delayed for twelve hours and we were very anxious about having our reservation dropped but, when we got there, they already had checked us in to guarantee our room. I can't really say if this is standard procedure but we were very happy. I also had some packages delivered to the wrong Doubletree and the staff located me at the right direction and forwarded me the packages. So, yes, the staff was very helpful here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We are glad that you are happy with your stay!

Summary: Wonderful hotel! We usually like to stay closer to Disneyland but decided to try this place. The Anaheim Resort Shuttle buses are a pain, too many stops at every resort.... The Doubletree has its own shuttle. Totally awesome! Straight there, straight back. No extra stops. It was quicker than staying closer to the park. Very nice hotel, big rooms, fridge, microwave, coffee maker. Starbucks and a nice restaurant and bar right in the lobby. Only downside was no late night food choices. We had to order from a pizza delivery place. But that was fine, I will definitely be coming back here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: very good, nice and helpful staff !! I like it very much, I enjoy my privacy and I spend really nice time!!  The staff was very kindly and helpful .....yes I can come back there for sure... ...is well located and I like to say thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We would like to thank you as well, for staying with us!  We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Did not receive the infamous cookies on arrival...couldn't purchase Disney tickets at the desk because the manager couldn't find the keys to the safe, had a leaky shower that flooded the foyer carpet, wait staff at the bar/restaurant  was not friendly...no wonder we were the only customers!!  The free shuttle to Disney changes times of drop off, depending on the the park hours...beware. Other than that, the beds were comfortable, the rooms were clean and updated, and the bellman were very friendly and helpful.  I enjoy Doubletree/Hilton hotels, just very disappointed with this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. Hearing from our guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We’re sorry that the comfort of your stay was interrupted and we've shared your comments with our team so we can do a better job of providing exceptional service from the moment every guest arrives. We understand how important a trip to Disney is and we regret any inconveniences you experienced with us during your trip to the park. The next time you travel to the area, we hope that you’ll be our guest again.

Summary Heading: Nice upgraded room and Excellent customer service given by Laura.
Summary: We just returned from our stay at Doubletree Orange I like the upgraded rooms and the attentive service we received by Laura (night manager) upon check-in we were greeted with Doubletree's famous chocolate chip cookies which are Delicious and also we had requested an upgrade to one of the upgraded rooms (we are HiltonHonors Silver members) which is tastfully decorated not like the pics furnished which show dated furnishings. We especially like the shuttle service to Disneyland. I would highly recommend this hotel. And definitely ask for an upgrade you wont be disappointed.
Manager Response: Hello and Thank You for your review of our hotel! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and your upgraded room!  All of us at the DoubleTree look forward to having you back in the future!

Summary: Standard Marriott/ Hilton style hotel. Excellent valet and greeting upon arrival but once inside you would think you are under different management . Check in staff fumbled finding my reservation but then said room was not ready. Left my cell and said to call me. I went to local office and not until shift change did finally a new person called my cell to inquire if any one had called me as my room had been ready for hours.  Went  to retrieve key and found no one offers the famous cookies anymore and you now have to remind them.  Went to find bellman for my stored luggage no one to be found. Manager finally had to come herself to retrieve my bags. However, Room was clean and as expected. Later that night I found  Room service is overwhelmed and did not answer phone until my
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Reading your experiences helps us improve.  We are sorry for the inconveniences that you had during your stay, and we will pass this review along to our staff.  We hope you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We arrived late Saturday night, and we were completely exhausted.  The staff was very nice, got us checked in quickly.  The room was one of the newly renovated sections, and I was very pleased.  Bed and pillows were comfy,  I got the staycation package, which included daily hot breakfast, self parking, and 1 movie.  The breakfast buffet had a good selection.  We took the shuttle to Disney and the times were every hour on the hour, going and returning.  Overall, it was a very pleasant stay.  I would stay there again definitely.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you had a very pleasant stay!

Summary: Lots of little problems that all add up to a terrible stay; workman in the room when arriving at hotel room, laundry dropped off but not sent out so had to live with dirty clothes, breakfast cafe couldn't cope with the number of guests, and getting out of parking was unusually slow. Lots of Hilton staff walking around smiling but no one was really looking after guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our hotel. We’re sorry you encountered housekeeping problems. Dirty rooms are not typical at our hotel, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention. We have discussed this with our staff and will make every effort to be sure our rooms meet the highest housekeeping standards. We are glad we were able to help you with this but regret you had to experience it at all. We hope you'll give us a second chance if you visit our area in the future.

Summary Heading: Close but not TOO close to Disneyland
Summary: This is a great location to stay for a vacation.  20+ shuttle times, all day long to Disney.  Being too close to Disneyland is stressful and food is twice as much.  Great pool, Fitness Center, outdoor mall to walk around just across the parking lot with varied restaurants.  They hand out homemade cookies when you check in, but you'll need to bring a bottle of water unless you head to the $3 vending machine.  Starbucks is right across the street, but they also have a lounge and breakfast cafe.  One of my favorite things was how quiet it was.  A nice switch from some others I've stayed at lately.  We actually live closeby, but had a water pipe burst in our house and had to move in here for the weekend.  While you're there you should go to Alcatraz (a restaurant at the mall) for
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary Heading: The level of service at this hotel has gone down dramatically. There were issues with parking, check-in/out, security...
Summary: Parking - One night the self-serve parking lot was full because they had given access to an evening event's guest list so I had to valet park and was charged $16. Charge was later adjusted but your guests shouldn't take a back seat to a one-time event. Check-in/out: When I checked-in, there was one staff person behind the counter and she was swamped. She commented that she didn't know where her other staff were. When I checked out (4:30 a.m.) there wasn't a staff person to be found. The floors were being cleaned, power washing outside but no person at the desk or valet/guest services to check me out. Finally found someone but by that time I was running late and didn't get to ask to have a meal for $42 billed separately (I wanted to pay for it rather than having it charged to my
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. Hearing from our guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We’re sorry that the comfort of your stay was interrupted and we've shared your comments with our team so we can do a better job of providing unparalleled service for all guests. The next time you travel to the area, we hope that you’ll be our guest again

Summary Heading: Great Location - Optional Upgrade Offer Definitely Worth It!
Summary: Excellent location for either the Convention Center or Disneyland, excellent service and I loved the cookies at check in. Also, when we checked in based on my Hilton Honors GOLD card received free vouchers for breakfast buffet which was great! At the time I made the reservation, I opted to pay a slightly higher fee if upgraded to a Suite - Best Deal I ever made as room was fabulous (see included pictures). The Suite was a huge, nice room with a stupendous master bath. The hotel is conveniently located next to the City Outlet Mall - many restaurants to choose from - all within walking distance. They also offer an excellent shuttle service to Disneyland (just be aware that sometimes it is full and you might have to wait for the next trip, but it was super convenient and FREE) -
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experiences! We appreciate your review and pictures.  Hopefully we will see you again in the future!

Summary: I stayed here this past weekend for the LA Religious Education Congress at the Anaheim Convention Center. The rooms were very nice, rate was good (our parish was paying was we had to get the best price we could), location was a little out of our way but they have a free shuttle to Disneyland which is in the next block from the Convention Center. Cost of a cab to the Center was only $10 plus a tip. And the best part of our stay was the staff...excellent help. We worked with a woman name Peti at the front desk that was great. Made sure our rooms were all together (we had 7 rooms for our group), helped me pre-check everyone in so they could come back later and get their room keys, and gave us enough of those wonderful warm cookies for all our bag lunches! I must admit, we have
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and comments!   "I must admit, we have stayed here several times now and every time its great!"  We like to hear from happy guests!  Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a good location
Summary: This hotel is across from UC Irvine medical center. About 10 minutes to Disneyland. Parking is $15. Checkin is quick and efficient. Rooms are clean and well appointed. A good option if you are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, Bill.

Summary: Stayed here in December 2012 for our visit to Disneyland.   Excellent location, excellent shuttle service (but sometimes it was full and we had to wait, but it was super convenient and FREE), excellent service and I loved the cookies  Booked on a third-party site but when I checked it gave them my Hilton Honors GOLD card and got all the privileges. Upgrade breakfast which was great!  Nice room, nice and big. Convenient location next to the City Outlet Mall - many restaurants to choose from - all walking distance.  When we left, I forgot my braces in the restroom. Called the security and he sent it to me to my next destination in Seattle. I received it the next day - great service!  A superb experience. Would recommend this hotel to everyone who's going to Disneyland. Don't waste
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so glad you had a great experice at our hotel. We look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: The room was dirty, the carpet looked like it wasn't vacuumed because there was hair and crumbs on the floor. I'm pretty sure no one used this room or their housekeepers don't know how to clean because the tv and coffee machine were both dusty. There was sticky stuff on the desk and the night stand. I can't fail to mention that the bath tub water WOULD NOT drain. Worst of it all, I had called downstairs and asked them to be moved to a different room, preferably one of the newly renovated ones and they told me it would cost an extra $50 a night. I was not happy but figured it could be a lot worse so I stuck it out and figured, well, we will be in Disneyland all day. Anyways, when we got back home to San Francisco I complained to the Hilton and they apologized and sent us a refund
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our hotel. We’re sorry you encountered housekeeping problems. Dirty rooms are not typical at our hotel, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention. We have discussed this with our staff and will make every effort to be sure our rooms meet the highest housekeeping standards. We are glad we were able to help you with this but regret you had to experience it at all. We hope you'll give us a second chance if you visit our area in the future.

Summary: GOODS clean room close drive to disneyland  BADS  no shuttle bus to take guests from hotel to Disneyland (this would have been nice for families) small bathroom  lobby can do with a makeover as it felt quite dull
Manager Response: Thank you for the review Tracey. I believe there is some accidental mix up with us and the Hilton-Anaheim in your review.  Either way, we hope you enjoyed your time at Disneyland, and please consider the DoubleTree in Orange, CA next time you are in the area.

Summary: I stayed here 2 nights with my son on a recent trip to Disneyland.  It's a bit farther from the park, but there is a complimentary shuttle and if you're driving to the park yourself, it's easy to drive to the theme park.  We've stayed at several hotels in this general area and this property has the benefits of other amenities close by including the outlet mall with lots of dining options (and a skate part to entertain the kids).  It's also a better value than some of the close hotels.  We had a room on one of the upper floors with a nice "view" of the area.  The room was spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are glad you found our property to be a good value.  Please visit us again when you are in the area!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here last weekend to be near the Honda Center for a Anaheim Ducks game. EVERY employee we encountered was exceptionally nice and helpfull. Love the very neat & professional attire as well. Would stay here again definatly!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind words!

Summary: I rarely review chain hotels, because they are basically all the same.  That said, this hotel deserves a special mention because they were actually much better than many of their corporate cousins.  Very friendly staff.  Good housekeeping:  The maid broke my phone charger & left a nice letter & a replacement.  Thank you.  Our group will be back!  Our only complaint:  The breakfast buffet could use a pick-me-up . . . and our one attempt at ordering breakfast a-la-carte was a colossal failure . . .
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We will extend your suggestions to our Trofi restaurant staff. Again, thank you for reviewing the DoubleTree!

Summary: My company booked a room here for a very important client.  It was an awful experience from the standpoint of customer service.  All these people want is your money.  Don't believe for a moment the Doubletree brand and image comes before their greed.  Bottom line is, they just don't care about your experience in the event things are unsatisfactory.  I received a phone call, while sitting with my client at 8:30pm in a restaurant, after he checked in to the hotel around 5pm.  The clerk told me the company credit card we had previously give to them was declined.  They waited over 3 hours to call, instead of handling it at the time of check in.  I offered an alternative card by phone, but that was not acceptable.  They wanted me to fax my ID.  Not easy from a table in a restaurant
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim-Orange County
Summary: This hotel is a frequent business stop while working in Orange County.  Close to freeways, office parks, and restaurants there is plenty of parking or taxi service to meet your needs.  The lobby bar serves food late, 24 hour room service is great when flights make for late arrivals and the restaurant has a nice selection on their menu.  Club is basic; a nice get away from the busy lobby for a business discussion, drink or down time.  Consistently clean with helpful, happy staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy you found the hotel to be clean with helpful and happy staff. Please think of us again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights for a short trip to Anaheim. The check-in was smooth and welcoming with the free warm cookie for each guest, which is always nice! Bell services were very helpful, although a tiny bit pushy as we checked out, kind of grabbing one of our suitcases from my husband!   The room was fairly large, well maintained and clean. The bed was comfy and the bedding was good. The aircon was good, quiet and efficient.  The only thing I didn't like was that the bathroom was oddly short of surface area for putting toothbrushes and stuff. We were in a wheelchair accessible room (I am on crutches and was grateful to the check in staff for this allocation) and clearly adaptations had been made for this.   The sink had no space either side of the taps, and the one shelf
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. We hope your choose us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Best hotel near Disneyland and Anaheim
Summary: Ok, I am writing about this hotel again because everytime I stay here ( which has been several years now) I love it.  It may not be a 5 star hotel, but I feel great when I am here.  Let me tell you why!  The service and staff are great!  ( I have to say thanks to Laura Ramos! You are awesome! )The rooms are not huge but comfortable and I sleep great there.  And they have been remodeling so that's nice. The breakfast is great.  If you are a hilton gold or diamond member, continental is free and you may upgrade to full breakfast for $7.00. You get a free shuttle to Disneyland, which is not available at alot of hotels near there. Alot of them you have to wait for the city bus which stops along the way to pick up people  at other hotels. It has a great gift shop, a Starbucks and a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel!

Summary: We stayed for two nights last week. I used my Hilton points for a last-minute Disneyland trip. The lobby was nice and modern, we were checked-in quickly and the room wa clean and modern. I am a Gold member, so we got free continental breakfast in the restaurant. The first day we upgraded ($6) to the full breakfast buffet which included made to order omlettes. Very good. The second day we just got the free breakfast--assorted yogurts, pastries, steel cut oats, fresh fruit, hard boiled eggs, toast.   Two things would have made the stay better. The first would be better shuttle times. We would have liked to take the shuttle to save on Disney parking, but the last shuttle ended before either of the nighttime shows at the parks even started. The second would be better mattresses. I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are glad you enjoyed your breakfast and stay.  Regarding the shuttle times- we usually have the last shuttle coming back from Disney, after the final show, at  midnight, arriving back to the hotel at 12:15am (unless the park closes earlier).  We are sorry that the shuttle service was not available that evening at the usual time.  We are sorry that you did not find our mattresses up to standard.  We hope you visit us next time you are in the Anaheim-Orange County area.  Again, thank you for your review!

Summary: This hotel certainly is not luxury, but it is clean and the service staff are friendly. The location is great for Disneyland.  Breakfast restaurant is very good.  Overall a pleasant stay.  I would return and recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad you had a pleasant stay and look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary Heading: Great Location with everything you would need for a business meeting
Summary: I stayed and hosted an event of 70 at this location. It is centrally located and you have access easy to the I-5, HWY-22, and Hwy-57! Staff and property is professional and first class. THe rooms were comfortable and clean as I have stayed here multiple times and will continue to do so.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are glad that you find our rooms to be comfortable and clean, and thank you for your loyalty to our property!

Summary: For leisure close to disneyland (free shuttle), 10 mins walk to the Orange outlet mall. Also walking distance to UCI medical center which I need to work there. The hotel service is good but the decoration is a bit outdated. Overall an average hotel.  Breakfast is average but not free, also there is Starbucks in the lobby area however, personally I think the staff there dont know how to make speciality coffee, they taste totally different than when I get them at the other Starbucks. I ordered a mocha and I have to threw it away after a few sip. :(
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad that you found our location to be easy access.  We are sorry that your mocha was not up to standard.  We will take your review into consideration and communicate this with our team.  Please visit us again when you are in the Anaheim-Orange County area.

Summary: We stayed here for one night on our way further south. The staff were great and very friendly on arrival. The hotel was beautiful as you walked in and my children loved that they were given a warm cookie on arrival. We had great views from the hotel and the room was clean and seemed to have updated furniture. Although we weren't going to Disneyland, they let us know that they offered a shuttle to and from the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We love that your family had a good experience at our hotel!

Summary Heading: Warning: Do not stay here -- Terrible Customer Service, Erwin, the manager, made my sister Cry before her Wedding night.
Summary: My sister's father in law booked 5 rooms here so we could have make up done in the morning.  We requested for robes in the morning and they said there were some but the limit is 2. Then my sister said we have 5 rooms and we needed 8 robes. After that, the lady said they had nothing at all.   We then were transferred to the manager rudely. His name was Erwin. Erwin spoke right away to my sister without hearing her story. My sister then told him he was being rude without listening to her. He was on speaker the whole time. This manager... at the so called double tree hotel, was telling her that she was demanding. She told him to put himself in her position... and then he said ... "I can't really do that". He is very rude. I was embarrassed for the hotel.  I tried to call the main
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for close proximity to Disneyland and weren't disappointed.  We were a comfortable walking distance form the Disney parks, and the restaurants between offered good choice.  The staff were helpful, the suites spacious and well equipped, and heated pool with spa a great way to end a day.  Thanks to Gary the concierge for his help with directions, cars, maps, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: I was a little worried about my week at the Doubletree after reading some of these reviews. But I almost feel like a stayed at a different hotel than some of these reviewers. I had a great, comfortable, and clean, stay on a tight budget. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling on a budget as it is very nice for the price you pay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel!  We are so happy you had a great experience.  Please think of us again next time you are in this area.

Summary: So I just threw in a price for a 3-star hotel in Anaheim before taking the family to Disneyland for New Years. Surprisingly, the Doubletree, a 3-1/2 star accepted to low price. We had multiple rooms reserved on the reservation so I called to ask if they could be connected or at least near each other. I was told "no problem". We were delayed by snow getting to Anaheim, so I called the hotel again to let them know we would be in late but were surely going to be there. Since our rooms were paid in advance, could they hold our rooms and not give them away.  "no problem". Upon checking in, we were given rooms many floors apart along with much attitude from the front desk.  The rooms were ADA...no tub, just shower on the floor. Funny thing was, the bathroom door would not stay open,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments

Summary: I think the hotel as a whole is fine but the issues we did have were irritating. First you have the parking issue which was totally undisclosed. The parking for the hotel is not free, it costs $13-16 per day! I am sure that is why they offer free shuttle service to Disneyland. I would have appreciated the shuttle times to be every 30 minutes, not every hour as it is now. That really irriated us having to pay for parking our ehicle at a 3 1/2 star hotel.  The front desk was helpful but the webiste states that a late check out is available. They gave us an extra hour, big deal. We really needed our late check out.  Then the beds- to me they were very comofrtable with top rated bedding but the beds were certainly not "doubles" but larger twin beds. There were only 28 working
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We have noted your comments and will pass them on to the appropriate departments.

Summary: One of the best hotel I have been to. Free palm size delicious freshly baked cookies at the front desk. Friendly service and staff, even the guests there are friendly and nice to one another. Probably because everyone is going to Disneyland. The shuttle bus driver was extremely nice, greeted everyone and waited for guests going to Disneyland. There is even a Best Buy shop within walking distance at the address below. Orange CA (Store 947) 3741 W Chapman Ave Orange, CA 92868
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Horrible service and a shuttle that leaves people behind.
Summary: I have had the worst possible experience while staying at the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim Orange County. I don't even know where to begin. I'll start at the beginning. When we checked in, we were told our rooms were still not ready even though it was 5pm and check-in starts at 3pm. They said it would be a few minutes, and a few minutes eventually turned into 2 hours! 2 hours of waiting in the lobby with a bunch of tired and cranky adults and kids, and the staff not offering any solution or explanation of why our rooms were not ready. Eventually, we were moved to different rooms, and I do not know why that could not have been done from the very beginning. If that wasn't bad enough, the next day was worse. The shuttles to Disneyland were not on time, and did not pick up all the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. Hearing from our guests helps us provide the best experience possible. We’re sorry that the comfort of your stay was interrupted and we’ve shared your comments with our team so we can do a better job of our check-in process. The next time you travel to the area, we hope that you’ll be our guest again.

Summary Heading: Annual Family Christmas Trip to Disneyland
Summary: We have a family tradition of starting off the holidays by visiting Disneyland. We have stayed at the Disney Hotels in the past, but as our family grew to 7 grandchildren and 5 adults we needed to find another location. We found it, last year! Double Tree is wonderful, with hourly shuttle service to Disneyland, warm cookies to greet us with, and an exceptional staff. Their is an excellent restaurant, gift shop, and convenient partking. This year's visit was as great at last years. We even have a new tradition, of taking the grandkids picture, in front of their gorgeous Christmas tree. The kiddos have grown, since last year. We will be returning next year!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here many, many times over the past 4+ years. And the newly refreshed rooms and the "executive floor" option with continental breakfast are great new options.  I have added pictures of the new rooms, as I could not find any others.  The Hotel is always great, service, cleanliness, etc.  Great place to stay in Anaheim and it only a 5 minute drive to Disneyland.  And yes you can upgrade to the breakfast buffet for like $9, which is good and worth the extra charge. P.S. the best part, we checked in at midnight, and they still had cookies available!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My travel agent booked this hotel for our family vacation because of it good reviews.  Slight misunderstanding as we were told there was a kichenette in the room...no such luck. Their idea of a kichenette is a bar fridge and a microwave! We arrived later in the evening and  were dropped off at the curb of Harbour Boulevard,  With 4 tired kids, a stroller and 6 pieces of luggage it would have been nice to have some assistance from a bell boy or hotel staff to haul all of our belongings from the street in to the hotel. The hotel was clean and the staff friendly.  Shuttles were mainly on time.
Manager Response: First of all, thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. We always appreciate hearing from our guests - including when comments help identify ways we can improve. I was happy to read from your review that you had a good experience with our staff. Our main priority is for you to feel welcome and comfortable during your stay. I understand that there was some confusion when you booked your room. I realize that you were looking for a full kitchen and I am sorry that we fell short of your expectations. I am also sorry that no one was available to help you while you and your family arrived at our hotel. We have taken your comments into consideration and we are looking in ways to improve our guest experience. Again, I apologize if you went through any inconveniences during your stay and I do hope the next time you return to the area you consider staying with us again.

Summary: This is the second time my husband and I have stayed at this hotel.  Once again, our visit could not have been better.   Clean and beautiful!  Hotel staff very friendly and helpful.  And the cookie upon arrival is definitely a  nice touch!  Centrally located.  Highly recommend and when in the area, we will be staying at the Double Tree again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Doubletree means double beds, not double queens
Summary: This Hilton run Hotel is clean, beautiful, and clearly high-end, with exceptional service, and all you would expect from a Doubletree Hotel.  The cookie is a nice touch.  Pets are allowed here, too.  We were given this on Hotwire (not always a welcome guest in the eyes of some properties staff), but we felt like royalty in the wonderful way we were treated.  This review is geared for Disneyland guests: With all of the options, this is a good one, but not great.  It is a very short drive to the parks (walking is out of the question), and a free shuttle for guests.  This property was not put here with Disneyland families in mind, and the Disney-going family perks end right here. Parking is $13/day, and to be fair, many other hotels do this as well. As with bigger hotels, no free
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to Disneyland & Sporting events
Summary: The Doubletree Orange is a great alternative to the Disneyland Main Street hotels - close to The Block it provides all the conveniences  of shopping, dining and movie theatre close by. The staff is extremely friendly - especially Julio at the bell desk and Rafael in the lounge. They make traveling there on business feel like staying with friends. The shuttle will get you to Disneyland or Angels Stadium very easily.Rooms are very comfortable and clean. I will continue to stay there on my trips to Orange County.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good place to stay. Got a good price on Priceline. Shuttle is dependable and walking distance to nice mall outlets at orange. Doormen were very nice. Gave us three free breakfast vouchers. Only problem was last night when front desk called at 3am asking about a remote?
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Superior hotel with a great shuttle
Summary: I booked the Doubletree by Hilton Anaheim - Orange Country after searching through many hotels on expedia and only finding very expensive or non quality motel style hotels online.  The Doubletree looked like a quality and clean hotel with a very reasonable price.  I stayed here for 5 nights in October using it as a base for tour pickups for Universal Studios and shopping tours and also for a two day trip to Disneyland.  They have a free shuttle bus which runs on the hour to and from the resort to Disneyland which is extremely convenient for getting to Disneyland and downtown Disney.  The rooms are very clean, relatively spacious and use quality linens and bath towels.  The staff are very friendly at all hours (I checked in at midnight) and the welcome cookie was always going to
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Near Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: I needed a place to stay at the last minute and most of the Hilton hotels in the area were fully booked.  When I checked online, the Doubletree by Hilton offered reasonable rates on a standard room,  with an upgrade to a premium room with free parking and free high speed internet.  I enjoyed the room so much that I spent all evening there...enjoying the view from my 17th floor window as well as the peace and quiet.  I ate dinner in the restaurant, which was practically empty....but the service and the food were excellent.   The short drive to the Anaheim Convention Center was very convenient...I was glad that I chose that hotel, and would stay there again in a heartbeat.  If I had wanted to go shopping, the outlet mall was only 10 minutes away...
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good location with shuttle to Disneyland
Summary: This is my 6th stay in the past year at a Hilton property in the Anaheim area. This one, though not my favorite, was adequate and close by to shopping and restaurants. Though not right across the street, the outlets were within a ten minute walking distance. the fast food was right across the street. Their restaurant staff was great. Very friendly and quick. I am not sure how much the breakfast buffet cost, but it was a great way to start the day. The shuttle ran only every hour on the hour, so this was not the greatest, but we made it work for us. It was free so we could not complain much. The pool is very shaded so even though it was warm outside, it felt very cool underneath all the shade. I love Hilton, so I will continue to stay at their properties. Make sure to book early
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location for shopping the Orange block and Krispy cream donuts very short walk from hotel unless you preferred to drive. Lots of free parking at the outlet. Our room was located on the 5th floor and was able to view the Disneyland fireworks without the noise. Great staff members and the chocolate chip cookies were great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our tour agent really did a good job for choosing this Hotel. I feel great. Beautiful and nice hotel. The waiter and waitress are so friendly. The Hotel is nearby to USS and factory outlet. Strategic place.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fantastic location, excellent place to stay
Summary: This was our first hotel stay in America and we were very happy with our choice. This hotel is in a great location, with just a quick shuttle bus down to Disneyland and California Adventure world -  you are surrounded by terrific places to shop and eat.  All the staff at this hotel are friendly and helpful, and the warm choc chip cookie on arrival was a really nice added touch.  The main thing my family and I enjoyed was going down to the buffet breakfast each morning -  clean, yummy and well priced (especially when you have a handful of kids).  The beds and pillows are probably the most comfiest I've ever experienced in a hotel.  Would stay here again absolutely.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just a couple of miles from Disney and surrounded by places to eat and shop. You'll enjoy your stay here. From the time you enter and the get a friendly reception to the time you get to your room and find a good size clean and fresh room. Bathrooms are clean and well lit. The TV is large and beds firm but comfortable.  They have a nice workout room and a small pool, if you want they will get you a deal at the local gym right across the street.  There is a large shopping mall within a short walk and if you need computer or work "stuff" Best Buy is across the street in the other direction. The Anaheim stadium is also within walking distance.  I would highly recommend it for the price and convenience. Everything is at your fingertips.  If you liked this make sure you mark Helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved this hotel! Staff was wonderful!! Starbucks on site opened at 6!! Bellman were very informational in regards to places to eat/pizza delivery. Gift shop was reasonably priced. Front desk staff was awesome. In fact all employees were friendly and cheerful. Free shuttle to and from Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Probably better for vacation than business
Summary: I recently stayed five nights at the doubletree. I was in one of the unrenovated rooms. It was clean but not spotless. The service was good but not great. There was no in room safe so I had to use the lockbox at the front desk which was a proceedure and not that convenient. Each time I wanted to use it, someone at the front desk would have to help me. Sometimes they made me fill out a slip, sometimes they didn't. They offered free internet on my rate but it was only good for two hours. Bascially coming back into the room from meetings meant I had to log on again. Not a huge deal but if you offer free internet, why not make it continuous. There was also no fridge in the room and one day I returned at 4:30 and housekeeping still hadn't been in to clean. The breakfast is ok and the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very good option for a Disney Stay
Summary: My husband and I stayed a couple of nights here for a quick trip to Disneyland. Several of the hotels walking distance to the park were sold out or very expensive, so we decided to give the Doubletree a try. We stayed in an executive level suite on the 16th floor. We did not have much of a view, but you could see the A from the Angel's stadium from the window in the hallway.  The rooms are spacious and clean. The bathroom was small considering the size of the room, but it was fine for the both of us.  The hotel offers a free shuttle to Disney every hour - it is a large comfortable bus. We took the first bus out to the park and it was completely full. They did have a smaller back up bus so I think everyone was able to get to the park during that trip. Our room came with free
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our Favorite Hotel when Visiting Disneyland
Summary: We stayed in 4 different hotels during our recent vacation in Anaheim and this Doubletree still rises above the rest.  The number one reason is the wonderful staff that is more friendly and accommodating than any other hotel we've stayed in.  They greet you with a friendly smile every time you enter the hotel and are always striving to make your stay the best possible.  The shuttle drivers are especially helpful.    Aside from the staff there are several other things that we really enjoy about this hotel.  We like that it is in a very convenient location.  It is close to a variety of fast food restaurants, grocery stores, Best Buy, Starbucks, and a shopping mall.  We like the free shuttle service that you don't have to share with other hotels and is just a short drive to and
Manager Response: none

Summary: The family and I just completed our stay at the Doubletree in Orange to enjoy four days at Disney. Overall it was a really great experience.  The customer service shown by all staff was truly superb. As a Hilton Honors member we took advantage of the free nightly appetizer at the bar (much larger and satisfying than I would have first guessed) and the complimentary continental breakfast.  Two days we decided pastries, cereal and fruit were good enough and two days we chose to upgrade to the full buffet for $7 more.  Not bad if you ask me.  The shuttle to Disney is truly free (not many are still doing that) and the drivers are great.  The pool area was a big hit with kiddos.  We hit it up every late afternoon and pretty much had it to ourselves.  Location next to the block is
Manager Response: none

Summary: Tried this hotel with some doubts after reading negative reviews on this site. But we are pleasantly surprised. Good location to explore the OC or go to Disneyland. UCI MC is next door and you might occasionally hear sirens from trucks - I only heard it once during our stay. Friendly staff, cookies on arrival, order extra amenities online prior to touchdown. Room is clean, spacious and quiet at night. Bed feels great. Internet access is free (slower speed) in the room - which is really nice. Great choice of shampoo and conditioner - Crabtree.  The downside: No vanity mirror in the bath, the trash bins are too small. No safe in the room but counter has it for use. Self park for $13 a day - is that a neg or positive??
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hotel for visiting Disney's California Adventure
Summary: First, I am a Hilton Honors gold member. Checked in and received our delicious cookies! Our room was on the 18th floor and I appreciated that you had to use your room key to access the top floors. We received a free continental breakfast and you could also use the voucher for Starbuck's coffee and a muffin. We took the free shuttle to Disney. They ran from 7:30 am until 12:15 am. We also received a voucher for a free appetizer from the bar. The chicken wings were delicious and very tasty! Our room had a great view and we could see the Tower of Terror from our room. We had a safe, but would have liked to have a refrigerator and microwave. Overall a great stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice reasonably priced hotel.  Good for business travel or personal.  Restaruants near by within walking distance.  I was there on business but I saw lots of people there returning on the hotel shuttle from Disneyland vacation looking very happy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Recommend: Yes  Room: Stayed in a standard room but with 2 queen beds; room was large, clean and the beds and pillows were amazingly comfortable! Perhaps a little out dated but don’t get put off by that as the room size and the bed more than make up for it.  Bathroom: Clean and big enough- no complaints here  Location: We had a car but even so, was excellent. As its in Orange County, I think the hotel may have been cheaper than Anaheim – although don’t quote me on that!   Services:  The free shuttle bus to Disneyland is excellent – when going to Disneyland; the only criticism was coming back as it was a bit more hectic as even though we go to the stop to catch the 2nd last bus, there were still about 40 people waiting after the supposed last bus had left.  But a few phone calls
Manager Response: none

Summary: LOCATION This hotel is officially and deceptively listed as "Doubletree by Hilton Hotel Anaheim - Orange County."  This hotel is NOT located in Anaheim; it's in the City of Orange, adjacent to Anaheim.  Disneyland (the Mickey and Friends Parking Garage) is 4 miles/8 minutes away by Interstate 5.  If you're looking for the Doubletree closest to Disneyland, that would be "Doubletree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center," which is 1 mile from the park.  If you go to the hotel's listed address of 100 The City Drive South as we did,,and judging from the signage most guests do, you will be at the employee parking and service entrance.  It does not connect to the main entrance.  Save yourself the U-turn and the drive around the block.  When you exit Interstate 10
Manager Response: none

Summary: We know what to expect when we come to this property for our Disneyland treks and have never been disappointed.  Tripadvisor IS displayed prominently on their entrance electronic events and information board.  From a friendly quick check in, to a hello from the bell hop, and may we help you with your luggage?  I know these are frequent questions to most travelers, but it is still nice to hear that someone wants to be of service to you.  We called for extra wash cloths and they were delivered within ten minutes.   Our stay over Saturday, October 1st through Wednesday, October 5th we observed that the hotel was not crowded or did it appear that there were any scheduled events at the hotel.  It takes less than 10 minutes to drive or be driven to the Disneyland Resort or DLR parking
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is one fantastic hotel! The employees are quite friendly and helpful, the rooms are clean and spacious, and the grounds are pleasant. The free shuttle to Disneyland is also a great feature. The only negatives are the lack of: free Wifi, refrigerators and microwaves as standard features of all guest rooms. It is close to an outlet mall which is chock full of great restaurants. I would definitely return!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Bright and cheerful hotel with super friendly staff
Summary: This hotel is very pleasant with bright and cheerful decor, very spacious rooms, comfortable beds and  an on-site restaurant and bar.  The restaurant has a good breakfast buffet featuring your choice of continental breakfast or full, hot breakfast (not free, unfortunately, but at average cost for a hotel buffet) and the bar has a very pleasant patio adjoining. Even though the hotel is quite accessible to the freeway it is not particularly noisy.  There is no airport shuttle but the hotel has shuttle service to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland, both within about a mile or so.  Regular airport shuttle service is $10 and a cab about $30 to the John Wayne airport.  Beyond all other positives are the friendly and helpful staff.  Everywhere I went in the hotel, staff were
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked this hotel through Priceline, my first time every using that website. I was a bit nervous about using it, but was very happily surprised. This hotel was booked for a birthday trip for myself and my fiance to the Disneyland Resort.   The Good: The hotel is only about 3 miles from Disneyland. Driving time was about 10 minutes, but very easy access to/from the freeway. The rooms were very nice, towels in the bathroom were comfortable, bed and sheets were comfortable. LOVED the fact that you can control the temperature of your room and not just select hot or cold like a lot of hotels. And housekeeping didn't mess with the temperature while we were out of the room for the day. The room had free coffee and tea, which was nice. There was no microwave or refrigerator, but that
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was in Anaheim for business conference which was hosted by the Doubletree.  Was greeted by friendly staff everywhere from the desk, to the concierge, to the wait staff in the restaurant to the housekeepers.  This was clean and decorated very nice.  Not sure where the outdated rooms comment comes from as this was as modern and well appointed as any place I have stayed.  The beds were comfy and the AC unit was beyond a doubledoubt the absolute quietest I have ever had in a hotel room(and yes it was working!)  I am always annoyed by the noisy AC units that freeze you or cook you. This was top of the line digital thermostat controlled unit.  Premium.  Double queen beds, double flat screens with game station. This was one of the nicest places I have stayed at. Walking distance to

Summary Heading: Great place for a Orange County & Disneyland Vist
Summary: This was our first stay at the Double Tree in Orange County.  The staff here is extremely friendly and they who doesn't looked the fresh cookies you receive during check in.  This hotel is located by the freeway for easy access and they also have the Block Mall right across the street within walking distance.  For our family we enjoyed that the hotel has a FREE shuttle to the Disneyland Resort which is only a short distance away.  The shuttle drop off is right by the main entrance and they run very frequently.  The hotel itself also has a Starbucks in the lobby although it is not full service and doesn't offer all full menu.  There is also a regular Starbucks and a Wendy's restaurant right across the street.  Over all we enjoyed our stay here and would recommend it to any one

Summary Heading: Not what I expected from DoubleTree!
Summary: The rooms are old and the keys dont work, every tIme we leave the room we have too get a new key.  it was annoying to walk all the way to our rooms and come back agaIn because the key just won't work. Not cool!

Summary Heading: Front desk staff very courteous and helpful.
Summary: We stayed one night for our anniversary and when we checked in the front desk Don and William were very cordial in greeting us.  After we checked in she upgraded our room to a nicer room for our anniversary.  The room however smelled very strong of cigarettes and so We had to up the AC to clean the air.  The staff sent up a platter of crackers and cheese and grapes with a bottle of wine, courtesy of the Double Tree for our anniversary.  This was such a sweet thing to do.  You do not get that kind of service from a hotel often anymore.  We had a pleasant visit, the room was clean, NO bed bugs, nice lounge and restaurant with nice wait service and of course your the best Don and William for thinking of us two on our anniversary.  We shall see you again next year!

Summary: Pro Parking is only $16 --> better than most other places in the area with in/out privilege and plenty of spaces.  Free internet (good connection) Good customer service Close to local attraction Fridge and microwave in the room. Free oatmeal chocolate cookies Extremely comfortable beds and blankets   Con Thin walls - can heard people talking in the hallway Bathroom has some design issues: tub is narrow and arms keep hitting walls while showering and when using the toilet arm keep catching onto toilet roll (i am average size).  Leaky shower head and shower knobs are old and hard to turn.   Overall its a good hotel to stay the night, but no more than several days.

Summary: My husband and I booked this hotel for two nights so we could celebrate our 35th wedding anniversary at Disneyland.  Thanks to Doubletree by Hilton, this special occasion was just perfect!  We were upgraded to one of the newly remodeled rooms on the 17th floor and it was beautiful...the king bed was super-comfortable.  And the view was awesome...especially being able to enjoy the spectacular Disneyland fireworks!  We didn't have time to enjoy room service, but the complimentary chocolate chip cookies and bottle of wine delivered to our room were delightful!  The "Sweet Ride" (shuttle service) to and from Disneyland was fun and much appreciated.  We have stayed in all of the upscale hotels in the Disneyland area and this one is now our favorite where we will hope to stay on all
